# title:                Laghano Lya Sambi Kwe Iwanu Wose<br>Laghano Lya Sambi Kwe Iwanu Wose

40001001	Chitabu cha lukolo lwa Yesu Kiristu , mtsukulu wa Daudi , iyakalile mtsukulu wa Abrahamu .
40001002	Abrahamu tsakamweleka Isaka , Isaka kamweleka Yakobu , Yakobu kamweleka Yuda na ndughu tsake ,
40001003	Yuda kaweleka Peresi na Sela , mai wawo tsakakala Tamari , Peresi kamweleka Hesironi , Esironi kamweleka Aramu ,
40001004	Aramu kamweleka Aminadabu , Aminadabu kamweleka Nasoni , Nasoni kamweleka Salimoni ,
40001005	Salimoni kamweleka Boasi , mai wake Boasi tsakakala Rahabu , Boasi kamweleka Obedi kwa Rutu , Obedi kamweleka Yese ,
40001006	Yese kamweleka Mndewa Daudi , naye Daudi kamweleka Selemani , mai wake Selemani tsakakala mwehe wa Uriya .
40001007	Selemani kamweleka Rehoboamu , Rehoboamu kamweleka Abiya , Abiya kamweleka Asa ,
40001008	Asa kamweleka Yehoshafati , Yehoshafati kamweleka Yoramu , Yoramu kamweleka Uzia ,
40001009	Uzia kamweleka Yosamu , Yosamu kamweleka Ahasi , Ahasi kamweleka Hesekiya ,
40001010	Hesekiya kamweleka Manase , Manase kamweleka Amoni , Amoni kamweleka Yosiya ,
40001011	Yosiya kamweleka Yekoniya na ndughu tsake mne ghamatsuwa ghala Wayahudi ghawaghalighwe Babeli .
40001012	Wayahudi hawakalile Babeli , Yekoniya kamweleka Setieli , Setieli kamweleka Serubabeli ,
40001013	Serubabeli kamweleka Abihudi , Abihudi kamweleka Eliyakimu , Eliyakimu kamweleka Asori ,
40001014	Asori kamweleka Sadoki , Sadoki kamweleka Akimu , Akimu kamweleka Eliudi ,
40001015	Eliudi kamweleka Eliasali , Eliasali kamweleka Matani , Matani kamweleka Yakobu ,
40001016	Yakobu kamweleka Yosefu , mmale wake Mariya , mai wake Yesu iyokemighwa Kiristu Mkombotsi .
40001017	Apfo tsakukala na pfeleko kumi na nne kulawa Abrahamu mbaka Daudi , na pfeleko kumi na nne kulawa Daudi mbaka Wayahudi hawaghalighwe akula Babeli , na pfeleko kumi na nne kulawa Wayahudi hawaghalighwe Babeli mbaka kwelekighwa kwa Kiristu Mkombotsi .
40001018	Ukwelekighwa kwa Yesu Kiristu tsakukala pfino , Mariya mai wake Yesu tsakalapfighwa tsengele na Yosefu , lekeni ng'ana wawase hamwe bae , Mariya tsakoneka kana inda kwa uwetso wa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
40001019	Kwaapfila Yosefu tsakakala imunu yanoghile , ng'abamile bae kumghela ichinyala Mariya , apfo kabama yamleke chinyelenyele .
40001020	Hang'ali yakwalangula chinu acho , Malaika kamlawila mndoto kamlongela , “ Yosefu mwana wa Daudi , uleke kupfuka kumsola Mariya yawe mwehe wako , kwaapfila inda yake ilawa kwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
40001021	Katsakwelekela imwana mmale , naghwe kutsomwing'a taghwa Yesu . Kwaapfila katsowakombola iwanu wake kulawa mne nzambi tsawo . ”
40001022	Ghose ghano ghalawila kutimilitsa aghala ghayalongile Imtwatsa kubitila nabii ,
40001023	“ Mwali ng'ana yawase na mmale katsokinda inda , katsomweleka imwana , nawo watsomkema Imanweli ! Mana yake , Imulungu kahamwe na twetwe . ”
40001024	Apfo Yosefu hayalamke katenda ka malaika pfayamlongele , kamsola Mariya , mwehe wake .
40001025	Lekeni ng'awasile naye bae mbaka hayeleke imwana . Yosefu kamwing'a litaghwa imwana ayo Yesu .
40002001	Yesu tsakoneka mne ghumji ghwa Betilehemu mne isi ya Yudeya , ghamatsuwa ghala Herodi hakalile Imndewa . Iwanu iwomanya igholawila kwa kulola tsinondo iwalawile ubali wa kwalilawila litsua tsawatsa Yerusalemu ,
40002002	waghutsa , “ Yalikwani imndewa wa Wayahudi yelekighwe ? Tuyona inondo yake kulawa ubali wa kwalilawila litsua , kuya tutsa kumtamanila . ”
40002003	Imndewa Herodi na iwanu wose iwali Yerusalemu hawahulike apfo , tsawaghanzika .
40002004	Herodi kawakema hamwe iwatambika wakulu na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso , kawaghutsa , “ Kiristu Mkombotsi yatsakonekela kwani ? ”
40002005	Wamwidika , “ Katsakonekela Betilehemu mne isi ya Yudeya , kwaapfila yandikighwa na nabii ,
40002006	‘ Naghwe Betilehemu yuli mne isi ya Yuda , ng'auli mdodo bae mne ipfilongotsi wa Yudeya , kwaapfila kuna ghweghwe katsolawila chilongotsi , naye katsokuwa imdimi we iwanu wangu we Isiraeli . ’ ”
40002007	Kuya Herodi kawakema chinyelenyele awala iwanu iwomanya igholawila kwa kulola tsinondo ili wamlongele inondo tsailawile tsuwachi .
40002008	Kuya kawatuma Betilehemu , kawalongela , “ Mghende mkabame pfinoghile kwayali imwana . Baho hamtsomwona muye mnilongele ili na nene nighende nikamtamanile . ”
40002009	Nawo hawamalitse kumhulikitsa imndewa tsawoka , na inondo iyawonile kulawa ubali wa kwalilawila litsuwa iwalongotsa na ukwima hanu kwayakalile imwana .
40002010	Hawayonile inondo ayo , wadeng'elela sideke .
40002011	Apfo wengila mng'anda , wamwona imwana hamwe na Mariya mai wake , nawo wenama hambele hake , wamtamanila . Kuya wapfughula imikoba yawo , wamwing'a nzawadi , nzahabu , upfumba na dawa inoghile iikemighwa manemane .
40002012	Kuya woya ukaye yawo kwa inzila ingi , kwaapfila Imulungu tsakawakanya mndoto waleke kumuyila Herodi .
40002013	Iwanu awo hawokile , malaika kamlawila Yosefu mndoto kamlongela , “ Winuke , umsole imwana na mai wake , mtsumile Misiri . Mkale ako mbaka hanitsokulongela , kwaapfila Herodi kobama yamkome imwana . ”
40002014	Apfo Yosefu kalamka , kamsola imwana na mai wake ichilo chicho , waghenda Misiri .
40002015	Tsakakala ako mbaka Herodi hayafile . Chinu acho chitendeka ili imbuli yalongile Imtwatsa kubitila nabii itimile , “ Tsanimkema mwanangu kulawa Misiri . ”
40002016	Herodi hayatangile ka iwanu iwomanya igholawila kwa kulola tsinondo wamghutsukila , tsakona maya ng'ani . Kalapfa laghitso iwana wose iwamale iwali Betilehemu na awala iwali habehi wakomighwe , iwana iwakalile na miyaka mili na awala ing'awapfikile miyaka mili kulawa litsuwa lila iwanu wala hawayonile inondo .
40002017	Kuya achila ichilongighwe na nabii Yeremiya chitimila ,
40002018	“ Listi lyohulikighwa ako Rama , chililo cha usungu mkulu , Raheli kowalilila iwanaghe naye kolema kukanzighwa , kwaapfila wose wafa . ”
40002019	Herodi hayafile , malaika we Imtwatsa kamlawila Yosefu mndoto mne isi ya Misiri ,
40002020	kamlongela , “ Winuke , umsole imwana na mai wake muye Isiraeli , kwaapfila awala iwabamile kumkoma imwana , wose ma wafa . ”
40002021	Apfo Yosefu kenuka , kamsola imwana na mai wake woya Isiraeli .
40002022	Lekeni Yosefu hayahulike Akelao kawa mndewa hanu ha Herodi , aba wake ako Yudeya , tsakapfuka kughenda ako , naye kwaapfila kakanyighwa mndoto , tsakaghenda Galilaya ,
40002023	kuya kakala mne ghumji ghwa Natsareti . Apfo chitimila achila ichilongighwe na manabii , “ Katsokemighwa Mnasaleti . ”
40003001	Imiyaka mingi hambele Yohane Mbatitsa tsakaghenda mne inyika ya Yudeya , kandusa kuwapetela iwanu .
40003002	Kalonga , “ Mtsileke nzambi tsenu kwaapfila Undewa wa kulanga wa habehi ! ”
40003003	Yohane iyo imunu iyalongighwe ne nabii Isaya , “ Litsi lye imunu lyokema kunyika , ‘ Muiyandae inzila ye Imtwatsa , mgholoseleni inzila yake . ’ ”
40003004	Yohane tsakapfala ghamaghwanda ighatendighwe kwe imighala ye ngamiya , na ghumsipi ghwe ingotsi mchuno , chijo chake tsachikala iwanzighe ne uki ye kwibagho .
40003005	Iwanu wamghendela kulawa Yerusalemu , Yudeya yose na kulawa mne isi tsose itsili habehi ne ghumto Yoridani .
40003006	Watsitoghola nzambi tsawo na kutsileka , naye kawabatitsa mne ghumto Yoridani .
40003007	Yohane hawonile Mafarisayo na Masadukayo wengi womtsila yawabatitse , kawalongela , “ Mwemwe iwana we nzoka ! Yuhi yawalongele mwodaha kuhepa ukuhighighwa ne Imulungu ikukutsa ?
40003008	Mtende aghala igholangusa ka mtsileka nzambi tsenu .
40003009	Mleke kwipfikitsa ka mwodaha kuhepa ukuhighighwa ne Imulungu kwa kulonga mwinaye aba wenu Abrahamu . Nomlongelani ghendo , Imulungu kodaha kumtendela Abrahamu iwana kulawa mne ghamabwe ghano .
40003010	Hoya ma ikighwa mmasina mwe imibiki , apfo chila mbiki ing'aukweleka ghamatunda ghanoghile woghanighwa na kwasighwa mmoto .
40003011	Nene nowabatitsa kwa ghamatsi kulangusa ka mtsileka nzambi tsenu . Lekeni ayo iyakutsa kuchughu kwangu kana ingupfu kubita nene , nene sibamighwa bae hata kughala imikwabatsa yake . Ayo katsowabatitsa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na kwa ghumoto .
40003012	Lungo lwake lwe ukubetela lwa mmoko mwake . Naye katsokunga uhemba na kuwika mkano , na katsolakatsa mikumvi mne ghumoto ing'aghutsimika bae . ”
40003013	Kuya Yesu kalawa Galilaya , kaghenda ghumto Yoridani kubatisighwa na Yohane .
40003014	Lekeni Yohane tsakabama yamghome , kalonga , “ Nene nobamighwa nibatitsighwe naghwe , naghwe konitsila nene ? ”
40003015	Yesu kamwidika , “ Uleke sambi iwe pfipfo . Kwaapfila twobamighwa kughatenda aghala ghose ghobama Imulungu . ” Kuya Yohane katoghola .
40003016	Yesu hayamalitse kubatisighwa , bahala kalawa mmatsi . Baho lilanga lipfughuka , kamwona Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kohulumka ka njiwa na kumtsila mchanya mwake .
40003017	Kuya litsi kulawa kulanga lilonga , “ Ayuno Imwanangu iyoninoghela , noghelighwa naye . ”
40004001	Kuya Yesu kalongotsighwa na Ghumuhe we Imulungu mbaka kunyika yaghetsighwe na Yehile .
40004002	Tsakafunga ukuja ghamatsuwa alubaini chilo na misi , kuya tsakona nzala .
40004003	Baho Setani kamghendela , kamlongela , “ Ka ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu , ghalongele ghamabwe ghano ghawe pfighate . ”
40004004	Yesu kamwidika , “ Yandikighwa mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka . ‘ Imunu ng'odaha bae kuwa mghima kwa chijo chiliyeka , ila kwa chila imbuli iyolonga Imulungu . ’ ”
40004005	Kuya Setani kamsola Yesu mbaka Yerusalemu , ghumji ghwenzeluke , kamwika mchiswili ghendo mwe Ing'anda ye Imulungu .
40004006	Kuya kamlongela , “ Ka ghweghwe kwa Imwana we Imulungu , wilaghatse hasi , kwaapfila yandikighwa , ‘ Imulungu katsowalaghitsa wamalaika wake , nawo watsokukinda kwa ghamoko ghawo , uleke kwilagha mne ghamabwe . ’ ”
40004007	Yesu kamwidika , “ Pfipfila yandikighwa , ‘ Uleke kumghetsa Imtwatsa Imulungu wako . ’ ”
40004008	Kuya Setani kamsola keli mbaka mne chidando chitali ng'ani , kamlangusa undewa wose we isi na ukulu wose we isi .
40004009	Kuya kamlongela , “ Ung'enama hambele hangu na kunitamanila , nitsokwing'a ghano ghose . ”
40004010	Yesu kamlongela , “ Ghenda Setani ! Kwaapfila yandikighwa , ‘ Umtamanile Imtwatsa Imulungu wako , umtumikile yeye yaliyeka ! ’ ”
40004011	Kuya Setani kamleka Yesu , na wamalaika watsa wamtumikila .
40004012	Yesu hayahulike Yohane wamwika mchifungo , koka Galilaya .
40004013	Kalawa Natsareti , kaghenda kukala Kaperinaumu , isi iili habehi ne tsimbu lya Galilaya , na iibakane ne isi ya Sabuloni na ya Nafutali .
40004014	Achino chitendeka ili achila chayalongile nabii Isaya chitimile ,
40004015	“ Isi ya Sabuloni na isi ya Nafutali , inzila ya kughendela mna bahali , kumwambu mwe Yoridani . Galilaya , isi ye iwanu iwali si Wayahudi !
40004016	“ Iwanu iwokala mchisi watsakona ghumwanga . Awala iwokala mne isi ye chimbeho che lifwa ghumwanga ghutsowamwemwesela . ”
40004017	Kulawa matsuwa agho Yesu kanza kuwapetela usenga wake , “ Mleke kutenda nzambi , kwaapfila undewa wa kulanga wa habehi . ”
40004018	Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu lya Galilaya , kawona iwandughu weli , Simoni iyakemighwe Petiri na ndughu yake Andereya . Tsawang'ali wolowa iwasomba kwa nyapfu mne tsimbu lya .
40004019	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mniwinze , nani nitsowatenda muwe iwalowa we iwanu . ”
40004020	Bahala watsileka nyapfu tsawo , wamuwinza .
40004021	Haghendile hambele chidogho , kawona iwandughu wangi weli , Jakobu imwana we Sebedayo na ndughu yake Yohane . Tsawakala mne mnumbwi hamwe na aba wawo Sebedayo , wotenda nyapfu tsawo . Yesu kawakema ,
40004022	bahala waghuleka mnumbwi na aba wawo , wamuwinza .
40004023	Yesu tsakanga Galilaya yose , kalangulitsa mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela , kawapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile ye Undewa we Imulungu na kawahonetsa iwanu wane matamu ghose .
40004024	Mbuli tsake tsenela mne isi yose ya Siriya , apfo iwanu wamghalila iwatamu wose , iwoghula utamu wowose , awala iwodununzika , wane pfinyamkela , iwakughwa chisala na awala iwaholole , naye kawahonetsa .
40004025	Na iwanu wengi wamuwinza kulawa Galilaya , isi tsa Dekapoli , Yerusalemu , Yudeya ne isi ili kumwambu mwa ghumto Yoridani .
40005001	Yesu hawonile mtingano ghwe iwanu , kagheluka mchidunda , kuya kakala hasi . Iwanang'ina wake wamghendela ,
40005002	naye kandusa kuwalangulitsa ,
40005003	Wabweda iwanu wala iwomuhuwila Imulungu , kwaapfila Undewa we kulanga wawo .
40005004	Wabweda awala wane usungu , kwaapfila watsokanzighwa .
40005005	Wabweda awala iwahole , kwaapfila watsoihala iisi .
40005006	Wabweda awala wane inzala ne ing'ilu ya kutenda ghayobama Imulungu , kwaapfila Imulungu katsowaghutitsa .
40005007	Wabweda awala wane libatsi , kwaapfila Imulungu katsowonela libatsi .
40005008	Wabweda awala wane imimoyo inoghile , kwaapfila watsomwona Imulungu .
40005009	Wabweda awala iwalamulitsi , kwaapfila watsokemighwa iwana we Imulungu .
40005010	Wabweda awala iwodununzika kwa kutenda aghala ghayobama Imulungu , kwaapfila undewa wa kulanga wawo .
40005011	“ Mbweda iwanu hawatsomlighani na kumdununzani na kumlongani pfihile kwa ughutsu , kwaapfila mwemwe mwoniwinza nene .
40005012	Mdeng'e na kudeng'elela kwaapfila ghweko lyenu kulu likighwa kulanga , apfi pfipfo manabii wa ghumwande we Imulungu pfawadununzike hala ng'ana mwemwe mwelekighwe .
40005013	“ Mwemwe mwa imunyu ye isi . Lekeni imunyu ing'ahinyika , angu mtsoghuma choni mbaka ikole keli ? Yahela sang'ano bae , apfo yakwasighwa kunze na iwanu woibayugha .
40005014	“ Mwemwe mwa ghumwanga ghwe iisi . Kaye ing'awa mchidando ng'aidaha bae kwipfisa .
40005015	Iwanu ng'awotuwa bae chitasa na kuchighubika ne iseghe , ila wochika hanu ha kwikila chitasa , nacho chowamulikila iwanu wose iwali mng'anda .
40005016	Pfipfila namwe ghumwanga ghwenu ghumulike hambele he iwanu , nawo waghone ghala ighanoghile ighamtenda , wamtunitse Aba wenu iyali kulanga .
40005017	“ Mleke kupfikitsa ka nene nitsa kuleghusa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa au pfitabu pfe manabii we Imulungu . Sitsile bae kuleghusa , ila nitsa kutimilitsa .
40005018	Nowalongelani ghendo , mbaka lilanga ne isi hapfitsohupa , kuduhu imbuli ndodo mne Ghamalaghitso iitsoleghusighwa mbaka ghose ghatimile .
40005019	Imunu wowose iyolema kukinda laghitso dodo kulawa mne Ghamalaghitso ghano na kuwalangulitsa iwanu wangi watende pfipfo , ayo katsokuwa mdodo mne undewa wa kulanga . Lekeni ayula iyokinda Ghamalaghitso na kuwalangulitsa iwanu watende pfipfo , ayo katsokemighwa mkulu mne undewa wa kulanga .
40005020	Nowalongelani ghendo , ka ng'amtenda bae ghobama Imulungu kubita pfawotenda Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso , ng'amtsokwingila bae mne undewa wa kulanga .
40005021	“ Muhulika iwanu wa ghumwande pfawalongelighwe , ‘ Mleke kukoma , na imunu wowose ang'akoma katsohighighwa . ’
40005022	Lekeni nene nowalongelani ghendo , imunu wowose iyomwonela maya ndughu yake , katsohighighwa . Na ayula iyombetsa ndughu yake katsoghalighwa kune libaratsa , na ayula iyomkema ndughu yake , ‘ Mbotsi ! ’ ayo kahabehi ukwingila mne ghumoto ghwa jehanamu .
40005023	Ka komlapfila Imulungu wako nambiko hanu ha kutambikila , na kwokumbuka tsakwisonga na ndughu yako ,
40005024	tanu uileke nambiko yako hanu aho , ughende wikelamlitse na ndughu yako , kuya uye uilapfe nambiko yako .
40005025	“ Wilamle ne imunu iyakughalile kune libaratsa . Utende apfo mng'ali mnzila , hela katsokughala kwe imlamulitsi na imlamulitsi katsokughala kwe asikali mkulu , naye katsokwika mchifungo .
40005026	Nokungela ghendo , ng'utsolawa bae mbaka ulihe sendi yose .
40005027	“ Muhulika tsailongighwa , ‘ Mleke ughoni . ’
40005028	Lekeni nene nowalongelani , imunu wowose iyomlolesa ipinga kwa kumbama , ayo ma katenda naye ughoni mmoyo mwake .
40005029	Ka inenge yako ya kujilo yokuhonza utende ghehile , uing'ole uyase kutali naghwe . Ng'apfu kwaghisa chilungo chako chimwe , kubita kululeka lukuli lwako lwose lwasighwe mne ghumoto ghwa jehanamu .
40005030	Na ghumoko ghwako ghwa kujilo ka wokuhonza utende ghehile , ughane , ughwase kutali naghwe . Ng'apfu kwaghisa chilungo chimwe , kubita kululeka lukuli lwako lwose lwasighwe mne ghumoto ghwa Jehanamu .
40005031	“ Tsailongighwa , ‘ Imunu wowose iyomleka mwehe wake kobamighwa yamwing'e talaka . ’
40005032	Lekeni nene nomlongelani , imunu wowose iyomleka mwehe wake , ila kwaapfila katenda ughoni , komtenda yawe mghoni , na imunu wowose iyomkwela ipinga yalekighwe , naye kotenda utsinzi .
40005033	“ Kuya muhulika iwanu wa ghumwande pfawalongelighwe , ‘ Uleke kubena lilaghano , ila ukindilise lilaghano lyako kwe Imtwatsa . ’
40005034	Lekeni nene nomlongelani , mleke kwilaha , wala kwa kulanga , kwaapfila acho chighoda che undewa we Imulungu ,
40005035	au kwilaha kwe isi , kwaapfila aho hanu he ukwikila ghamaghulu ghake , wala kwa Yerusalemu , kwaapfila agho ghumji ghwe Imndewa Mkulu .
40005036	Wala mleke kwilaha kwa litwi , kwaapfila ng'amdaha bae kulutenda lupfili lumwe luwe lutselu au lutitu .
40005037	Mng'alonga ‘ Ona , ’ iwe ‘ Ona , ’ na mng'alonga ‘ Bae , ’ iwe ‘ Bae . ’ Ichinu chochose kubita agha , cholawa kwa Yehile .
40005038	“ Muhulika tsailongighwa , ‘ Inenge kwa inenge , na tsino kwa tsino . ’
40005039	Lekeni nene nowalongelani , mleke kwihisanya ne imunu yehile . Imunu ang'akutowa kanza lya kujilo , pfipfila umleke yakutowe kanza lya kumoso .
40005040	Na imunu ang'abama kukughala kune libaratsa ili asole lighwanda lyako , mleke asole na likoti lyako pfipfila .
40005041	Ka imunu kokubama umghalile mtsigho ghwake kwa utali wa chilomita imwe , umghalile kwa chilomita mbili .
40005042	Umwing'e ayula iyokulomba , na ayula iyobama kukukopa uleke kumwima .
40005043	“ Muhulika tsailongighwa , ‘ Mnoghele miyagho , na umhile mwihile wako . ’
40005044	Lekeni nene nowalongelani , muwanoghele iwehile wenu na muwalombele awala iwomdununzani ,
40005045	ili muwe iwana wa Aba wenu iyali kulanga . Kwaapfila litsuwa lyake lyowamwemwesela iwanu iwehile na iwanu iwanoghile , naye kowatowela imvula iwanu iwanoghile na iwanu iwehile .
40005046	Ka mwowanoghela iwanu wala iwomnoghelani mwemwe waliheka , mtsopata ghweko lyachi ? Apfi iwasola kodi ng'awotenda pfipfo bae ?

40005048	Muwe watimilifu , ka Aba wenu iyali kulanga pfayali mtimilifu .
40006001	“ Mwalangitse , mleke kutenda ghanoghile hambele he iwanu ili wamwoneni . Mng'atenda apfo , ng'amtsopata ghweko bae kulawa kwa Aba wenu iyali kulanga .
40006002	“ Apfo hauweng'a iwahingwa chinu chochose , uleke kwilangusa kwe iwanu . Uleke kutenda ka wang'enye pfawotenda mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela na mne tsinzila , ili iwanu wawatoghole . Nowalongelani ghendo , ma wabokela ghweko lyawo lyose .

40010001	Yesu tsakawakema hamwe iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli , kaweng'a uwetso wa ukulapfa pfinyamkela na kuhonetsa utamu na maghayo ghose .

40010005	Yesu tsakawatuma Iwatumighwa awo , kawalaghitsa , “ Mleke kughenda kwe iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu bae , au mne isi tse Wasamariya .

40010010	Mleke kusola mkoba we ghumwanza , wala ghamaghwanda meli , wala imikwabatsa , wala ing'weku . Kwaapfila mtenda isang'ano kobamighwa yeng'ighwe maliho ghake .
40010011	“ Hamkwingila mne isi au kaye yoyose , mbame imunu yanoghile , mkale mng'anda amwo mbaka hamkuka .

40010026	“ Apfo mleke kupfuka iwanu . Chochose ichighubikighwe , chitsoghubulighwa na chochose ichipfisighwe chitsakoneka .

40010029	Apfi iwasolwe weli ng'awoghulighwa kwa sendi imwe bae ? Lekeni kuduhu yumwe iyolaghala hasi ka Aba wenu ng'abamile bae .

40010034	“ Mleke kupfikitsa ka nene nitsa kuwatenda iwanu wakale tseghamba muisi . Mbe ! Sitsile bae kuwatenda iwanu wakale tseghamba , ila nighala lipanga .
40010035	Kwaapfila nitsa kuwatenda mwisonge , imunu na aba wake , imwana na mai wake , mwalipfala na mwalipfala wake .

40010037	“ Imunu wowose iyomnoghela aba na mai wake kubita nene , ayo ng'oninoghela bae . Na imunu iyowanoghela iwanaghe kubita nene , ayo ng'oninoghela bae .
40010038	Na imunu wowose yang'osola ghumsalaba ghwake na kuniwinza , ayo ng'oninoghela bae .

40011001	Yesu hayamalitse kuwalangulitsa iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli , koka hanu aho kaghenda kulangulitsa na kuwapetela iwanu mne imiji ya Galilaya .

40013017	Nowalongela ghendo , manabii wengi ne iwanu we Imulungu tsawabama ng'ani wone achila chamkona mwemwe , na ukuhulika achila chamuhulika , lekeni ng'awonile bae wala ng'awahulike .
40013018	“ Lelo mtegheletse mana ya ghumfano ghwe imunu iyohanda .
40013019	Imunu wowose iyohulika imbuli ya undewa lekeni ng'oielewa bae , ayo keghala na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mnzila . Yehile kakutsa koboka achila ichihandighwe mghati mwake .
40013020	Tsimbeghu tsila itsilaghalile mna ghamabwe tseghala ne imunu yohulika imbuli na bahala koibokela kwa ndeng'elelo .
40013021	Lekeni kwaapfila kahela imitsitsi , kodudumila chidogho . Ghamaghayo na kudununzika pfing'atsa kwaajili ye imbuli , baho kakughwa .
40013022	Tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne tsimiwa tseghala ne imunu yula iyohulika imbuli , lekeni sang'ano tse ughima uno , na kunoghela sideke utajili woihinya imbuli ayo , nae ng'akweleka bae ghamatunda .
40013023	Na tsimbeghu itsilaghalile mne lidongo linoghile tseghala ne imunu yula iyohulika imbuli ayo na kuielewa . Hayo kakweleka ghamatunda , yungi mia imwe , hayu sitini na yungi selathini . ”

40013033	Yesu kawalongela keli ghumfano ghungi , “ Undewa wa kulanga weghala ne hamila iisolighwe ne pinga yumwe na kuhanganya mne utimbo mwingi , nawo wose usasa . ”

40014001	Mne ghamatsuwa agho , mndewa Herodi tsakahulika mbuli tsa Yesu .

40017001	Haghabitile matsuwa sita , Yesu kamsola Petiri , Jakobu na Yohane ndughu yake Jakobu , kaghenda nawo waliyeka mchidando mwe chidunda chitali .
40017002	Hawang'ali wolola , bahala Yesu kaghaluka . Chihanga chake tsaching'ala ka litsua , na ghamaghwanda ghake ghawa matselu chwee ka ghumwanga !
40017003	Kuya Musa na Eliya walawila , walonga naye .
40017004	Petiri kamlongela Yesu , “ Mndewa , pfinogha twetwe kukala hano ! Ung'abama nene nitsosenga pfibumbulika pfidatu , chimwe chako , chimwe cha Musa na chimwe cha Eliya . ”
40017005	Hayang'ali yolonga , libingu iling'alile liwaghubika , na litsi kulawa mne libingu lila lilonga , “ Ayuno Mwanangu iyoninoghela , nonoghelighwa naye . Mumtegheletse ! ”
40017006	Iwanang'ina hawahulike apfo , wapfuka ng'ani , watowa maghoti wenama mbaka pfihanga pfawo pfidonza hasi .
40017007	Yesu kawaghendela kawaghutsa , kawalongela , “ Mwinuke , mleke kupfuka ! ”
40017008	Hawalolile kuchanya , ng'awonile imunu bae ila Yesu yaliheka .
40017009	Hawang'ali wohulumka mchidando , Yesu kawalaghitsa , “ Mleke kumlongela imunu wowose achila chamwonile mbaka Imwana we Imunu hayatsotsilihuka . ”
40017010	Kuya iwanang'ina wamghutsa , “ Lelo ule iwalangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Eliya kobamighwa tanu yatse ? ”
40017011	Yesu kawedika , “ Tanu Eliya kakutsa ghendo . Naye katsokwika ghoya ipfinu pfose .
40017012	Nowalongelani , Eliya ma katsa , ila ng'awamtangile bae . Nawo wamtendela ghose ghawabamile . Pfipfila watsomdununza Imwana we Imunu . ”
40017013	Kuya iwanang'ina tsawamanya ka Yesu yang'ali yowalongela mbuli tsa Yohane Mbatitsa .
40017014	Hawapfikile mne mtingano we iwanu , imunu yumwe kamghendela Yesu , kamtowela ghamaghoti ,
40017015	kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , umwonele libatsi mwanangu , kana chisala na kodununzighwa ng'ani . Kwaapfila kakughwagha mne ghumoto au mne ghamatsi .
40017016	Nimghala kuna iwanang'ina wako , lekeni ng'awadahile bae kumhonetsa . ”
40017017	Yesu kedika , “ Mwemwe mweleko ing'aghutoghola , na ighwihile ! Nitsokala na mwemwe mbaka tsuwachi ? Nitsowadudumila mwemwe mbaka tsuwachi ? Mngalile hano imsongolo ayo ! ”
40017018	Yesu kamkembela chinyamkela , na chinyamkela kamlawa imsongolo ayo . Bahala imsongolo ayo kahona .
40017019	Kuya iwanang'ina wamghendela Yesu chinyelenyele , wamghutsa , “ Ule ng'atudahile bae kumlapfa chinyamkela yula ? ”
40017020	Yesu kawedika , “ Kwaapfila mwotoghola chidogho . Nowalongelani ghendo , ka ukutoghola kwenu kung'awile kudodo ka imbeghu ya haladali , mng'adahile kuchilongela chidunda chino , ‘ Ulawe hano , ughende kula , ’ nacho ching'aghendile . Wala ng'akutsokuwa ne ichinu chochose ing'achidahika kuna mwemwe . ”
40017021	Lekeni ichinyamkela ka yuno ng'odaha bae kulawa kwa inzila yoyose , ila kwa ukulomba na ukufunga ukuja .
40017022	Iwanang'ina wose hawapfikile Galilaya , Yesu kawalongela , “ Imwana we Imunu katsoghoghighwa ne iwanu ,
40017023	nawo watsomkoma , ila mne litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka . ” Iwanang'ina wake wona usungu sideke .
40017024	Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hawapfikile Kaperinaumu , iwasola kodi ye ing'anda ye Imulungu wamghendela Petiri wamghutsa , “ Apfi imlangulitsi wako koliha kodi ye ing'anda ye Imulungu ? ”
40017025	Petiri kawedika , “ Ona . ” Petiri hayengile mng'anda , Yesu kandusa kulonga , “ Simoni ukonatse ? Iwandewa we isi wosola kodi au maliho kwe iwanu wachi , kwe iwana wawo au kwe iwahenza ? ”
40017026	Petiri kamwidika , “ Kwe iwahenza . ” Yesu kedika , “ Pfinogha , apfo iwanu wawo ng'awobamighwa kuliha bae .
40017027	Lekeni , ng'atubama bae kuwadesa iwanu wano , ghenda kune tsimbu , wase ludodi lwako . Umsole isomba yula yulongole kumlowa , umwasame mlomo ghwake kuya kutsakona isendi . Isole ukaweng'e kwaajili ya kodi yangu na yako . ”
40018001	Bahala iwanang'ina wamghendela Yesu , wamghutsa , “ Yuhi iyali mkulu mne undewa wa kulanga ? ”
40018002	Yesu kamkema imwana mdodo , kamwika haghati hawo .
40018003	Kawalongela , “ Nowalongelani ghendo , ka ng'amghaluka bae na kwighala ne iwana wadodo , ng'amtsakwingila mbe mne undewa wa kulanga .
40018004	Apfo imunu wowose yehulumsa mwenyegho ka imwana yuno , hayo iyo imkulu mne undewa wa kulanga .
40018005	Na imunu wowose iyombokela imwana mdodo ka yuno kwa taghwa lyangu , ayo kombokela nene .
40018006	“ Lekeni imunu wowose yomhonza yumwe we iwana wano iwonitoghola nene yatende nzambi , ng'apfu yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo na yasighwe mwibahali mne ghamatsi ighaghendese .
40018007	Iisi yose itsoghaya kwaajili ya aghala ighowahonza iwanu waghitse ukutoghola kwawo ! Agho ghatsolawila , lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula iyoghatenda ghalawile !
40018008	“ Ka ghumoko ghwako au mghulu ghwako ghwokuhonza utende ghehile , ughane ughwase kutali naghwe . Ng'apfu wingile mne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose aku kuhungukighwa na ghumoko au mghulu , kubita ukwasighwa mne ghumoto ghwa ghamatsuwa ghose aku kuna ghamoko meli na maghulu ghako meli .
40018009	Inenge yako ing'akuhonza utende ghehile , uing'ole uyase kutali naghwe ! Ng'apfu wingile mne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose aku kuna inenge imwe kubita kwasighwa mne ghumoto aku kuna nenge mbili .
40018010	“ Mwalangitse mleke kumbetsa yumwe we iwana wano wadodo . Kwaapfila , nowalongelani wamalaika wawo ako kulanga ghamatsuwa ghose wa hambele ha Aba wangu iyali kulanga .
40018011	Kwaapfila Imwana we Imunu katsa kuwakombola awala iwaghile .
40018012	“ Mkonatse ? Ka imunu kana iwang'olo mia imwe , kuya yumwe kagha , apfi ng'atsowaleka bae awala tisini na tisa kulughongo na kughenda kumbama ayula iyaghile ?
40018013	Nowalongelani ghendo , ang'amwona , katsomdeng'elela ng'ani kubita awala tisini na tisa yang'awaghile .

40018015	“ Ndughu yako ang'akutendela ghehile , ughende ukamkanye totso lyake , ghweghwe na yeye mliyeka . Ang'akutegheletsa , katsakuwa ndughu yako keli .
40018016	Lekeni ang'alema kukutegheletsa , umsole imunu yumwe au weli hamwe naghwe , ili ‘ kwa iwakalangama weli au wadatu ghomba lilamlighwe , ’ ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga .
40018017	Ang'alema kuwategheletsa ulilongele kanisa , na ka kolema kuwategheletsa iwanu we Imulungu , kuna ghweghwe mleke yawe ka imunu ing'ammanyile Imulungu au imsola kodi .
40018018	“ Nowalongelani ghendo , ghoghose ghamuhinda muisi ghatsohindighwa kulanga , na ghoghose ghampfughula muisi , ghatsopfughulighwa kulanga .
40018019	“ Nowalongelani keli , ka weli wenu wetoghola muisi kulomba ichinu chochose , Aba wangu iyali kulanga katsowatendela .
40018020	Kwaapfila hanu hohose hawetingana iwanu weli au wadatu kwa taghwa lyangu , Nene nahamwe nawo . ”
40018021	Kuya Petiri kamghendela Yesu , kamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , apfi ndughu yangu ang'anitendela ghamatotso , nitsomlekelela mala ngapi ? Hata mala saba ? ”
40018022	Yesu kamwidika , “ Nokulongela si mala saba bae , ila saba mala sabini ,
40018023	kwaapfila undewa we Imulungu weghala na Imndewa yumwe iyabamile kukaghula tsisendi tsake tsawalinatso iwatumwa wake .
40018024	Hayanduse kupeta , kaghalighwa imunu yumwe iyang'ali yomdahi sendi milioni nyingi .
40018025	Naye kwaapfila tsakahela chinu che ukuliha , imndewa kalaghitsa yahutsighwe , yeye , mwehe wake ne iwanaghe na pfose pfayalinapfo , ili yalihe deni .
40018026	Apfo imtumwa ayo katowa ghamaghoti hambele hake , kalonga , ‘ Unidudumile , nitsokuliha chila chinu . ’
40018027	Imndewa yula kamwonela libatsi , kamleghusila deni lila , kamleka yoke .
40018028	“ Lekeni imunu ayo koka , kuya ketingana ne imtumwa miyaghe iyang'ali yomdahi sendi chidogho . Kamghogha kamkinda halumelo . Kalonga , ‘ Unilihe sendi tsangu ! ’
40018029	Imtumwa miyaghe kamtowela ghamaghoti , kamlomba , ‘ Unidudumile , nitsokuliha . ’
40018030	Lekeni yeye kalema , kaghenda kumwika miyaghe mchifungo , mbaka hayatsoliha deni lila .
40018031	Iwatumwa wangi hawonile achila ichilawile , wasing'inika sideke , waghenda kumlongela imndewa chila chinu ichilawile .
40018032	Kuya imndewa kamkema mng'anda imtumwa ayo , kamlongela , ‘ Ghweghwe imtumwa wihile . Nikuleghusila deni lyose kwaapfila tsakunilomba nitende apfo .
40018033	Tsakubamighwa umwonele libatsi imtumwa miyagho ka nene pfanikwonele libatsi . ’

40018035	Kuya Yesu kaghendelela kulonga , “ Apfi pfifo Aba wangu iyali kulanga pfayatsowatendelani mng'aleka kuwaleghusila wandughu tsenu ghamatotso ghawo kulawa mne mimoyo yenu . ”
40019001	Yesu hayamalitse kulonga mbuli atso , kalawa isi ya Galilaya kaghenda mne isi ya Yudeya , kumwambu kwe ghumto Yoridani .
40019002	Iwanu wengi wamuwinza , naye kawahonetsa .
40019003	Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela Yesu wamghetse . Wamghutsa , “ Angu pfinogha immale kumleka mwehe wake kwa totso lyolyose ? ”
40019004	Yesu kawedika , “ Ng'amsomile bae mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , ka kulawa mwanduso Imulungu tsakalumba immale ne ipinga ?
40019005	Apfo Imulungu kalonga , ‘ Kwa ichinu chino , mmale katsomleka aba wake na mai wake , katselunga na mwehe wake , nawo weli watsokuwa lukuli lumwe ? ’
40019006	Apfo si weli keli , ila lukuli lumwe . Apfo chayalungile Imulungu , imunu yaleke kuchibaghula . ”
40019007	Mafarisayo wamghutsa , “ Ebali lelo Musa tsakalaghitsa immale yamwing'e mwehe wake talaka na kumleka ? ”
40019008	Yesu kawedika , “ Musa tsakawalekelela muwaleke wehe tsenu kwaapfila imimoyo yenu mikomu . Lekeni ng'aiwile pfino bae kulawa mwanduso .
40019009	Nowalongelani , imunu wowose iyomleka mwehe wake , ila kwa ughoni , na ukukwela ipinga yungi , ayo kotenda ughoni . ”

40019012	Kuna ipfinu pfingi ipfiwatenda iwamale waleke kukwela , kwaapfila wamwenga welekighwa pfipfo , na wamwenga watendighwa apfo ne iwanu . Wamwenga ng'awokwela bae kwaajili ye undewa wa kulanga . Imunu iyodaha kuitoghola imbuli ino , leka yaitoghole . ”
40019013	Kuya iwanu wangi wamghalila Yesu iwana wadowado awekile ghamoko na kuwalombela , lekeni iwanang'ina wake wawakembela iwanu awo iwawaghalile iwana .
40019014	Yesu kalonga , “ Muwaleke iwana wadowado watse kuna nene , mleke kuwaghoma kwaapfila undewa wa kulanga wa iwanu iwali ka iwana wano . ”
40019015	Kawekila ghamoko , kuya koka hanu aho .
40019016	Imunu yumwe kamghendela Yesu kamghutsa , “ Mlangulitsi , angu nende choni chinoghile ili niubokele ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose ? ”
40019017	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ebali kwonighutsa imbuli ye ichinu chinoghile ? Hana yumwe yaliyeka iyanoghile . Ung'abama kwingila mne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose , ughakinde ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu . ”
40019018	Imunu yula kamghutsa , “ Ghamalaghitso ghachi ? ” Yesu kamwidika , “ Aghano , uleke kukoma , uleke ughoni , uleke ubapfi na uleke kulonga ughutsu ,
40019019	uwategheletse aba wako na mai wako , umnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela ghumwenyegho . ”
40019020	Imsongolo yula kamlongela , “ Agha ghose nighakinda . Lelo nitende choni keli ? ”
40019021	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ung'abama kuwa imunu yatimilike , ughende ukautse ipfinu pfako pfose , uweng'e tsisendi iwahingwa , naghwe kutsakuwa na hatsina kulanga . Kuya utse uniwinze . ”
40019022	Imsongolo yula hayahulike apfo , koka kwa usungu , kwaapfila tsakana mali nyingi .
40019023	Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Nowalongela ghendo , itsakuwa pfikomu kwa tajiri kwingila mne undewa wa kulanga .
40019024	Kuya nowalongelani , pfibewe kwe ingamiya kwingila mchonzo mwe sindano , kubita tajiri kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu . ”
40019025	Iwanang'ina wake hawahulike apfo , wakangawala ghendo , wamghutsa , “ Lelo yuhi iyodaha kukombolighwa ? ”
40019026	Yesu kawalola kuya kawalongela , “ Kwe imunu chinu chino ng'achidahika bae , lekeni kwe Imulungu ghose ghodahika . ”
40019027	Petiri kamwidika , “ Tuleka chila chinu twokuwinza ghweghwe . Lelo tutsopata choni ? ”
40019028	Yesu kawalongela , “ Nowalongelani ghendo , mne isi iikutsa , Imwana we Imunu hayatsokala hane chighoda chake cha utunitso , mwemwe imniwinzile nene pfipfila mtsokala mne pfighoda kumi na pfili , kughahigha makabila kumi na meli gha Isiraeli .
40019029	Na imunu wowose iyalekile tsing'anda , au kaka tsake , au lumbu tsake , au aba wake , au mai wake , au iwanaghe , au imighunda yake kwaajili yangu , ayo katsobokela mala kumi , na katsohala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
40019030	Lekeni awala wa mwanduso watsakuwa wa utsighilo , na wautsighilo watsakuwa wamwanduso .
40020001	“ Undewa we Imulungu weghala ne imunu yane mghunda , iyalawile lupfilipfili kaghenda kubama iwanu wakasang'ane mne mghunda ghwake .
40020002	Katoghola kuwaliha sendi tsa litsuwa limwe , kuya kawaghala mne mghunda ghwake .
40020003	Masaa madatu hambele koka keli , kawona iwanu wangi wema mne ghulilo wahela sang'ano .
40020004	Kawalongela , ‘ Mwemwe mwose mghende mne mghunda ghwangu mkasang'ane , nitsowaliha pfinoghile . ’
40020005	Nawo waghenda . Kuya kaghenda keli saa sita na saa tisa , katenda pfipfila .
40020006	Haipfikile saa kumi na imwe koka keli , kawona iwanu wangi wema hane ghulilo , kawaghutsa , ‘ Ebali mwimile hano misi yose bila sang'ano ? ’

40020008	“ Nemihe haipfikile , imunu yane mghunda kamlongela mwimilitsi wake , ‘ Uwakeme iwanu iwasang'ane , uwalihe sendi tsawo , wanduse na wautsighilo kuya awala iwalongole . ’
40020009	Iwanu iwasang'ane kwandusila saa kumi na imwe hawatsile , chila munu kabokela malilho gha litsuwa limwe .
40020010	Apfo awala iwalongole kusang'ana hawatsile , tsawalolela kubokela sendi nyingi , lekeni chila munu kabokela dinali imwe .
40020011	Hawabokele maliho ghawo , wandusa kumsing'inikila ayula yane mghunda .
40020012	Walonga , ‘ Iwanu wano iwatsile kusang'ana nemihe , wasang'ana kwa saa limwe liliheka , lekeni kuwaliha ka pfautulihe twetwe itusang'ane misi yose mlutsua . ’
40020013	“ Naye kamwidika yumwe wawo , ‘ Sale yangu , sikubunzile bae . Apfi ghweghwe ng'utoghole kusang'ana kwa malilho gha litsuwa limwe ?
40020014	Lelo usole ichili chako uke . Nene nobama kumwing'a ayula wa utsighilo ka pfanikwing'ile ghweghwe .
40020015	Angu ng'apfinoghile bae nene kutenda achila chanibama kwa sendi tsangu mwenyegho ? Au kwakona chepfu kwaapfila nene namluso ? ’ ”
40020016	Kuya Yesu kamalitsa kwa ukulonga , “ Apfo , wa utsighilo katsakuwa wa mwanduso , na ayula wamwanduso katsakuwa wautsighilo . ”
40020017	Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda Yerusalemu kawasola iwanang'ina kumi na weli waliyeka , kawalongela ,
40020018	“ Mlole , twogheluka Yerusalemu , ako Imwana we Imunu katsakwing'ighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwatambika wakulu ne iwalangulitsi we ghamalaghitso . Nawo watsomhigha yakomighwe .
40020019	Kuya watsomghala kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi , nawo watsombetsa , watsomtsipula na watsomkoma kwa kumuwamba mna msalaba , lekeni ghamatsuwa madatu hambele katsotsilihuka ! ”
40020020	Kuya mai we iwana wa Sebedayo kamghendela Yesu hamwe ne iwanaghe , katowa ghamaghoti , kamlomba amtendele choyobama .
40020021	Yesu kamghutsa , “ Ubama choni . ” Ipinga ayo kamwidika , “ Chondechonde , ulaghitse wanangu wano weli wakale ubali wako wa kujilo na wa kumoso mne undewa wako . ”
40020022	Yesu kawalongela , “ Ng'ammanyile bae achila chamlomba . Angu mwodaha kunwela ichikombe chanitsonwela nene ? ” Wamwidika , “ Twodaha . ”

40020024	Iwanang'ina kumi hawahulike apfo , tsawawonela maya awala wandughu weli .
40020025	Lekeni Yesu kawakema , kawalongela , “ Mwomanya ka iwabala we iwanu iwali si Wayahudi wowalongotsa iwanu wawo kwa ingupfu , na pfilongotsi wawo wana ukulu kuna wawo .
40020026	Lekeni ileke kuwa apfo kuna mwemwe , ila imunu wowose iyobama kuwa imkulu mghati mwenu , yawe mtumwa wenu ,

40020034	Yesu kawonela libatsi , katsikinda nenge tsawo , bahala wadaha ukwona , nawo wamuwinza .
40021001	Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake hawang'ali habehi na Yerusalemu na kupfika Betifage mne Chidunda cha Mitseituni , kawatuma iwanang'ina wake weli ,

40021003	Imunu wowose ang'awalongela chochose , mumlongele , ‘ Imtwatsa kowabama , ’ naye katsowaleka mke . ”
40021004	Achino chilawila ili aghala ighalongighwe na manabii ghatimile .
40021005	“ Umlongele neghe Sayuni , Lola , Mndewa wako kokutsila , Kahola na kadina ipunda , imwanapunda , imwana we ipunda . ”
40021006	Apfo iwanang'ina waghenda watenda ka Yesu pfayawalongele .

40021008	Iwanu wengi wagheka ghamaghwanda ghawo mnzila na wangi waghana milala wanzasa mnzila .

40021010	Yesu hayengile Yerusalemu , iwanu wose wakangawala , weghutsa , “ Ayu nani ? ”
40021011	Iwanu wawedika , “ Ayuno nabii , Yesu wa Natsareti ya Galilaya . ”
40021012	Yesu kengila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu kawawinga wose awala iwang'ali woghula na iwang'ali wohutsa . Katsibindula tsimetsa tsawo tsa ukubenela tsisendi na ipfighoda pfa awala iwang'ali woutsa iwanjiwa .
40021013	Kawalongela , “ Yandikighwa , ‘ Ing'anda yangu itsokemighwa ing'anda ya ukulombela . ’ Lekeni mwemwe mwoitenda iwe mango ye iwabapfi ! ”
40021014	Ipfifita na ipfimbete wamghendela Yesu mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , naye kawahonetsa .

41006014	Imndewa Herodi kahulika mbuli atso , kwaapfila taghwa lya Yesu tsalimanyika chila hanu . Iwanu wangi walonga , “ Yohane Mbatitsa katsilihuka . Ndo mana kana ngupfu tsa ukutenda ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa . ”
41006015	Lekeni wangi walonga , “ Ayuno Eliya . ” Na wangi walonga , “ Ayuno nabii ka wala manabii wa ghumwande . ”
41006016	Herodi hayahulike apfo , kalonga , “ Yohane iyanimghanile litwi katsilihuka ! ”
41006017	Kwaapfila Herodi imwenyegho tsakalaghitsa Yohane yaghoghighwe , yekighwe mne chifungo . Tsakatenda apfo kwaajili ya Herodiya mwehe wake , ipinga ayo tsakakala mwehe wa ndughu yake Filipi .
41006018	Yohane Mbatitsa tsakaghendelela kumlongela Herodi , “ Ng'apfinoghile bae ghweghwe kumkwela mwehe wa ndughu yako . ”
41006019	Naye Herodiya tsakamhila Yohane na kabama amkome . Lekeni ng'adahile bae kwaajili ya Herodi .
41006020	Herodi tsakampfuka Yohane kwaapfila kamanya Yohane kakala imunu yanoghile na yenzeluke , apfo yang'ali yomlolesa . Tsayang'ali yonoghela kumhulikitsa , hata ka tsayang'ali yoghanzika ng'ani hayomalitsa kumhulikitsa .
41006021	Litsuwa limwe , Herodiya tsakapata nafasi mne ichihungo cha kwelekighwa kwa Herodi . Herodi tsakawatendela ichihungo iwatawala , iwakulu we asikali na ipfilongotsi we isi ya Galilaya .
41006022	Neghe Herodiya hayengile tsakapfina , kamdeng'elesa Herodi ne iwahenza wake . Apfo imndewa kamlongela imwana ayo , “ Unilombe ichinu chochose chaubama , nitsokwing'a . ”
41006023	Kelaha , “ Nitsokwing'a chochose chaubama , hata ka inusu ya undewa wangu ! ”
41006024	Kuya imwana ayo kaghenda kumghutsa mai wake , “ Nilombe choni ? ” Naye kamwidika , “ Lomba litwi lya Yohane Mbatitsa . ”
41006025	Imwana ayo katsuma mbaka kwa imndewa kamlomba , “ Nobama ungaye litwi lya Yohane Mbatitsa mne lungo ! ”
41006026	Imndewa kona usungu ng'ani , lekeni ng'adahile bae kulema , kwaapfila tsakelaha hambele he iwahenza wake .
41006027	Bahala imndewa kamlaghitsa asikali , kamlongela aghale litwi lya Yohane . Asikali kaghenda mne chifungo , kamghana litwi Yohane .
41006028	Kuya kaghala litwi alyo mne lungo , kamwing'a imwana ayo . Naye kamwing'a mai wake .
41006029	Iwanang'ina wa Yohane hawahulike apfi , waghenda kulusola lukuli lwake , walutsika .
41006030	Iwatumighwa woya na wetingana kwa Yesu , wamlongela aghala ghose ghawatendile na kulangulitsa .
41006031	Yesu kawalongela , “ Leka tughende tuliyeka hanu halihela imunu tukabwihile . ” Kalonga apfo kwaapfila tsakukala ne iwanu wengi iwang'ali wakutsa na ukuka , mbaka Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake ng'awadahile bae kupata nafasi ya ukuja ichijo .
41006032	Apfo woka waliyeka mne mnumbwi , waghenda hanu halihela imunu .
41006033	Lekeni iwanu iwawonile hawang'ali wakuka , tsawamanya . Apfo watsuma kwa mghulu kulawa mne imiji yose , kuya walongola kupfika .
41006034	Yesu hayalawile mne mnumbwi , kona mtingano mkulu ghwe iwanu , kawonela libatsi kwaapfila tsawoneka ka iwang'olo iwalihela mdimi . Apfo kandusa kuwalangulitsa ipfinu pfingi .
41006035	Mihe haipfikile , iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlongela , “ Hanu hano hana nyika iliyeka , na litsua liswa .
41006036	Waleke woke kune imighunda ne ipfijiji , ili wakeghulile ichijo iwenyegho . ”
41006037	Lekeni kawedika , “ Mwemwe muweng'e ichijo waje . ” Wamghutsa , “ Apfi kwotubama tughende tukawaghulile pfighate pfa sendi miya mbili tuweng'e waje ? ”
41006038	Kawaghutsa , “ Mna pfighate pfingapi ? Mghende mkalole . ” Hawamanyile , wamlongela “ Kuna pfighate pfitano ne iwasomba weli . ”
41006039	Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , wawalongele iwanu wose weghole mne makingili , wakale hasi mne mitsani imibisi .
41006040	Apfo wakala mne makingili ghe iwanu , hano miya , hano hamsini .
41006041	Kuya Yesu kasola pfighate pfila pfitano ne iwasomba weli , kalola kulanga , kapfibaliki kuya kapfibena pfighate pfila . Kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu . Pfipfila kawagholela iwanu wose iwasomba wala weli .
41006042	Iwanu wose waja weghuta ,
41006043	ne iwanang'ina wake wadondola pfighate ne iwasomba yawakalile wamemetsa pfiseghe kumi na pfili .
41006044	Iwamale iwajile wakala 5000 .
41006045	Bahala Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake wengile mne mnumbwi wamlongolele kughenda Betisaida . Yeye tsayang'ali kowaagha iwanu woke .
41006046	Hayamalitse kuwaagha iwanu , kaghenda mlughongo kulomba .
41006047	Mihe haipfikile , mnumbwi ghukala mghati mwe tsimbu naye kakala aliyeka kunze kwe tsimbu .
41006048	Tsakawona iwanang'ina wake woghaya mne mnumbwi , kwaapfila libeho ling'ali lyowatowa kwa ingupfu . Habehi na kucha , kawaghendela , yang'ali yoghenda mchanya mwe ghamatsi . Kabama awalute ,
41006049	nawo hawamwonile koghenda mchanya mwe ghamatsi , tsawepfikitsa tsakakala mtsimu . Walila kwa litsi likulu ,
41006050	kwaapfila wose tsawamwona na wang'ali wopfuka . Bahala Yesu kawalongela , “ Nene ! Mleke kupfuka . ”
41006051	Kuya kengila mne mnumbwi hamwe nawo , na libeho linyamala , iwanang'ina wake wakangawala ghendo .
41006052	Kwaapfila ng'awamanyile bae mbuli tsa pfighate , imimoyo yawo tsaikala mikomu .
41006053	Waloka tsimbu , wapfika mne isi ya Genesareti , baho wemitsa imnumbwi ghwawo .
41006054	Hawalawile mne mnumbwi , bahala iwanu wamtanga Yesu .
41006055	Apfo watsuma mne isi yose , wandusa kuwasola iwatamu mne ghamasatsi na kuwaghala hanu hohose kuwahulike Yesu kabaho .
41006056	Na chila hanu kwayaghendile , mne ipfijiji , imiji au kumighunda , waweka iwatamu mne ghamasoko . Wamlomba awaleke wakinde hata mindo ya lighwanda lyake , na wose iwamkindile tsawahona .
41007001	Mafarisayo wangi na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso iwalawile Yerusalemu , wetingana hambele ha Yesu .
41007002	Wawona iwanang'ina wake wamwenga wakuja ichijo bila kwohopfugha ghamoko ghawo .
41007003	Mafarisayo na Wayahudi wose ng'awakuja bae ichijo mbaka wahopfughe ghamoko ghawo mbaka mne pfipfughumu , tsawakinda ichihendo cha iwabala wawo .
41007004	Hawolawa kusoko ng'awakuja ichinu chochose mbaka wachihopfughe . Pfipfila tsawakinda ipfihendo pfingi ka kuhopfugha ipfikombe , ghamabigha na pfiha .
41007005	Apfo awala Mafarisayo na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wamghutsa Yesu , “ Ebali iwanang'ina wako ng'awokinda bae ipfihendo pfa iwabala , ila wakuja kwa ghamoko ghehile ? ”
41007006	Yesu kawedika , “ Isaya tsakatabili pfinoghile kuna mwemwe , mwemwe iwang'enye , ka pfandike . ‘ Iwanu wano wonihulikitsa kwa imilomo yawo , lekeni imimoyo yawo yakutali na nene .
41007007	Wonitamanila hela , wolangulitsa ghamalaghitso ghe iwanu , ka ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu ! ’
41007008	“ Mleka ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu , mwokinda ipfihendo pfe iwanu . ”
41007009	Kuya kawalongela , “ Pfinogha ! Mna inzila inoghile ya kulema ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu ili mkinde ipfihendo pfenu .
41007010	Musa tsakalonga , ‘ Uwahulike aba wako na mai wako , ’ na ‘ Imunu wowose iyomligha aba wake au mai wake katsokufa . ’
41007011	Lekeni mwemwe mwolangulitsa , ka imunu kana ichinu cha kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake lekeni kolonga , ‘ Ichinu achi Koribani ’ mana yake , nzawadi kwe Imulungu ,
41007012	apfo ng'obamighwa keli kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake .
41007013	Apfo mwoibetsa imbuli ye Imulungu kwe ipfihendo pfenu pfambokele . Na mwotenda ipfinu pfingi ka apfo . ”
41007014	Kuya Yesu kalikema keli kingili lila lye iwanu , kawalongela , “ Mnitegheletse mwemwe wose , mmanye .
41007015	Kuduhu ichinu ichikwingila mghati mwe imunu kulawa kunze ichidaha kumtenda yehe . Lekeni ichilawa mghati mwe imunu , acho chomtenda imunu yehe .
41007016	Imunu yane ghamaghutwi gha kuhulika na yahulike . ”
41007017	Halilekile kingili lye iwanu na kwingila mng'anda , iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa mana ye imbuli ayo .
41007018	Yesu kawalongela , “ Apfi namwe mwahela tsimbutsi ? Angu ng'ammanya bae ka kuduhu ichinu ichimwingila imunu kulawa kunze chimtende yehe ?
41007019	Kwaapfila ng'achimwingila bae mne ghumoyo ila chakwingila munda , kuya cholawa kunze kwe lukuli lwake . ” Kwa ukulonga apfi , Yesu kapfitenda ipfijo pfose “ pfinogha . ”
41007020	Kaghendelela kulonga , “ Ichinu ichimlawa imunu , acho chomtenda yehe .
41007021	Kwaapfila mne ghumoyo ghwe imunu , gholawa mawatso ghehile , utsinzi , ubapfi , ukukoma , dong'o ,
41007022	ughoni , ughutsu , ufisadi , chepfu , maligho , kwighoda , chidandali ne ubotsi .
41007023	Agho ghose ghehile gholawa mghati mwe imunu , nagho ghomtenda imunu yehe . ”
41007024	Yesu kalawa hanu aho , kaghenda mne ghumji ghwa Tiro . Ako kengila mne ing'anda na ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amanye , lekeni ng'adahile bae kwipfisa .
41007025	Ipinga yumwe iyakalile ne imwana pinga yane ichinyamkela , kahulika mbuli tsa Yesu . Apfo kamghendela , kamghwila mmaghulu mwake .
41007026	Ipinga ayo tsakakala Mgiriki , iyelekighwe mne ghumji ghwa Sirofoinike . Kamlomba Yesu amlapfe mwanaghe ichinyamkela .
41007027	Lekeni Yesu kamwidika , “ Tanu waleke iwana weghute . Ng'apfinoghile bae kusola ichijo che iwana na kuwasila wambwa . ”
41007028	Ipinga ayo kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa , lekeni hata wambwa iwali hasi mwe imetsa wakuja ipfijo pfawalekile iwana . ”
41007029	Yesu kamlongela ipinga yula , “ Kwa apfo pfawidike , uke ukaye , ichinyamkela kamlawa imwanagho . ”
41007030	Apfo ipinga yula koka ukaye , kampfika imwanaghe kawasa mne lusatsi na ichinyamkela kamlawa .
41007031	Kuya Yesu koka mne ghumji ghwa Tiro , kaghenda Galilaya kwa kubitila Sidoni na mne ghumji ghwa Dekapoli .
41007032	Iwanu wangi wamghalila imunu chitsiwi na iyang'adahile bae ukulonga pfinoghile , wamlomba Yesu amwikile ghamoko imunu ayo .
41007033	Apfo Yesu kamseghetsa imunu ayo hambali ne iwanu . Keka pfidole pfake mne ghamaghutwi ghe imunu ayo . Kuya kabwalula ghamate na kaludonza lulimi lwake .
41007034	Yesu kalola kulanga , kahumula kwe ingupfu , kamlongela imunu ayo , “ Epfata ! ” ( mana yake , “ Ghubuka ! ” ) .
41007035	Bahala ghamaghutwi ghe imunu yula ghaghubuka , lulimi lwake luleghela , kandusa kulonga pfinoghile .
41007036	Kuya Yesu kawalaghitsa waleke kumlongela imunu wowose . Lekeni ka pfayaghendelele kuwaghoma , waghendelela kulalatsa mbuli ayo .
41007037	Iwanu wakangawala ghendo . Walonga , “ Katenda ghoya chila ichinu . Hata pfitsiwi kowatenda wahulike , na pfibubu walonge ! ”
41008001	Mne ghamatsuwa agho , kingili lingi likulu litingana . Kwaapfila tsawakala wahela ichijo , Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake , kawalongela ,
41008002	“ Nowonela libatsi iwanu wano , kwaapfila wakala na nene kwa ghamatsuwa madatu bila ukuja .
41008003	Ning'awalongela woke mmakaye mwawo ne inzala , wodaha kutsilika mnzila , kwaapfila wangi wolawa kutali . ”
41008004	Iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa , “ Apfi hano kunyika imunu kodaha kupata kwani ichijo chokuweng'a iwanu wose wano waghute ? ”
41008005	Yesu kawaghutsa , “ Mna pfighate pfingapi ? ” Wamwidika , “ Saba . ”
41008006	Yesu kawalongela iwanu wakale hasi . Kasola pfighate pfila saba , kapfibaliki , kapfibena na kuweng'a iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu , nawo watenda pfipfo .
41008007	Pfipfila tsawakala ne iwasomba wadowado chidogho . Yesu kawabaliki pfipfila na kuwalongela iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu .
41008008	Iwanu waja na kwighuta . Kuya iwanang'ina wake wadondola pfiseghe saba ipfimemile ipfijo ipfisighale .
41008009	Iwanu iwajile tsawakala elufu nne . Kuya Yesu kawaagha ,
41008010	bahala kengila mne mnumbwi ne iwanang'ina wake , kaghenda mne ghumji ghwa Dalamanuta .
41008011	Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela na wandusa kumghutsa . Wamghetsa , wabama chitango kulawa kulanga .
41008012	Tsakwona usungu mne ghumoyo ghwake , kalonga , “ Ebali mweleko ghuno ghwobama ichitango ? Nowalongela ghendo , ng'awatsakwing'ighwa ichitango chochose . ”
41008013	Kuya kawaleka , kengila mne mnumbwi , kaloka kaghenda kumwambu .
41008014	Iwanang'ina tsawesemwa kughala pfighate , wakala na chighate chimwe chiliyeka mne mnumbwi .
41008015	Yesu kawakanya , kawalongela , “ Mwalangitse ne hamila ya Mafarisayo na ya Herodi ! ”
41008016	Wandusa kwilongela iwenyegho , “ Kalonga apfi kwaapfila twahela chighate . ”
41008017	Yesu tsakamanya chawang'ali wolonga . Kawaghutsa , “ Ebali mwelongela iwenyegho , kwaapfila mwahela chighate ? Mng'ali ng'ammanya au kutanga ? Apfi imimoyo yenu mikomu ?
41008018	Mna tsinenge ng'amkwona bae , na mna ghamaghutwi ng'amhulika bae ? Na ng'amkumbuka bae
41008019	hanibenile pfighate pfila pfitano na kuweng'a wala iwanu elufu tano ? Apfi tsamdondole pfiseghe pfingapi ipfimemile pfihande ipfisighale ? ” Wamlongela , “ Kumi na pfili . ”
41008020	“ Na hanibenile pfighate pfila saba na kuweng'a iwanu elufu nne , apfi mdondole pfiseghe pfingapi ipfimemile pfihande ipfisighale ? ” Wamwidika “ Saba . ”
41008021	Kawaghutsa , “ Pfii ng'ana mmanye bae ? ”
41008022	Tsawapfika Betisaida , iwanu wangi wamghalila Yesu ichifita , wamlomba amkinde .
41008023	Kamkinda ghumoko ichifita yula , kamlapfa kunze kwe chijiji . Kuya kambwalulila ghamate mnenge , kamwikila ghamoko ghake , kamghutsa , “ Kwodaha kwona ichinu chochose ? ”
41008024	Imunu ayo kalola kuya kalonga , “ Nakwona iwanu , wakoneka ka imibiki itsunguluka . ”
41008025	Yesu keka keli ghamoko mne tsinenge tse imunu ayo . Kuya tsinenge tsake tsifughuka , naye kona pfinoghile ipfinu pfose .
41008026	Yesu kamlongela aghende ukaye yake na kamghoma kwingila mne ipfijiji na kuwalongela iwanu .
41008027	Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda mne ipfijiji pfa Kaisariya Filipi . Mnzila Yesu kawaghutsa , “ Apfi iwanu wolonga nene nili nani ? ”
41008028	Wamwidika , “ Wangi wolonga ghweghwe kwa Yohane Mbatitsa , wangi wolonga kwa Eliya na wangi wolonga kwa yumwe wa manabii . ”

41008033	Lekeni Yesu kahunduka , kawalolesa iwanang'ina wake na kumkembela Petiri , “ Soghela hano Setani ! Kwaapfila ng'aukwalangula bae mbuli tse Imulungu , ila kokwalangula mbuli tse iwanu . ”
41008034	Kuya Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake na kingili lye iwanu kawalongela , “ Imunu wowose iyobama kuniwinza , yeleme imwenyegho , asole msalaba ghwake aniwinze . ”
41008035	Kwaapfila imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake , katsowaghisa , ila imunu wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake kwaajili ya nene na kwaajili ye Imbuli Inoghile katsoukombola .
41008036	Apfi iwanu wobweda choni ka wopata isi yose lekeni wakwaghisa ughima wawo ?
41008037	Kuduhu ichinu chawodaha kulapfa waupate keli ughima wawo .
41008038	Imunu ang'ambonela chinyala nene na mbuli tsangu mne iwanu wa mweleko ghuno ghwa nzambi na utsinzi , Imwana we Imunu katsomwonela chinyala hatsakutsa mne utunitso wa Aba wake hamwe ne wamalaika wahenzeluka wa kulanga .
41009001	Kaghendelela kulonga , “ Nowalongela ghendo , iwanu wamwenga iwemile hano ng'awatsakufa bae mbaka wawone Undewa we Imulungu iukutsa kwe ingupfu . ”
41009002	Matsuwa sita hambele , Yesu kawasola Petiri , Jakobu na Yohane , kaghenda nawo mchidando hanu halihela imunu . Baho Yesu kaghaluka chihanga , hambele hawo .
41009003	Na ghamaghwanda ghake ghawa matselu ng'ani , kuduhu imunu wowose mne isi iyodaha kughatsapfa ghamaghwanda ghawe matselu apfo .
41009004	Kuya Eliya na Musa walawila hambele hawo , walonga na Yesu .
41009005	Petiri kamlongela Yesu , “ Mlangulitsi , pfinogha twetwe tukale hano . Leka tutsenge pfibumbulika pfidatu , chimwe cha kwako , chimwe cha Musa na chimwe che Eliya . ”
41009006	Ng'amanyile bae cha kulonga , kwaapfila wose tsawang'ali wopfuka ng'ani .
41009007	Kuya liwingu lilawila , liwaghubika , na litsi lilawila mne liwingu . “ Ayuno imwanangu yanoghele , mumtegheletse ! ”
41009008	Bahala hawalolese mmbalimbali ng'awamwonile imunu wowose hamwe nawo , ila Yesu yaliyeka .
41009009	Hawakalile wohulumka kulawa mchidando , Yesu kawalaghitsa waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ghawonile , mbaka Imwana we Imunu hatsotsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa .
41009010	Watoghola chayalongile , lekeni weghutsa , “ Kutsilihuka kulawa mne lifwa mana yake choni ? ”
41009011	Kuya wamghutsa Yesu , “ Ebali iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Eliya kobamighwa tanu yatse ? ”
41009012	Yesu kawedika , “ Ona , tanu Eliya kakutsa kwika chila ichinu pfinoghile . Ebali lelo yandikighwa Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yadununzike na kulemighwa ?
41009013	Lekeni nowalongela , Eliya katsa na wamtendela ghose ghawabamile , ka mbuli tsake pfatsandikighwe . ”
41009014	Hawawapfikile iwanang'ina wangi , wona mtingano mkulu we iwanu liwatsunguluka ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wehisanya nawo .
41009015	Bahala iwanu wose hawamwonile Yesu wakangawala ng'ani , wamtsumila kumlamsa .
41009016	Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake , “ Apfi mwehisanya nawo choni ? ”
41009017	Imunu yumwe mne kingili lye iwanu kamwidika , “ Mlangulitsi , nikughalila imwanangu kana ichinyamkela iyamtedile awe chibubu .
41009018	Na chila hayomnighula , komghwisa hasi , na imwana kolawa lihofu mne mlomo , koghegheda ghamatsino ghake kuya koghoghodala . Niwalomba iwanang'ina wako wamlapfe ichinyamkela , lekeni ng'awadahile bae . ”
41009019	Yesu kawedika , “ Mwemwe lukolo ing'alutoghola ! Nikale namwe mbaka tsuwachi ? Mnighalile imwana ayo ! ”
41009020	Wamghalila imwana ayo . Ichinyamkela hamwonile Yesu , bahala kamghwisa imwana ayo chisala , imwana kaghwa hasi na kwibulughitsa , kalapfa lihopfu mne mlomo .
41009021	Yesu kamghutsa aba we imwana ayo , “ Angu imwana yuno kapfino kulawa tsuwachi ? ” Kamwidika , “ Kulawa udodo wake .
41009022	Komghwisagha mne ghumoto au mne ghamatsi ili yamkome . Lekeni ka kwodaha kutenda ichinu , utwonele libatsi ne utwapfile . ”
41009023	Yesu kalonga , “ Ka kwodaha ! Ghose ghodahika kwe imunu iyotoghola . ”
41009024	Bahala aba we imwana yula kakemelela kalonga , “ Notoghola , ila unyapfile nitoghole ghendo ! ”
41009025	Yesu halyonile kingili lye iwanu lyakongetseka hambele hake , kamkembela ichinyamkela ayo , “ Ghwe ichinyamkela we ububu ne utsiwi , nokulongela ulawe mne imwana yuno na uleke kumwingila keli ! ”
41009026	Ichinyamkela kakemelela , kamghwisa chisala imwana ayo , kamlawa . Na imwana tsakoneka ka kafa , na iwanu wengi walonga , “ Kafa ! ”
41009027	Lekeni Yesu kamkinda ghumoko imwana ayo , kamwapfila kwinuka , naye kenuka .
41009028	Yesu hayengile mng'anda , iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa hawakalile naye waliyeka , “ Ebali twetwe ng'atudahile bae kumlapfa ichinyamkela yula ? ”
41009029	Yesu kawedika , “ Ichinyamkela ka yuno ng'odaha bae kulawa kwa inzila yoyose , ila kwa kulomba kuliyeka . ”
41009030	Yesu na iwanang'ina wake woka hanu hala waghenda Galilaya . Yesu ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amanye kwayali ,
41009031	kwaapfila yang'ali yowalangulitsa iwanang'ina wake . Kawalongela , “ Imwana we imunu katsoghelighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwanu , nawo watsomkoma . Ghamatsuwa madatu hambele , katsotsilihuka . ”
41009032	Lekeni ng'awaimanyile bae imbuli ayo na wapfuka kumghutsa .
41009033	Hawafikile Kaperinaumu , wengila mng'anda na Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake , “ Ichinu chachi chamng'ali mwisongela mnzila ? ”
41009034	Lekeni ng'awamwidike bae , kwaapfila wang'ali wesongela yuhi yali mkulu .
41009035	Yesu kakala hasi , kawakema iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli , kalonga , “ Imunu wowose yobama kuwa wa mwanduso , kobamighwa yawe wa utsighilo , na yawe imtumwa wa wose . ”
41009036	Kuya kamsola imwana mdodo , kamwika mghati mwawo , kawalongela ,
41009037	“ Imunu wowose iyombokela imwana mdodo ka yuno kwa taghwa lyangu , kombokela nene . Ne imunu iyombokela nene , kombokela yula iyanitumile . ”
41009038	Yohane kamlongela Yesu , “ Mlangulitsi , tumwona imunu kolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa taghwa lyako . Tumghoma kwaapfila ng'olawila bae mne kingili lyetu . ”
41009039	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mleke kumghoma . Haduhu imunu iyodaha kutenda ipfinzonza kwa taghwa lyangu na baho kulonga mbuli tsangu pfihile .
41009040	Kwaapfila imunu wowose yali ubali wetu , ayo kamiyetu .
41009041	Nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose iyoweng'a ichikombe cha ghamatsi kwaapfila mwemwe mwa iwanu wa Kiristu , katsobokela ghweko lyake .
41009042	“ Imunu wowose iyowahonza wadodo wano iwonitoghola watende ghehile , ng'apfu imunu ayo yohighwe libwe lya kusaghila msingo mwake na kwasighwa mne ibahali .
41009043	Ka ghumoko ghwako ghwokuhonza utende ghehile , ghughane . Ng'apfu kwingila kune ughima na ghumoko ghumwe , kubita kwingila jehanamu na ghamoko meli .
41009044	Ako membele iwowaja ng'awakufa bae , na ghumoto ighuwalakatsa ng'aghutsimika bae .
41009045	Ka mghulu ghwako wokuhonza utende ghehile , ghughane . Ng'apfu kwingila kune ughima na mghulu ghumwe , kubita kuwa na ghamaghulu meli na kwasighwa jehanamu .
41009046	Ako membele iwowaja ng'awakufa bae , na ghumoto ighuwalakatsa ng'aghutsimika bae .
41009047	Na ka inenge yako yokuhonza utende ghehile , ing'ole . Ng'apfu kwingila kune Undewa we Imulungu na inenge imwe , kubita kuwa na tsinenge mbili na kwasighwa jehanamu .
41009048	Ako membele wake ng'awakufa bae , na ghumoto ghwake ng'aghutsimika bae .
41009049	“ Chila imunu katsodeghetetsighwa kwa ghumoto ka inyama pfaighumighwa imunyu .
41009050	“ Imunyu inogha , lekeni ka ihinyika , itsoghumighwa choni mbaka ikolele keli ? “ Muwe ne imunyu mghati mwenu , na mkale tseghamba . ”
41010001	Kuya Yesu koka hanu hala kaghenda kune chijiji cha Yudeya na kuloka ghumto Yoridani . Kuya kingili lye iwanu limtsila , naye kawalangulitsa ka pfatsowele .
41010002	Mafarisayo wangi wamghendela , wamghetsa kwa kumghutsa , “ Apfi pfinogha imunu kumleka mwehe wake ? ”
41010003	Yesu kawedika , “ Apfi Musa yalaghitse choni ? ”
41010004	Wedika , “ Musa kalonga , twodaha kwandika talaka na kuwaleka . ”
41010005	Yesu kawalongela , “ Musa kandika apfo kwaapfila imimoyo yenu misughu .
41010006	Lekeni kulawa mwanduso , ‘ Imulungu kalumba mmale ne ipinga . ’
41010007	‘ Apfo , immale katsomleka mai wake na aba wake , naye katselunga na mwehe wake ,
41010008	nawo watsokuwa lukuli lumwe na si weli keli bae , ila lukuli lumwe . ’

41010028	Petiri kamlongela , “ Tuleka chila chinu tukuwinza ghweghwe ! ”

41010030	katsobokela ketseketse mne ghamatsuwa ghano . Katsobokela kaye , iwandughu , lumbu , mai , iwana , ne imighunda na kudununzika na mne ghamatsuwa ighakutsa katsobokela ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .

41010032	Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wang'ali wogheluka woghenda Yerusalemu , Yesu kawalongola , iwanang'ina wake wakangawala ne iwanu iwakalile womuwinza wose wapfuka . Yesu kawasola keli iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli mmbalimbali , kawalongela aghala ighatsomlawila .

41011010	Imulungu ubaliki Undewa iukutsa wa mndewa wetu Daudi . Mumtunye Imulungu yali kuchanya ng'ani ! ”
41011011	Yesu kengila Yerusalemu , kaghenda mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu . Kalola mmbalimbali chila hanu , lekeni kwaapfila litsua tsaliswa , kaghenda Betaniya ne iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli .

41011018	Wapfilongotsi we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso hawahulike apfi , wandusa kubama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu . Lekeni wang'ali wompfuka , kwaapfila iwanu wose wang'ali wokangawala kwa ghamalangulitso ghake .

41012020	Tsakukala ne iwandughu saba . Imkulu wawo kakwela , naye kafa bila kuleka imwana wowose .
41012021	Ndughu wa keli kamkwela chitsuka ayo , naye kafa bila kweleka imwana . Ilawila pfipfo kwa ndughu wa kadatu .

41012026	Kwe imbuli ya ukutsilihuka kwe iwanu iwafile , apfi ng'amsomile bae imbuli ya libagho ilikwaka mne ichitabu cha Musa , Imulungu pfayalongile na Abrahamu , ‘ Nene na Imulungu wa Abrahamu , na Imulungu we Isaka na Imulungu wa Yakobu . ’

41012031	Na laghitso lya keli , ‘ Mnoghele imunu wa habehi yako , ka pfawinoghela imwenyegho . ’ Kuduhu laghitso kulu kubita agha meli . ”
41012032	Imlangulitsi ayo wa ghamalaghitso kamlongela Yesu , “ Mlangulitsi , kwidika ghoya . Kulongesa ghendo , Imulungu ka yumwe na kuduhu imulungu yungi ila yeye .
41012033	Na kumnoghela Imulungu kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghwose na kwa tsimbutsi tsako tsose na kwa ngupfu tsako tsose , na kumnoghela imunu wa habehi yako ka pfawinoghela ghwe imwenyegho pfinogha ghendo kubita kumlapfila Imulungu inambiko . ”
41012034	Yesu hayonile kedika kwa ihekima , kamlongela , “ Ng'uli kutali bae na Undewa we Imulungu . ” Kulawa baho , kuduhu imunu iyaghetsile kumghutsa Yesu imbuli yoyose .
41012035	Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu , kawaghutsa , “ Ebali iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wolonga Kiristu kaimwana wa Daudi ?
41012036	Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka tsakamlongotsa Daudi , naye kalonga , ‘ Imtwatsa kamlongela Imtwatsa wangu , Ukale ghumoko ghwangu ghwa kujilo mbaka niweke iwehile wako hasi ha ghamaghulu ghako . ’
41012037	“ Daudi imwenyegho tsakamkema ‘ Imtwatsa . ’ Apfi Kiristu yodahatse kuwa imwanaghe ? ” Iwanu wengi wamhulikitsa kwa kudeng'elela .
41012038	Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa kalonga , “ Mwalangitse na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso . Wonoghela kupfala ghamaghwanda matali na kulamsighwa mmasoko .
41012039	Na wosaghula ipfighoda ipfili hambele mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela na kukala hanu hanoghile mne ipfihungo .
41012040	Wakuja mne tsing'anda tse pfitsuka , kwa kwilangusa wanogha , wolomba bila kwipfa . Awo watsohighighwa ng'ani . ”
41012041	Yesu tsakakala habehi na chinu cha kwikila sadaka , kalola iwanu pfawoghela tsisendi . Matajiri wengi walapfa sendi nyingi .
41012042	Kuya katsa chitsuka yumwe mhingwa kaghela sendi mbili .
41012043	Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake kalonga , “ Nowalongela ghendo , chitsuka yuno keka nyingi kubita wose .
41012044	Wose walapfa tsimali tsawo itsiswelele , lekeni chitsuka yuno kalapfa pfose pfalinapfo . ”
41013001	Yesu hayang'ali yolawa kunze kwe ing'anda ye Imulungu , yumwe wa imwanang'ina wake kamlongela , “ Mlangulitsi , ulole ghamabwe na tsing'anda pfatsinoghile ! ”
41013002	Yesu kamwidika , “ Apfi kwotsona tsing'anda tsino ng'ulu ? Ng'alitsolekighwa libwe mchanya mwe libwe lingi , chila limwe litsakwasighwa hasi . ”
41013003	Yesu tsakakala mchidando mwa Chidunda cha Mitseituni , kumwambu kwe ing'anda ye Imulungu . Petiri , Jakobu , Yohane ne Andereya wamghutsa hawakalile waliyeka .
41013004	“ Utulongele , agha ghose ghatsolawila tsuwachi ? Na kutsakuwa na chitango chachi agha ghose haghatsolawila ? ”
41013005	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mwalangitse , imunu aleke kuwaghutsukila .
41013006	Iwanu wengi watsakutsa kwa taghwa lyangu , watsolonga , ‘ Nene nayeye ! ’ na watsowaghutsukila iwanu wengi .
41013007	Namwe hamtsohulika ng'ondo na mbuli tsa ng'ondo , mleke kupfuka . Ipfinu apfo pfobamighwa pfilawile , ila utsighilo ung'ali kutsa .
41013008	Iwanu we isi watsetowa ne iwanu wa isi ingi , undewa utsetowa ne undewa ungi , ne isi itsoking'isika chila hanu , na kutsolawila nzala ng'ulu . Agha ghose ghatsakuwa ka mwanduso wa usungu we kweleka .
41013009	“ Namwe mwalangitse ! Mtsoghoghighwa na kughalighwa mne libaratsa . Mtsotowighwa mne tsing'anda tsa ukulombela . Mtsakwima hambele he iwabala na iwandewa kwaajili yangu kuwalongela mbuli tsinoghile .
41013010	Na Imbuli Inoghile ye Imulungu yobamighwa kupetighwa mne tsiisi tsose .
41013011	Hawatsowaghogha na kuwaghala kune libaratsa , mleke ukwalangula cha ukulonga . Mlonge chochose chila chamtsakwing'ighwa , kwaapfila si mwemwe bae yamlonga , ila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
41013012	Ndughu katsomlapfa ndughu yake yakomighwe , na aba katsomlapfa imwanaghe yakomighwe . Iwana watsowalema na kuwakoma aba na mai tsawo .
41013013	Iwanu wose watsowahila kwa taghwa lyangu , ila ayula yoghendelela mbaka usighilo katsokombolighwa .
41013014	“ Hamtsakwona lideso lima hanu hang'alibamighwa kwima bae . ( Imunu iyosoma amanye ) Awala iwali mne isi ya Yudeya watsumile mpfidunda .
41013015	Imunu wowose iyali mkano aleke kuhulumka hasi , au kwingila mng'anda kulapfa ichinu chochose kunze .
41013016	Na yula iyali kumghunda aleke kuya ukaye kusola ghamaghwanda ghake .
41013017	Watsoghaya ng'ani iwapinga wane tsiinda ne iwapinga iwakong'etsa mne ghamatsuwa agho !
41013018	Mlombe agho ghaleke kulawila msimu wa chipfeghetsi !
41013019	Kwaapfila ghamatsuwa agho kutsakuwa na maghayo ighang'ali ghalawile kulawa mwanduso , Imulungu hayalumbile isi yose , mbaka sambi , na ng'aghatsolawila keli !
41013020	Na ka Imtwatsa ng'ahungutse bae ghamatsuwa agho , kuduhu imunu ang'adahile kukombolighwa . Lekeni kwaajili ye iwanu wake iyawasaghule , kahungutsa ghamatsuwa agho .
41013021	“ Mne ghamatsuwa agho , imunu wowose ang'awalongela , ‘ Lola , Kiristu kahano ! ’ au ‘ Kakula ! ’ Mleke kumtoghola .
41013022	Kwaapfila watsolawila tsina Kiristu wa ughutsu na manabii wa ughutsu . Watsotenda ipfinzonza ne ipfitango na kuwaghutsukila hata wala iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu , ka yodahika .
41013023	Mwalangitse ! Niwalongela chila ichinu ichitsolawila .
41013024	“ Lekeni mna ghamatsuwa agho ahala maghayo aghatsomala , litsua litsakuwa ne ichisi , lwetsi ng'alutsolapfa ghumwanga bae ,
41013025	tsinondo tsitsolaghala kulawa mlanga , na ngupfu tsa kulanga tsitsohighitsighwa .
41013026	Baho iwanu watsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakutsa mne ghamawingu kwe ingupfu ng'ulu na utunitso .
41013027	Naye katsowatuma wamalaika wake kuwasola awala iyawasaghule mne isi yose , kulawa ubali umwe mbaka ubali ungi !
41013028	“ Mwilangulitse imbuli ino kulawa mne mbiki ghwa mtini . Ghamaputila ghake haghakuwa madeke na kwandusa kutula , mwomanya chihangatsi cha habehi .
41013029	Pfipfila hamtsakona agha ghose gholawila , mmanye Imwana we Imunu kahabehi ghendo .
41013030	Nowalongela ghendo , iwanu wa mweleko ghuno ng'awatsoluta bae mbaka agha ghose ghalawile .
41013031	Kulanga ne isi pfitsoluta , ila mbuli tsangu ng'atsitsoluta bae .
41013032	“ Kuduhu iyomanya litsuwa lila wala saa ila . Hata wamalaika wa kulanga wala Imwana ng'awomanya , ila Imulungu yaliyeka iyomanya .
41013033	Mwalangitse , mkale meso kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae itskughwa tsuwachi .
41013034	Yeghala ne imunu yokile na kuwaleka iwatumwa wake , chila yumwe ne isang'ano yake . Kuya kamlaghitsa imkalitsi wa libani akale meso .
41013035	Apfo mkale meso , kwaapfila ng'ammanya bae yane ing'anda yatsakuya tsuwachi , kakuya nemihe , nechilo , ijogholo hayatsakwika , au nemitondotondo .
41013036	Ka kakuya kwa kwidukitsa , aleke kuwapfika muwasa .
41013037	Achino chaniwalongela , niwalongela iwanu wose . ‘ Mwalangitse ! ’ ”
41014001	Tsaghakalile matsuwa meli ng'ana ichihungo che Ipasaka na pfighate ipfilihela hamila chipfike . Iwakulu we inambiko na iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wabama inzila ya kumghogha Yesu chinyelenyele na kumkoma .
41014002	Walonga , “ Tuleke kumghogha mne ichihungo che Ipasaka , hela iwanu watsotenda tsogho . ”
41014003	Yesu tsakakala Betaniya mng'anda mwa Simoni , imunu iyang'ali yoghula ukoma . Hawakalile mmetsa wakuja ichijo cha nemihe , ipinga yumwe iyaghalile ichupa ya ghamafuta ighonung'ila gha bei ng'ulu katsa . Kaipfughula na kamwitila Yesu mwitwi .
41014004	Iwanu iwakalile aho tsawona maya , welongela , “ Ule kakwaghitsa ghamafuta gha bei ng'ulu ?
41014005	Ghamafuta ghano ghang'autsighwe kwa bei ng'ulu na sendi weng'ighwe iwahingwa ! ” Kuya wamkembela ipinga ayo .
41014006	Yesu kalonga , “ Mlekeni ! Ule mumdesa ? Yeye kanitendela ichinu chinoghile .
41014007	Iwahingwa mwinawo ghamatsuwa ghose , na mwodaha kuwapfila pfopfose pfambama . Lekeni ng'amtsakuwa na nene bae ghamatsuwa ghose .
41014008	Ipinga ayu katenda achila chayadahile . Kalongola kulubaka lukuli lwangu , lukale ghoya kwa kutsikighwa .
41014009	Nowalongela ghendo , hanu hohose imbuli inoghile haitsopetighwa mne isi , chayatendile ipinga ayu chitsolongighwa kwa kumkumbuka yeye . ”
41014010	Yuda Isikarioti , yumwe wa wala iwanang'ina kumi na weli , kaghenda kwe ipfilongotsi we inambiko ili amhunduke Yesu kuna wawo .
41014011	Nawo hawahulike wadeng'elela kwa achila chayalongile , wamlongela watsomwing'a sendi . Apfo kabama nzila ya ukumhunduka Yesu .
41014012	Mne litsuwa lya mwanduso lye Ichihungo cha Pfighate ipfilihela hamila na litsuwa lya kumkoma imwana we ing'olo we Ipasaka , iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa , “ Apfi ubama tughende kwani tukakwikile ichijo cha Ipasaka ? ”
41014013	Yesu kawatuma iwanang'ina wake weli , kawalongela , “ Mghende kune ghumji , mtsetingana ne imunu iyaghalile chiya cha ghamatsi . Mmuwinze
41014014	mbaka kune ing'anda iyatsakwingila , kuya mumlongele imunu yane ing'anda , Imlangulitsi koghutsa , ‘ Chilikwani chiheleto cha iwahenza , ili ndiye Ipasaka ne iwanang'ina wangu ? ’
41014015	Kuya katsowalangusa chiheleto chikulu cha uchanya ichikighwe ghoya . Mtwikile amo . ”
41014016	Iwanang'ina tsawoka , waghenda kune ghumji , kuya tsawona ka Yesu pfawalongele . Apfo wachitenga ichijo che Ipasaka .
41014017	Kuya haipfikile nemihe , Yesu kapfika ne iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli .
41014018	Bahala hawang'ali wakuja mmetsa , Yesu kalonga , “ Nowalongela ghendo , imunu yumwe kulawa kuna mwemwe iyakuja na nene , katsonihunduka . ”
41014019	Iwanang'ina waghanzika , chila yumwe kamghutsa , “ Angu nene ? ”
41014020	Yesu kawedika , “ Yumwe kulawa mna mwemwe kumi na weli , iyopfabika chighate chake mne bakuli na nene .
41014021	Imwana we Imunu katsakufa ka pfayandikighwe . Lekeni katsoghaya imunu yula yomhunduka Imwana we Imunu . Ing'awile ng'apfu kwa imunu yula ka ng'elekighwe bae ! ”
41014022	Hawang'ali wakuja , Yesu kasola chighate , kachibaliki , kachimegha , kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake kawalongela , “ Msole , aluno lukuli lwangu . ”
41014023	Kuya kasola chikombe , kachibaliki , kaweng'a , wose wachinwela .
41014024	Kawalongela , “ Aino idamu yangu ya lilaghano iikwitika kwaajili ye iwanu wengi .
41014025	Nowalongela ghendo , sitsakunwa keli bae dipfai ya mitsabibu mbaka litsuwa lila lyanitsakunwa ingi mne Undewa we Imulungu . ”
41014026	Hawamalitse kwimba wila , waghenda kune Chidunda cha Mitseituni .
41014027	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mwemwe wose mtsotsuma na kundeka , ka pfayandikighwe , ‘ Nitsomtowa mdimi , ne iwang'olo watsopwililika . ’

41014029	Petiri kamlongela , “ Hata wose wang'akuleka , nene sikuleka bae ! ”

41014031	Lekeni Petiri kaghendelela kulonga , “ Hata ka nobamighwa nife naghwe , mbe , sikubela bae ! ” Ne iwanang'ina wangi wose walonga pfipfo .
41014032	Tsawapfika hanu hokemighwa Getisemane , Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Hanighenda kulomba , mwemwe mkale hano . ”
41014033	Kawasola Petiri , Jakobu na Yohane , naye kandusa kughanzika na kwona usungu ng'ani mne ghumoyo ghwake .
41014034	Kawalongela , “ Usungu uli mne ghumoyo ghwangu mkulu ng'ani , wodaha kunikoma . Mkale hano na mkale meso . ”
41014035	Kaghenda hambele chidogho , keghwisa hasi , kalomba , ka yodahika aleke kubitila mne ichipindi chila cha kudununzika .
41014036	Kalomba , “ Aba wangu , ipfinu pfose pfodahika kuna ghweghwe . Uchilapfe chikombe cha kudununzika kuna nene , lekeni si ka pfanibama nene bae , ila pfaubama ghweghwe . ”
41014037	Kuya koya keli kawapfika iwanang'ina wake wadatu wawasa . Naye kamlongela Petiri , “ Simoni , kuwasa ? Ng'udahile bae kukala meso hata kwa saa imwe ? ”
41014038	Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wose , “ Mkale meso , mlombe mleke kughetsighwa na ghehile . Ghumoyo ghwobama kutenda ghanoghile , lekeni lukuli lwahela ingupfu . ”
41014039	Kaghenda keli kulomba akuno kolonga ghaghala .
41014040	Kuya koya keli kawapfika iwanang'ina wake wawasa , ng'awadahile bae kufumbula tsinenge tsawo . Nawo ng'awamanyile bae chakumlongela Yesu .
41014041	Hayoile lwakadatu , kawalongela , “ Mng'ali mwowasa na kubwihila ? Lamkeni lelo ! Ichipindi chipfika , Imwana we Imunu sambi kakwing'ighwa mne ghamoko ghe iwanu wane nzambi .
41014042	Mwinuke ! Tughende ! Mlole , ayuno hano imunu yonihunduka nene ! ”
41014043	Yesu hayang'ali yolonga , Yuda , yumwe we iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli , tsakapfika . Katsa na kingili lye iwanu iwakindile imimaghe ne ipfilungu . Tsawatumighwa na ipfilongotsi we inambiko , iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso ne iwabala .
41014044	Yuda kaling'a ichitango kingili alyo . “ Imunu yanitsomnonela iyo yamumbama . Mumghoghe , mumghale na mumlolese aleke kutsuma . ”
41014045	Bahala Yuda hayapfikile , kamghendela Yesu kalonga , “ Mlangulitsi ! ” kuya kamnonela .
41014046	Apfo , wamkinda , wamghogha Yesu .
41014047	Lekeni imunu yumwe mne iwanu iwemile hala , kalapfa limaghe lyake kamtowa imtumwa we Ichilongotsi we Inambiko , kamghana ghutwi lyake .
41014048	Yesu kawalongela , “ Pfii mtsa hano ne imimaghe ne ipfilungu kunighogha ka nene nambapfi ?
41014049	Chila litsuwa tsanahamwe namwe , nolangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , ng'amnighoghile bae . Lekeni leka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimilike . ”
41014050	Kuya iwanang'ina wose wamleka , watsuma .

41014052	kalileka ligholole lyake , katsuma chidako .
41014053	Kuya wamghala Yesu mne ing'anda ye Ichilongotsi we Inambiko , baho ipfilongotsi we inambiko , iwabala ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wose wetingana hamwe .
41014054	Petiri yang'ali yomuinzilitsa Yesu kwa kutali , kengila mne luwa lya Ichilongotsi we Inambiko , kakala ne iwakalitsi , na yang'ali yakota ghumoto .
41014055	Iwakulu we inambiko ne iwanu wose mne libaratsa wabama ukalangama wamwing'e maghomba Yesu ili wadahe kumkoma , lekeni ng'awadahile bae kuupata .
41014056	Iwanu wengi walonga ughutsu kuna Yesu , lekeni ukalangama wawo ng'awighalile bae .
41014057	Iwanu wamwenga wenuka , walonga ukalangama wa ughutsu ,
41014058	“ Tsatumhulika kolonga , ‘ Nitsoihinya Ing'anda ino ye Imulungu iitsengighwe kwa ghamoko na litsuwa lya kadatu nitsotsenga ingi ing'aitsengighwe kwa ghamoko ghe iwanu . ’ ”
41014059	Hata apfo , ukalangama wawo ng'awighalile bae .

41014061	Lekeni Yesu kenyamala , ng'alongile bae . Ichilongotsi we Inambiko kamghutsa keli , “ Apfi ghweghwe kwa Kiristu , Imwana we Imulungu Yetunyighwe ? ”
41014062	Yesu kalonga , “ Ona nene . Wose mtsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakala mne ghumoko ghwa kujilo ghwe Imulungu yane Ingupfu , kakutsa mne ghamawingu gha kulanga . ”

41014065	Iwanu wangi wandusa kumbwalulila Yesu ghamate , wamghubika tsinenge tsake , wamtowa , wamlongela , “ Utange , yuhi yakutowile ! ” Pfipfila iwakalitsi wamsola , wamtowa .

41014069	Imtumwa yula hayamwonile keli hala , kawalongela iwanu iwemile hala . Ayuno naye yumwe wawo .
41014070	Petiri kabela keli . Hambele chidogho , awala iwemile hala wamghendela . Wamlongela , “ Ghweghwe kwa yumwe wawo ghendo , kwaapfila ghweghwe kwa Mgalilaya . ”
41014071	Petiri kandusa kwilighita na kwilaha kuna wawo , “ Simmanyile bae imunu yamlonga mbuli tsake . ”

41015001	Nemitondotondo , ipfilongotsi we inambiko wetingana hamwe ne iwabala , iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso na libaratsa lyose , walamla kumghala Yesu kwa Pilato . Apfo wamwoha , wamghala na wamwing'a Pilato .
41015002	Pilato kamghutsa Yesu , “ Apfi ghweghwe kwaimndewa wa Wayahudi ? ” Yesu kamwidika , “ Ona , ka ghweghwe pfaulonga . ”
41015003	Iwakulu we inambiko wamghutsukila Yesu maghomba mengi .
41015004	Apfo , Pilato kamghutsa Yesu keli , “ Ng'ukwidika chochose bae ? Tegheletsa ghamaghomba ghawo ghose kuna ghweghwe . ”
41015005	Lekeni Yesu kalema kwidika keli , Pilato kakangawala .
41015006	Chila Ichihungo che Ipasaka , Pilato tsakatsowela kumlekelela imunu yumwe yohighwe yobamighwa ne iwanu .
41015007	Ichipindi acho kukala ne imunu yumwe yakemighwe Baraba , wamwika mne chifungo hamwe ne iwanu iwatendile hengele na iwakomile iwanu mna tsogho kulu .
41015008	Na kingili lye iwanu limghendela Pilato na limlomba awatendele ka pfayatendagha .
41015009	Naye Pilato kawaghutsa , “ Apfi , mwobama nimlekelele Imndewa wa Wayahudi ? ”
41015010	Pilato kamanya ghendo ka pfilongotsi we inambiko wamghala Yesu kuna yeye kwaapfila wamwonela chepfu .
41015011	Lekeni ipfilongotsi we inambiko wawaswangitsa iwanu wamlombe Pilato amlekelele Baraba ihanu ha Yesu .
41015012	Pilato kawaghutsa iwanu awo , “ Kuya mwobama nimtende choni imunu yamumkema Imndewa wa Wayahudi ? ”
41015013	Iwanu wose wakemelela walonga , “ Mkondeke mna msalaba ! ”
41015014	Pilato kawaghutsa , “ Apfi atendile choni chihile ? ” Walonga keli kwa kukemelela , “ Mkondeke mna msalaba ! ”
41015015	Pilato kabama kuwadeng'eletsa iwanu , apfo kamlekelela Baraba . Kuya kalaghitsa Yesu yafapulighwe ipfiboko , kuya wamkondeke mna msalaba .
41015016	Asikali wamghala Yesu mghati mwe ing'anda ye imkulu we isi ya Yudeya , wawakema hamwe wayawo wose .
41015017	Wampfatsa Yesu lighwanda lya langi ya tsambarau , wabota litaji lya mihonga , walika mwitwi mwake .
41015018	Kuya wandusa kumlamsa , “ Mbukwa Imndewa wa Wayahudi ! ”
41015019	Waghendelela kumtowa ne ng'weku mwitwi mwake na kumbwalulila ghamate . Watowa ghamaghoti , wamwinamila .
41015020	Kuya hawamalitse kumbetsa , wamtsula lighwanda lya langi ya tsambarau wampfatsa ghamaghwanda ghake . Kuya wamlapfa kunze wamkondeka mne msalaba .
41015021	Hawakalile mnzila , wetingana ne imunu iyakemighwe Simoni , imunu wa Kirene , aba wawo Alekisanda na Lufo . Imunu ayo tsayang'ali yolawa kumghunda koghenda mne ghumji . Asikali wambama aghughale msalaba ghwa Yesu .

42002035	Kuya ukwalangula mne imimoyo ye iwanu wengi kutsoghubulighwa mwatsi . Naghwe imwenyegho , usungu ka lipanga ilitema utsouhoma ghumoyo ghwako . ”
42002036	Tsakukala na nabii yumwe pinga , kakala mnzehe ghendo , tagwa lyake Ana , neghe Fanuweli , wa lukolo lwa Aseri . Ipinga ayo tsakakala na immale wake kwa miyaka saba kulawa kukwelighwa kwake .

42003017	Ayo kana lungo mne ghamoko ghake , abetele uhemba wake , awike hamwe mne ikano yake na katsolakatsa mikumvi mne ghumoto ing'aghutsimika bae . ”

42004001	Yesu kalawa mne ghumto Yoridani kamema Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu , na Ghumuhe haghwo ghumlongotsa mbaka kunyika .
42004002	Ako kaghetsighwa na Setani kwa matsuwa alubaini . Mne agho , ng'ajile bae chinu chochose , na matsuwa agho haghamalile tsakona nzala .
42004003	Setani kamlongela ; “ Ka ghweghwe kwe Imwana wa Imulungu , ulilongele libwe lino liwe chighate . ”

42004020	Yesu kachighubika ichitabu , kamwing'a imtumwa , kuya kakala hasi . Iwanu wose mne ing'anda ye ukulombela wamtsodolela tsinenge .

42004024	Kaghendelela kulonga , “ Nowalongela ghendo , nabii ng'otogholighwa bae ukaye yake .

42004026	Eliya ng'atumighwe bae kwe chitsuka wowose , lekeni katumighwa kwe chitsuka yumwe iyakalile Sarefati mne isi ya Sidoni .

42005001	Litsuwa limwe Yesu tsakema mmbalimbali mwa tsiwa Genesareti , baho iwanu wammemela na kumkunughitsa kunughitsa , wategheletsa Imbuli ye Imulungu .

42005036	Kuya Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino , “ Kuduhu imunu iyodegha ichiraka kulawa mne lighwanda lya sambi na kuchika mne lighwanda lya ghumwande . Ka kotenda apfo , katsolidegha lighwanda lya sambi , na ichiraka kulawa mne lighwanda lya sambi ng'achitsolingana bae na lighwanda lya ghumwande .

42006001	Litsuwa limwe lya sabato Yesu ang'ali yobita mne imighunda ya uhemba . Iwanang'ina wake wandusa kukwanyula mikungwi ya uhemba , waifighisa mne ghamoko ghawo waja .

42006019	Iwanu wose tsawabama kumkinda Yesu , kwaapfila ingupfu ing'ali imlawa na iwahonetsa wose .
