42006033	Mng'awatendela ghanoghile iwanu wala iwowatendela ghanoghile , apfi uluso wachi wamlangusa ? Pfipfila ‘ iwanu wane nzambi ’ wotenda pfipfo !
42006034	Mng'awakopesha iwanu wala yamuwalolela watsomuyitsilani , apfi uluso wachi wamlangusa ? Pfipfila ‘ iwanu wane nzambi ’ wowakopesha wayawo , na kuwalolela wawoyitsile .

42006042	Apfi kwodaha kumlongela ndughu yako , ‘ Ndughu yangu , leka nikulapfe chibanzi chili mnenge mwako , ’ naghwe ghumwenyegho ng'ulyona bae biki ilili mnenge mwako ? Ghweghwe kwa mng'enye ! 42008017	Kwaapfila ichinu chochose ichipfisighwe chitsakuwa mwatsi , na ichinu chochose ichighubikighwe chitsomanyika na kughalighwa mne ghumwanga .
42008018	“ Apfo mwalangitse pfamuhulikitsa , kwaapfila imunu yenacho katsakongetsighwa , ne imunu yalihela ichinu katsobokighwa hata achila chopfikitsa kenacho . ”
42008019	Mai wake ne iwandughu tsake Yesu wamtsila , lekeni ng'awadahile bae kupfika habehi naye , kwaapfila iwanu tsawengi sideke .
42008020	Imunu yumwe kamlongela Yesu , “ Mai wako na ndughu tsako wema kunze , wobama wakwone . ”
42008021	Yesu kedika , “ Mai wangu na ndughu tsangu , iwo wala iwohulika imbuli ye Imulungu na kuitoghola . ”
42008022	Litsuwa limwe Yesu kengila mne mnumbwi ne iwanang'ina wake , kawalongela , “ Tuloke kumwambu mwe tsimbu . ” Apfo wandusa ghumwanza .
42008023	Hawang'ali mne ghumwanza , Yesu kawasa . Bahala , nyahemu ng'ulu ng'ani tsailawila mne tsimbu na mnumbwi wandusa kumema ghamatsi , apfo wose tsawabama watsame .
42008024	Iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamlamsa , “ Mtwatsa , Mtwatsa ! Twotsama ! ” Yesu kalamka , kalikembela libeho ne inyahemu , napfo pfinyamala . Litsimbu linyamala tulu .
42008025	Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake , “ Kulikwani ukutoghola kwenu ? ” Lekeni wakangawala , wapfuka , welongela , “ Ayu imunu wachi ? Kokembela libeho ne inyahemu , napfo pfomhulikitsa ? ”
42008026	Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghendelela na ghumwanza , wapfika mne isi ya Gerasi , ili kumwambu mwe tsimbu Galilaya .
42008027	Yesu hayang'ali yohulumka mne mnumbwi , kaghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu , ketingana ne imunu yane ipfinyamkela . Imunu ayo ng'apfalile bae ghamaghwanda kwa ghamatsuwa mengi , na ng'akalile bae mng'anda , lekeni ang'ali yokala kune tsikaburi .
42008028	Hamwonile Yesu , tsakalila na kamghwila mmaghulu , kuya kakemela , “ Yesu , Imwana we Imulungu Iyali Kuchanya Ng'ani ! Apfi kwobama unitende choni ? Nokulomba uleke kunidununza ! ”
42008029	Imunu yuno kalonga apfino kwaapfila Yesu tsakawakembela ipfinyamkela wamlawe . Chinyamkela ayo ang'ali yomghoghagha . Hata ka iwanu tsawamwoha ghamoko na ghamaghulu ghake ne minyololo , yeye kaibema minyololo ayo , na ipfinyamkela wamghalagha mbaka kunyika .
42008030	Yesu kamghutsa , “ Taghwa lyako nani ? ” Naye kamwidika , “ Taghwa lyangu ‘ Likingili ’ , ” kwaapfila tsakana ipfinyamkela wengi .
42008031	Ipfinyamkela wamlomba Yesu aleke kuwaghala mne lipondo lyang'alitsigha .
42008032	Habehi na hanu hala tsahana kingili lye iwangubi iwang'ali wakuja mlughongo . Apfo pfinyamkela wamlomba Yesu awalekelele wawengile iwangubi awo , naye Yesu kawaleka wawengile .
42008033	Ipfinyamkela wamlawa imunu ayo wengila mne iwangubi . Likingili lyose lye iwangubi litsumila kulwanda mwe tsimbu Galilaya , wafa mne ghamatsi .
42008034	Wadimi we iwangubi hawonile achila ichilawile , watsuma na kutsilonga mbuli atso mne ghumji na mne ipfijiji .
42008035	Iwanu waghenda kulola achila ichilawile , hawapfikile kwa Yesu , wampfika imunu yahonetsighwe ipfinyamkela kakala mmaghulu mwa Yesu , kapfala ghamaghwanda , na tsimbutsi tsake tsimuyila keli . Iwanu wose tsawapfuka .
42008036	Iwanu wala iwonile chinu chino wawalongela iwanu apfila imunu yane ipfinyamkela pfayahonetsighwe .
42008037	Kuya iwanu wose we isi ya Gerasi wamlomba Yesu yoke kwaapfila tsawapfuka ghendo . Apfo Yesu kengila mne mnumbwi yoke .
42008038	Imunu yahonetsighwe ipfinyamkela kamlomba Yesu , “ Leka nighende na ghweghwe . ” Lekeni Yesu ng'atoghole bae kughenda naye , kamlongela ,
42008039	“ Uye ukaye ukawalongele iwanu achila chayakutendele Imulungu . ” Apfo kaghenda muisi mwose , kawalongela iwanu achila Yesu chayamtendele .
42008040	Yesu hayoile ubali ungi wa tsimbu , iwanu wambokela kwa kudeng'elela kwaapfila wose tsawang'ali wombeta .
42008041	Kuya katsa imunu yumwe yakemighwe Yairo , iyakalile mkulu we Ing'anda ya ukulombela . Keghwisa mmaghulu mwa Yesu , kamlomba aghende ukaye yake ,
42008042	kwaapfila imwanaghe ipinga nyalimwe yane miyaka kumi na mili yang'ali yobama yafe . Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda , iwanu wammemela chila hanu .
42008043	Pinga yumwe yadununzike kwa utamu wa kulawa idamu kwa miyaka kumi na mili , hata ka tsakaghisa mali tsake tsose kwa waghanga , tsakuduhu imunu yadahile kumhonetsa , tsakakala mne iwanu awo .
42008044	Pinga ayo tsakatsa kuchisogho kwa Yesu kakinda pindo lya ghwanda lyake . Bahala idamu ileka kumlawa .
42008045	Yesu kaghutsa , “ Angu yuhi yanikindile ? ” Iwanu wose wabela . Petiri kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , iwanu wakutsunguluka na wakumemela ! ”
42008046	Lekeni Yesu kalonga , “ Kuna imunu kang'inda , nimanya kwaapfila ngupfu tsangu tsindawa . ”
42008047	Ipinga hayonile ng'odaha bae kwipfisa , tsakatsa aku koghudema , keghwisa mmaghulu mwa Yesu . Kamlongela Yesu hambele he iwanu iwali hala ichinu ichimtendile amkinde na bahala pfayahonetsighwe .
42008048	Yesu kamlongela ipinga ayo , “ Mwanangu , ukutoghola kwako kukuhonetsa . Ughende tseghamba . ”
42008049	Yesu hang'ali yolonga , tsakatsa imunu kulawa mne ing'anda ya Yairo . Kamlongela Yairo , “ Uleke kumtsupfa Imlangulitsi . ”
42008050	Lekeni Yesu haulike apfo kamlongela Yairo , “ Uleke kupfuka , ghwe toghola na imwanagho katsohonetsighwa . ”
42008051	Hapfikile ukaye kwa Yairo , kawaghoma iwanu waleke kwingila naye mng'anda , lekeni Petiri , Yohane , Jakobu , aba wa imwana yula iyafile na mai wake .
42008052	Wanu wose wang'ali womlila imwana iyafile akuno weyayana . Yesu kawalongela , “ Mleke kulila , imwana ng'afile bae , ila kawasa ! ”
42008053	Iwanu wose wamseka Yesu kwaapfila tsawamanya imwana kafa .
42008054	Yesu kaghukinda ghumoko ghwe imwana iyafile , kamlongela , “ Mwanangu , lamka ! ”
42008055	Imwana iyafile ughima wake umuyila , na bahala kalamka . Kuya Yesu kawalongela wamwing'e imwana yula ichijo .
42008056	Aba wake na mai wake tsawakangawala , lekeni Yesu kawaghoma kumlongela imunu wowose achila ichilawile .
42009001	Yesu tsakawakema hamwe iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli , kaweng'a ingupfu na uwetso wa kulapfa ipfinyamkela na kuhonetsa watamu .
42009002	Kuya kawatuma kuwapetela iwanu mbuli tsa Undewa we Imulungu na kuwahonetsa iwatamu .
42009003	Kawalongela , “ Mne ghumwanza mleke kusola ichinu chochose , mleke kusola ng'weku wala ghumkoba wala ichijo wala sendi wala maghwanda meli .
42009004	Ing'anda yoyose yamkwingila , mkale mmo mbaka hamkuka mne ghumji aghwo .
42009005	Iwanu wang'alema kuwabokela , hamlawa mne ghumji aghwo , mkung'use litimbwisi mmaghulu mwenu , chiwe ichitango ka walema kumuhulikitsani . ”
42009006	Iwanang'ina wake waghenda mne ipfijiji pfose , aku wopeta Imbuli Inoghile na wowahonetsa iwanu chila hanu .
42009007	Herodi hakalile mndewa wa Galilaya , kahulika ipfinu pfose ipfitendighwe na Yesu . Naye kapfuka kwaapfila iwanu wangi tsawang'ali wolonga Yohane mbatitsa katsilihuka ,
42009008	wangi walonga Eliya kalawila , na wangi walonga nabii yumwe wa ghumwande katsilihuka .
42009009	Herodi kalonga , “ Yohane tsanimghana litwi , apfi ayu nani iyanihulika mbuli tsake ? ” Naye tsakabama amwone .
42009010	Iwatumighwa wake hawoyile wamlongela Yesu chila ichinu chawatendile . Naye kawasola iwanang'ina wake waliyeka , kaghenda nawo mne ghumji ighukemighwe Betisaida .
42009011	Iwanu hawamanyile kwaghendile , tsawamuwinza . Yesu kawabokela , kalonga nawo mbuli tse Undewa we Imulungu na kawahonetsa iwanu iwabamile kuhonetsighwa .
42009012	Litsua haling'ali lyikuswa , iwanang'ina kumi na weli wamghendela Yesu wamlongela , “ Walongele iwanu waghende mne ipfijiji na kaye itsili mne imighunda tsa habehi kubama ichijo na hanu ha kuwasa , kwaapfila twakunyika . ”
42009013	Lekeni Yesu kawedika , “ Mwemwe iwenyegho muweng'e ichijo waje . ” Wamwidika , “ Twetwe tuna pfighate pfitano ne iwasomba weli waliheka . Pfii kwobama tughende tukawaghulile iwanu wose wano ? ”
42009014	Hanu hala hana wamale elufu tano . Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Muwalongele iwanu wakale mne makingili , na chila kingili wanu hamsini . ”
42009015	Kuya iwanang'ina watenda apfo , iwanu wose wakala hasi .
42009016	Yesu kasola pfighate pfitano ne iwasomba weli , kalola kulanga , kapfibaliki . Kuya kamegha pfighate ne iwasomba , kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake waweng'e iwanu .
42009017	Iwanu wose tsawaja weghuta . Ne iwanang'ina wadondola pfihindi pfe pfighate ne iwasomba ipfimemile Pfiseghe kumi na pfili .
42009018	Litsuwa limwe Yesu ang'ali yolomba aliyeka . Iwanang'ina wake wamtsila , naye kawaghutsa , “ Apfi iwanu wolonga nene nani ? ”
42009019	Nawo wamwidika , “ Iwanu wamwenga wolonga ghweghwe kwa Yohane Mbatitsa , wangi wolonga kwa Eliya , wangi wolonga kwa-yumwe wa manabii wa ghumwande yoyile mne ughima . ”
42009020	Naye kawaghutsa , “ Namwe mwolonga nene nani ? ” Petiri kamwidika , “ Ghweghwe kwa Kiristu yulawile kwe Imulungu . ”
42009021	Kuya Yesu kawakanya waleke kumlongela imunu wowose ichinu chino .
42009022	Pfipfila tsakawalongela , “ Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yadununzike ng'ani na kulemighwa ne iwabala , ipfilongotsi we inambiko ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso . Katsokomighwa , kuya mne litsuwa lya kadatu katsotsilihuka . ”
42009023	Kuya kawalongela wose , “ Imunu wowose iyobama kuniwinza nene yeleme imwenyegho na yaghale msalaba ghwake , aniwinze .
42009024	Imunu wowose iyobama kuukombola ughima wake katsowaghitsa , lekeni wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake kwa kuniwinza nene katsoukombola .
42009025	Apfi imunu yobweda choni ka ang'apata chila chinu ichili muisi mwose , aku kowaghisa ughima wake ?
42009026	Imunu wowose iyombonela chinyala nene na ghamalangulitso ghangu , Imwana we Imunu katsomwonela chinyala hatsakutsa mne utunitso wake , na mne utunitso wa aba wake , na we malaika wahenzeluka .
42009027	Nowalongela ghendo , wangi iwemile hano ng'awatsakufa bae mbaka wawone Undewa we Imulungu . ”
42009028	Aghabitile matsuwa manane kulawa halongile ipfinu pfino , Yesu kawasola Petiri , Yohane , na Jakobu , wagheluka kuchidunda kulomba .
42009029	Yesu hang'ali yolomba , uhanga wake ughalamka na ghwanda lyake liwa tselu chwee .
42009030	Bahala iwanu weli wang'ali wolonga naye . Iwanu awo tsawakala Musa na Eliya ,
42009031	woneka mne utunitso wa kulanga na walonga na Yesu mbuli tsa lifwa lyake ilitsolawila Yerusalemu .
42009032	Petiri na wayaghe tsawawasa ghendo , na hawalamke wona utunitso wa Yesu ne iwanu weli wema naye .
42009033	Iwanu awo hawang'ali wakuka , Petiri kamlongela Yesu , “ Mtwatsa , pfinogha twetwe tukale hano . Leka tutsenge pfibumbulika pfidatu , chimwe chako , chimwe cha Musa na chimwe cha Eliya . ” Petiri ng'amanyile bae yang'ali yolonga choni .
42009034	Petiri hang'ali yolonga apfo , liwingu lilawila liwaghubika , ne iwanang'ina wapfuka liwingu pfaliwaghubike .
42009035	Litsi lilonga kulawa mne liwingu , “ Ayuno mwanangu yanimsaghule , mtegheletseni yeye ! ”
42009036	Litsi halinyamale , Yesu tsakakala aliyeka . Iwanang'ina wenyamala na ng'awamlongele imunu wowose bae ichinu chawonile ghamatsuwa agho .
42009037	Haipfikile nemitondo , Yesu na iwanang'ina wadatu wahulumka kuchidunda , na iwanu wengi wetingana naye .
42009038	Imunu yumwe iyakalile mna mtingano ghula ghwe iwanu kakemelela , “ Mlangulitsi ! Nokulomba umlole imwanangu , imwanangu nyalimwe !
42009039	Ichinyamkela komghogha na komtenda adamilile , komtenda yaghwe chisala na lihofu lomlawa mne mlomo , na ng'omlekelela bae himahima !
42009040	Niwalomba iwanang'ina wako wamlapfe ichinyamkela , lekeni ng'awadahile bae . ”
42009041	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ka ! Pfii mwemwe mweleko ing'aghutoghola na iwaghile ! Apfi ng'ale namwe na kuwadudumila mbaka tsuwachi ? ” Kuya kamlongela imunu ayo , “ Nighalile hano imwanagho . ”
42009042	Imsongolo hang'ali yomghendela Yesu , ichinyamkela kamghwisa hasi chisala . Yesu kamkembela ichinyamkela , kamhonetsa imsongolo ayo na kamuhitsa imsongolo ayo kwa aba wake .
42009043	Iwanu wose wakangawala kwa uwetso mkulu we Imulungu . Yesu kolonga keli lifwa lyake ( Matei 17:22-23 ; Maliki 9:30-32 ) Iwanu hawang'ali wokangawala kwa ghose ghayatendile Yesu , kawalongela iwanang'ina wake ,
42009044	“ Mleke kwisemwa achino chaniwalongela ! Imwana we Imunu katsoghalighwa mna ghamoko ghe iwanu . ”
42009045	Lekeni iwanang'ina wake ng'awamanyile bae mana ye imbuli ino , kwaapfila ipfisighwa waleke kuimanya ; nawo wapfuka kumghutsa Yesu imbuli ino .
42009046	Iwanang'ina wa Yesu wandusa kwihisanya yuhi yatsakuwa imkulu mna wawo .
42009047	Yesu hamanyile ukwalangula kwawo , kamsola imwana mdodo kamwika habehi naye .
42009048	Kuya kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Imunu wowose iyombokela imwana yuno kwa taghwa lyangu kombokela nene . Ne imunu wowose iyombokela nene , pfipfila kombokela iyanitumile . Kwaapfila imunu wowose yali mdodo mna mwemwe katsakughwa mkulu mna mwemwe . ”
42009049	Yohane kamlongela Yesu , “ Mtwatsa , tumwona imunu kolapfa ipfinyamkela kwa taghwa lyako na tumghoma kutenda apfo , kwaapfila ng'elongotsagha na twetwe bae ”
42009050	Yesu kamlongela Yohane ne iwanang'ina wangi , “ Mleke kumghoma , kwaapfila imunu wowose iyowatoghola mwemwe kahamwe namwe . ”
42009051	Ghamatsuwa gha Yesu gha kuya kulanga aghapfikile habehi , Yesu kabama aghende Yerusalemu .
42009052	Kawalongotsa iwatumighwa iwaghendile mne tsikaye tsa Samariya kumwikila ghoya chila ichinu .
42009053	Lekeni iwanu wa Samariya ng'awambokele bae , kwaapfila tsawamanya koghenda Yerusalemu .
42009054	Iwanang'ina wake , Jakobu na Yohane hawonile apfo , wamghutsa Yesu , “ Mtwatsa , apfi kwobama twetwe tukeme ghumoto ghuhulumke kulawa kulanga ghuwalakatse wose , ka Eliya pfayatendile ? ”
42009055	Yesu kawahundukila kawakembela.e
42009056	Kuya Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda kuna kaye tsingi .
42009057	Hawang'ali mnzila , imunu yumwe kamlongela Yesu , “ Nitsokuwinza hanu hohose utsoghenda . ”
42009058	Yesu kamlongela , “ Wambwa wa kumuhulo wana tsimango ne iwapfideghe wana pfibali , lekeni Imwana we Imunu kahela hanu ha kuwasitsa litwi lyake na kubwihila . ”
42009059	Yesu kamlongela imunu yungi , “ Niwinze ! ” Lekeni imunu yula kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , leka tanu mbuye ukaye nikamtsike aba wangu . ”
42009060	Yesu kamwidika , “ Leka iwanu iwafile wawatsike wayawo , ila ghweghwe ghenda upete Undewa we Imulungu . ”
42009061	Imunu yungi kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , nitsokuwinza lekeni leka tanu nikawalongele iwandughu tsangu nakuka . ”
42009062	Yesu kamlongela , “ Imunu wowose iyokwaluka kulima na kuya kolola kuchisogho ng'obamighwa mne Undewa we Imulungu . ”
42010001	Kuya Imtwatsa kawasaghula iwanu wangi sabini na weli na kawatuma weliweli wamlongolele chila kaye na chila hanu abamile kughenda .
42010002	Kawalongela , “ Ghamapfuno mengi , lekeni iwosang'ana wadodo . Mumlombe Imtwatsa wa ghamahuno awatume watenda isang'ano mne mghunda ghwake .
42010003	Mghende ! Nowatuma mwemwe ka iwang'olo mghati mwe wambwa wa kumuhulo .
42010004	Mleke kusola ghumfuko au ghumkoba au imikwabatsa . Na mleke kulamsa imunu wowose mnzila .
42010005	Na ing'anda yoyose yamtsakwingila , tanu mlonge , ‘ Mkale tseghamba mne ing'anda ino . ’
42010006	Ka imunu yobama kukala tseghamba kabaho , katsakuwa tseghamba . Ka kuduhu imunu yobama kukala tseghamba , mwemwe mtsokala tseghamba .
42010007	Mkale mne ing'anda hayo , mje na mnwe chochose chamkwing'ighwa ; kwaapfila mtenda isang'ano kobamighwa yeng'ighwe sendi tsake . Mkale mne ing'anda iyampfikile na mleke kulawa mne ing'anda ayo na kughenda ing'anda ingi .
42010008	Ka mwakwingila mne ghumji ne iwanu wowabokela , diyeni achila chamtsakwing'ighwa .
42010009	Muwahonetse iwatamu iwali hao muwalongele , ‘ Undewa we Imulungu wa habehi yenu . ’
42010010	Lekeni ka mwakwingila mne ghumji ne iwanu wolema kuwabokela , biteni mna nzila tsawo mlonge ,
42010011	‘ Hata litimbwisi lya ghumji ghwenu ilinanahile mmaghulu mwetu twowakung'usilani mwemwe , chiwe chitango ka mlighitighwa , Lekeni mmanye pfino , Undewa wa Imulungu wa habehi ghendo ’
42010012	Nowalongela ghendo , mne litsuwa lya kuhigha Imulungu katsoghuhigha ng'ani ghumji agho kubita ghumji ghwa Sodoma ! ”
42010013	“ Ghweghwe Kolasini kutsoghaya ! Ghweghwe Betisaida kutsoghaya ! Kwaapfila ka ipfinu pfa kukangawatsa ipfitendeke hano pfing'atendeke Tiro na Sidoni , iwanu iwali hala wang'apfalile maghwanda gha ghamaghuniya na wang'abakale lipfu kulangusa waleka nzambi tsawo .
42010014	Mne litsuwa lya kuhigha Imulungu katsoyonela libatsi imiji ya Tiro na Sidoni kubita mwemwe .
42010015	Naghwe Kaperinaumu ! Apfi kutsakwinulighwa mbaka kulanga ? Bae ! Kutsakwasighwa mbaka kutsimu ! ”
42010016	Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Imunu iyowategheletsa mwemwe , konitegheletsa nene ; ne imunu iyowalema mwemwe , kondema nene . Ne imunu iyondema nene , komlema yula iyanitumile ! ”
42010017	Hambele iwanu wala sabini na weli woya wodeng'elela ng'ani , walonga , “ Mtwatsa , kwa taghwa lyako tuwakembela ipfinyamkela nawo watenda ka pfatubamile kutenda ! ”
42010018	Yesu kawedika , “ Nimwona Setani kaghwa ka lumwesa kulawa kulanga .
42010019	Mtegheletse ! Niweng'ani ukulu mwemwe , apfo mwodaha kuwabajugha wanzoka ne iwainge ; mtsakuwa na ukulu kwa iwehile wenu wose . Kuduhu ichinu chitsowalagha .
42010020	Lekeni mleke kudeng'elela kwaapfila ipfinyamkela wowapfukani , ila mdeng'elele kwaapfila mataghwa ghenu ghandikighwa kulanga . ”
42010021	Isaa iila Yesu kadeng'elela ng'ani na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu . Kuya kalonga , “ Aba , Imtwatsa wa kulanga ne iisi , nolonga mighede kwaapfila kupfipfisa ipfinu pfino kwe iwanu wane ihekima na iwomanya ; na kupfilangusa kwe iwana wadodo ! Ona , Aba , apfi pfipfo pfaubamile . ”
42010022	Kaghendelela kuwalongela iwanu , “ Aba wangu kangaya nene ipfinu pfose . Kuduhu imunu iyommanya Imwana ila Aba , na kuduhu imunu iyommanya Aba ila Imwana , ne iwanu wala iwasaghulighwe kulangusighwa ne Imwana . ”
42010023	Kuya Yesu kawahundukila iwanang'ina wake kalonga nawo waliyeka , “ Wabalikiighwa iwanu wala iwakona ipfinu pfamkwona mwemwe !
42010024	Kwaapfila nowalongela , manabii ne iwandewa wengi tsawabama wone achino chamkona mwemwe , lekeni ng'awadahile bae kwona ; na kutegheletsa achino chamtegheletsa , lekeni ng'awadahile bae kutegheletsa . ”
42010025	Mlangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso kema amghetse Yesu , kamghutsa , “ Mlangulitsi , apfi nobamighwa nitende choni ili niubokele ughima wa matsuwa ghose ? ”
42010026	Yesu kamwidika , “ Apfi Ghamalaghitso gholongatse ? Apfi kwoghamanyatse ? ”
42010027	Imunu ayo kamwidika , “ Mnoghele Imtwatsa Imulungu wako kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghwose , kwa muhe wako ghwose , kwa ngupfu tsako tsose na kwa tsimbutsi tsako tsose ; na mnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela imwenyegho . ”
42010028	Yesu kamwidika , “ Kwidika ghoya . Tenda apfo naghwe kutsakuwa na ughima . ”
42010029	Lekeni imunu ayo kabama kwilangusa kanogha , apfo kamghutsa Yesu , “ Yuhi imunu wa habehi yangu ? ”

42013001	Ichipindi chichila tsahana iwanu iwampetele Yesu mbuli tsa Wagalilaya iwakomighwe na Pilato hawang'ali womlapfila Imulungu inambiko .

42013034	“ Ghwe Yerusalemu ! Ghwe Yerusalemu ! Kwowakoma manabii na kuwatowa kwa ghamabwe iwatumwa we Imulungu iwatumighwe kuna ghweghwe ! Mara nyingi tsambama kuwakunga iwanagho ka ng'uku pfowaghubika pfitsiya wake kwa ghamabawa ghake , lekeni ghweghwe ng'aubamile bae !
42013035	Mlole , mlekelighwa ing'anda yenu . Nowalongela , ng'amtsombona keli bae mbaka mlonge , ‘ Kabalikiighwa ayula iyakutsa kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa . ’ ”
42014001	Litsuwa limwe lya Sabato , Yesu tsakaghenda kuja mne ing'anda ye imkulu wa Mafarisayo . Iwanu wang'ali wamlolesa ng'ani Yesu .

42014015	Imunu yumwe iyakalile na Yesu haulike apfi , kamlongela Yesu , “ Kabweda ghendo imunu yula yatsakuja ichijo che chihungo mne Undewa we Imulungu ! ”
42014016	Yesu kamwidika , “ Imunu yumwe tsayang'ali yotenda chihungo chikulu , kawakema iwahenza wengi watse .

42014020	Pfipfila imunu yungi naye kalonga , ‘ Nikwela sambi , apfo sidaha kutsa bae . ’
42014021	“ Imtumwa yula koya ukaye kamlongela imtwatsa wake mbuli tsose . Hahulike apfo , yane kaye kaghudubuka kamlongela imtumwa wake , ‘ Ghenda himahima mne ipfijiji ne kaye uwalongele wahingwa , iwanu iwaholole , pfifita na pfimbete watse . ’

42014026	“ Ka imunu wowose konitsila na ng'omhila bae aba wake na mai wake , mwehe wake ne iwanaghe , iwandughu tsake na lumbu tsake na ng'ouhila bae ughima ghwake , ng'odaha bae kuwa mwanang'ina wangu .
42014027	Na imunu wowose yang'oduta msalaba ghwake na kuniwinza nene , ayo ng'odaha bae kuwa mwanang'ina wangu . ”

42015013	Ghamatsuwa chidogho hambele , imwana mdodo kautsa ipfinu pfake . Kuya koka ukaye yawo , kaghenda isi ya kutali , ako katsipwilisa sendi tsake kwa pfinu pfihile .

42015017	Tsimbutsi tsake hatsimuyile , keghutsa imwenyegho , ‘ Aba wangu kana iwanu wengi we isang'ano iwakuja na kuleka ichijo , na nene nahano noghanzika kwe inzala !
42015018	Nitsakwinuka na kuya kwa aba wangu na kumlongela , Aba , nimtendela Imulungu nzambi , na pfipfila nikutendela ghweghwe nzambi . ’
42015019	Sibamighwa bae kukemighwa imwanagho , unende niwe ka yumwe we iwanu wako we isang'ano . ”
42015020	Apfo kenuka koya kwa aba wake . “ Lekeni hang'ali kakutali , aba wake kamwona kamwonela libatsi ; kamtsumila imwanaghe , kamkumbatila , na kamnonela .
42015021	“ Imwana kamlongela aba wake , ‘ Aba wangu , nimtendela nzambi Imulungu na ghweghwe pfipfila . Sibamighwa bae kukemighwa mwanagho . ’

42015023	Mumghale imwana we ing'ombe yanenehe . Leka tutende ichihungo na tudeng'elele .

42016001	Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Tsahana imunu yumwe yane mali nyingi , naye tsakana mtunza mali wake . Imunu ayo tsakahulika ka mtunza mali wake kapwililitsa mali tsake hela .

42016003	Mtunza mali kelongela mmoyo , ‘ Mtwatsa wangu katsoniwinga mne isang'ano . Apfi nitsotendatse ? Nahela ingupfu ya kulima , na nakwona chinyala kulomba .

42016008	“ Imtwatsa kamtunya mtunza mali yula yehile kwaapfila katenda ipfinu kwa kukengela . Kwaapfila iwanu iwali mne isi ino wakengela mna kutenda ipfinu pfawo kubita iwanu iwali mne ghumwanga . ”
42016009	“ Nowalongela , mtsitendele tsimali itsili muisi kwipatila sale tsenu wenyegho , ili hatsitsomala , mbokelighwe nawo mne chibumbulika cha ghamatsuwa ghose .
42016010	Imunu wowose iyotogholighwa mne ichinu chidodo katsotogholighwa mne ichinu chikulu , ne imunu wowose yang'atogholighwa mne ichinu chidodo pfipfila ng'atsotogholighwa bae mne ichinu ichikulu .
42016011	Kuya ka ng'amtogholighwe bae kwika tsimali tsili mne isi , apfi yuhi iyatsowatoghola kwika tsimali tsa kweli ?
42016012	Ka ng'amtogholighwe bae mna tsimali tse imunu yungi , yuhi yatsoweng'a mwemwe tsimali tsenu iwenyegho ?
42016013	“ Kuduhu imtumwa iyodaha kuwasang'anila iwatwa weli . Kwaapfila katsomwihila yumwe na kumnoghela yungi ; katsolunga na yumwe na kumbetsa yungi . Ng'amdaha bae kumtumikila Imulungu na sendi . ”

42016017	Pfibewe kwe ililanga ne isi ukwagha , kubita kuhunguka ichinu chidodo mne Ghamalaghitso .
42016018	“ Immale wowose iyomleka mwehe wake na kumkwela ipinga yungi kotenda utsinzi , ne immale iyomkwela ipinga iyalekighwe kotenda utsinzi . ”
42016019	“ Tsahana imunu yumwe tajiri yang'ali yopfala maghwanda gha tsambalau ighaghulighwe kwa sendi nyingi , chila litsuwa yeye yang'ali yohondola pfijo pfinoghile .
42016020	Hane ha libani lyake likulu , tsakekighwa imunu yumwe mhingwa yakemighwe Lazali yane ipfilonda pfingi ,
42016021	yabamile kuja ipfijo ipfilaghale kulawa mmetsa mwe tajiri . Na iwambwa wamghendela wamlambita ipfilonda pfake .
42016022	“ Hambele , Lazali kafa kuya kasolighwa ne wamalaika mbaka mmambagha mwa Abrahamu . Imunu tajiri pfipfila naye kafa kuya katsikighwa .
42016023	Akula kutsimu , ang'ali yodununzika ng'ani , kalola kuchanya , kamwona Abrahamu kwa kutali hamwe na Lazali iyakalile mmambagha mwake .
42016024	Apfo kamkema kwa ukukemelela , ‘ Aba Abrahamu , mbonele libatsi ! Umtume Lazali achike ichidole chake mne ghamatsi aluhotse lulimi lwangu , kwaapfila nene namne usungu mkulu mne ghumoto ghuno ! ’ ”

43002009	nae imkulu we ichihungo kalanza ghamatsi ighaghaluke idipfai . Ng'amanyile bae kwailawile , lekeni iwatumwa iwadeghile ghamatsi tsawamanya . Kuya imkulu ayo kamkema imunu iyokwela hambalimbali ,
43002010	kamlongela , “ Chila imunu tanu kolapfa idipfai inoghile . Kuya wahenza hawomalitsa kunwa ng'ani , kolapfa idipfai ihile . Lekeni ghweghwe kuika idipfai inoghile mbaka sambi ! ”
43002011	Yesu katenda chinu chino cha kukangawatsa cha mwanduso ako Kana , mne isi ya Galilaya . Ako kalangusa utunitso wake , ne iwanang'ina wake wamtoghola .
43002012	Hambele Yesu na mai wake , hamwe na ndughu tsake ne iwanang'ina wake wahulumka Kaperinaumu . Wakala ako matsuwa chidogho .
43002013	Ipasaka ya Wayahudi haikalile habehi , Yesu kagheluka Yerusalemu .
43002014	Mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , Yesu kawapfika iwanu woutsa wang'ombe , iwang'olo ne iwanjiwa , ne iwanu wangi wakala hane tsimetsa wobena tsisendi .
43002015	Yesu kabota ichiboko che lutsabi , kawawinga iwanu wose mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , hamwe ne iwang'olo ne wang'ombe . Pfipfila katsibidula tsimetsa tse iwobena tsisendi na kutsipwililisa sendi tsawo .
43002016	Kuya kawalongela iwanu iwang'ali woutsa iwanjiwa , “ Pfilapfeni hano pfinu pfino ! Ule ing'anda ye Aba wangu mwoitenda ghulilo ? ”
43002017	Iwanang'ina wake wakumbuka ichandikighwe , “ Imulungu , unoghelo wangu kwe ing'anda yako wakwaka mghati mwangu ka ghumoto . ”
43002018	Kuya iwakulu wa Wayahudi wamghutsa Yesu , “ Apfi kwodaha kutenda chinu chachi cha kukangawatsa kutulangusa ka kuna uwetso wa ukutenda agha ghose ? ”
43002019	Yesu kawedika , “ Muimwaghe Ing'anda ino ye Imulungu , nene nitsoitsenga keli kwa ghamatsuwa madatu ! ”
43002020	Wayahudi wamwidika , “ Ing'anda ino ye Imulungu itsengighwa kwa miyaka alubaini na sita , naghwe utsoitsengatse kwa matsuwa madatu ? ”
43002021	Lekeni Ing'anda ye Imulungu iyang'ali yoilonga Yesu tsaikala ulukuli lwake .
43002022	Apfo , hayatsilihuke , iwanang'ina wake wakumbuka achila chayalongile . Kuya waghatoghola Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka na watoghola mbuli tsila tsayalongile Yesu .
43002023	Yesu hayang'ali Yerusalemu mne Ichihungo che Ipasaka , iwanu wangi wona pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfayang'ali yotenda , wamtoghola .
43002024	Lekeni Yesu tsang'awatoghole bae , kwaapfila tsakawamanya iwanu wose .
43002025	Ng'abamile bae imunu wowose amlongele mbuli tse iwanu , kwaapfila Yesu tsakamanya ighali mghati mwe imimoyo yawo .
43003001	Tsakukala ne imkulu yumwe wa Mafarisayo , imunu we libalatsa lya Wayahudi iyakemighwe Nikodemu .
43003002	Chilo chimwe , kamghendela Yesu , kamlongela , “ Mlangulitsi , twokumanya ghweghwe kwa mlangulitsi yulawile kwe Imulungu . Kwaapfila kuduhu imunu wowose iyodaha kutenda pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfautenda ka Imulungu ng'ali hamwe naye bae . ”
43003003	Yesu kamwidika , “ Nokulongela ghendo , kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwona undewa we Imulungu ka ng'elekighwe lwa keli . ”
43003004	Nikodemu kamghutsa , “ Apfi imunu imbala yodahatse kwelekighwa keli ? Ng'aidahika ghendo imunu kwingila munda mwa mai wake na kwelekighwa keli ! ”
43003005	Yesu kamwidika , “ Nokulongela ghendo , kuduhu imunu iyodaha kwingila mne undewa we Imulungu ka ng'elekighwe bae kwa ghamatsi na kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
43003006	Imunu kakwelekighwa kwa lukuli kulawa kwa aba wake na mai wake , ila kakwelekighwa kwa muhe kulawa kwa Ghumuhe .
43003007	Uleke kukangawala kwaapfila nokulongela wose mwobamighwa mwelekighwe keli .
43003008	Libeho lyoduma kokose kwalibama , kohulika litsi lyake . Lekeni ng'umanya bae kwalilawile kwani wala kwalighenda kwani . Apfi pfipfo pfaili kwa chila imunu yelekighwe na Ghumuhe . ”
43003009	Nikodemu kamghutsa , “ Angu ghano ghodahatse kulawila ? ”
43003010	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ghweghwe kwa mlangulitsi mkulu wa Waisiraeli , angu naghwe ng'utsimanyile bae mbuli tsino ?
43003011	Nokulongela ghendo , twolonga ipfinu pfatumanya na twowalongela ipfinu pfatwonile , lekeni mng'ali mwolema usenga wetu .
43003012	Ng'amtoghole bae haniwalongele mbuli tse ipfinu ipfili muisi , apfi mtsotogholatse ning'awalongela mbuli tse ipfinu ipfili kulanga ? ”
43003013	Kuduhu imunu iyaghendile kulanga ila Imwana we Imunu , iyatsile kulawa kulanga .
43003014	Ka Musa pfayachinule ichinyagho chila che inzoka kwa lubiki kunyika , pfipfila Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yenulighwe ,
43003015	ili chila imunu iyomtoghola awe ne ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
43003016	Kwaapfila Imulungu tsakainoghela isi yose mbaka kamlapfa Imwanaghe nyalimwe , ili chila imunu iyomtoghola aleke kwagha ila yawe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
43003017	Kwaapfila Imulungu ng'amtumile bae Imwanaghe muisi , yaihighe , ila yaikombole kubitila yeye .
43003018	Imunu wowose iyomtoghola ng'atsohighighwa bae , lekeni imunu wowose iyolema kumtoghola ayo ma kahighighwa , kwaapfila ng'amtoghole bae Imwana nyalimwe we Imulungu .
43003019	Apfi pfipfo pfamtsohighighwa , Ghumwanga ghutsa muisi , lekeni iwanu wanoghela ichisi kubita ghumwanga , kwaapfila ghawotenda gheha .
43003020	Iwanu wose iwotenda ghehile woghuhila ghumwanga , ng'awakutsa bae mne ghumwanga , kwaapfila wopfuka aghala ghehile ghawotenda ghatsakoneka .
43003021	Lekeni awala iwotenda ghanoghile wakutsa mne ghumwanga , ili aghala ghawotenda ghoneke mwatsi ka ghatendighwa kwa kumuhulikitsa Imulungu .
43003022	Hambele Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake waghenda mne isi ya Yudeya , ako kakala nawo , na tsakawabatitsa iwanu .
43003023	Pfipfila Yohane yang'ali yobatitsa Ainoni habehi ne Salemu , kwaapfila hanu aho tsahana ghamatsi mengi . Iwanu wang'ali womghendela , naye yang'ali yowabatitsa .
43003024	Ghamatsuwa agho Yohane tsakakala ng'ana yohighwe mchifungo .
43003025	Iwanang'ina wangi wa Yohane na Myahudi yumwe wang'ali weghutsaghutsa kwa mbuli ya ukuhopfugha ghamaghulu na ghamoko .
43003026	Apfo wamghendela Yohane , wamlongela , “ Mlangulitsi , imunu yula iyakalile naghwe kumwambu kwe tsiwa Yoridani , ayula yutulongele mbuli tsake , sambi kobatitsa na iwanu wose womghendela . ”
43003027	Yohane kawedika , “ Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kubokela ichinu ka ng'eng'ighwe bae ne Imulungu iyali kulanga .
43003028	Mwemwe iwenyegho mwa iwakalangama haniwalongele , ‘ Nene si Kiristu Mkombotsi bae , ila nene nitumighwa nimlongole . ’
43003029	Iyali na pinga iyokwelighwa , ayo iyo immale iyomkwela . Sale wake immale iyokwela kombeta na komtegheletsa , kodeng'elela hayohulika litsi lyake . Sambi ndeng'elo yangu itimila .
43003030	Yeye kobamighwa awe mkulu , nene nobamighwa niwe mdodo . ”
43003031	Ayula iyolawila kulanga ka mkulu kubita wose . Imunu wa iisi kolawa muisi , na kolonga mbuli tse isi , ila iyolawila kulanga ka mkulu kubita wose .
43003032	Yeye kolonga chayonile na chayahulike , lekeni kuduhu imunu iyotoghola mbuli tsalongile .
43003033	Lekeni imunu wowose iyotoghola usenga wake , katsolonga Imulungu kolongesa .
43003034	Iyatumighwe ne Imulungu kolonga mbuli tse Imulungu , kwaapfila Imulungu kommemesa Ghumuhe ghwake Mwenzeluka .
43003035	Aba komnoghela Imwanaghe na kagheka ghose mmoko mwake .
43003036	Imunu wowose iyomtoghola Imwana kakuwa ne ughima wa matsuwa ghose , lekeni imunu wowose iyomlema Imwana ng'atsakuwa ne ughima bae , ila katsokala mne maya ye Imulungu .
43004001	Mafarisayo tsawahulika ka Yesu yang'ali yowatenda iwanu wengi wawe iwanang'ina na kuwabatitsa kubita Yohane ,
43004002	lekeni Yesu ng'abatitse bae iwanu , ila iwanang'ina wake iwo iwabatitse .
43004003	Yesu hayahulike apfi , kalawa Yudeya koya Galilaya ,
43004004	mne ghumwanza ghwake tsakabamighwa kubitila Samariya .
43004005	Tsakapfika Samariya hanu hakemighwe Sikari , habehi na mghunda ghula Yakobu ghwamwing'ile Yosefu , imwanaghe .
43004006	Baho tsakukala na chisima cha Yakobu , kwaapfila Yesu tsakepfa kwa ghumwanza ghwake , apfo kakala hasi habehi ne chisima . Tsaikala nemisi .
43004007	Ipinga yumwe Msamariya tsakatsa kudegha ghamatsi , Yesu kamlongela , “ Ungaye ghamatsi nuwe . ”
43004008	Iwanang'ina wake tsawaghenda mkaye kughula ichijo .
43004009	Ipinga ayo kamwidika , “ Ghweghwe kwa Myahudi , nene na Msamariya . Ule kwonomba ghamatsi ? ” Tsakalonga apfi kwaapfila Wayahudi na Wasamariya ng'awajagha hamwe bae .
43004010	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ung'amanyile ichinu chayolapfa Imulungu na nani iyokulomba ghamatsi gho ukunwa , ung'amlombile , naye ang'akwing'ile ghamatsi ighoghala ughima . ”
43004011	Ipinga ayo kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , kwahela chinu cha kudeghela ghamatsi , ne chisima chighendesa . Lelo utsoghapata kwani ghamatsi ghe ughima ?
43004012	Apfi ghweghwe kwa mbala kubita aba wetu Yakobu iyatwing'ile chisima chino , yeye mwenyegho ne iwanaghe ne iwanyama wake tsawanwa ghamatsi ghe chisima chino ? ”
43004013	Yesu kamwidika , “ Imunu wowose iyakunwa ghamatsi ghano , katsakona ng'ilu keli ,
43004014	lekeni imunu wowose iyakunwa ghamatsi ghanimwing'a nene , ng'atsakona ng'ilu keli . Ghamatsi ghanimwing'a nene ghatsakuwa mbwibwi iilapfa ghamatsi gha ughima mghati mwake na ghatsomwing'a ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose . ”
43004015	Ipinga ayo kamlongela , “ Mtwatsa ngaya ghamatsi agho ndeke kwona ng'ilu keli , kuya ndeke kutsa hano keli kudegha ghamatsi . ”
43004016	Yesu kamlongela , “ Ghenda ukamkeme mmale wako , utse naye . ”
43004017	Ipinga ayo kamwidika , “ Nahela mmale . ” Yesu kamlongela , “ Kolonga ghoya haulonga kwahela mmale .
43004018	Kwaapfila tsakukwelighwa ne iwamale watano , na mmale yauli naye sambi si mmale wako bae . Chaulongile kulongesa ghendo . ”
43004019	Ipinga ayo kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , nakwona ghweghwe kwa nabii .
43004020	Iwabala wetu tsawamtamanila Imulungu hane lughongo luno , lekeni mwemwe Wayahudi mwolonga twobamighwa tumtamanile Imulungu ako Yerusalemu . ”
43004021	Yesu kamlongela , “ Mai utoghole , ghamatsuwa ghakutsa iwanu ng'awatsomtamanila bae Aba hane lughongo luno wala ako Yerusalemu .
43004022	Mwemwe Wasamariya ng'amummanyile bae yamumtamanila , lekeni twetwe Wayahudi twommanya yatumtamanila , kwaapfila ukombotsi wolawa kwa Wayahudi .
43004023	Lekeni matsuwa ghakutsa na sambi ghabaha iwanu iwotamanila kweli watsomtamanila Aba kwa kulongotsighwa na Ghumuhe na kweli , kwaapfila womtamanila ka Aba pfayobama .
43004024	Imulungu ka Ghumuhe , apfo iwanu wake iwomtamanila wamtamanile kwa Ghumuhe na ukweli . ”
43004025	Ipinga ayo kamlongela , “ Nomanya Masiya iyokemighwa Kiristu kakutsa , na hatsakutsa katsotulongela ghoya chila chinu . ”
43004026	Yesu kamwidika , “ Nene yanilonga naghwe , iyo yuyo . ”
43004027	Iwanang'ina wake Yesu tsawoya , wakangawala kumpfika Yesu kolonga ne ipinga ayo . Lekeni kuduhu imunu yamghutsile , “ Apfi ubama choni ? ” au “ Ule ulonga ne ipinga ? ”
43004028	Kuya ipinga ayo kachileka chiha chake cha ghamatsi , koya ukaye , kawalongela iwanu ,
43004029	“ Mtse mmwone imunu iyanongele ipfinu pfose pfanendile . Apfi ayu kodaha kuwa Kiristu ? ”
43004030	Apfo iwanu walawa mkaye mwao wamghendela Yesu .
43004031	Ichipindi chichila iwanang'ina wake wang'ali womlomba Yesu , “ Mlangulitsi tanu diya ! ”
43004032	Lekeni Yesu kawedika , “ Nene nina ichijo ing'amchimanyile bae . ”
43004033	Kuya iwanang'ina wake wandusa kwighutsa , “ Pfii hana munu iyamghalile chijo ? ”
43004034	Yesu kawalongela , “ Ichijo changu chicho chino , kusang'ana aghala ghayobama iyanitumile na kuimalitsa ing'onde yangaile niisang'ane .
43004035	Mwemwe mwolonga , ‘ Ing'ali miyetsi mine , kuya ghamatsuwa gha mapfuno ghopfika . ’ Nowalongela , mwinule tsinenge mlole imighunda ! Ghamatsawo ghakomala , ghobamighwa ghapfunighwe !
43004036	Imunu iyopfuna kobokela maliho na kolunda hamwe ghamatsawo kwaajili ya ughima wa matsuwa ghose , ili imunu iyohanda na imunu iyopfuna wadeng'elele hamwe .
43004037	Iwanu hawolonga , ‘ Yumwe kohanda , yungi kopfuna ’ wolongesa .
43004038	Nimtumani kupfuna mne imighunda yang'amlimile bae , iwanu wangi wasang'ana namwe mwobweda kwa isang'ano yawo . ”
43004039	Wasamariya wengi wa kaye ila wamtoghola Yesu kwa achila chalongile ipinga ayo , “ Kanongela ipfinu pfose pfanendile . ”
43004040	Apfo Wasamariya wamghendela Yesu , wamlomba akale nawo , Yesu kakala nawo matsuwa meli .
43004041	Iwanu wengi tsawatoghola kwa mbuli tsa Yesu .
43004042	Wamlongela ipinga ayo , “ Sambi tutoghola , si kwa achila chulongile bae , ila kwaapfila twetwe iwenyegho tumuhulika , twomanya imunu yuno kweli ka Mkombotsi we iisi yose . ”
43004043	Haghamalile matsuwa meli Yesu kaghenda Galilaya .
43004044	Kwaapfila Yesu imwenyegho tsakalonga , “ Nabii ng'otogholighwa bae mne isi yake . ”
43004045	Yesu hapfikile Galilaya , iwanu wambokela kwaapfila nawo tsawaghenda mne Ichihungo cha Ipasaka ako Yerusalemu , na waghona ghose ghatendile Yesu mne ichihungo acho .
43004046	Kuya Yesu kengila keli mne ghumji ghwa Kana ako Galilaya , hanu haghaluse ghamatsi kuwa idipfai . Baho tsakukala ne chilongotsi yane imwana iyoghula ako Kaperinaumu .
43004047	Chilongotsi ayo hayahulike Yesu kapfika ako Galilaya kulawa Yudeya , kamghendela kamlomba aghende akamhonetse imwanaghe , iyang'ali habehi ukufa .
43004048	Yesu kamlongela , “ Mwemwe ng'amtoghola mbaka mwone ipfitango na pfihulo . ”
43004049	Chilongotsi ayo kamwidika , “ Mtwatsa tuke ng'ana mwanangu yafe . ”
43004050	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ghweghwe ghenda , imwanagho katsohona . ” Chilongotsi ayo katoghola chalongile Yesu , koka ukaye .
43004051	Hang'ali mnzila , ketingana ne iwatumwa wake , wamlongela imwanaghe kahona .
43004052	Kawaghutsa , “ Imwana handuse kuhona saa ngapi ? ” wamwidika , “ Ligholo saa saba nemisi . ”
43004053	Kuya aba ayo tsakamanya ka isaa iila Yesu yamlongele , “ Imwanagho katsohona . ” Apfo yeye na kaye yake wamtoghola Yesu .
43004054	Apfino tsapfikala pfihulo pfa keli pfatendile Yesu halawile Yudeya kughenda Galilaya .
43005001	Hambele , Yesu kagheluka Yerusalemu kune ichihungo cha Wayahudi .
43005002	Ako Yerusalemu , habehi na libani likulu ilikemighwe Libani lye Iwang'olo tsahana tsimbu ilikemighwe Betisada kwa Chihebulaniya , tsimbu alyo tsa lya habehi na pfibwalu pfitano .
43005003	Iwanu wengi iwatamu tsawakala mne pfibwalu apfo , pfifita , pfimbete , ne iwanu iwaholole . Tsawang'ali wobeta ghamatsi ghatibuke ,
43005004	kwaapfila malaika we Imtwatsa ang'ali yohulumkagha mne ghamatsi na kughatibula . Imtamu iyakwandusa kwingila mne ghamatsi ighatibulighwe , tsakahonetsighwa utamu wowose iyali nawo .
43005005	Imunu yumwe iyakalile hala , tsakakala mtamu kwa miyaka selasini na nane .
43005006	Yesu hamwonile mtamu ayo kawasa hala , tsakamanya ka yang'ali yoghula kwa matsuwa mengi , apfo kamghutsa mtamu ayo , “ Pfii kwobama uhone ? ”
43005007	Mtamu yula kamwidika , “ Mtwatsa , nahela imunu wa kunyingitsa mne litsimbu ghamatsi haghotibulighwa . Hanibama kwingila , imunu yungi konongolela . ”
43005008	Kuya Yesu kamlongela , “ Winuke ! Sola chilagho chako uke . ”
43005009	Bahala imunu yula kahona , kasola chilagho chake , koka . Ichinu chino tsachilawila mne Litsuwa lye Sabato ,
43005010	apfo Iwakulu wa Wayahudi wamlongela imunu yahonile , “ Leloli Litsuwa lya Sabato , ghamalaghitso ghoghoma kuchighala chilagho chako . ”
43005011	Lekeni imunu ayo kawedika , “ Imunu iyanihonetse kanongela , ‘ Sola chilagho chako uke . ’ ”
43005012	Wamghutsa , “ Angu munu wachi iyakulongele usole chilagho chako uke ? ”
43005013	Lekeni ng'ammanyile bae imunu iyamuhonetse kwaapfila iwanu tsawengi na Yesu ma tsakoka .
43005014	Hambele Yesu kampfika imunu yula mne Ing'anda ya Ukulombela , kamlongela , “ Tegheletsa , sambi kuhona . Uleke kutenda nzambi , ung'atenda nzambi , ichinu chihile chitsokulawila . ”
43005015	Kuya imunu yula koka , kawalongela iwakulu wa Wayahudi ka yamuhonetse Yesu .
43005016	Kwaapfila Yesu yang'ali yotenda ipfinu pfino mne Litsuwa lya Sabato , Wayahudi wandusa kumhila .
43005017	Yesu kawalongela , “ Aba wangu kosang'ana ghamatsuwa ghose , na nene pfipfila nobamighwa nisang'ane . ”
43005018	Apfo Wayahudi wabama wamkome Yesu . Tsawabama wamkome Yesu si kwaapfila kalibetsa Litsuwa lya Sabato liliheka , ila tsakamkema Imulungu Aba wake , apfo ketenda keghala ne Imulungu .
43005019	Yesu kawedika , “ Nowalongela ghendo , Imwana ng'odaha bae kutenda chinu chochose yaliyeka , Imwana kodaha kutenda aghala ghomwona Aba wake koghatenda , kwaapfila ghoghose ghotenda Aba , Imwana naye koghatenda .
43005020	Kwaapfila Aba komnoghela Imwana na komlangusa ghose ghayotenda . Kuya katsomlangusa ipfinu pfikulu pfa kusang'ana kubita pfino , namwe mtsokangawala .
43005021	Ka Aba pfayowatsilihula iwanu iwafile na kuweng'a ughima , pfipfila Imwana kolapfa ughima kwe iwanu iyowabama .
43005022	Aba ng'omuhigha bae imunu wowose , lekeni kamwing'a Imwanaghe uwetso wa kuhigha ,
43005023	ili iwanu wose wamuhulikitse Imwana ka pfawomuhulikitsa Aba . Imunu wowose iyolema kumuhulikitsa Imwana komlema Aba iyamtumile .
43005024	“ Nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose iyohulika mbuli yangu na kumtoghola ayula iyanitumile kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose , ng'atsohighighwa kwaapfila kaloka lifwa kengila mne ughima .
43005025	Nowalongela ghendo , litsuwa lyakutsa na sambi ma lipfika iwanu iwafile hawatsohulika litsi lye Imwana we Imulungu , na awala iwahulike watsakuwa waghima .
43005026	Ka Aba imwenyegho pfayali mwanduso we ighima , pfipfila kamtenda Imwanaghe kuwa mwanduso we ughima .
43005027	Kamwing'a imwana uwetso wa kuhigha , kwaapfila ka Imwana we Imunu .
43005028	Mleke kukangawala mbuli ino , litsuwa lyakutsa iwanu iwafile hawatsohulika litsi lyake ,
43005029	watsolawa mne tsikabuli tsawo , awala iwatendile ghanoghile watsotsilihulighwa wawe waghima , na iwatendile ghehile watsotsilihulighwa wahighighwe .
43005030	Nene sidaha bae kutenda ichinu imwenyegho , nohigha ka Imulungu pfonongela , nohigha kwa haki , kwaapfila sitenda bae chanibama , ila notenda achila chobama ayula iyanitumile .
43005031	“ Ning'alonga mbuli tsangu imwenyegho , ukalangama wangu wa ughutsu .
43005032	Lekeni kuna yungi iyolonga mbuli tsangu , nomanya chila chinu chalongile kalongesa .
43005033	Mwemwe tsamuwatuma iwanu kwa Yohane , na mbuli tsangu tsalongile tsolongesa .
43005034	Sibama bae ukalangama we imunu , ila nolonga apfi ili mwemwe mkombolighwe .
43005035	Yohane tsakakala ka ichitasa , iching'ali chikwaka na chomwemwesa , namwe msaghula ghamatsuwa chidogho kudeng'elela ghumwanga ghwake .
43005036	Nina ukalangama mkulu kubita wa Yohane . Kwaapfila ing'onde iyangaile Aba niimalitsa , isang'ano yanisang'ana , yolangusa Aba kanituma .
43005037	Aba imwenyegho iyanitumile kalonga mbuli tsangu . Ng'amuhulike bae litsi lyake wala kuchona chihanga chake ,
43005038	na mbuli yake ng'aikala bae mghati mwenu , kwaapfila ng'amumtoghole yula iyamtumile .
43005039	Mwosoma Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , kwaapfila mwopfikitsa mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka mtsopata ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose . Ghamaandiko ghagho Mahenzeluka gholonga mbuli tsangu !
43005040	Lekeni mng'ali mwolema kunitsila muwe na ughima .
43005041	“ Sibama bae iwanu wanitunye .
43005042	Lekeni nommanyani ka mwahela unoghelo we Imulungu mne imimoyo yenu .
43005043	Nitsa kwa taghwa lya Aba wangu , ng'amnitoghole bae , lekeni imunu yungi ang'atsa kwa taghwa lyake , mtsombokela .
43005044	Apfi mtsodahatse kunitoghola , ka mwemwe mwobama kubokela utunitso kulawa kuna mwemwe iwenyegho , lekeni mwolema kubokela utunitso iulawa kwe Imulungu yaliyeka ?
43005045	Mleke kupfikitsa nitsowalongeletsa kwa Aba . Musa iyammwikile lolelo lyenu , ayo yuyo iyatsomuhighani .
43005046	Mng'amtoghole Musa , mng'anitoghole na nene , kwaapfila tsakandika mbuli tsangu .
43005047	Lekeni ka ng'amchitoghola achila chandikile , apfi mtsotogholatse chanilonga ? ”
43006001	Hambele Yesu kaloka kumwambu mwa tsimbu Galilaya au tsimbu Tiberiya .
43006002	Likingili lye iwanu limuwinza Yesu kwaapfila tsawona pfihulo pfayatendile pfa kuwahonetsa iwatamu .
43006003	Kuya Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wagheluka mchidunda , wakala hasi .
43006004	Ichihungo che Ipasaka ya Wayahudi tsachikala chahabehi .
43006005	Yesu hayalolile mmbalimbali kona mtingano mkulu ghwe iwanu womtsila , kamghutsa Filipi , “ Kwani twodaha kughula ichijo tuweng'e iwanu wano waje ? ”
43006006	Yesu kaghutsa pfino kumghetsa Filipi , kwaapfila tsakamanya katsotenda choni .
43006007	Filipi kamwidika , “ Sendi miya mbili ng'atsidaha bae kumghulila chighate chila imunu ! ”
43006008	Imwanang'ina yungi wa Yesu , Andereya , ndughu yake Simoni Petiri , kamlongela Yesu ,
43006009	“ Hano hana imsongolo yumwe , yane ipfihindi pfitano pfe pfighate ne iwasomba weli . Lekeni watsoghutatse kwe ipfijo pfino chidogho ? ”
43006010	Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Muwalongele iwanu wakale hasi . ” Hanu hala tsahana imitsani , iwanu wakala hasi , tsakukala ne iwamale elufu tano .
43006011	Kuya Yesu kasola ipfihande pfe pfighate , kalonga , “ Mighede Imulungu , ” kaweng'a iwanu iwakalile hasi . Katenda pfipfo kwa iwasomba ka iwanu pfawabamile .
43006012	Iwanu wose hawaghutile , Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Mdondole ipfihande ipfikalile . Chochose chileke ukwagha . ”
43006013	Apfo iwanang'ina wadondola , wamemesa ipfiseghe kumi na pfili pfe ipfihande pfe pfighate ipfikalile .
43006014	Iwanu hawonile pfihulo ipfitendighwe na Yesu , wandusa kulonga , “ Kweli ayuno ka nabii iyakutsa muisi . ”
43006015	Yesu tsakamanya iwanu wambama ghendo wamtende yawe imndewa , apfo kagheluka keli mchidunda yaliyeka .
43006016	Litsua haliswele , iwanang'ina wake Yesu wahulumka mbaka mne tsimbu ,
43006017	wadina mnumbwi waloka tsimbu waghenda Kaperinaumu . Tsakukala ne ichisi , na Yesu tsakakala ng'ana yawapfikile bae .
43006018	Libeho kulu ling'ali lyoduma na ghamatsi ghatibuka .
43006019	Iwanang'ina hawaghendile utali we maili ndatu au maili nne , tsawamwona Yesu koghenda mchanya mwe ghamatsi , kakutsa habehi na mnumbwi , iwanang'ina wapfuka .
43006020	Lekeni Yesu kawalongela , “ Na nene , mleke kupfuka ! ”
43006021	Kuya wabama wamsole Yesu mne mnumbwi , bahala mnumbwi tsaghupfika hanu hawabamile kupfika .
43006022	Litsuwa lya keli kingili lye iwanu ilikalile kumwambu mwe tsimbu wamanya kukala na mnumbwi umwe uliyeka , Yesu ng'engile bae mne mnumbwi ne iwanang'ina wake , ila iwanang'ina tsawoka waliyeka .
43006023	Kuya iminumbwi mingi ilawile Tiberiya tsaipfika habehi ne hanu iwanu hawajile pfighate Imtwatsa hayamalitse kupfibaliki .
43006024	Iwanu hawamanyile Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake ng'awalibaho bae hanu hala , wengila mne iminumbwi waghenda Kaperinaumu kumbama .
43006025	Iwanu hawamwonile Yesu ubali ungi we tsimbu , wamghutsa , “ Mlangulitsi , apfi hano upfikile tsuwachi ? ”
43006026	Yesu kawedika , “ Nowalongelani ghendo , mwonibama kwaapfila mja pfighate mghuta , si kwaapfila mwona pfihulo pfangu .
43006027	Mleke kuchisulukila ichijo ichikola , mchisulukile ichijo ichikala ghamatsuwa ghose . Ichijo chino chicho Imwana we Imunu yatsomwing'ani , kwaapfila Imulungu , Aba kamsaghula na kamtoghola . ”
43006028	Kuya wamghutsa Yesu , “ Apfi tutende choni ili tughatende aghala ghobama Imulungu tughatende ? ”
43006029	Yesu kawedika , “ Achino ichinu chayobama Imulungu mtende , mumtoghole ayula iyamtumile . ”
43006030	Apfo wamghutsa , “ Angu pfihulo pfachi pfausang'ana ili tupfone tukutoghole ? Kutsotenda choni ?
43006031	Iwabala wetu waja mana kunyika , ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , ‘ Kaweng'a chighate ichihulumke kulanga waje . ’ ”
43006032	Yesu kawalongela , “ Nowalongela ghendo , si Musa bae iyaweng'ile chighate ichihulumke kulanga , ila Aba wangu iyo iyaweng'ile chighate che ukweli kulawa kulanga .
43006033	Kwaapfila chighate chayotwing'a Imulungu iyo ayula iyakutsa kulawa kulanga na iyolapfa ughima kwe iwanu iwali muisi . ”
43006034	Wamlongela , “ Imtwatsa , utwing'e chighate chino ghamatsuwa ghose . ”
43006035	Kuya Yesu kawalongela , “ Nene na ichijo ichighala ughima , awala iwakutsa kuna nene ng'awatsokwona nzala bae , na awala iwonitoghola ng'awatsakwona ng'ilu bae .
43006036	Ka pfaniwalongele , mmbona lekeni mng'ali ng'amnitoghola bae .
43006037	Wose iyongaya Aba watsakutsa kuna nene , imunu wowose iyonitsila , simuwinga bae .
43006038	Kwaapfila nihulumka kulawa kulanga si kutenda pfanibama bae , ila kutenda pfayobama ayula iyanitumile .
43006039	Ayula iyanitumile kobama apfi , ndeke kumwaghitsa imunu wowose mna iwanu wala iyangaile , ila niwatsilihule wose mna litsuwa lya usighilo .
43006040	Kwaapfila Aba wangu kobama chila imunu iyomlola Imwana na kumtoghola yawe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose . Nitsomtsilihula litsuwa lya usighilo . ”
43006041	Wayahudi wandusa kumnung'unikila Yesu kwaapfila tsakalonga , “ Nene na chighate ichihulumke kulawa kulanga . ”
43006042	Walonga , “ Apfi ayu si Yesu bae imwana wa Yosefu , aba wake ne mai wake twowamanya . Lelo kodahatse kulonga , ‘ Nihulumka kulawa kulanga ? ’ ”
43006043	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mleke kunung'unika .
43006044	Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kunitsila ka Aba iyanitumile ng'amkweghile bae , na nene nitsomtsilihula litsuwa lya usighilo .
43006045	Wanabii tsawandika , ‘ Iwanu wose watsolangulitsighwa ne Imulungu . ’ Chila imunu iyomtegheletsa Aba na kwilangulitsa kuna yeye katsokutsa kuna nene .
43006046	Chanilonga chicho chino , kuduhu imunu iyamwonile Aba ila yula iyalawile kwe Imulungu , ayo yuyo yaliyeka iyamwonile Aba .
43006047	Nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose iyotoghola kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
43006048	Nene na chijo ichighala ughima .
43006049	Iwabala wenu tsawaja mana kunyika lekeni wafa .
43006050	Lekeni achino ichighate ichihulumka kulawa kulanga , imunu iyochija ng'atsokufa bae .
43006051	Nene na ichijo che ughima ichihulumke kulawa kulanga . Imunu ang'aja chijo chino , katsokala ghamatsuwa ghose . Chijo chino lukuli lwangu , nolulapfa ili iwanu we isi yose wawe ne ughima . ”
43006052	Kuya Wayahudi wandusa kwighutsa kwa maya , “ Apfi imunu yuno kodahatse kutwing'a lukuli lwake tuluje ? ”
43006053	Yesu kawalongela , “ Nowalongela ghendo , ka ng'amkuja lukuli lwe Imwana we Imunu na kunwa idamu yake , ng'amtsokuwa ne ughima mghati mwenu .
43006054	Imunu wowose iyoluja lukuli lwangu na kunwa idamu yangu kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose , nitsomtsilihula mne litsuwa lya usighilo .
43006055	Kwaapfila lukuli lwangu ichijo cha kweli na idamu yangu chokunwa cha kweli .
43006056	Imunu wowose iyoluja lukuli lwangu na kunwa idamu yangu , ayo kokala mghati mwangu , na nene nokala mghati mwake .
43006057	Aba iyali mghima kanituma , na kwaajili ya Aba nene nokala , apfo imunu iyoluja lukuli lwangu katsokala kwaajili ya nene .
43006058	Achino chicho ichijo ichihulumke kulawa kulanga , si ka mana iwajile iwabala wenu , na ukufa . Lekeni imunu iyakuja chijo chino katsokuwa mghima ghamatsuwa ghose . ”
43006059	Yesu kaghalonga agho hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne ing'anda ye ukulombela ako Kaperinaumu .
43006060	Iwanu wengi iwamuwinzile Yesu hawahulike apfo , walonga , “ Ghamalangulitso ghano makomu . Apfi yuhi iyodaha kughatoghola ? ”
43006061	Kuduhu imunu iyamlongele Yesu ichinu chawang'ali wonung'unika iwanang'ina wake , lekeni yeye tsakamanya , apfo kawaghutsa , “ Ule ghamalangulitso ghano ghoghetsa ukutoghola kwenu ?
43006062	Itsakuwatse ka mtsomwona Imwana we Imunu kakuya kulanga hanu hayakalile mwanduso ?
43006063	Ghumuhe we Imulungu kolapfa ughima , ngupfu tsa imunu ng'atsidaha chinu . Mbuli tsaniwalongele tsowaghalila muhe na ughima .
43006064	Hata apfo , wangi wenu mng'ali ng'amtoghola . ” Kwaapfila Yesu tsakamanya kulawa mwanduso tsina nani ing'awotoghola na tsakamanya nani iyatsomhunduka .
43006065	Kuya Yesu kalonga keli , “ Kwaajili ayo tsaniwalongela kuduhu imunu iyodaha kunitsila mbaka Aba yamtoghole . ”
43006066	Kulawa litsuwa lino iwanang'ina wake wengi woya kuchughu , ng'awamuwinzile keli .
43006067	Yesu kawaghutsa iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli , “ Pfii , namwe pfipfila mwobama kuka ? ”
43006068	Simoni Petiri kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa , tughende kwa nani ? Ghweghwe kuna mbuli itsighala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
43006069	Twotoghola na twomanya ghweghwe kwa Mwenzeluka we Imulungu . ”
43006070	Kuya Yesu kawedika , “ Apfi siwasaghuleni mwemwe kumi na weli bae ? Lekeni yumwe wenu ka Setani . ”
43006071	Yesu tsayang'ali yolonga mbuli tsa Yuda , imwana wa Simoni Isikarioti , yumwe we iwanang'ina wala kumi na weli , iyomhunduka Yesu hambele .
43007001	Hambele , Yesu kaghenda Galilaya , ng'abamile bae kughenda Yudeya , kwaapfila iwakulu we Wayahudi tsawabama wamkome .
43007002	Lekeni chihungo cha Wayahudi cha Ipfibumbulika haching'ali habehi ,
43007003	ndughu tsake Yesu wamlongela , “ Ulawe hano ughende Yudeya , ili iwanang'ina wako wone pfihulo pfausang'ana .
43007004	Kuduhu imunu iyofisa aghala ghayotenda ka kobama yamanyike ne iwanu wangi . Kwaapfila ghweghwe kwotenda ipfinu pfino , wilanguse kwe iwanu we iisi yose . ”
43007005	Mana hata iwandughu tsake ng'awamtoghole .
43007006	Yesu kawalongela , “ Litsuwa lyangu linoghile ng'ana lipfike bae , ila kuna mwemwe chila litsuwa linogha .
43007007	Iwanu we isi ng'awodaha kuwahilani mwemwe , ila wonihila nene kwaapfila nolonga ka aghala ghawotenda gheha .
43007008	Mghende mne Ichihungo . Nene sighenda bae mne Ichihungo acho , kwaapfila litsuwa lyangu ng'ana lipfike bae . ”
43007009	Tsakalonga apfi , kuya kakala ako Galilaya .
43007010	Iwandughu tsake hawaghendile mne ichihungo , naye Yesu pfipfila kaghenda , lekeni ng'aghendile bae mwatsimwatsi , ila kaghenda chinyelenyele .
43007011	Mne ichihungo acho , iwakulu we Wayahudi wang'ali wombama Yesu , waghutsa , “ Apfi yalikwani imunu yula ? ”
43007012	Mne likingili , iwanu wang'ali wenong'onetsa mbuli tsa Yesu . Iwanu wangi walonga , “ Imunu yuno kanogha . ” Wangi wedika , “ Mbe , kowaghitsa iwanu . ”
43007013	Lekeni kuduhu imunu iyadahile kulonga mbuli yoyose ya Yesu mwatsimwatsi , kwaapfila wawapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi .
43007014	Ichihungo haching'ali habehi kumala Yesu kaghenda mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , kandusa kulangulitsa .
43007015	Iwakulu we Wayahudi wakangawala , walonga , “ Apfi imunu yuno aghapatiletse ghamalangulitso ghano , naye ng'asomile bae ? ”
43007016	Yesu kawedika , “ Ghamalangulitso ghanilangulitsa si ghangu bae , ila gholawa kwa yula iyanitumile .
43007017	Imunu wowose ang'asaghula kutenda pfayobama Imulungu , katsomanya ka ghamalangulitso ghangu gholawa kwe Imulungu au nolonga kwa uwetso wangu imwenyegho .
43007018	Imunu iyolonga mbuli tsake kobama utunitso wake , lekeni imunu iyobama utunitso kwa yula iyamtumile ayo mwenyepfale , kuduhu ughutsu mna yeye .
43007019	Apfi Musa ng'aweng'ile bae Ghamalaghitso ? Lekeni kuduhu imunu iyokinda Ghamalaghitso mna mwemwe . Ebali mwobama mng'ome ? ”
43007020	Likingili lye iwanu limwidika , “ Ghweghwe kuna chinyamkela . Yuhi iyobama yakukome ? ”
43007021	Yesu kawedika , “ Tsanenda chihulo chimwe , namwe wose mkangawala .
43007022	Musa tsakamlaghitseni muwengitse ngoma iwanenu , hata ka si Musa bae ila iwabala wenu iwanduse ichinu acho , namwe mwomwingitsa ngoma imwana Litsuwa lya Sabato .
43007023	Ka mwomwingitsa ngoma imwana Litsuwa lya Sabato ili kukindilisa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa , ebali mwakwona maya kwaapfila nimhonetsa imunu mne Litsuwa lya Sabato ?
43007024	Mleke kuhigha kwa kulola kuliheka , ila muhighe kwa haki . ”
43007025	Iwanu wangi wa Yerusalemu wandusa kwighutsa , “ Apfi si imunu yuno bae iwombama wamkome ?
43007026	Lola hayuno ! Kolonga mwatsimwatsi na iwanu ng'awomlongela ichinu bae . Pfii iwakulu wetu womanya ghendo ayu ka Kiristu ?
43007027	Kiristu hayatsakutsa kuduhu imunu iyatsomanya kolawila kwani , lekeni twetwe twomanya koyolawila imunu yuno . ”
43007028	Yesu hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , kalonga kwa kukemelela , “ Ona , mwonimanya na mwomanya kwonilawila . Sitsile bae kwa kubama imwenyegho , lekeni iyanitumile ka ukweli . Mwemwe ng'amummanyile bae ,
43007029	lekeni nene nommanya kwaapfila nolawila kuna yeye , naye kanituma . ”
43007030	Kuya wabama kumghogha , lekeni kuduhu imunu iyagholose ghamoko ghake kumghogha , kwaapfila litsuwa lyake tsang'ana lipfike .
43007031	Lekeni iwanu wengi kulawa mne likingili wamtoghola walonga , “ Kiristu hayatsakutsa , apfi katsotenda pfihulo pfingi kubita imunu yuno ? ”
43007032	Mafarisayo wahulika iwanu wonong'ona mbuli tsa Yesu . Apfo iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo wawatuma iwabetetsi we Ing'anda ye Imulungu kumghogha Yesu .
43007033	Yesu kawalongela , “ Nokala namwe kwa matsuwa chidogho , kuya nitsoghenda kwa ayula iyanitumile .
43007034	Mtsombama , lekeni ng'amtsombona bae , kwaapfila ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanili . ”
43007035	Wayahudi welongela , “ Apfi imunu yuno katsoghenda kwani mbaka tuleke kumwona ? Pfii katsoghenda mne kaye tsa Wagiriki iwokala iwanu wetu na kuwalangulitsa Wagiriki ?
43007036	Apfi kana mana yachi hayalongile ‘ Mtsonibama , lekeni ng'amtsombona ’ na ‘ ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanili ’ ? ”
43007037	Litsuwa lya usighilo na litsuwa kulu lya ichihungo , Yesu kema , kakemelela , “ Imunu wowose yane ng'ilu , yatse kuna nene yanwe .
43007038	Imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene , ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , ‘ Imito ye ghamatsi iighala ughima itsokwitika kulawa mghati mwake . ’ ”
43007039	Yesu tsayang'ali yolonga mbuli tse Ghumuhe , yawatsombokela iwanu awala iwomtoghola . Mbaka litsuwa lila iwanu tsawang'ali ng'aweng'ighwe bae Ghumuhe , kwaapfila Yesu tsakakala ng'ana yatunitsighwe ne Imulungu .
43007040	Hawahulike mbuli tsake , iwanu wangi walonga , “ Kweli imunu yuno ka ayula Nabii . ”
43007041	Iwanu wangi walonga , “ Ayuno ka Kiristu Mkombotsi . ” Lekeni iwanu wangi wang'ali weghutsa , “ Apfi Kiristu kodahatse kulawa Galilaya ?
43007042	Apfi Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka ng'aghalongile bae Kiristu katsolawila mlukolo lwa imndewa Daudi na kwelekighwa Betilehemu , kaye yakalile Daudi ? ”
