43007044	Iwanu wangi wabama kumghogha , lekeni kuduhu imunu iyamgholosele ghumoko .
43007045	Wakalitsi we Ing'anda ye Imulungu hawoyile , iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo wawaghutsa , “ Ule ng'amtsile naye bae ? ”
43007046	Wakalitsi wawedika , “ Kuduhu imunu yadahile kulonga ka imunu yuno ! ”
43007047	Mafarisayo wawaghutsa , “ Pfii namwe pfipfila kawabugha ? ”
43007048	“ Angu kuna imkulu au Mfarisayo iyamtoghole ?
43007049	Bali iwanu wano ng'awomanya bae Ghamalaghitso gha Musa , apfo walighitighwa ne Imulungu . ”
43007050	Nikodemu , Mfarisayo yumwe , iyamghendele Yesu aho mwanduso , kawalongela ,
43007051	“ Apfi Ghamalaghitso ghetu ghomhigha imunu wowose ka ng'atumhulikitse na kumanya chayatendile ? ”
43007052	Wamwidika , “ Pfii naghwe kwolawa Galilaya ? Lola Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , kutsomanya ka kuduhu nabii iyolawila Galilaya . ”
43007053	Kuya chila imunu koka ukaye yake .
43008001	Lekeni Yesu kaghenda kune chidunda che Mitseituni .
43008002	Nemitondotondo litsuwa lya keli Yesu kaghenda keli mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu . Iwanu wose wamtsunguluka , naye kakala hasi , kandusa kuwalangulitsa .
43008003	Iwalangulitsi wa Ghamalangulitso na Mafarisayo wamghala ipinga iyaghoghighwe ughoni . Wamwika ipinga ayo hambele hawo .
43008004	Wamlongela Yesu , “ Mlangulitsi , ipinga yuno kaghoghighwa ughoni .
43008005	Mne Ghamalaghitso , Musa katulaghitsa apfi , ipinga ka ayu kobamighwa yatowighwe na ghamabwe mbaka yafe . Lelo ghweghwe ulongatse ? ”
43008006	Tsawaghutsa pfino wamwonze Yesu ili wapate ghomba lya kumghoghela . Lekeni Yesu kenamila hasi , kandusa kwandika hasi kwa chidole chake .
43008007	Hawaghendelele kumghutsa , Yesu kenuka kawalongela , “ Imunu wowose mna mwemwe iyalihela nzambi , yalongole kumwasila libwe . ”
43008008	Kuya Yesu kenama keli , kandika hasi .
43008009	Iwanu wala hawahulike apfi , wandusa kuka yumweyumwe , wandusa iwabala . Yesu kasighala ne ipinga ayula yemile hala .
43008010	Yesu kenuka kamghutsa , “ Walikwani iwanu iwakughoghile ? Pfii kuduhu imunu iyakuhighile ? ”
43008011	Ipinga ayo kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa , kuduhu imunu iyanihighile . ” Yesu kamlongela , “ Na nene sikuhigha bae . Ghenda na uleke kutenda keli nzambi . ”
43008012	Yesu hayalongile keli ne iwanu , kalonga , “ Nene na ghumwanga ghwe iisi . Imunu wowose iyoniwinza ng'atsokwanga mchisi bae , ila katsokuwa na ghumwanga ghwe ughima . ”
43008013	Mafarisayo wamwidika , “ Ghweghwe kwelapfila imwenyegho ukalangama , na ukalangama wako wa ughutsu . ”
43008014	Yesu kawalongela , “ Hata ning'elapfila ukalangama imwenyegho , ukalangama wangu wolongesa , kwaapfila nomanya kwani kwanilawila na kwani konighenda . Lekeni mwemwe ng'ammanyile bae kwani kwanilawila au kwanighenda .
43008015	Mwemwe mwohigha ka iwanu pfawohigha . Nene simuhigha imunu bae .
43008016	Lekeni ka nohigha , nohigha ghoya , kwaapfila sisang'ana bae niliyeka , Aba iyanitumile kahamwe na nene .
43008017	Yandikighwa mne Ghamalaghitso ghenu ukalangama we iwanu weli wotogholighwa .
43008018	Nene nelapfila imwenyegho ukalangama , na mkalangama wangu yungi , Aba iyanitumile . ”
43008019	Kuya wamghutsa , “ Aba wako yalikwani ? ” Yesu kawedika , “ Ng'amnimanyile nene wala ng'amummanyile Aba wangu , mng'animanyile , pfipfila mng'ammanyile Aba wangu . ”
43008020	Yesu kalonga mbuli tsino hayang'ali yolangulitsa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , hanu hane chinu cha kwikila sadaka . Kuya kuduhu imunu iyamghoghile kwaapfila chipindi chake tsa ng'ana chipfike bae .
43008021	Yesu kalonga nawo keli , “ Nakuka , mtsombama lekeni mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu . Ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanighenda . ”
43008022	Iwakulu wa Wayahudi waghutsa , “ Kolonga ng'atudaha bae kughenda hanu hoyoghenda . Pfii kobama yekome imwenyegho ? ”
43008023	Lekeni Yesu kawedika , “ Mwemwe mwa wa iisi ino ili hasi , lekeni nene na wa kulanga . Mwemwe mwa iwanu wa muisi amu , lekeni nene si wa muisi amu .
43008024	Tsaniwalongela mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu . Kwaapfila ng'amtoghola bae ‘ Nene na Yuyula ’ mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu . ”
43008025	Wamghutsa Yesu , “ Lelo ghweghwe uli nani ? ” Yesu kawedika , “ Nene na Yuyula kulawa mwanduso . ”
43008026	“ Nina mbuli nyingi tsa kulonga mna mwemwe na kuwahigha . Lekeni iyanitumile yeye kotogholighwa , na chanihulike kuna yeye , chicho chaniwalongela iwanu wose . ”
43008027	Ng'awamanyile bae ka Yesu yang'ali yowalongela mbuli tse Aba wake .
43008028	Yesu kawalongela , “ Hamtsomwinula Imwana we Imunu mna msalaba , mtsomanya nene na Yuyula , kuya mtsomanya ka nene sitenda ichinu chochose niliyeka , ila nolonga chayanilangulitse Aba wangu .
43008029	Yula iyanitumile kahamwe na nene , ng'anilekile niliyeka bae , kwaapfila ghamatsuwa ghose notenda ighomnoghela . ”
43008030	Iwanu wengi iwamhulikitse Yesu hayang'ali yolonga pfinu pfino wamtoghola .
43008031	Kuya Yesu kawalongela awala Wayahudi iwamtoghole , “ Mng'aghakinda ghamalaghitso ghangu , mwemwe mtsakuwa iwanang'ina wangu ghendo .
43008032	Kuya mtsomanya ukweli , na ukweli utsowakombola . ”
43008033	Wamwidika Yesu , “ Twetwe twa watsukulu wa Abrahamu , ng'atuwile bae iwatumwa we imunu wowose . Pfii kuya kwolonga tutsokombolighwa ? ”
43008034	Yesu kawedika , “ Nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose iyotenda nzambi ka imtumwa wa nzambi .
43008035	Imtumwa ng'okala bae ukaye ghamatsuwa ghose , ila imwana kokala ukaye ghamatsuwa ghose .
43008036	Imwana ang'amkombolani , mtsokombolighwa ghendo .
43008037	Nomanya mwemwe mwa watsukulu we Abrahamu . Lekeni mwobama mnikome kwaapfila ng'amtoghola ghamalangulitso ghangu .
43008038	Nowalongela achila Aba wangu chayanilanguse , lekeni mwemwe mwotenda achila chayawalongele aba wenu . ”
43008039	Wamwidika , “ Aba wetu Abrahamu . ” Yesu kawedika , “ Mng'awile iwana we Abrahamu , mng'atendile aghala ghayatendile Abrahamu .
43008040	Niwalongela ukweli yaniuhulike kwe Imulungu . Lekeni mwemwe mng'ali mwobama mnikome . Abrahamu ng'atendile pfino bae !
43008041	Mwemwe mwotenda ipfinu ipfitendighwe na aba wenu . ” Wamwidika , “ Imulungu yaliyeka iyo Aba wetu yatulinaye . Twetwe twa iwanaghe ghendo . ”
43008042	Yesu kawalongela , “ Ka Imulungu ang'awile Aba wenu , mng'amnoghele , kwaapfila ndawa kwe Imulungu na sambi nahano . Sitsile bae kwa uwetso wangu imwenyegho , ila yeye kanituma .
43008043	Ebali ng'amchimanya bae chanilonga ? Kwaapfila mwemwe ng'amdaha bae kuhulikitsa chanilonga .
43008044	Mwolawa kwa aba wenu Yehile , na mwotenda ka aba wenu pfayobama . Kulawa mwanduso tsakawakoma iwanu , kwaapfila kuduhu ukweli kuna yeye . Hayolonga ughutsu , kolonga chihendo chake , kwaapfila ka mghutsu na aba we ughutsu .
43008045	Na nene kwaapfila nolongesa , ng'amnitoghola bae .
43008046	Apfi mna mwemwe kuna imunu iyodaha kulapfa ukalangama ka nene nina nzambi ? Ka nolongesa , ebali ng'amnitoghola bae ?
43008047	Imunu we Imulungu kohulikitsa mbuli tse Imulungu . Mwemwe ng'amuhulikitsa kwaapfila mwemwe si iwanu we Imulungu bae . ”
43008048	Wayahudi wamligha Yesu kwa kumghutsa , “ Apfi ng'atulongile ghoya bae ka ghweghwe kwa Msamariya na kuna chinyamkela ? ”
43008049	Yesu kawedika , “ Nene nahela chinyamkela , nene nomuhulikitsa Aba wangu lekeni mwemwe ng'amnihulikitsa bae .
43008050	Nene sibamila utunitso imwenyegho bae , ila kabaho iyoubama , ayo ka mlamutsi .
43008051	Nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose iyokinda ghamalaghitso ghangu ng'atsokufa bae . ”
43008052	Wayahudi wamlongela Yesu , “ Sambi twomanya kuna chinyamkela ! Abrahamu na manabii wafa , lekeni ghweghwe kwolonga imunu wowose iyokinda ghamalangulitso ghako ng'atsakufa bae .
43008053	Angu ghweghwe kwa mbala kubita aba wetu Abrahamu iyafile ? Pfipfila manabii nawo wafa . Apfi ghweghwe kwolonga uli nani ? ”
43008054	Yesu kawedika , “ Ning'etunya imwenyegho , utunitso wangu si chinu . Aba wangu yamumkema Imulungu wenu , yeye iyo yonitunya .
43008055	Mwemwe ng'amummanya bae , lekeni nene nommanya . Ning'alonga simmanyile bae , nitsakuwa mghutsu ka mwemwe . Lekeni nommanya na nokinda imbuli yake .
43008056	Aba wenu Abrahamu kadeng'elela kwaajili ya kulyona litsuwa lya kutsa kwangu , naye kalyona , kalideng'elela . ”
43008057	Wayahudi wamlongela Yesu , “ Ghweghwe ng'una upfike imiyaka hamsini , naghwe kumwona Abrahamu ! ”
43008058	Yesu kawedika , “ Nowalongela ghendo , Abrahamu ng'ana yelekighwe nene nabaho . ”
43008059	Kuya wadondola ghamabwe wabama wamtowe Yesu , lekeni Yesu kalawa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu .
43009001	Yesu hayang'ali yoghenda mmbalimbali , kamwona imunu chifita kulawa kwelekighwa kwake .
43009002	Iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa , “ Mlangulitsi , yuhi iyatendile nzambi , mbaka imunu yuno yelekighwe chifita , imunu yuno au iwamweleke ? ”
43009003	Yesu kawedika , “ Si imunu yuno wala iwamweleke bae iwatendile nzambi , lekeni ilawila pfino ili ngupfu ye Imulungu yoneke mne ughima wake .
43009004	Kwaapfila kung'ali misi , twobamighwa kusang'ana ing'onde ya ayula iyanitumile . Chilo hachikutsa kuduhu imunu iyodaha kusang'ana .
43009005	Haning'ali muisi , nene na ghumwanga ghwe isi . ”
43009006	Hayamalitse kulonga apfi , kabwalula ghamate mne lidongo , kapfulugha likododo kwa ghamate kambaka chifita mnenge .
43009007	Yesu kamlongela , “ Ghenda ukahopfughe chihanga chako mne tsimbu Siloamu . ” Siloamu mana yake “ Iyatumighwe . ” Apfo imunu yula koka kaghenda kuhopfugha chihanga chake , kuya koka ukaye aku kakona .
43009008	Iwanu iwang'ali wokala naye habehi ne iwanu iwamwonile hayang'ali yolomba weghutsa , “ Apfi ayu si imunu yula iyang'ali yolomba ? ”
43009009	Iwanu wamwenga walonga , “ Ayuno yeye , ” lekeni wangi walonga , “ Ayu si yeye bae , keghala naye . ” Lekeni imunu yula kalonga , “ Nene na yuyula iyaning'ali nilomba . ”
43009010	Wamghutsa , “ Apfi kudahatse kona ? ”
43009011	Imunu ayo kawedika , “ Imunu iwomkema Yesu kapfulugha likododo kanibaka mnenge mwangu . Kanongela ng'ende Siloamu nikahopfughe chihanga changu . Apfo ng'enda , bahala haning'ali nohupfugha chihanga , nidaha kwona . ”
43009012	Wamghutsa , “ Alikwani imunu hayo ? ” Kawedika , “ Imane . ”
43009013	Kuya iwanu wamghala imunu yula yakalile chifita kwa Mafarisayo .
43009014	Litsuwa Yesu lyapfulughe likododo na kumhonetsa imunu chifita tsalikala Litsuwa lya Sabato .
43009015	Kuya Mafarisayo wamghutsa keli imunu ayo pfayadahile kona . Kawedika , “ Kanibaka likododo mnenge mwangu , nihopfugha chihanga changu , sambi nakona . ”
43009016	Mafarisayo wamwenga walonga , “ Imunu yuno yatendile pfino ng'olawa bae kwe Imulungu , kwaapfila kolibetsa Litsuwa lya Sabato . ” Lekeni iwanu wangi waghutsa , “ Apfi imunu yane nzambi kodahatse kutenda pfihulo ka pfino ? ” Apfo weghola .
43009017	Kuya Mafarisayo wamghutsa imunu ayo , “ Kulonga kakuhonetsa tsinenge tsako . Ghweghwe ulongatse kwa imunu ayo ? ” Naye kawedika , “ Imunu ayo ka nabii . ”
43009018	Kuya iwakulu wa Wayahudi ng'awatoghole bae ka imunu ayo tsachifita na kadaha kona , mbaka wawakema aba na mai we imunu hayo .
43009019	Wayahudi wawaghutsa , “ Apfi ayu mwanenu ? Yumlonga kelekighwa chifita , lelo kodahatse ukona ? ”
43009020	Aba wake na mai wake wawedika , “ Twomanya ayu mwanetu , twomanya tsakelekighwa chifita .
43009021	Lekeni ng'atumanyile bae pfayadahile kona na ng'atummanyile imunu iyamhonetse nenge tsake . Mumghutse , yeye ka imbala kodaha kwidika imwenyegho ! ”
43009022	Aba wake na mai wake walonga apfi kwaapfila wang'ali wowapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi , kwaapfila tsawalonga imunu wowose iyolonga Yesu ka Kiristu katsowingighwa mne Ing'anda ye Kulombela .
43009023	Kwaajili ayo aba na mai wake tsawalonga apfi , “ Imwenyegho ka imbala , mghutseni . ”
43009024	Wayahudi wamkema keli imunu ayo , wamlongela , “ Wilahe kwe Imulungu ka kolongesa ! Twomanya imunu iyakuhonetse kana nzambi . ”
43009025	Imunu ayo kawedika , “ Imane ka imunu ayu kana nzambi au kahela nzambi . Ichinu chimwe chanimanya ; tsang'ala chifita lekeni sambi nakona ! ”
43009026	Kuya wamghutsa imunu ayo , “ Angu akutendele choni ? Yatendiletse kukuhonetsa tsinenge tsako ? ”
43009027	Imunu ayo kawedika , “ Tsaniwalongela lekeni ng'ambamile bae kutegheletsa . Ule mwobama kuhulika imbuli ino keli ? Pfii namwe mwobama kuwa iwanang'ina wake ? ”
43009028	Kuya wamligha wamlongela , “ Ghweghwe kwa mwanang'ina wake ! Twetwe twa iwanang'ina wa Musa !
43009029	Twomanya Imulungu tsakalonga na Musa , lekeni imunu yuno , ng'atumanyile bae kolawila kwani ! ”
43009030	Imunu yula kawedika , “ Mwonikangawatsa ! Mwemwe ng'ammanyile kwani koyolawila , lekeni katsihonetsa nenge tsangu .
43009031	Twomanya Imulungu ng'omhulikitsa bae imunu yane nzambi . Imulungu komhulikitsa imunu iyomtoghola na iyotenda chayambamile kutenda .
43009032	Kulawa iisi pfailumbighwe kuduhu imunu yahulike ka imunu wowose kamhonetsa imunu iyelekighwe chifita .
43009033	Ka imunu yuno ng'olawa bae kwa Imulungu , tsayang'alekile kudaha kusang'ana chochose ! ”
43009034	Wamwidika , “ Ghweghwe kwelekighwa na kukulila mnzambi . Apfi udahatse kutulangulitsa ? ” Apfo Wayahudi wamuwinga imunu ayo mne Ing'anda ya Kulombela .
43009035	Yesu tsakahulika imunu iyamuhonetse kawingighwa , hayamwonile kamghutsa , “ Pfii kwomtoghola Imwana we Imunu ? ”
43009036	Imunu ayo kamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , apfi imunu ayo nani ? Nongele nimtoghole ! ”
43009037	Yesu kamwidika , “ Sambi kumwona , yulonga naye iyo yuyo . ”
43009038	Kuya imunu ayo kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa , notoghola , ” kampfughamila Yesu ghamaghoti .
43009039	Yesu kalonga , “ Nitsa muisi amu kuhigha , pfifita wone na iwanu iwakona wawe pfifita . ”
43009040	Mafarisayo wangi iwakalile na Yesu wamhulika hayalongile pfino , wamghutsa , “ Apfi kwolonga twetwe twa pfifita ? ”
43009041	Yesu kawedika , “ Mng'awile pfifita , mng'akalile mwahela nzambi , lekeni kwaapfila mwolonga mwakona , mwemwe mng'ali mna nzambi . ”
43010001	Yesu kawalongela , “ Nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose ka ng'akwingila bae mne libanda lya wang'olo kubitila halibani , ila kakwingila kwa nzila ingi ayo ka mbapfi na mbokaji .
43010002	Imunu iyakwingila kubitila libani ayo ka mdimi we wang'olo .
43010003	Mbetetsi kompfughulila libani , na wang'olo wohulikitsa litsi lya mdimi . Kowakema wang'olo wake kwa mataghwa , kowalongotsa kunze .
43010004	Hayowalapfa kunze wang'olo wake kowalongola , na wang'olo wake womuwinza kwaapfila womanya litsi lyake .
43010005	Lekeni ng'awomuwinza bae imunu yungi , watsomlema kwaapfila ng'awomanya bae litsi lye imunu yungi . ”
43010006	Yesu kawalongela imbuli ino , lekeni ng'awamanyile bae chayawalongele .
43010007	Kuya Yesu kalonga keli , “ Nowalongela ghendo , nene nalibani lya wang'olo .
43010008	Iwanu wose iwanongole tsawabapfi na wabokaji , lekeni wang'olo ng'awawahulikitse bae .
43010009	Nene nalibani . Imunu wowose iyakwingila kubitila nene katsokombolighwa . Katsakwingila na kulawa , naye katsopata ipfijo .
43010010	Wabapfi wakutsa kwiba , kukoma na kuhinya , nene nitsa wawe ne ughima bwelele , na watsokala ghamatsuwa ghose .
43010011	“ Nene namdimi yaninoghile . Mdimi yanoghile kolapfa ughima wake kwa wang'olo .
43010012	Imunu yodima kwa kulihighwa na si mdimi yane iwang'olo bae . Hayomwona yumbwa wa kumuhulo kakutsa , kowaleka iwang'olo kotsuma . Apfo yumbwa wa kumuhulo kowaghogha iwang'olo na kowapwililisa .
43010013	Imunu ayo kotsuma kwaapfila yeye ka imunu wa kulihighwa na ng'owalolesa bae wang'olo .
43010014	“ Nene namdimi yaninoghile , nowamanya wang'olo wangu na wang'olo wangu wonimanya ,
43010015	ka Aba pfayonimanya na nene nommanya Aba , na nowalapfila wang'olo ughima wangu .
43010016	Nina wang'olo wangi , awo si wa banda lino . Pfipfila nobamighwa niwaghale . Pfipfila nawo watsohulika litsi lyangu , na kutsakuwa na kingili limwe na mdimi yumwe .
43010017	“ Nomnoghela Aba wangu kwaapfila nolapfa ughima wangu ili niubokele keli .
43010018	Kuduhu imunu iyoniboka ughima wangu . Noulapfa imwenyegho ughima wangu kwaapfila nodaha kughulapfa na kughusola keli . Nibokela laghitso lino kulawa kwa Aba wangu . ”
43010019	Mbuli tsino tsa Yesu tsiwatenda Wayahudi weghole keli .
43010020	Iwanu wemwenga walonga , “ Kana chinyamkela na kamkwalukwale . Ule mwomtegheletsa ? ”
43010021	Lekeni wangi walonga , “ Imunu yane chinyamkela ng'odaha bae kulonga pfino . Apfi chinyamkela kodaha kumhonetsa imunu chifita ? ”
43010022	Hako Yerusalemu tsakukala na Chihungo cha Kuika wakifu Ing'anda ye Imulungu , tsaghukala msimu ghwa chipfeghetsi .
43010023	Yesu yang'ali yakwanga mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu hane chitala cha Selemani .
43010024	Wayahudi wamtsunguluka wamghutsa , “ Kutsotuleka tuleke kumanya mbaka tsuwachi ? Tulongele mwatsimwatsi ka ghweghwe kwa Kiristu Mkombotsi . ”
43010025	Yesu kawedika , “ Tsaniwalongela , lekeni ng'amnitoghole bae . Pfihulo ipfanitenda kwa taghwa lya Aba wangu pfonilangusa ,
43010026	lekeni mwemwe ng'amtoghola kwaapfila mwemwe si wang'olo wangu .
43010027	Wang'olo wangu wohulika litsi lyangu , nowamanya , nawo woniwinza .
43010028	Noweng'a ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose , nawo ng'awatsakufa bae . Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwaboka mna ghamoko ghangu .
43010029	Aba wangu , iyangaile , ka mkulu kubita wose , kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwaboka kulawa mna ghamoko gha Aba wangu .
43010030	Nene na Aba twa chinu chimwe . ”
43010031	Wayahudi wadondola keli ghamabwe wamtowe Yesu ,
43010032	lekeni Yesu kawalongela , “ Niwalangusa pfihulo pfingi ipfilawile kwa Aba . Apfi chihulo chachi ichiwatenda mnitowe ne ghamabwe ? ”
43010033	Wamwidika , “ Ng'atukwasila ghamabwe kwaapfila kutenda pfihulo , ila kwaapfila kumligha Imulungu ! Ghweghwe kwa imunu , lekeni kwolonga ghweghwe kwa Imulungu . ”
43010034	Yesu kawedika , “ Apfi ng'ayandikighwe mne Ghamalaghitso ghenu Imulungu tsakalonga , ‘ Mwemwe mwa walungu ? ’
43010035	Imulungu tsakawakema walungu awala yaweng'ile usenga wake , na Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholongesa ghamatsuwa ghose .
43010036	Aba kanisaghula na kanituma nene muisi . Ule mwolonga nimligha Imulungu kwaapfila nilonga ‘ Nene na lmwana we Imulungu ? ’
43010037	Ka sisang'ana bae sang'ano tsa Aba wangu yanibamile nitsisang'ane mleke kunitoghola .
43010038	Lekeni ka notsisang'ana sang'ano tsake na mng'ali mwolema kunitoghola , togholeni pfihulo pfangu , ili mmanye na mtange ka Aba ka mghati mwangu , na nene na mghati mwe Aba . ”
43010039	Kuya wabama wamghoghe keli , lekeni Yesu kaswekuka kawaleka .
43010040	Kuya Yesu koya keli kumwambu mwe Ghumto Yoridani hanu Yohane hayakalile yobatitsa iwanu , kakala kuko .
43010041	Iwanu wengi wamghendela Yesu . Walonga , “ Yohane ng'atendile pfihulo , ila chila imbuli ye imunu yuno iyalongile Yohane ilongesa . ”
43010042	Baho iwanu wengi wamtoghola Yesu .
43011001	Imunu yumwe iyakemighwe Lazali tsamtamu . Lazali yang'ali yokala Betaniya , kaye yake Mariya ne ndughu yake Marita .
43011002	Mariya yuno tsakakala yuyula iyambakile Imtwatsa Yesu ghamafuta ighonung'ila mmaghulu na kughabaghusa kwa mvili tsake , lumbu wake Lazali tsakakala mtamu .
43011003	Apfo lumbu tsake Lazali wamtumila Yesu usenga , “ Imtwatsa , sale yako yumnoghele koghula . ”
43011004	Yesu hayahulike apfi , kalonga , “ Utamu uno ng'autsomkoma bae Lazali , utamu uno ulawila kwa utunitso we Imulungu ili Imwana we Imulungu yatunitsighwe kubitila utamu uno . ”
43011005	Yesu tsakawanoghela Marita na lumbu wake na Lazali .
43011006	Yesu hayahulike Lazali koghula , kongetsa ghamatsuwa meli gha kukala hala hayakalile .
43011007	Kuya Yesu kawalongela iwanang'ina wake , “ Tuye keli Yudeya . ”
43011008	Iwanang'ina wake wamlongela , “ Mlangulitsi , ghamatsuwa chidogho ighalutile Wayahudi tsawabama wakutowe ne ghamabwe , ule kwobama ughende keli hanu hala ? ”
43011009	Yesu kawedika , “ Apfi misi yahela masaa kumi ne meli bae ? Imunu iyokwanga nemisi ng'ekwala bae kwaapfila koghwona ghumwanga ghwe isi ino .
43011010	Lekeni imunu ang'anga nechilo kekwala , kwaapfila kahela ghumwanga . ”
43011011	Yesu hayalongile apfi , kaghendelela kuwalongela , “ Sale yetu Lazali kawasa , lekeni noghenda kumlamsa . ”
43011012	Iwanang'ina wake wamwidika , “ Mtwatsa , ka kawasa , katsohona . ”
43011013	Yesu tsayang'ali yolonga Lazali tsakafa lekeni iwanang'ina wake wapfikitsa Lazali tsakawasa .
43011014	Apfo Yesu kawalongela mwatsimwatsi , “ Lazali kafa ,
43011015	lekeni kwaajili yenu nodeng'elela kwaapfila sikalile naye bae , ili mtoghole . Leka tumghendele . ”
43011016	Kuya Tomasi , iyakemighwe Basa kawalongela iwanang'ina wayaghe , “ Leka tughende ne Mlangulitsi ili tufe naye . ”
43011017	Yesu hayapfikile , tsakapfika lukuli lwa Lazali lwikighwa mne likabuli ghamatsuwa mane ighalutile .
43011018	Kaye ya Betaniya tsaikala habehi ne Yerusalemu , utali wa maili mbili ,
43011019	na Wayahudi wengi watsa kuwakanza Marita ne Mariya kwa ukufa kwa ndughu yawo .
43011020	Marita hayahulike Yesu kakutsa , kaghenda kunze kwitingana na Yesu , lekeni Mariya tsakasighala mng'anda .
43011021	Marita kamlongela Yesu , “ Mtwatsa , ka ung'awile hano , lumbu wangu tsa yang'alekile kufa !
43011022	Lekeni nomanya hata sambi Imulungu katsokwing'a chochose chaumlomba . ”
43011023	Yesu kamlongela , “ Lumbu wako katsotsilihuka . ”
43011024	Marita kamwidika , “ Nomanya katsotsilihuka keli mne litsuwa lya ukutsigha . ”
43011025	Yesu kamlongela , “ Nene nautsilihuko ne ughima . Imunu iyonitoghola nene , ang'afa katsakuwa mghima ,
43011026	na imunu wowose iyokala na kunitoghola nene ng'atsakufa bae . Pfii kwotoghola ? ”
43011027	Marita kamwidika , “ Ona , Mtwatsa ! Nokutoghola ghweghwe kwa Kiristu , Imwana wa Imulungu , iyatsile mne isi . ”
43011028	Marita hayalongile pfino , kaghenda mng'anda kamkema Mariya chinyelenyele . Kamlongela , “ Mlangulitsi kabaha , kokukema . ”
43011029	Mariya hayahulike pfino , kenuka himahima kamghendela Yesu .
43011030	Na Yesu tsakakala ng'ana yapfike mkaye , ila kakala hanu hala hayetingane ne Marita .
43011031	Wayahudi iwakalile mng'anda womkanza Mariya , hawamwonile Mariya kenuka himahima na kulawa kunze wamuwinza , wapfikitsa yang'ali yoghenda kulila mne likabuli .
43011032	Mariya hayapfikile hanu hayali Yesu na hayamwonile , kamtowela ghamaghoti , kamlongela , “ Mtwatsa , ka ung'awile hano , lumbu wangu tsa yang'alekile kufa ! ”
43011033	Yesu hayamwonile Mariya kolila , na Wayahudi iwatsile na Mariya nawo wolila , Yesu kaghanzika mne ghumoyo ghwake , kona usungu .
43011034	Yesu kawaghutsa , “ Angu mumtsikile kwani ? ” Wamwidika , “ Mtwatsa , itsa wone . ”
43011035	Yesu kalila .
43011036	Kuya Wayahudi walonga , “ Mlole pfayamnoghele ! ”
43011037	Lekeni iwanu wangi welongela , “ Ka kamhonetsa imunu chifita , ule ng'adahile kumtenda Lazali aleke kufa ? ”
43011038	Yesu yang'ali yoghanzika keli mne ghumoyo ghwake , kaghenda mbaka mne likabuli , likabuli tsalikala imango iighubikighwe ne libwe .
43011039	Yesu kawalaghitsa , “ Mlibimbilise libwe ! ” Marita lumbu wa imunu iyafile kamwidika , “ Mtwatsa , lekeni katsonung'a , ghamatsuwa mane ghabita kulawa yatsikighwe ! ”
43011040	Kuya Yesu kamlongela , “ Apfi sikulongele bae ka ung'atoghola , kutsakona utunitso we Imulungu ? ”
43011041	Apfo wabimbilisa libwe . Kuya Yesu kalola kulanga kalonga , “ Aba , nolonga mighede kwaapfila kwonihulika .
43011042	Nomanya ghamatsuwa ghose kwonihulika , lekeni nolonga pfino kwaajili ya iwanu iwemile hano , ili watoghole ghweghwe kunituma . ”
43011043	Yesu hayamalitse kulonga apfi , kakemelela , “ Lazali , lawa kunze ! ”
43011044	Naye Lazali kalawa kunze , ghamoko na maghulu ghake ghoighwa isanda na ichihanga chake chighubikighwa chitambala . Yesu kawalongela , “ Mdoholeni mumleke yoke . ”
43011045	Apfo Wayahudi wengi iwaghendile kumwangila Mariya , waghona ghayatendile Yesu , na wamtoghola .
43011046	Lekeni iwanu wangi woya kwa Mafarisayo wawalongela aghala ghayatendile Yesu .
43011047	Apfo Mafarisayo na iwatambika wakulu wetingana ne iwanu we Libalatsa lye Wayahudi , weghutsa , “ Tutende choni ? Imunu yuno kotenda pfihulo pfingi .
43011048	Tung'amleka aghendelele , iwanu wose watsomtoghola , kuya iwakulu wa Waroma watsakutsa kusola Ing'anda yetu ya ukulombela na isi yetu . ”
43011049	Kuya yumwe wawo , iyakemighwe Kayafa , iyakalile Mtambika mkulu wa ghumwaka ghula , kalonga , “ Mwawabotsi !
43011050	Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka pfinogha kuna mwemwe imunu yumwe yafe kwaajili ya iwanu wose kubita isi yose ihinyighwe ? ”
43011051	Ng'alongile bae kwa kubama imwenyegho , lekeni kwaapfila tsakakala mtambika mkulu wa ghumwaka ghula , tsakatabili Yesu katsakufa kwaajili ya isi ya Wayahudi ,
43011052	kuya si kwaajili ya isi ila iliyeka , ila pfipfila kuweka hamwe iwana we Imulungu iwapwililike wawe wamwe .
43011053	Apfo kulawa litsuwa lila iwakulu wa Wayahudi wabama inzila ya kumkoma Yesu .
43011054	Apfo Yesu ng'aghendile bae mwatsimwatsi muisi ya Yudeya , ila kalawa ako kaghenda habehi na kunyika , kune kaye iikemighwe Efuremu , hao kakala ne iwanang'ina wake .
43011055	Ichihungo che Ipasaka cha Wayahudi hachipfikile habehi , iwanu wengi wagheluka Yerusalemu ili wadeghesighwe ng'ana Ipasaka ipfike .
43011056	Wang'ali wombama Yesu , na hawetingane mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu weghutsa , “ Mkwonatse ? Apfi ng'atsakutsa bae mne lchihungo ? ”
43011057	Lekeni iwatambika wakulu na Mafarisayo walapfa laghitso imunu wowose iyomanya kwayali Yesu , yalonge , ili wamghoghe .
43012001	Ghamatsuwa sita ng'ana ichihungo che Ipasaka chipfike , Yesu kapfika Betaniya , ukaye kwa Lazali , imunu iyamtsilihule .
43012002	Iwanu wamwikila Yesu ichijo cha nemihe , Marita angali yowasang'anila . Lazali tsakakala yumwe we iwanu iwang'ali wakuja na Yesu .
43012003	Kuya Mariya kasola isupa ye ghamafuta ighonung'ila ghoya ighalawile mne ghummeya ighukemighwe narido , kambaka Yesu ghamaghulu na kumbaghusa kwa mvili tsake . Ing'anda yose tsainung'ila ghoya .
43012004	Yuda Isikarioti , yumwe wa iwanang'ina wake , iyatsomhunduka Yesu kaghutsa ,
43012005	“ Ule ghamafuta ghano ghang'autsighwe dinari miya ndatu na sendi weng'ighwe iwahingwa ? ”
43012006	Yuda tsakalonga pfino , si kwakuwonela libatsi iwahingwa , ila kalonga pfino kwaapfila tsakakala mbapfi , yeye yang'ali yokindagha ghumkoba ghwo ukwikila tsisendi na yang'ali yakwibagha tsisendi .
43012007	Yesu kamwidika , “ Mleke ! Katenda pfino kulyandaa litsuwa lya kutsikighwa kwangu .
43012008	Ghamatsuwa ghose mtsokala ne iwahingwa , lekeni ng'amtsokala na nene bae ghamatsuwa ghose . ”
43012009	Wayahudi wengi hawahulike Yesu kakala Betaniya waghenda , ng'awaghendile bae kumwona Yesu aliheka , pfipfila waghenda kumwona Lazali , imunu yula Yesu iyamtsilihule .
43012010	Apfo iwatambika wakulu wabama inzila ye kumkoma Lazali ,
43012011	kwa achila ichimlawile Lazali Wayahudi wengi wamghendela Yesu na kumtoghola .
43012012	Litsuwa liwinzile iwanu wengi watsa mne Ichihungo che Ipasaka , tsawahulika Yesu ang'ali yakutsa Yerusalemu .
43012013	Apfo wasola ghamaputila ghe mibiki , waghenda kumbokela , wakemelela , “ Mtunitse Imulungu ! Imulungu kambaliki iyakutsa kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa , Imulungu kambaliki Imndewa wa Isiraeli ! ”
43012014	Yesu kamwona imwana punda , kamdina , ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka
43012015	“ Mleke kupfuka , iwanu we Sayuni , Imndewa wenu kakutsa , kadina imwana punda . ”
43012016	Mwanduso iwanang'ina wake ng'awamanyile bae mbuli tsino . Lekeni Yesu hayatsilihuke na kutunitsighwa , iwanang'ina wakumbuka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ighalongile mbuli tsake na ka wanu wamtendela pfinu apfo .
43012017	Iwanu iwakalile na Yesu hayamkemile Lazali kulawa mne likabuli na kumtsilihula , walonga aghala ighalawile .
43012018	Iwanu wengi waghenda kutingana na Yesu kwaapfila tsawahulika Yesu katenda chihulo .
43012019	Apfo Mafarisayo welongela , “ Mlole , ng'atudaha kutenda chochose . Iwanu wose womuwinza ! ”
43012020	Kukala na Wagiriki wengi mne iwanu iwatsile Yerusalemu kutamanila mne ichihungo cha Ipasaka .
43012021	Wamghendela Filipi , iyalawile Betisaida mne isi ya Galilaya wamlongela , “ Mkulu , twobama tumwone Yesu . ”
43012022	Filipi kaghenda , kamlongela Andereya , kuya wose weli waghenda kumlongela Yesu .
43012023	Yesu kawedika , “ Chipindi chipfika che Imwana we Imunu kutunyighwa !
43012024	Nowalongela ghendo , ka mbeghu ye uhemba ng'ailaghale mdongo na ukufa , yokala pfipfo imwe iliyeka . Lekeni ing'afa na ukota , itsokweleka mbeghu bwelele .
43012025	Imunu iyounoghela ughima wake katsowaghitsa , ila imunu iyouhila ughima wake katsokwing'ighwa ughima we ghamatsuwa ghose .
43012026	Imunu wowose iyobama kunitumikila yaniwinze , hohose hanikala imtumwa wangu akale baho . Aba wangu katsomtoghola imunu iyonitumikila .
43012027	“ Sambi ghumoyo ghwangu ghwoghanzika , na nene nonge choni ? ‘ Aba unikombole mne chipindi chino ? ’ Bae , acho chicho chanitsile , nibite chipindi chino cha maghayo .
43012028	Aba , litunye taghwa lyako ! ” Kuya litsi kulawa kulanga lilonga , “ Nilitunya na nitsolitunya keli . ”
43012029	Iwanu wengi iwemile hala wahulika litsi lila , iwanu wangi walonga kukala na mdumo , lekeni iwanu wangi walonga , “ Malaika kalonga naye ! ”
43012030	Bali Yesu kawalongela , “ Litsi lino ng'alinitsile nene bae lekeni liwatsilani mwemwe .
43012031	Chipindi cha kuhighighwa isi ino chipfika , mkulu we isi ino katsowingighwa .
43012032	Hanitsokwinulighwa muisi , nitsowakwegha iwanu wose kuna nene . ”
43012033	Yesu kalonga pfino kulangusa pfayatsokufa .
43012034	Mtingano we iwanu wamghutsa , “ Ghamalaghitso ghetu tsaghalonga Kiristu katsokala ghamatsuwa ghose . Ule lelo kwolonga ‘ Imwana we Imunu kobamighwa yenulighwe ? ’ Apfi Imwana yuno we Imunu nani ? ”
43012035	Kuya Yesu kawalongela , “ Mtsokala ne ghumwanga kwa chipindi chidodo . Mwange hamng'ali nawo ghumwanga , ng'ana ichisi chiwatsile . Imunu iyokwanga mchisi ng'omanya bae koyoghenda .
43012036	Mtoghole ghumwanga hamng'ali nawo , ili muwe iwana we ghumwanga . ” Hayamalitse kulonga apfi , Yesu koka , kepfisa waleke kumwona .
43012037	Hata ka Yesu tsakasang'ana pfihulo hambele hawo , lekeni ng'awamtoghole bae .
43012038	Agha ghose ghalawila ghatimile aghala ghayalongile Nabii Isaya . “ Imtwatsa , nani iyautoghole usenga wetu ? Na ghumoko ghwa Imtwatsa ughubulighwa kwa nani ? ”
43012039	Apfo ng'awadahile bae kutoghola , kwaapfila Isaya pfipfila tsakalonga keli .
43012040	Imulungu kalonga , “ Nitsowabopfula nenge tsawo , nitsotsibumbuwatsa mbutsi tsawo , waleke kwona kwa tsinenge tsawo , waleke kumanya kwa mbutsi tsawo , waleke kunihundukila , na kuwahonetsa . ”
43012041	Isaya tsakalonga apfi kwaapfila tsakawona utunitso wa Yesu na kulonga mbuli tsake .
43012042	Hata iwakulu wangi wa Wayahudi tsawamtoghola Yesu . Lekeni ng'awadahile bae kulonga mwatsimwatsi kwaapfila wapfuka Mafarisayo watsowawinga mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu .
43012043	Kwaapfila tsawanoghelighwa sideke kutunyighwa ne iwanu kubita kutunyighwa ne Imulungu .
43012044	Yesu kakemelela , “ Imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene , ng'onitoghola nene niliyeka bae ila pfipfila komtoghola ayula iyanitumile .
43012045	Imunu wowose iyombona nene komwona yula iyanitumile .
43012046	Nitsa muisi niwe ghumwanga , ili iwanu wose iwonitoghola waleke kukala mchisi .
43012047	Ka imunu kotegheletsa mbuli tsangu na ng'otsikinda bae , sitsomuhigha bae . Kwaapfila sitsile bae kuhigha iisi lekeni nitsa kuikombola .
43012048	Yeye iyondema nene na kulema mbuli tsangu , ayo kenaye wa kumhigha . Mbuli tsila tsanongile tsitsomhigha mna litsuwa lya ukutsigha .
43012049	Kwaapfila silonga bae kwa ukulu wangu , ila Aba wangu iyanitumile kandaghitsa chokulonga , na nilongetse .
43012050	Nomanya laghitso lyake lyoghala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose . Apfo nolonga aghala Aba wangu ghayandaghitse nighalonge . ”
43013001	Tsaikala ichihungo che Ipasaka ng'ana chipfike . Yesu tsakamanya saa yake ya ukuka kulawa iisi ino na kughenda kwa Aba wake ipfika . Tsakawanoghela ng'ani iwanu wake iwali muisi , kawalangusa unoghelo wake ing'autsigha bae .
43013002	Yesu ne iwanang'ina wake wang'ali wakuja ichijo cha nemihe , yehile ma tsakamwingila Yuda , imwana wa Simoni Isikarioti , mne ghumoyo ghwake , kumhunduka Yesu .
43013003	Yesu tsakamanya Aba kamwing'a ghose mna ghamoko ghake , tsakamanya kalawila kwa Imulungu na kakuya kwe Imulungu .
43013004	Apfo kenuka mmetsa , keka mmbalimbali gholole lyake , keyoha lighwanda lingi mchuno .
43013005	Kuya keka ghamatsi mchiya , kandusa kuwahopfugha ghamaghulu iwanang'ina wake na kuwabaghusa kwa lighwanda ilili mchuno mwake .
43013006	Yesu kapfika hayali Simoni Petiri , iyamghutsile Yesu , “ Imtwatsa , ghweghwe uhopfughe ghamaghulu ghangu ? ”
43013007	Yesu kamwidika , “ Chanisang'ana sambi ghweghwe ng'uchimanyile bae , lekeni kutsochimanya hambele . ”
43013008	Petiri kalonga , “ Bae , ng'utsoghahopfugha bae ghamaghulu ghangu ! ” Yesu kamwidika , “ Ka sighahopfugha bae ghamaghulu ghako , ng'utsakuwa keli bae imwanang'ina wangu . ”
43013009	Simoni Petiri kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa , uleke kughahopfugha ghamaghulu ghangu ghaliyeka , ila pfipfila uhopfughe na ghamoko ghangu na litwi lyangu ! ”
43013010	Yesu kedika , “ Imunu yoghile kela lukuli lwose na kobamighwa yofughe ghamaghulu ghaliyeka . Mwemwe mwela ila si wose bae . ”
43013011	Yesu tsakalonga si wose bae iwelile kwaapfila tsakamanya imunu iyoghenda kumhunduka .
43013012	Yesu hayamalitse kuwahopfugha ghamaghulu ghawo , kapfala keli gholole lyake kakala hanu hake . Kawaghutsa , “ Apfi mghamanya ghaniwatendele ? ”
43013013	“ Mwonikema Mlangulitsi na Imtwatsa , mwotenda ghoya kwaapfila apfo pfipfo pfanili .
43013014	Nene na Imtwatsa na Mlangulitsi wenu , niwahopfugha mwemwe ghamaghulu ghenu , namwe pfipfila mwihopfughe ghamaghulu ghenu .
43013015	Nimlangutsani nzila ya kutenda , namwe mtende ka pfaniwatendele .
43013016	Nowalongela ghendo , kuduhu mtumwa imkulu kubita imtwatsa wake , na kuduhu mtumwa imkulu kubita yula iyamtumile .
43013017	Lelo mwopfimanya pfinu pfino , mng'atenda mtsobweda .
43013018	“ Siwalonga bae mwemwe wose , nowamanya awala yaniwasaghule . Lekeni leka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile igholonga , ‘ Imunu yanikuja naye kanihunduka . ’
43013019	“ Sambi nowalongela ng'ana chilawile , ili hachitsolawila mtsotoghola ‘ Nene iyo Yeye . ’
43013020	Nowalongelani ghendo , imunu wowose iyombokela imunu yanimtumile kombokela nene , na imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene kombokela ayula iyanitumile . ”
43013021	Yesu hayamalitse kulonga apfi , kona usungu ng'ani mne ghumoyo ghwake , kalonga , “ Nowalongela ghendo , yumwe wenu katsonihunduka ! ”
43013022	Iwanang'ina wake tsawelolesa na ng'awamanyile bae yang'ali yomlonga nani .
43013023	Imwanang'ina yumwe , iyanoghelighwe na Yesu , tsakakala habehi naye .
43013024	Simoni Petiri kampfinyighitsa na kulonga , “ Mghutse yomlonga nani . ”
43013025	Imwanang'ina ayo kasoghela habehi na Yesu , kamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , umlonga nani ? ”
43013026	Yesu kamwidika , “ Imunu yula iyanimwing'a chihande che chighate chanipfabika mwibakuli , ayo iyo yeye . ” Kuya kasola chihande che chighate , kachipfabika , kamwing'a Yuda , imwana wa Simoni Isikarioti .
43013027	Bahala Yuda hayasolile chighate , Setani kamwingila . Kuya Yesu kamlongela , “ Tenda himahima chaubama kutenda ! ”
43013028	Lekeni mna iwanu wala iwang'ali wakuja tsahaduhu imunu iyamanyile ule Yesu tsakamlongela pfino .
43013029	Kwaapfila Yuda tsakakala mkinda mkoba ghwa sendi , iwanang'ina wangi wapfikitsa Yesu yang'ali yomlongela Yuda yaghende kughula ipfinu ipfibamighwa mne Ichihungo , au kuweng'a chinu iwahingwa .
43013030	Bahala Yuda hayasolile chighate , kalawa kunze . Tsaikala nechilo .
43013031	Yuda hayokile , Yesu kalonga , “ Lelo utunitso we Imwana we Imunu woneka , na utunitso we Imulungu woneka kubitila yeye .
43013032	Ka utunitso we Imulungu ughubulighwa kubitila yeye , kuya Imulungu imwenyegho katsoughubula utunitso we Imwana we Imunu , na baho katsomtunya .
43013033	Wanangu , nitsokala namwe chidodo . Mtsombama , lekeni sambi nowalongela achila chaniwalongele Wayahudi , ‘ Kwanighenda ng'amdaha kutsa bae . ’
43013034	Lelo noweng'a laghitso lya sambi . Mwinoghele . Ka pfaniwanoghele , namwe mwinoghele pfipfo .
43013035	Mng'enoghela , iwanu wose watsomanya mwemwe mwa iwanang'ina wangu . ”
43013036	Simoni Petiri kamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , ughenda kwani ? ” Yesu kamwidika , “ Ng'udaha bae sambi kuniwinza hanu hanighenda , lekeni hambele kutsoniwinza . ”
43013037	Petiri kamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa ule sidaha kukuwinza sambi ? Nene nitsokulapfila ughima wangu . ”
43013038	Kuya Yesu kamwidika , “ Ghweghwe kodaha kundapfila nene ughima wako ? Nokulongela ghendo , jogholo ng'ana yeke bae kutsonibela mala ndatu !
43014001	“ Mleke kughanzika mne mimoyo yenu , mtogholeni Imulungu , pfipfila mnitoghole nene .
43014002	Mng'anda kwa Aba wangu kuna pfiheleto pfingi , ka si pfipfo bae , ning'awalongele . Lelo noghenda kuwaandalila hanu henu .
43014003	Ning'aghenda , noghenda kuwaandalila hanu henu , nitsowoyila na kuwasola ili mkale hala nene hanikala .
43014004	Mwoimanya inzila ya hanu hanighenda . ”
43014005	Tomasi kamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , ng'atumanyile bae kwani kwaughenda , lelo tuimanyetse inzila ayo ? ”
43014006	Yesu kamwidika , “ Nene na inzila , kweli na ughima . Haduhu imunu iyodaha kughenda kuna Aba ka ng'abitile bae kuna nene .
43014007	Mng'animanyile nene , pfipfila mng'ammanyile Aba wangu na kulawa sambi mwommanya na mumwona . ”
43014008	Filipi kamlongela , “ Imtwatsa , tulanguse Aba ayo , ayo iyo yuyo yatumbama . ”
43014009	Yesu kamlongela , “ Filipi nikala namwe matsuwa mengi , ung'ali ng'unimanyile bae ? Imunu wowose iyambonile nene kamwona Aba . ‘ Ule kwolonga tulanguse Aba ? ’
43014010	Apfi ng'autoghola bae ka nene namghati mwa Aba , naye kamghati mwangu ? Mbuli tsanilonga si tsangu bae , ila Aba iyokala mghati mwangu kosang'ana ng'onde yake .
43014011	Mnoghole haniwalongela nene namghati mwa Aba naye Aba kamghati mwangu . Ka ng'utoghola imbuli yangu , toghola pfinu pfanitendile .
43014012	Nowalongela ghendo , imunu iyonitoghola nene katsotenda apfila pfanendile , katsotenda ipfinu pfikulu kubita pfino , kwaapfila nene noghenda kwa Aba wangu .
43014013	Nitsowatendelani chochose chamlomba kwa taghwa lyangu , ili utunitso wa Aba woneke kubitila Imwana .
43014014	Mng'anilomba ichinu chochose kwa taghwa lyangu , nitsowatendelani .
43014015	“ Ka mwoninoghela , mtsoghakinda ghamalaghitso ghangu .
43014016	Nitsomlomba Aba , naye katsomwing'ani Mwapfitsi yungi , katsokala namwe ghamatsuwa ghose .
43014017	Ayo Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu iyoighubula kweli . Iwanu wa isi ng'awodaha bae kumbokela kwaapfila ng'awodaha bae kumwona na kummanya . Lekeni mwemwe mwommanya , kwaapfila kokala namwe na katsokuwa mghati mwenu .
43014018	“ Hanitsakuka , siwaleka bae mliyeka ka wachuwa , nitsowoyila .
43014019	Mne ichipindi chidodo ichikutsa iwanu wa iisi ng'awatsombona keli bae , lekeni mwemwe mtsombona , kwaapfila namghima , pfipfila namwe mtsakuwa waghima .
43014020	Mne litsuwa alyo mtsomanya nene namghati mwa Aba wangu , namwe mwamghati mwangu , na nene namghati mwenu .
43014021	“ Iwanu wala iwobokela ghamalaghitso ghangu na kughakinda , iwanuwo woninoghela . Aba wangu katsowanoghela iwanu wala iwonoghela nene , pfipfila nene nitsowanoghela na nitselangusa kuna wawo . ”
43014022	Yuda , si Yuda Isikarioti bae kalonga , “ Imtwatsa , ebali kobama kwilangusa kuna twetwe tuliyeka na si kwe iwanu we isi yose bae ? ”
43014023	Yesu kamwidika , “ Imunu wowose iyonoghela nene katsoghakinda ghamalaghitso ghangu . Aba wangu katsomnoghela , nene na Aba wangu tutsomtsila na kukala naye .
43014024	Imunu wowose ing'ayoninoghela ng'oghakinda bae ghamalangulitso ghangu . Ghamalangulitso ighamuhulike si ghangu bae , gholawa kwa Aba iyanitumile .
43014025	“ Niwalongela ghano haning'ali namwe .
43014026	Aba wangu katsowatumila Mwapfitsi , Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kwa taghwa lyangu , katsowalangulitsa mmanye ipfinu pfose na kuwatenda mkumbuke chila ichinu chaniwalongele .
43014027	“ Nowalekela iamani , noweng'a iamani yangu . Siweng'a bae ka isi pfaitendagha . Mleke kughanzika . Mleke kupfuka .
43014028	Tsamuhulika haniwalongele , ‘ Noghenda , kuya nitsowoyila . ’ Ka tsamninoghela mng'adeng'elele nene kughenda kwa Aba , kwaapfila Aba kamkulu kubita nene .
43014029	Niwalongela ng'ana ghalawile , ili haghatsolawila mtoghole .
43014030	Sitsolonga keli bae namwe mbuli nyingi , kwaapfila imkulu wa iisi ino kakutsa . Hayo kahela ngupfu kuna nene ,
43014031	lekeni iwanu we iisi wamanye ka nene nomnoghela Aba , nosang'ana chichila Aba wangu chayanilaghitse . “ Mwinuke tukeni .

43019013	Pilato hayahulike apfi , kamghala Yesu kunze , kakala mne ichighoda cha mlamutsi hanu hamanyike ka “ Chibwalu che Ghamabwe . ” Kwa Chihebulaniya “ Gabatsa . ”

43019015	Lekeni Wayahudi wakemelela , “ Mkome ! Mkome ! Mumuwambe mna msalaba ! ” Pilato kawaghutsa , “ Mwombama nimuwambe imndewa wenu ? ” Iwatambika wakulu wamwidika , “ Twetwe twahela imndewa yungi ila imndewa wa Roma yaliheka ! ”
43019016	Kuya Pilato kamlapfa Yesu , kaweng'a wakamuwambe . Yesu kowambighwa mna msalaba ( Matei 27:32-44 ; Maliki 15:21-32 ; Luka 23:26-43 ) Kuya asikali wamsola Yesu .
43019017	Naye kalawa aku kaughala msalaba wake , kughenda hanu hakemighwe Bombwe lya Litwi . Kwa Chihebulaniya hokemighwa Goligota .
43019018	Baho wamuwamba Yesu mna msalaba , pfipfila tsawawawamba iwanu weli , yumwe ubali ungi na yungi ubali ungi , Yesu haghatighati .
43019019	Pilato kandika chitango kachika mna msalaba . Kandika , “ Yesu wa Natsareti , Imndewa wa Wayahudi . ”
43019020	Wayahudi wengi wachisoma chitango chino , kwaapfila hanu hayawambighwe Yesu kukala habehi na ghumji , na chitango chandikighwa kwa Chihebulaniya , Chilatini na Chigiriki .
43019021	Iwatambika wakulu wamlongela Pilato , “ Leka kwandika ‘ Imndewa wa Wayahudi , ’ ila imunu yuno tsakalonga yeye ka imndewa wa Wayahudi . ”
43019022	Pilato kawedika , “ Chanyandike , nyandika . ”
43019023	Asikali hawamuwambile Yesu , wasola ghamaghwanda ghake , waghaghola mabughulu mane , chila bughulu kwa asikali yumwe . Pfipfila wasola na lighwanda lyake ing'alisonighwe bae , ilifumighwe kwandusila mchanya mbaka hasi .
43019024	Asikali welongetsa , “ Tuleke kulidegha , leka tutowe simbi tulole yuhi yatsolipata . ” Ilawila pfino ili ghatimile Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka igholonga , “ Wegholela ghamaghwanda ghangu lighwanda lyangu walitowela simbi . ” Apfi pfipfo pfawatendile asikali awo .
43019025	Habehi na msalaba wa Yesu tsawema mai wake , lumbu wa mai wake na Mariya mwehe wa Kileopa , na Mariya Magidalena .
43019026	Yesu hawonile mai wake ne imwanang'ina wake iyamnoghele wema hala , kamlongela mai wake , “ Mai , ayuno iyo imwanagho . ”
43019027	Kuya Yesu kamlongela imwanang'ina wake , “ Ayuno ano iyo mai wako . ” Kulawa baho , imwanang'ina ayo kamsola Mariya , kakala naye ukaye yake .
43019028	Yesu tsakamanya ka ghose ghatimila , ili Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka ghatimile , Yesu kalonga , “ Nakwona ng'ilu . ”
43019029	Hanu hala tsahakala na siki , apfo wapfabika lidodoki mne siki , walika mne lubiki lwa msopo , wamwikila mumlomo .
43019030	Yesu hayafonzile siki ayo kalonga , “ Ghatimila . ” Kenamisa litwi lyake , kafa .
43019031	Tsalikala Litsuwa lya Kwiyandaa , na litsuwa liwinzile likala Litsuwa lya Sabato . Iwakulu we Wayahudi ng'awabamile bae ng'uli tsisighale mna misalaba mne Litsuwa lya Sabato . Kwaapfila Litsuwa lya Sabato tsalikala litsuwa kulu . Wayahudi wamlomba Pilato ghamaghulu ghe iwanu iwawambighwe ghabenighwe , kuya mitufi yawo ihulumsighwe .
43019032	Apfo asikali waghenda , waghabena ghamaghulu gha imunu wa mwanduso iyawambighwe na Yesu , kuya waghabena ghamaghulu gha ayula yungi .
43019033	Lekeni hawapfikile kwa Yesu wampfika ma kafa , ng'awabenile bae ghamaghulu ghake .
43019034	Asikali yumwe kamuhoma Yesu mlubapfu kwa mghowa , bahala ilawa idamu na ghamatsi .
43019035	Imunu iyonile ichilawile katulongela ukalangama tutoghole . Na acho chayalongile kalongesa , kuya yeye komanya ka kolongesa .
43019036	Ilawila pfino Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile , igholonga , “ Kuduhu mpate wake yautsobenighwa . ”
43019037	Kuya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga keli , “ Watsomlola imunu yula iwamuhomile . ”
43019038	Hambele , Yosefu imunu iyolawila ghumji ghwa Arimataya , kamlomba Pilato amwing'e lukuli lwa Yesu . Yosefu tsakakala imwanang'ina wa Yesu kwa chinyelenyele kwaapfila tsakawapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi . Pilato kamlongela Yosefu alusole lukuli lwa Yesu , apfo Yosefu kaghenda kalusola lukuli lwa Yesu .
43019039	Yosefu tsakelongotsa na Nikodemu , imunu yula iyaghendile kwa Yesu chilochilo aho mwanduso . Nikodemu tsakaghala pishi tano tse upfumba iunung'ila iutifighwe ne ubani .
43019040	Iwanu weli walusola lukuli lwa Yesu , walupfatsa sanda hamwe ne upfumba iunung'ila kwa ichihendo cha Wayahudi cha kutsika .
43019041	Hanu hayawambighwe Yesu tsakukala na mghunda we mibiki , mumghunda amwo tsakukala na mango lya kutsikila lya sambi , kuduhu imunu iyatsikighwe mmango amwo .
43019042	Kwaapfila likala Litsuwa lya Wayahudi kwitanda , na kwaapfila mango ikala habehi , walwika amwo lukuli lwa Yesu .
43020001	Nemitondotondo litsuwa lya mwanduso lya juma , kung'ali ne ichisi , Mariya Magidalena tsakaghenda mne imango , kona libwe lilapfighwa kulawa mne libani lya imango .
43020002	Katsuma kaghenda kwa Simoni Petiri ne imwanang'ina yungi , yula iyanoghelighwe na Yesu , kawalongela , “ Walusola lukuli lwa Imtwatsa mmango , ng'atumanyile bae wamwikile kwani ! ”
43020003	Kuya Petiri ne imwanang'ina yungi waghenda mmango .
43020004	Wose weli tsawatsuma , lekeni yula imwanang'ina yungi katsuma kubita Petiri , kalongola kupfika mmango .
43020005	Kenama kasungulila mghati , tsakona sanda , lekeni ng'engile bae mghati .
43020006	Kuya Simoni Petiri , iyakalile kuchughu kwake , kapfika kengila mmango . Kona isanda ,
43020007	na chighwanda ichohighwe mwitwi mwa Yesu , ng'achikalile bae hamwe ne isanda ila chipfingilisa na chikala chiliyeka .
43020008	Kuya imwanang'ina yula yungi iyandusile kupfika mmango , pfipfila kengila mghati , kona , katoghola .
43020009	Tsawang'ali ng'awoghamanya bae Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka ighalongile Yesu kobamighwa yatsilihuke .
43020010	Kuya iwanang'ina woya ukaye .
43020011	Mariya tsakema kunze mwa imango kolila . Hayang'ali yolila , kenama kasungulila mghati mwe imango ,
43020012	kawona malaika weli iwapfalile ghamaghwanda matselu , wakala hanu halukalile lukuli lwa Yesu , yumwe tsakakala halikalile litwi , yungi kakala haghakalile ghamaghulu .
43020013	Wamghutsa , “ Mai , angu choulila choni ? ” Mariya kawedika , “ Wamsola Imtwatsa wangu , na simanyile bae wamwikile kwani ! ”
43020014	Kuya Mariya kahunduka kamwona Yesu kema hala , lekeni ng'amanyile ka tsakakala Yesu .
43020015	Yesu kamghutsa , “ Mai , angu choulila choni ? Umbama nani ? ” Mariya kapfikitsa kolonga ne imbetetsi wa imghunda we imibiki , apfo kamlongela , “ Imtwatsa , ka kumsola , nongele umwikile kwani , ng'ende nikamsole . ”
43020016	Yesu kamlongela , “ Mariya ! ” Mariya kamuhundukila kamlongela kwa Chihebulaniya “ Raboni ! ” Mana yake Imlangulitsi .
43020017	Yesu kamlongela , “ Leka kunikinda , kwaapfila sina ng'ende bae kwa Aba . Ghenda ukawalongele ndughu tsangu nene nakuya kwa Aba wangu na Aba wenu pfipfila , Imulungu wangu na Imulungu wenu . ”
43020018	Mariya Magidalena kaghenda kawalongela iwanang'ina ka kamwona Imtwatsa , kawalongela achila Yesu chayamlongele .
43020019	Mihe ila mne litsuwa lya mwanduso lya juma , iwanang'ina hawetingane hamwe aku imibani ihindighwa kwa kuwapfuka iwakulu we Wayahudi , Yesu katsa , kema mghati mwawo , kawalongela , “ Mkale tseghamba . ”
43020020	Hayamalitse kulonga ghano , Yesu kawalangusa ghamoko ghake na lubapfu lwake . Iwanang'ina tsawadeng'elela hawamwonile Imtwatsa .
43020021	Yesu kawalongela keli , “ Mkale tseghamba . Ka Aba pfayanitumile nene , na nene nomtumani mwemwe . ”
43020022	Kuya kawahumulila , kawalongela , “ Bokeleni Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
43020023	Mng'awaleghusila nzambi iwanu , iwanu awo woleghusighwa nzambi , ka ng'amuwaleghusila nzambi , iwanu awo ng'awoleghusighwa nzambi bae . ”
43020024	Mwanang'ina yumwe mne iwanang'ina kumi na weli , Tomasi , iyakemighwe Basa , ng'awile baho hayatsile Yesu .
43020025	Apfo iwanang'ina wangi wamlongela , “ Tumwona Imtwatsa ! ” Lekeni Tomasi kawalongela , “ Ka sitsona bae ng'opfu tsa misumari mne ghamoko ghake na kwika chidole changu mne ng'opfu atso , na kwika ghumoko ghwangu mlubapfu mwake , sitoghola bae . ”
43020026	Haghabitile matsuwa manane iwanang'ina wetingana keli mng'anda , na Tomasi tsakakala nawo . Imibani tsaihindighwa , lekeni Yesu katsa , kema mghati mwawo , kawalongela , “ Mkale tseghamba . ”
43020027	Kuya Yesu kamlongela Tomasi , “ Wike chidole chako hano , ulole ghamoko ghangu , kuya gholosa ghumoko ghwako ughwike mlubapfu mwangu . Leka kulema kutoghola , utoghole ! ”
43020028	Tomasi kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa wangu na Imulungu wangu ! ”
43020029	Yesu kamlongela , “ Kwotoghola kwaapfila kumbona ? Wabweda awala iwotoghola bila kumbona ! ”
43020030	Yesu tsakatenda pfihulo pfingi hayakalile ne iwanang'ina wake , ila ng'apfandikighwe bae mne ichitabu chino .
43020031	Lekeni mbuli tsino tsandikighwa ili mghendelele kutoghola Yesu ka Kiristu Mkombotsi , Imwana we Imulungu na kwa kumtoghola muwe ne ughima kwa ngupfu ya taghwa lyake .
43021001	Hambele Yesu kawalawila keli iwanang'ina wake mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu Tiberiya . Tsakawalawila pfino ,
43021002	Simoni Petiri , Tomasi iyakemighwe Basa , Nasanaeli iyalawile Kana ghumji ghwa Galilaya , iwana wa Sebedayo , ne iwanang'ina wangi weli wa Yesu wose tsawakala hamwe .
43021003	Simoni Petiri kawalongela , “ Noghenda kulowa iwasomba . ” Wamlongela , “ Twoghenda naghwe . ” Apfo wengila mumnumbwi , lekeni chilo chila chose ng'awapatile chinu bae .
43021004	Nemitondotondo , Yesu tsakema mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu , lekeni iwanang'ina ng'awamtangile bae ka tsa Yesu .
43021005	Kuya Yesu kawaghutsa , “ Sale tsangu , ng'ampatile chinu bae ? ” Wamwidika , “ Ona , ng'atupatile chinu . ”
43021006	Kuya Yesu kawalongela , “ Mwase ichelo lubali lwa kumoso lwe imnumbwi , mtsolowa iwasomba . ” Apfo wasa ichelo mmatsi na ng'awadahile bae kukwegha kwaapfila tsawapata iwasomba wengi ng'ani .
43021007	Kuya imwanang'ina yumwe , iyanoghelighwe na Yesu kamlongela Petiri , “ Ayuno ka Imtwatsa . ” Bahala Simoni Petiri ayahulike yula tsakakala Imtwatsa , keyoha lighwanda lyake kwaapfila tsakalitsula . Kuya kadalukila mmatsi .
43021008	Iwanang'ina wangi watsa mne mnumbwi , kwaapfila ng'awakalile hatali ne isi , ila tsawakala utali wa ghamaghulu miya imwe , tsawakwegha ichelo ichimemile iwasomba .
43021009	Hawapfikile mmbalimbali mwa tsimbu , wona ghumoto na iwasomba wekighwa mchanya mwake , na chighate .
43021010	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mngaye iwasomba wangi wamlowile . ”
43021011	Kuya Simoni Petiri kadina mne mnumbwi , kakwegha ichelo mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu , ichimemile iwasomba wakulu miya imwe na hamsini na tatu . Hata ka tsakukala ne iwasomba wengi , ichelo ng'achidegheke bae .
43021012	Yesu kawalongela , “ Mtse mje . ” Kuduhu imwanang'ina iyaghetsile kumghutsa , “ Ghweghwe uli nani ? ” Kwaapfila wammanya tsakakala Imtwatsa .
43021013	Yesu katsa , kasola pfighate ne iwasomba wala , kaweng'a .
43021014	Aluno lukala lwakadatu Yesu kuwalawila iwanang'ina wake kulawa hayatsilihuke .
43021015	Hawamalitse ukuja , Yesu kamghutsa Simoni Petiri , “ Simoni imwana wa Yohane , apfi kwoninoghela kubita wano ? ” Simoni Petiri kamwidika , “ Ona , Imtwatsa ghweghwe kwomanya ka nene nokunoghela . ” Yesu kamlongela , “ Wadime iwanang'olo wangu . ”
43021016	Kuya Yesu kamghutsa lwa keli , “ Simoni imwana wa Yohane , apfi kwoninoghela . ” Petiri kamwidika , “ Ona , Imtwatsa ghweghwe kwomanya ka nene nokunoghela . ” Yesu kamlongela , “ Wadime iwang'olo wangu . ”
43021017	Yesu kamghutsa keli lwa kadatu , “ Simoni mwana wa Yohane , kwoninoghela ? ” Simoni Petiri kona usungu kwaapfila Yesu kamghutsa lwa kadatu , “ Apfi kwonoghela ? ” Kamwidika , “ Imtwatsa , kwomanya pfinu pfose , kwomanya ka nokunoghela . ” Yesu kamlongela , “ Wadime iwang'olo wangu .
43021018	Nokulongela ghendo , haung'ali msongolo , tsakutsowela kupfala msipi imwenyegho na kughenda hanu haubamile , lekeni hautsolala kutsogholosa ghamoko ghako , imunu yungi katsokwoha na kukughala hanu ng'aubamile bae kughenda . ”
43021019	Yesu kalonga pfino , kulangusa Petiri pfayatsokufa na kumtunitsa Imulungu . Kuya Yesu kamlongela , “ Niwinze ! ”
43021020	Petiri kahunduka , kamwona imwanang'ina yula iyanoghelighwe na Yesu kowawinza . Imwanang'ina yuno tsakakala yula iyakalile na Yesu mne ichijo cha Ipasaka na iyamghutsile , “ Mtwatsa , yuhi iyatsokuhunduka ? ”
43021021	Petiri hamwonile , kamghutsa Yesu , “ Imtwatsa , ayuno naye ? ”
43021022	Yesu kamwidika , “ Ka nombama akale mghima mbaka hanikuya , ghweghwe ubama choni ? Ghwe niwinze ! ”
43021023	Apfo mbuli tsenela kwa wandughu kuwa imwanang'ina yula ng'atsakufa bae . Lekeni Yesu ng'alongile ka imwanang'ina yuno ng'atsakufa . Bali kalonga , “ Ka nombama akale mghima mbaka hanikuya , ghweghwe ubama choni ? ”
43021024	Ayuno iyo imwanang'ina iyalongile agha ghose na kughandika , na twetwe twomanya ghano ghayalongile gholongesa .
43021025	Yesu tsakatenda pfinu pfingi . Pfinu pfose pfing'andikighwe chimwechimwe , isi yose ing'akalile yahela hanu he ukwika ipfitabu ipfandikighwe .
44001001	Kuna imkulu Teofili , Mne ichitabu changu chanongole ukwandika , tsanyandika ipfinu pfose Yesu pfatendile na pfayalangulitse , kulawa handuse isang'ano yake
44001002	mbaka litsuwa lila hayasolighwe kughenda kulanga . Ichipindi ng'ana yasolighwe , tsakaweng'a malaghitso kwa uwetso wa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iwatumighwa wala iyawasaghule .
44001003	Matsuwa alubaini kulawa hafile , Yesu kawalawila mala nyingi na kwilangusa ghendo ka tsakakala mghima . Wamwona , naye kalonga nawo mbuli tse Undewa we Imulungu .
44001004	Na litsuwa limwe , hayang'ali yakuja nawo kawalaghitsa pfino , “ Mleke kulawa Yerusalemu , ila mwemwe mbete achila chayalongile Aba , iyo Ghumuhe yamnihulike nomlonga .
44001005	Yohane tsakabatitsa kwa ghamatsi , lekeni matsuwa chidogho ighakutsa , mtsobatitsighwa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka . ”
44001006	Iwatumighwa hawetingane na Yesu , wamghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , pfii matsuwa ghano kutsowoyitsila Waisiraeli Undewa ? ”
44001007	Yesu kawalongela , “ Matsuwa na msimu pfamne uwetso wa Aba wangu , mwemwe ng'ambamighwa bae kumanya itsakuwa tsuwachi .
44001008	Lekeni Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka hatsowahulumkila , mtsobokela ingupfu , namwe mtsakuwa iwakalangama wangu ako Yerusalemu , mne tsiisi tsa Yudeya na Samariya , na muisi mwose . ”
44001009	Hayamalitse kulonga apfo kasolighwa kulanga , aku wose womlola , kuya liwingu limghubika nawo ng'awamwonile keli bae .
44001010	Hawang'ali wotsodola tsinenge kulanga Yesu hang'ali yakuka , bahala iwanu weli iwapfalile maghwanda matselu wema habehi yawo ,
44001011	walonga , “ Mwemwe iwanu wa Galilaya ! Ebali mwima hano mwolola kulanga ? Yesu yuyuno , iyasolighwe kuna mwemwe kughenda kulanga , katsakuya keli ka pfipfo pfammwonile kakuka kulanga . ”
44001012	Kuya iwatumighwa woya Yerusalemu kulawa mne Chidunda cha Mitseituni , utali wa chilomita ka imwe kulawa mkaye .
44001013	Hawapfikile mkaye , wengila mne chiheleto cha kuchanya chawang'ali wokalagha . Nawo tsawakala Petiri , Yohane , Yakobu , Andereya , Filipi , Tomasi , Batalomeyo , Matei , Jakobu imwana we Alifayo , Simoni Mkanani na Yuda mwanaghe Jakobu .
44001014	Awo wose tsawaghendelela kwitingana hamwe ukulomba , hamwe ne iwapinga wangi , na Mariya mai wake Yesu , na ndughu tsake Yesu .

44001016	Petiri kalonga , “ Ndughu tsangu , tsaibamighwa Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimile . Ghumwande Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka tsakalonga kubitila Daudi , Daudi tsakatabili mbuli tsa Yuda , iyawalongotse iwanu wala iwamghoghile Yesu .
44001017	Yuda tsakakala miyetu kwaapfila tsakasaghulighwa na Yesu tusang'ane naye . ”
44001018	Yeye tsakaghula mghunda kwa sendi tsapatile kwa sang'ano yake ila ihile , kaghwa hamo , katulika na usapi wake wose ulawa kunze .
44001019	Iwanu wose wa Yerusalemu tsawahulika mbuli atso , apfo mne chilugha chawo waghukema mghunda aghwo Akelidama , mana yake “ Mghunda ghwe Idamu . ”
44001020	Petiri kalonga , “ Kwaapfila yandikighwa mne Tsaburi , ‘ Ing'anda yake ikale uchuwa , imunu wowose aleke kukala mng'anda amwo . ’ Pfipfila yandikighwa , ‘ Imunu yungi yeng'ighwe isang'ano yake ya kulongotsa . ’
44001021	“ Apfo yobamighwa kumsaghula imunu yumwe kulawa mne iwanu iwelongotse na twetwe matsuwa ghose Imtwatsa Yesu hayang'ali na twetwe ,
44001022	kulawa Yohane hayang'ali yobatitsa mbaka litsuwa lila Yesu hayasolighwe kulawa kuna twetwe kughenda kulanga . Imunu ayo kobamighwa yawe mkalangama miyetu wa kutsilihuka kwa Yesu . ”
44001023	Apfo wasaghula mataghwa meli , Yosefu iyakemighwe Barisaba , pfipfila tsakakemighwa Yusti , na wa keli Matiasi .
44001024	Kuya walomba , “ Imtwatsa , ghweghwe kwoimanya imimoyo ye iwanu wose . Lelo utulanguse , imunu yuhi yumsaghule mne iwanu wano weli
44001025	ili asole isang'ano ye utumighwa yailekile Yuda na kughenda hanu hake imwenyegho . ”
44001026	Kuya watowa simbi , na simbi imghwila Matiasi , naye kongetsighwa mne iwatumighwa wala kumi na yumwe .
44002001	Litsuwa lya Pentekoste halipfikile , wose iwamtoghole Yesu tsawetingana hanu hamwe .
44002002	Bahala , iwanu wahulika chinu choduma kulawa kulanga ka beho liduma kwe ingupfu , limemesa ing'anda yose iwakalile iwanu awo .
44002003	Kuya , pfilawila ipfinu ipfikoneka ka milambi ya ghumoto , napfo pfipwililika na kukala mchanya mwa chila imunu .
44002004	Wose tsawamemesighwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , wandusa kulonga lugha tsingi ka Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka pfayawatendile wadahe kulonga .
44002005	Ako Yerusalemu tsakukala na Wayahudi iwompfuka Imulungu iwalawile chila isi .
44002006	Hawahulike litsi alyo , iwanu wetingana hamwe . Wose wakangawala kwaapfila chila imunu kawahulika wolonga kwa chilugha chake imwenyegho .
44002007	Wakangawala ng'ani , walonga , “ Pfii , iwanu wano wose watuwahulika wolonga pfino , si Wagalilaya bae ?
44002008	Ebali lelo , chila imunu mna twetwe kowahulika wolonga chokaye ?
44002009	Wamwenga twolawila Paritiya , Midiya na Elamu , wamwenga wolawila Mesopotamiya , Yudeya , Kapadokiya , Ponto na isi ya Asiya ,
44002010	Na wamwenga wolawa Firigiya , Pamfiliya , Misiri na kaye tsa Libiya tsili habehi na Kirene , wamwenga wetu wolawila Roma ,
44002011	na Wayahudi ne iwanu iwengile mne dini ya Chiyahudi , wamwenga wolawila Kirete ne Arabiya . Twetwe wose twowahulika wolonga ipfinu pfikulu pfayatendile Imulungu kwa lugha tsetu iwenyegho . ”
44002012	Wose wakangawala , wapfuka , weghutsa , “ Achi nacho choni ? ”
44002013	Lekeni iwanu wangi wawabetsa , walonga , “ Iwanu wano wapatika ! ”
44002014	Kuya Petiri kema nawo iwatumighwa wala kumi na yumwe , kandusa kuwalongela iwanu awo kwa kukemelela , “ Wayahudi weyangu , na mwemwe mwose yamkala hano Yerusalemu , mleke niwalongele , namwe mtegheletse ghoya chanilonga .
44002015	Iwanu wano ng'awapatike bae ka pfamlonga . Sambi saa tatu nemitondo !
44002016	Achino ichilawile chicho chayalongile Yoeli , nabii we Imulungu ,
44002017	‘ Imulungu kolonga , mne matsuwa gha utsighilo nitsowamwaghila iwanu wose Ghumuhe ghwangu . Iwana wenu na neghe tsenu watsopeta mbuli yangu , iwasongolo wenu watsakona ghamaono , ne iwabala wenu watsolota tsindoto .
44002018	Hata iwatumwa wangu pfipfila , wose iwamale ne iwapinga nitsowamwaghila Ghumuhe ghwangu mne matsuwa agho , nawo watsopeta mbuli yangu .
44002019	Nitsotenda pfihulo uchanya kulanga , ne ipfinu pfa ukukangawatsa muisi , kutsakuwa na idamu , ghumoto na hosi tito .
44002020	Litsua litsoghaluka kuwa chisi , na lwetsi lutsakuwa ludung'u ka idamu , aho ng'ana lipfike litsuwa lila likulu lye utunitso we Imtwatsa .
44002021	Ne imunu wowose iyatsolomba kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa katsokombolighwa . ’
44002022	“ Iwanu we Isiraeli , mtegheletse imbuli ino ! Yesu wa Natsareti tsakakala imunu yane uwetso iyalangusighwe kuna mwemwe kwe pfihulo , pfinu pfa kukangawatsa ne ipfitango pfatendile Imulungu kuna mwemwe kubitila yeye , ka mwemwe iwenyegho pfammanya .
44002023	Kulawa mwanduso Imulungu imwenyegho tsakabama Yesu aghoghighwe na mwemwe , namwe mumkoma kwa kuwaleka iwanu wehile wamuwambe mna msalaba .
44002024	Lekeni Imulungu kamtsiliula Yesu , kamkombola kulawa mne usungu we lifwa kwaapfila ng'aidahike bae lifwa limwohe .
44002025	Mana Daudi tsakalonga pfino mbuli tsa Yesu , ‘ Tsanimwona Imtwatsa hambele hangu matsuwa ghose Kwaapfila yeye ka habehi hangu Sitsohighisika bae .
44002026	Apfo , ghumoyo ghwangu ghwodeng'elela , lulimi lwangu lolonga kwa kudeng'elela , na lukuli lwangu lutsokala kwa lolelo ,
44002027	kwaapfila ng'utsondeka kutsimu bae , ng'utsomleka bae Mwenzeluka wako yole mne likabuli .
44002028	Kunilangusa inzila ye ughima , kutsonimemesa ndeng'elo kwaapfila kwa hamwe na nene . ’
44002029	“ Wandughu , ndekeni nonge mwatsimwatsi mbuli tsa aba wetu mkulu Daudi . Yeye kafa , katsikighwa na likabuli lyake lyabahano mbaka leloli .
44002030	Lekeni kwaapfila Daudi tsakakala nabii we Imulungu , kamanya ka Imulungu kelaha kuna yeye ka ang'amtendile mtsukulu wake yumwe yawe imndewa ka pfayakalile Daudi .
44002031	Daudi tsakalongola kughona agho ighatsotendighwa ne Imulungu , apfo kalonga mbuli tse ukutsilihuka kwa Kiristu Mkombotsi , hala hayalongile , ‘ Ng'alekighwe kutsimu bae , wala lukuli lwake ng'alolile bae . ’
44002032	“ Imulungu iyo yamtsilihule ayo Yesu , na twetwe twa iwakalangama we chinu acho .
44002033	Naye Yesu henulighwe na kwikighwa lubali lwa kujilo lwe Imulungu , kabokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kulawa kwa Aba wake ka pfayatulongele . Kuya katughalila Ghumuhe ayo , na acho chicho chamchona sambi na kuchihulika .
44002034	Kwaapfila si Daudi bae iyasolighwe kughenda kulanga , ila yeye kalonga , ‘ Imtwatsa kamlongela Imtwatsa wangu , ukale hano hane ubali wangu wa kujilo
44002035	mbaka niwatende wehile wako wawe hasi ha ghamaghulu ghako . ’
44002036	“ Apfo iwanu wose wa Isiraeli wobamighwa wamanye ghendo , Imulungu kamtenda ayu Yesu imumuwambile mna msalaba yawe Imtwatsa na Kiristu Mkombotsi . ”
44002037	Iwanu hawahulike agho , ghawahoma ghendo mmoyo , wawaghutsa Petiri na iwatumighwa wangi , “ Ndughu tsetu , lelo tutendatse ? ”
44002038	Petiri kawedika , “ Chila imunu yatsileke nzambi tsake , mbatitsighwe kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu , na Imulungu katsomleghusilani nzambi tsenu . Namwe mtsobokela laghano lye Imulungu , iyo Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
44002039	Kwaapfila laghano lila tsamwikilighwa mwemwe , na iwana wenu , na iwanu wose iwali kutali na awala wose iwatsokemighwa ne Imtwatsa Imulungu wetu . ”
44002040	Kwa mbuli nyingi Petiri kawakomangitsa iwanu , kalonga , “ Mwikombole kulawa mweleko ghuno ghuhile . ”
44002041	Iwanu wengi watsitoghola mbuli tsake , wabatitsighwa . Mne litsuwa lila , iwanu ka 3,000 wongetseka .
44002042	Awo wose waghendelela kulangulitsighwa ne iwatumighwa wa Yesu , wakala hamwe ka iwandughu , wamegha ichighate na walomba hamwe .
44002043	Iwatumighwa tsawatenda pfihulo na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa pfingi , chila imunu ang'ali yopfuka .
44002044	Iwatoghole wose waghendelela kukala hamwe na kwigholela ipfinu pfawo .
44002045	Tsawang'ali wohutsa mali tsawo ne ipfinu pfawo na kwigholela sendi ka chila imunu pfayabamile .
44002046	Waghendelela kwitingana mne ing'anda ye Imulungu chila litsuwa . Lekeni hawang'ali womegha chighate , tsawetingana mne tsing'anda tsawo na ukuja ichijo acho kwa ndeng'elo na ghumoyo mtselu .
44002047	Tsawamtunitsa Imulungu ne iwanu wose wanoghelesighwa nawo . Na chila litsuwa Imtwatsa yang'ali yowongetsela iwanu iwang'ali wokombolighwa .
44003001	Litsuwa limwe , Petiri na Yohane wang'ali woghenda mne ing'anda ye Imulungu saa tisa nemisi , iwanu hawoghendagha kulomba .
44003002	Iwanu tsawang'ali womghalagha imunu yumwe iyakalile chimbete kulawa kwelekighwa kwake . Chila litsuwa iwanu wang'ali womwika imunu ayo mne libani lye ing'anda ye Imulungu ilikemighwe “ Libani linoghile ” ili yalombe chochose kwe iwanu iwang'ali wakwingila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu .
44003003	Hayawonile Petiri na Yohane wakwingila mng'anda , kawalomba wamwing'e chochose .
44003004	Nawo wamtsodolela tsinenge . Kuya Petiri kamlongela , “ Tulolese ! ”
44003005	Naye kawalola , kalolela kupata ichinu chochose kulawa kuna wawo .
44003006	Lekeni Petiri kamlongela , “ Nahela sendi , ila nokwing'a achila chanili nacho , kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu wa Natsareti , winuke ughende ! ”
44003007	Kuya kamkinda ghumoko ghwake ghwa kujilo , kamwapfila ukwinuka , bahala ghamaghulu , na mbweghele tse imunu ayo tsiwa na ngupfu .
44003008	Kadaluka kwa ghamaghulu ghake na kwandusa ukughenda . Kuya kengila nawo mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , koghenda kodaluka daluka aku komtunya Imulungu .
44003009	Iwanu wose hawamwonile koghenda na komtunya Imulungu ,
44003010	wamtanga yeye kayuyula iyang'ali yolomba habehi na “ Libani linoghile ” lye Ing'anda ye Imulungu , weduka , wakangawala kwa achila ichimlawile .
44003011	Imunu ayo hang'ali yoghenda na Petiri na Yohane , iwanu wose wang'ali wokangawala na wandusa kutsumila hanu ha kwitinganila hakemighwe “ Ukumbi wa Selemani . ”
44003012	Petiri honile apfi , kawalongela , “ Iwanu wa Isiraeli , ebali mwokangawala kwe ichinu chino ? Mbona mwotutsodolela tsinenge ka twetwe itumtendile imunu yuno yadahe kughenda kwa ngupfu tsetu iwenyegho au kwaapfila tunogha hambele he Imulungu ?
44003013	Imulungu wa Abrahamu , Isaka na Yakobu , Imulungu we iwabala wetu , tsakamtunya Yesu imtumighwa wake , ila mwemwe mumghogha ili yakomighwe , namwe mumlema hambele ha Pilato , lekeni Pilato tsakabama yamlekelele yoke .
44003014	Tsakakala Mwenzeluka na imunu yanoghile , lekeni mwemwe mumlema , mumlomba Pilato yamlekelele imunu iyakomile .
44003015	Mwemwe mumkoma yeye yali mwanduso wa ughima , lekeni Imulungu kamtsilihula kulawa mne lifwa , na twetwe twa wakalangama we ichinu acho .
44003016	Kwa kutoghola taghwa lya Yesu , imunu ayu immwona na imummanya keng'ighwa ingupfu . Ukutoghola na taghwa lya Yesu pfimhonetsa ghendo imunu ayu ka wose pfammwona .
44003017	“ Lelo ndughu tsangu , nomanya ka mwemwe ne iwakulu wenu mghatenda agho kwaapfila ng'ammanyile bae .
44003018	Lekeni Imulungu katimitsa achila chayalongile ghumwande kubitila manabii wose we Imulungu , ka ibamighwa Kiristu wake yadununzike .
44003019	Lelo mtsileke nzambi tsenu mmuyile Imulungu , ili yawaleghusile nzambi tsenu . Mng'atenda apfo ,
44003020	mtsakongetsighwa ngupfu tsa muhe kulawa kwe Imtwatsa , naye katsomtuma Yesu Kiristu , iyamsaghulileni .
44003021	Kobamighwa akale kulanga mbaka ichipindi che Imulungu kutenda ipfinu pfose pfiwe pfa sambi chipfike , ka pfayalongile ghumwande kubitila manabii wake wahenzeluka .
44003022	Kwaapfila Musa tsakalonga , ‘ Imtwatsa Imulungu wenu katsomghalileni nabii wake ka pfanighalile nene , ayo katsolawila mghati mwenu mwenyegho , mwobamighwa muhulikitse chila ichinu chayowalongela .
44003023	Imunu wowose iyolema kumuhulikitsa nabii ayo , katsobaghulighwa kulawa kwe iwanu we Imulungu na katsokomighwa . ’
44003024	Wanabii wose we Imulungu , kwanzila Samweli na awala iwatsile hambele , tsawalonga mbuli tse ipfinu ipfilawila mne matsuwa ghano .
44003025	Imulungu tsakawalapfila mwemwe laghano kubitila wanabii we Imulungu , namwe mwamghati mwa laghano lila lyatendile Imulungu ne iwabala wenu , ka pfayamlongele Abrahamu , ‘ Kubitila mweleko ghwako , nitsowabaliki iwanu wose muisi mwose . ’
44003026	Imulungu hayamtsilihule imtumighwa wake , tanu kamtumilani mwemwe , yawabaliki na yamtende chila yumwe wenu aleke kutenda ghehile . ”
44004001	Petiri na Yohane hawang'ali wowalongela iwanu , iwatambika wakulu ne iwakulu wa wakalitsa Ing'anda ye Imulungu hamwe na Masadukayo tsawapfika .
44004002	Tsawona maya ng'ani kwaapfila iwatumighwa awo wang'ali wolangulitsa iwanu ka Yesu katsilihuka , ichinu ichikonesa ghendo ka iwanu iwafile watsotsilihuka .
44004003	Apfo wawaghogha Petiri na Yohane , waweka mwigheletsa mbaka ilupfi yake , kwaapfila tsaikala nemihe .
44004004	Lekeni iwanu wengi iwahulike imbuli yawailongile Petiri na Yohane watoghola , na iwanu iwatoghole tsawongetseka na kuwa ka iwanu elufu tano .
44004005	Litsuwa liwinzile , iwakulu wa Wayahudi , iwabala ne iwolangulitsa Ghamalaghitso wetingana hamwe ako Yerusalemu .
44004006	Tsawetingana ne Imtambika mkulu Anasi , Kayafa , Yohane , Alekisanda na iwanu wangi wa lukolo lwa Imtambika mkulu .
44004007	Tsawaweka hambele hawo , wawaghutsa , “ Mwemwe mtenda ichinu chino kwa ingupfu yachi na kwa taghwa lya nani ? ”
44004008	Kuya Petiri , aku kamema Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , kawedika , “ Mwemwe iwakulu ne iwabala we iwanu !
44004009	Mng'atughutsa leloli kwa chinu chila chinoghile chayatendelighwe imunu yula chimbete , na pfahonile ,
44004010	iwanu wose wa Isiraeli mwobamighwa mmanye ka imunu ayu iyemile hano hambele henu , kamghima ghendo kwe ingupfu ya taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu wa Natsareti , yula imumuwambile mna msalaba na Imulungu iyamtsilihule kulawa mne lifwa .
44004011	Yesu iyo ‘ Libwe lyamlemile mwemwe iwatsenga ng'anda , sambi liwa libwe kulu lya ukwalambatsa . ’
44004012	Yeye yaliyeka iyodaha kuwakombola iwanu , kwaapfila mne isi yose kuduhu taghwa lyatwing'ighwe twetwe tukombolighwe nalyo . ”
44004013	Iwabala awo wa libalatsa tsawamanya ka Petiri na Yohane tsawakala iwanu mbughilambughila ing'awasomile bae , apfo wakangawala kuwona pfawalongile pfinoghile , wamanya kuwa wahamwe na Yesu .
44004014	Lekeni kwaapfila wamwona imunu yahonetsighwe kema hamwe na Petiri na Yohane , ng'awadahile bae kulonga ichinu chochose .
44004015	Apfo wawalaghitsa walawe kunze kwe libalatsa , kuya wandusa kwilongetsa iwenyegho .
44004016	Weghutsa , “ Tuwatende choni iwanu wano ? Chila imunu iyokala Yerusalemu komanya kuwa watenda chihulo chikulu , na twetwe ng'atudaha bae kubela .
44004017	Lekeni ili imbuli ino ileke kwenela ng'ani kwe iwanu , tuwakanye waleke kulonga keli ne imunu wowose kwa taghwa lya Yesu . ”
44004018	Kuya wawakema keli mng'anda , wawalaghitsa waleke kulonga keli na kulangulitsa kwa taghwa lya Yesu .
44004019	Lekeni Petiri na Yohane wawedika , “ Mlamle mwemwe muwenyegho , chihi ichinoghile kwe Imulungu , kuwahulikitsa mwemwe au kumuhulikitsa Imulungu .
44004020	Kwaapfila ng'atudaha bae kuleka kulonga aghala ghatwonile na ghatuhulike . ”
44004021	Kuya iwabala awo wa libaratsa wawakanya ghendo na kuwalekelela . Ng'awadahile bae kuweng'a atsabu kwaapfila iwanu wose wakala womtunitsa Imulungu kwa achila ichilawile .
44004022	Imunu ayo iyahonetsighwe tsakakala imbala wa kubita miyaka alubaini .
44004023	Bahala Petiri na Yohane hawalekilighwe , woya kwa weyawo , wawalongela achila chawalongelighwe ne iwatambika wakulu ne iwabala .
44004024	Nawo hawahulike imbuli ayo wamlomba Imulungu kwa ghumoyo ghumwe . “ Imtwatsa , ghweghwe kwa Maumba yulumbile kulanga na iisi , ne ibahali na pfose ipfili mumo !
44004025	Tsakulonga kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kubitila kwa imtumighwa wako , aba wetu Daudi , ‘ Ebali wanu wali muisi waghudubuka ? Mbona iwanu wokwalangula ipfinu ipfilihela mana ?
44004026	Iwandewa we iisi weyandaa , ne iwatawala watingana hamwe , kumpinga Imtwatsa na Kiristu wake . ’
44004027	Kwaapfila Herodi , Pontiyo Pilato , iwanu we Isiraeli ne iwanu iwali si Wayahudi watingana mne ghumji ghuno kumpinga Yesu , Imtumighwa wako Mwenzeluka , yumsaghule yawe Kiristu .
44004028	Tsawatingana watenda aghala ghubamile kulawa ghumwande kwa uwetso wako ghalawile .
44004029	Lelo ghwe Imtwatsa , ulole pfawatutenda tupfuke , utwapfile twetwe iwatumwa wako tudahe kulonga imbuli yako bila kupfuka .
44004030	Gholosa ghumoko ghwako kuhonetsa iwanu , utende ipfitango na pfihulo kwa taghwa lya Yesu Imtumighwa wako Mwenzeluka . ”
44004031	Hawamalitse kulomba , hanu hala hawatinganile tsahahighisighwa . Wose wamemesighwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , na waghendelela kulonga imbuli ye Imulungu bila kupfuka .
44004032	Iwanu wose iwatoghole tsawakala na ghumoyo ghumwe na tsawalangula chinu chimwe . Kuduhu imunu wowose iyalongile ka ichinu iyalinacho chake aliyeka , ila wegholela ipfinu pfose pfawakalile napfo .
44004033	Iwatumighwa waghendelela kulonga kwa ngupfu Imbuli ya ukutsilihuka kwa Yesu , na Imulungu kawabaliki ghendo .
44004034	Tsahaduhu imunu wowose iyakalile kahela ichinu . Iwanu iwakalile ne imighunda au tsing'anda tsawang'ali wohutsa , na waghala sendi
44004035	kwe iwatumighwa , nawo tsawatsighola kwa chila imunu ka pfayabamile .
44004036	Tsakukala na Mlawi yumwe iyolawila Kupulo , iyakemighwe Yosefu . Iwatumighwa tsawamwing'a taghwa Balinaba , mana yake “ Mghuma ghumoyo iwanu ”
44004037	Ayu tsakakala na mghunda , kauhutsa , kasola sendi atso katsighala kwe iwatumighwa .
44005001	Tsakukala ne imunu yumwe iyakemighwe Ananiya na mwehe wake Safila . Nawo pfipfila tsawahutsa mghunda ghwawo .
44005002	Lekeni Ananiya kabaghula sendi tsingi katsifisa , aku mwehe wake kapfimanya . Sendi itsisighale katsighala kwe iwatumighwa .
44005003	Petiri kamghutsa , “ Ananiya , ebali kumleka Setani yengile mmoyo mwako , na kukutenda umghutsukile Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , kwa kupfisa sendi tsingi tsupatile kwa kuhutsa mghunda ?
44005004	Pfii mghunda ng'aghukalile ghwako bae hala ng'ana ghuhutsighwe ? Na hauutsile sendi atso ambe tsikala tsako , utsitendele chochose choubama . Ebali lelo kulamla kutenda ichinu chino ? Ng'umghutsukile imunu bae , ila kumghutsukila Imulungu ! ”
44005005	Bahala Ananiya hayahulike apfo , kaghwa hasi , kafa . Iwanu wose iwahulike imbuli ayo wapfuka ng'ani .
44005006	Kuya iwasongolo watsa , walupfatsa sanda lukuli lwake , wamlapfa kunze , wamtsika .
44005007	Masaa madatu haghabitile , mwehe wake naye kengila , ng'amanyile bae aghala ighalawile .
44005008	Petiri kamghutsa , “ Unongele , atsino tsitso sendi tsose tsampatile ghweghwe na mmale wako kwa kuhutsa mghunda ghwenu ? ” Naye kedika , “ Ona , tsitso . ”
44005009	Petiri kamlongela , “ Ebali ghweghwe na mmale wako mlamula kumghetsa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ghwe Imtwatsa ? Tegheletsa , iwanu iwamtsikile mmale wako , sambi wa hane libani , nawo pfipfila watsokusola ghweghwe ! ”
44005010	Bahala ipinga ayo kaghwa mmaghulu mwa Petiri , kafa . Kuya iwasongolo wala wengila , wampfika ma kafa . Apfo wamlapfa naye kunze , wamtsika habehi na mmale wake .
44005011	Iwanu wose iwamtoghole Yesu ne iwanu wangi iwahulike mbuli atso wapfuka ng'ani .
44005012	Iwatumighwa tsawatenda pfihulo na pfinu pfingi pfa kukangawatsa mghati mwe iwanu . Na iwanu wose iwatoghole wang'ali wotingana hamwe mne chitala cha mtingano cha Selemani .
44005013	Kuduhu imunu wowose ing'ayamtoghole Yesu iyaghetsile kwilunga nawo . Hata apfo , iwanu wangi tsawang'ali wowatunya .
44005014	Iwanu iwamtoghole Imtwatsa wang'ali wakongetseka ng'ani , iwamale ne iwapinga .
44005015	Mbaka iwanu wang'ali wowaghala iwatamu mne tsinzila na kuwawasisa mlutsatsi na mne ghamatemvu ili Petiri ang'abita sisila lyake liwabitile wangi wawo .
44005016	Iwanu wengi , iwalawile mne miwambo ya habehi na Yerusalemu watsa , wawaghala iwatamu na iwanu wane ipfinyamkela , nawo wose wahonetsighwa .
44005017	Kuya Imtambika mkulu na weyaghe , iwanu we chikingili cha Masadukayo wa hanu hala , wawonela chepfu iwatumighwa .
44005018	Wawaghogha Iwatumighwa , wawoha mwigheletsa .
44005019	Lekeni nechilo malaika we Imtwatsa kapfughula imibani ya ligheletsa , kawalapfa kunze , kawalongela ,
44005020	“ Mghende , mkeme mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , muwalongele iwanu imbuli yose ye ughima uno wa sambi . ”
44005021	Iwatumighwa wahulikitsa , kuya nemitondotondo wengila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , wandusa kulangulitsa . Imtambika mkulu na weyaghe hawapfikile , wawakema hamwe iwanu we libaratsa kulu lye iwabala we Isiraeli , kuya wawatuma iwanu mchifungo wawaghalile iwatumighwa wala .
44005022	lekeni iwanu wala hawapfikile ako , ng'awawapfikile bae iwatumighwa wa Yesu mwigheletsa . Apfo woya mne libaratsa na kuwalongela imbuli ayo ,
44005023	walonga , “ Tupfika ligheletsa lihindighwa pfipfila , na iwakalitsi wokalitsa imibani . Lekeni hatufughule imibani , ng'atumpfikile imunu wowose mng'anda . ”
44005024	Imkulu we iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu ne iwatambika wakulu hawahulike imbuli ayo , wakangawala ichinu chachi ichiwapatile iwatumighwa wa Yesu .
44005025	Kuya imunu yumwe katsa , kawalongela , “ Iwanu wala yamuwekile mwigheletsa , sambi wamne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , wowalangulitsa iwanu ! ”
44005026	Baho imbala we iwokalitsa ing'anda ye Imulungu hamwe ne iwanu wake waghenda mne ing'anda ye Imulungu , wawasola na kuwaghala mne libaratsa . Lekeni ng'awawaghoghile bae kwe ingupfu , kwaapfila wawapfuka iwanu wang'awatowile na ghamabwe .
44005027	Kuya wawaghala iwatumighwa wa Yesu na kuwemisa hambele ha libaratsa . Imtambika mkulu kawaghutsa ,
44005028	“ Ambe tuwaghoma mwemwe ukulangulitsa kwa taghwa lye imunu ayu , lelo mlole achi chamtendile ! Mghenetsa ghamalangulitso ghenu Yerusalemu yose na mwobama kulonga twetwe iwo itumtendile yafe ! ”
44005029	Petiri na iwatumighwa wala wangi wedika , “ Twobamighwa tumhulikitse Imulungu , si iwanu bae !
44005030	Imulungu we iwabala wetu kamtsilihula Yesu , imumkomile kwa kumuwamba mna msalaba .
44005031	Imulungu kamwinula mbaka lubali lwake lwe kujilo , kawa Chilongotsi ne Mkombotsi , awatende iwanu we Isiraeli watsileke nzambi ili Imulungu awaleghusile nzambi tsawo .
44005032	Twetwe twa iwakalangama we ipfinu pfino , na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka Imulungu iyaweng'ile iwanu wose iwomhulikitsa , naye ka mkalangama wa chinu chino . ”
44005033	Iwanu wose wa libaratsa hawahulike apfo , wona maya ghendo , wabama wawakome iwatumighwa awo wa Yesu .
44005034	Lekeni Mfarisayo yumwe taghwa lyake Gamalieli , mlangulitsa ghamalaghitso yahulikitsighwe ne iwanu wose , kema hambele he libaratsa , kabama iwatumighwa wala walapfighwe kunze chidogho .
44005035	Kuya kawalongela iwanu wa libaratsa , “ Waisiraeli weyangu mwalangitse ichinu ichimbama kuwatendela iwanu wano !

44006001	Hambele , iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu hawang'ali wakongetseka , tsakulawila manung'uniko mghati mwe iwomtoghola Yesu iwolonga Chigiriki , na awala iwolonga Chihebulaniya . Awala iwolonga Chigiriki tsawanung'unika ka iwasaka wawo wang'ali wosemighwa mne ukugholelighwa ipfijo pfa chila litsuwa .

44006003	Apfo ndughu tsetu , msaghule iwanu saba mghati mwenu iwomanyika wamema Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na wane ihekima , na twetwe tutsoweng'a isang'ano ino .

44006005	Imbuli ayo iwadeng'eletsa iwanu wose iwomtoghola Yesu . Wawasaghula Stefani , imunu iyotoghola ghendo na yamemile Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , Filipi na Porokoro na Nikanori na Timona na Parimena na Nikolayo iyolawila Antiyokiya , iyengile mne dini ya Chiyahudi hao mwanduso .
44006006	Waweka hambele he iwatumighwa , nawo wawalombela na kuwekila ghamoko .

44006008	Stefani imunu iyabalikighwe ng'ani na kwing'ighwa ingupfu ne Imulungu , tsakatenda pfihulo na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa mghati mwe iwanu .
44006009	Lekeni iwanu wangi we ing'anda ye ukulombela iikemighwe Ing'anda ye iwanu iwalekelighwe , iwalawile Kirene , Alekisandiliya na wangi iwalawile Kilikiya na Asiya , wandusa kwihisanya na Stefani .
44006010	Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kamwing'a Stefani inzewele , hayang'ali yolonga ng'awadahile bae kumuhuma .
44006011	Apfo wawasongetsa iwanu wangi walonge , “ Tumuhulika Stefani kolonga mbuli tsa kuwaligha Musa ne Imulungu . ”

44006013	Kuya wawaghala iwakalangama we ughutsu iwalongile , “ Imunu yuno ng'oleka bae kuhalonga pfihile hanu hano haenzeluke na kughalonga pfihile Ghamalaghitso gha Musa .

44007003	Imulungu kamlongela , ‘ Ileke isi yako , waleke iwanu wa lukolo lwako , ughende kune isi yanitsokulangusa . ’
44007004	Baho Abrahamu kaileka isi ya Kalidayo , kaghenda kukala Harani . Aba wake hayafile , Imulungu kamlapfa Harani katsa kukala mne isi ino yamkala sambi .
44007005	Imulungu ng'amwing'ile bae hata hanu hadoghodogho he isi ino hawe hanu hake , hata apfo tsakamlongela katsomwing'a isi ino iwe yake na iwe ye iwanaghe , hata ka matsuwa agho ng'akalile ne imwana bae .
44007006	Imulungu kamlongela pfino , ‘ Iwana wako watsoghalighwa kune isi iitawalighwa ne iwanu wangi , ako watsotendighwa iwatumwa , na kutendighwa ghehile kwa miyaka maghana mane .
44007007	Lekeni nene nitsowahigha iwanu we isi ayo iitsowatenda mwemwe iwatumwa . Kuya nitsowalapfa mne isi ayo watse hanu ano wanitamanile . ’
44007008	Kuya Imulungu kamwing'a Abrahamu chihendo cha kwingitsa ngoma chiwe chitango che laghano lyake . Apfo Abrahamu kamwingitsa ngoma imwanaghe Isaka litsuwa lya nane kulawa hayoneke .
