44007009	“ Kwaapfila awala iwabala wetu tsawamwonela chepfu Yosefu , wamhutsa yawe mtumwa mne isi ya Misiri . Lekeni Imulungu tsakakala hamwe naye ,
44007010	kamlapfa mne maghayo ghake ghose . Imulungu kamwing'a ihekima , kamtenda amnoghele Farao imndewa wa Misiri , na imndewa ayo kamwika Yosefu yawe imbala we isi na ing'anda yake ya undewa .
44007011	Kuya kulawila nzala ng'ulu mne isi yose ya Misiri na Kanani , nzala ayo itenda iwanu wadununzike ng'ani . Iwabala wetu ng'awadahile bae kupata ichijo chochose .
44007012	Yakobu hayahulike ka ako Misiri tsakukala ne ichijo , kawatuma iwanaghe , iwabala wetu , waghende ako Misiri kwa ghumwanza ghwa mwanduso .

44007019	Tsakawatendela iwanu wetu pfihile , na kawonela iwabala wetu kwa kuwalaghitsa wawase kunze iwana wawo pfing'ele wafe .

44007024	Ako kamwona ndughu yake yumwe kotendighwa pfihile na Mmisiri , kaghenda kumwapfila na kwa kuliha chisasi , kamkoma Mmisiri yula .

44007027	“ Lekeni imunu yula iyang'ali yomlagha myaghe kamkunughitsa Musa kalonga , ‘ Angu nani yakwikile ghweghwe uwe ichilongotsi na mlamutsi wetu ?

44007035	“ Ayuno Musa yuyula yawamlemile iwanu we Isiraeli , hawamlongele , ‘ Angu nani yakwikile ghweghwe uwe ichilongotsi na mlamutsi wetu ? ’ Kubitila malaika yuyula iyamlawile Musa mne chibagho iching'ali chakwaka ghumoto , Imulungu kamtuma Musa yuyo yawe ichilongotsi na mkombotsi .
44007036	Yeye iyawalongotse iwanu wala walawe Misiri kwa kutenda pfihulo na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa mne isi ya Misiri , mne ibahali ya Shamu , na kwa miyaka alubaini kunyika .

44007044	“ Hakula kunyika iwabala wetu wakala na ichibumbulika chila che ukalangama . Tsachitsengighwa ka Imulungu pfayamlongele Musa achitsenge , chighale na achila chayalangusighwe Musa

44007050	Si nene imwenyegho bae nitendile ghano ghose ? ’ ”
44007051	Stefani tsakaghendelela kulonga , “ Mwemwe mwa wasughu ! Maghutwi ne imimoyo yenu pfighala ne iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu , mwemwe ka iwabala tsenu . Ghamatsuwa ghose mwotsilema mbuli tse Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .

44008001	Naye Sauli tsakona pfinogha kukomighwa kwa Stefani . Sauli kowadununza iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu Litsuwa lilila iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu wa Yerusalemu wandusa kudununzika ng'ani , iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu wose wapwililikila isi ya Yudeya na Samariya , ila iwatumighwa waliheka iwasighale .

44009003	Lekeni hayang'ali mnzila habehi na kupfika Damasko , bahala lumwesa kulawa kulanga lummulika kosekose .
44009004	Kaghwa , kahulika litsi lyomlongela , “ Sauli , Sauli ! Ebali kwondesa ? ”
44009005	Sauli kaghutsa , “ Imtwatsa , ghweghwe uli nani ? ” Naye kamwidika , “ Nene na Yesu , yumdununza !
44009006	Lelo winuke , wingile mne ghumji , ako kuna imunu katsokulongela chokutenda . ”
44009007	Iwanu iwelongotse na Sauli mne ghumwanza wema baho aku wahela chakulonga , wahulika litsi ila ng'awamwonile munu bae .
44009008	Sauli kenuka , hayafumbule tsinenge , ng'adahile bae ukwona chochose . Apfo wamlongotsa kwa kumkinda ghumoko mbaka Damasko .
44009009	Kwa matsuwa madatu Sauli ng'adahile bae ukona , na ng'ajile wala ng'anwile ichinu chochose .
44009010	Ako Damasko tsahana imunu yumwe iyamuwinzile Yesu , taghwa lyake Ananiya . Imtwatsa tsakamlongela mne ghamaono , “ Ananiya ! ” Ananiya kedika , “ Ona Mtwatsa . ”
44009011	Imtwatsa kamlongela , “ Winuke , ughende kune inzila iikimeghwa inzila iigholoke , ukambame imunu yumwe wa Taso iyokemighwa Sauli , kamne ing'anda ya Yuda , sambi kolomba ,
44009012	naye mne ghamaono kamwona imunu iyokemighwa Ananiya kakwingila mng'anda na kumwikila ghamoko ili yadahe ukwona keli . ”
44009013	Lekeni Ananiya kedika , “ Imtwatsa nihulika mbuli tse imunu ayu kulawa kwe iwanu wengi . Nihulika mengi ghehile ghayawatendele iwanu wako ako Yerusalemu .
44009014	Naye katsa hano ne uwetso kulawa kwe iwatambika wakulu awaghoghe wose iwokutamanila ghweghwe . ”
44009015	Lekeni Imtwatsa kamlongela , “ Ghenda , kwaapfila nimsaghula imunu yuno yanisang'anile , yapete taghwa lyangu kwa iwanu iwali si Wayahudi na kwe iwandewa wawo na kwe iwanu we Isiraeli .
44009016	Nene imwenyegho nitsomlangusa mengi ighatsombama yadununzike kwaajili ya taghwa lyangu . ”
44009017	Apfo Ananiya kaghenda , kengila mng'anda amwo . Kuya kamwikila ghamoko Sauli , kalonga , “ Ndughu yangu Sauli , Imtwatsa Yesu iyakulawile mnzila haung'ali kwakutsa hano , kanituma ili udahe ukwona keli na umemesighwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka . ”
44009018	Bahala ipfinu ka maghamba pfilaghala kulawa mnenge mwake , naye kadaha ukwona keli . Kuya kenuka , kabatitsighwa .
44009019	Na hayamalitse ukuja ngupfu tsake tsimuyila . Sauli kowapetela iwanu ako Damasko Sauli tsakakala ghamatsuwa chidogho ne iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu ako Damasko .
44009020	Baho kandusa kupeta mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela ka Yesu ka Imwana we Imulungu .
44009021	Iwanu wose iwamuhulike wakangawala , walonga , “ Imunu yuno si yuyula bae iyawakomile iwanu iwamtamanile Yesu akula Yerusalemu ? Ambe tsakatsa hano yawaghoghe iwanu awo kuya yawaghale kwe iwatambika wakulu ! ”
44009022	Lekeni Sauli kaghendelela kupata ingupfu na kuwakangawatsa Wayahudi iwokala Damasko kwa kulangusa ka Yesu iyo Kiristu .
44009023	Haghabitile ghamatsuwa mengi , Wayahudi tsawelaghana wamkome Sauli .
44009024	Lekeni Sauli tsakalongelighwa imbuli ayo . Chilo na misi tsawamlolesa hane imibani ya kwingilila mkaye ili wamkome .
44009025	Lekeni nechilo wanang'ina wake wamsola , wamuhulumsa mliseghe kubitila mne litundu ilikalile mne libanda lye ghumji .
44009026	Sauli hapfikile Yerusalemu , tsakabama yelunge ne iwanang'ina , lekeni wawo wang'ali wompfuka , kwaapfila ng'awatoghole bae ka naye tsakakala imwanang'ina .
44009027	Lekeni Balinaba kamsola Sauli kamghala kwe iwatumighwa . Kawalongela Sauli pfayamwonile Imtwatsa mne ghumwanza ghwake na Imtwatsa tsakalonga naye , na pfayapetile taghwa lya Yesu bila kupfuka akula Damasko .
44009028	Apfo Sauli kakala nawo na ukwanga Yerusalemu yose aku kopeta imbuli ye Imtwatsa bila kupfuka .
44009029	Kalonga nawo na kwighutsa na Wayahudi iwolonga Chigiriki , lekeni nawo wabama kumkoma .
44009030	Ndughu hawamanyile imbuli ayo wamsola Sauli mbaka Kaisariya , wamghala Taso .
44009031	Apfo iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu tsawakala tseghamba mne isi ya Yudeya na Galilaya na Samariya , waghumighwa ghumoyo na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na wongetseka na kukala kwa kumpfuka Imtwatsa .
44009032	Petiri hayang'ali yobita chila hanu , kawangila iwanu we Imulungu iwokala Luda .
44009033	Ako kampfika imunu yumwe iyakemighwe Eneya , yawasile mlusatsi kwa miyaka kumi na minane kwa utamu wa kuholola .
44009034	Petiri kamlongela , “ Eneya , Yesu Kiristu kokuhonetsa . Winuke , utandike lusatsi lwako . ” Bahala Eneya kenuka .
44009035	Iwanu wose iwokala Luda na Sharoni wamwona Eneya , nawo wamuyila Imtwatsa .
44009036	Ako Yopa tsakukala ne imwanang'ina yumwe pinga iyakemighwe Tabita kwa Chigiriki Dorika , mana yake mbawala . Ipinga ayo tsayang'ali yotenda ghanoghile matsuwa ghose na kuwapfila iwahingwa .
44009037	Mna matsuwa agho kaghula , kafa , waghwopfugha lukuli wake na waghwika mchiheleto cha kuchanya .
44009038	Luda si hatali ng'ani na Yopa , apfo iwanang'ina hawahulike Petiri ka ako , wawatuma iwanu weli kuna yeye , na wamlomba , “ Utse kuna twetwe sambi baha . ”
44009039	Petiri kaghenda nawo , na hayapfikile , wamghala mchiheleto cha uchanya . Ipfitsuka wose wamtsunguluka Petiri aku wolila na kumlangusa maghwanda na maghwanda ghayatendile Dorika hayang'ali mghima .
44009040	Petiri kawalapfa wose kunze , kuya katowa ghamaghoti , kalomba . Kamhundukila ipinga yula iyafile , kalonga , “ Tabita , winuke . ” Naye kafumbula tsinenge na hayamwonile Petiri , kenuka kakala .
44009041	Petiri kamkinda ghumoko kamwapfila ukwimwinula . Kuya kawakema iwanu we Imulungu na wala ipfitsuka , kamleka mghamoko mwawo ka mghima .
44009042	Imbuli ayo imanyika mne isi yose ya Yopa , na iwanu wengi wamtoghola Imtwatsa .
44009043	Petiri kakala ako Yopa matsuwa mengi , tsakakala ne imunu iyotenda tsingotsi yakemighwe Simoni .
44010001	Ako Kaisariya tsakukala ne imunu yumwe taghwa lyake Korineli , chilongotsi wa chikosi chimwe cha asikali kumi ichikemighwe “ Chikosi cha Italiya . ”
44010002	Yeye ne iwanu wa ukaye yake tsawang'ali wompfuka Imulungu . Tsaang'ali yowapfila wahingwa na komlomba Imulungu matsuwa ghose .
44010003	Litsuwa limwe saa tisa nemisi kona ghamaono mwatsimwatsi , malaika we Imulungu kamtsila , kalonga , “ Korineli ! ”
44010004	Korineli kamtsodolela tsinenge kwa kupfuka , kaghutsa , “ Kuna choni Imtwatsa ? ” Malaika ayo kedika , “ Imulungu kahulika ukulomba kwako na sadaka tsako kwa iwahingwa , kuya ng'atsotsisemwa bae .
44010005	Sambi watume iwanu ako Yopa wakamkeme imunu iyokemighwa Simoni , taghwa lyake lingi Petiri .
44010006	Kokala mne ing'anda ya Simoni mtenda tsingotsi , ing'anda yake yahabehi ne ibahali . ”
44010007	Malaika yula iyalongile naye hayokile , Korineli kawakema iwatumwa wake weli hamwe na asikali wake yumwe iyompfuka Imulungu .
44010008	Kawalongela ghose ighalawile , kuya kawatuma Yopa .
44010009	Litsuwa liwinzile , saa sita nemisi iwanu wala hawang'ali wamne ghumwanza , habehi na kupfika Yopa , Petiri kadina mchiswili ili yalombe .
44010010	Inzala imtama , kabama ichijo yaje , na ichijo haching'ali chikwambikighwa , kona ghamaono .
44010011	Kona kulanga kughubulighwa ne ichinu ka gholole kulu lyohulumsighwa muisi kwa membe tsake nne .
44010012	Mghati mwake mna wanyama wose iwali na ghamaghulu mane , na iwotambala hasi na wapfideghe wa kulanga .
44010013	Kuya kahulika litsi lyomlongela , “ Petiri , winuke uchinje uje ! ”
44010014	Petiri kalonga , “ Mbe , Imtwatsa , sina ndiye bae chinu chochose ichighomighwe au ichihile . ”
44010015	Litsi limlongela keli , “ Uleke kupfikema pfiha ipfinu ipfideghetighwe ne Imulungu . ”
44010016	Imbuli ayo ilawila mala ndatu , kuya gholole liyutsighwa kulanga .
44010017	Petiri hayang'ali yokangawala ghamaono ghala gholonga choni , iwanu wala iwatumighwe na Korineli wapfika kune ing'anda ya Simoni , wema mlibani .
44010018	Wakemelela , waghutsa ka Simoni yokemighwa Petiri kokala hamo .
44010019	Simoni Petiri hayang'ali yokangawala ghamaono agho , baho Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kamlongela , “ Simoni , hano hana iwanu wadatu wokubama ghweghwe .
44010020	Apfo winuke uhulumke ughende nawo , uleke kupfuka , kwaapfila yaniwatumile nene . ”
44010021	Petiri kahulumka hasi , kawalongela iwanu awo , “ Nene iyo yamumbama . Mtsilile choni hano ? ”
44010022	Wamwidika , “ Twolawa kwa Korineli , imkulu we asikali , imunu yanoghile , mpfuka Imulungu na youlikitsighwa na Wayahudi wose . Malaika mwenzeluka kamlongela yakukeme ghweghwe ukaye yake ili yahulike chochose chautsomlongela . ”
44010023	Kuya Petiri kawalongela iwanu awo wengile mng'anda , wawe wahenza wake . Litsuwa lya kabili Petiri kandusa ukuka nawo , ne iwanu wangi wa Yopa iwamtoghole Yesu waghenda naye .
44010024	Litsuwa liwinzile Petiri kapfika Kaisariya . Korineli tsaang'ali yowabeta hamwe na iwandughu tsake na sale tsake iyawakemile .
44010025	Petiri hayang'ali yakwingila mng'anda , Korineli kaghenda kumbokela , kamtowela ghamaghoti , kenama mbaka hasi ghendo .
44010026	Lekeni Petiri kamwinula , kalonga , “ Winuke , nene imwenyegho na imunu ka ghweghwe . ”
44010027	Na hang'ali yolonga naye , Petiri kengila mng'anda , kawapfika iwanu wengi wetingana .
44010028	Kawalongela , “ Mwemwe mwomanya ka Myahudi kaghomighwa na malaghitso ghe dini yake kukala ne imunu wa isi ingi , au kumwangila . Lekeni Imulungu kanilangusa ndeke kumwona imunu wowose ng'adeghete au keha .
44010029	Apfo hamnikemile , silemile bae kutsa . Lelo nowaghutsa , mnikemile choni ? ”
44010030	Korineli kedika , “ Matsuwa madatu ghabitile saa ka ino , tsanikala mng'anda mwangu nolomba . Bahala imunu yane maghwanda matselu ng'ani tsakema hambele hangu ,
44010031	kalonga , ‘ Korineli , Imulungu kabokela malombi ghako na ng'aghasemwile aghala ghauweng'ile iwahingwa .
44010032	Lelo , watume iwanu waghende Yopa kumkema Simoni yokemighwa Petiri , kokala mne ing'anda ya Simoni mtenda tsingotsi , iyokala habehi ne ibahali . ’
44010033	Apfo bahala niwatuma iwanu kuna ghweghwe , naghwe kutenda ghoya ukutsa . Sambi twetwe twa hambele he Imulungu , kuhulikitsa chochose Imulungu chayakulaghitse kutulongela . ”
44010034	Kuya Petiri kandusa ukulonga , “ Lelo nomanya ka Imulungu ng'obaghula bae ,
44010035	ila kowatoghola iwanu iwompfuka na kutenda ghanoghile kulawa chila isi .
44010036	Mwemwe mwomanya imbuli yaitumile Imulungu kuna iwanu wa Isiraeli , kalonga imbuli inoghile iitenda iwanu wakale tseghamba kubitila Yesu Kiristu , Imtwatsa wa wose .
44010037	Mwemwe mwomanya ichilawile mne isi yose ya Yudeya , kwandusila Galilaya haumalile ubatitso yaupetile Yohane ,
44010038	Imulungu pfayamsaghule Yesu wa Natsareti kwa kumwing'a Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ne ingupfu , na pfayaghendile chila hanu aku kotenda ghanoghile na kuhonetsa iwanu wose iwonelighwe na Setani , kwaapfila Imulungu tsakakala naye .
44010039	Twetwe twa iwakalangama we ipfinu pfose pfatendile mne isi ya Wayahudi na Yerusalemu . Tsawamkoma kwa kumuwamba mna msalaba .
44010040	Lekeni Imulungu kamtsilihula mne litsuwa lya kadatu , kuya kamtenda yoneke ne iwanu .
44010041	Ng'oneke ne iwanu wose , ila na iwakalangama iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu , twetwe iyatujile na ukunwa naye hayatsilihuke .
44010042	Katulaghitsa tuwapetele iwanu na kuwalongela ka Yesu iyo iyasaghulighwe ne Imulungu yawe imlamutsi we iwaghima na iwafile .
44010043	Wanabii wose we Imulungu tsawalonga mbuli tsake ka chila imunu iyomtoghola katsoleghusighwa nzambi tsake kwa taghwa lyake . ”
44010044	Petiri hayang'ali yolonga mbuli atso , Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kawahulumkila wose iwang'ali wotegheletsa mbuli atso .
44010045	Awala Wayahudi iwatoghole iwatsile na Petiri wakangawala kwaapfila nzawadi ya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka pfipfila ighumighwa kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae .
44010046	Kwaapfila wawahulika wolonga kwa lugha ingi , na kumtunya Imulungu . Kuya Petiri kalonga ,
44010047	“ Iwanu wano wambokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ka twetwe pfatumbokele . Angu nani lelo iyodaha kuwaghoma iwanu wano waleke kubatitsighwa kwa ghamatsi ? ”
44010048	Apfo kalaghitsa wabatitsighwe kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu . Kuya wamlomba Petiri akale nawo kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho .
44011001	Kuya iwatumighwa ne iwamtoghole Yesu akula Yudeya wahulika ka iwanu iwali si Wayahudi nawo waibokela imbuli ye Imulungu .
44011002	Apfo Petiri hayoile Yerusalemu , Wayahudi iwamtoghole Yesu wamlonga ,
44011003	walonga , “ Ghweghwe kughenda mne tsing'anda tse iwanu ing'awengile ngoma bae na ukuja nawo . ”
44011004	Petiri kandusa kuwalongela lughalugha chila ichinu pfachilawile .
44011005	“ Tsanikala mne isi ya Yopa nolomba , baho mbona ghamaono , mbona ichinu ka gholole kulu lyohulumsighwa hasi kulawa kulanga kwa membe tsake nne , kuya litsa bahala hanikalile .
44011006	Nilola mghati , mbona iwanyama wane ghamaghulu mane iwali muisi , iwanyama wa kubagho , iwotambala , ne iwapfideghe wa kulanga .
44011007	Kuya nihulika litsi lyonilongela , ‘ Petiri , winuke uchinje uje . ’
44011008	Nyidika , ‘ Bae , Imtwatsa ! Kuduhu ichinu chochose chihile au ichighomighwe ichingile mumlomo mwangu . ’
44011009	Litsi lilonga keli kulawa kulanga , ‘ Uleke kuchikema chiha ichinu chayadeghete Imulungu . ’
44011010	Imbuli ayo tsailawila mala ndatu , kuya ligholole liyutsighwa keli kulanga .
44011011	Baho iwanu wadatu iwatumighwe kuna nene kulawa Kaisariya wapfika mne ing'anda yaning'ali nikala .
44011012	Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kanongela ndeke kupfuka , ng'ende nawo . Iwandughu wano sita pfipfila waghenda na nene , twingila mng'anda mwa Korineli .
44011013	Katulongela pfamwonile malaika yemile mng'anda mwake iyamlongele , ‘ Utume iwanu isi ya Yopa wamkeme Simoni iyokemighwa Petiri .
44011014	Katsomghalilani imbuli iitsokukombola ghweghwe ne iwanu wose iwali mng'anda mwako . ’
44011015	Hanyanduse ukulonga , Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kawahulumkila ka pfayatuhulumkile twetwe aho mwanduso .
44011016	Baho ng'umbuka chayalongile Imtwatsa . ‘ Yohane tsakabatitsa kwa ghamatsi , lekeni mwemwe mtsobatitsa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka . ’
44011017	Apfo ka Imulungu kaweng'a iwanu iwali si Wayahudi nzawadi iila iyatwing'ile twetwe yatumtoghola Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu , lelo nene nani nimpinge Imulungu ? ”
44011018	Hawahulike apfo , wenyamala . Wamtunya Imulungu , walonga , “ Lelo , Imulungu kaweng'a iwanu iwali si Wayahudi toba iighala ughima . ”
44011019	Kwa maghayo ighalawile Stefani hayakomighwe , iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu tsawapwililika . Wangi waghenda mbaka Foinike , Kupulo na Antiyokiya wapeta imbuli ila kwa Wayahudi waliyeka .
44011020	Wangi iwalawile Kupulo na Kirene waghenda Antiyokiya , pfipfila wandusa kulonga ne iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , wawapetela imbuli inoghile ye Imtwatsa Yesu .
44011021	Ngupfu ye Imtwatsa tsaikala nawo , na iwanu wengi watoghola na kumuyila Imtwatsa .
44011022	Mbuli atso tsihulikighwa na iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu wa Yerusalemu , nawo wamtuma Balinaba aghende Antiyokiya .
44011023	Naye hapfikile na kuwona uluso we Imulungu kwe iwanu wala , kadeng'elela na kawalomba waghendelele kumtoghola Imtwatsa kwa mimoyo yawo yose .
44011024	Balinaba tsakakala imunu yanoghile na yamemile Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na iyotoghola ghendo , na iwanu wengi tsawongetseka kwe Imtwatsa .
44011025	Kuya Balinaba kaghenda Taso kumbama Sauli .
44011026	Hamwonile , kamghala Antiyokiya . Nawo wose weli kwa ghumwaka mghima tsawetingana na iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu na kuwalangulitsa iwanu wengi . Iwanang'ina tsawandusa ukukemighwa Wakiristu ako Antiyokiya .
44011027	Ghamatsuwa ghaghala manabii wangi we Imulungu iwalawile Yerusalemu wapfika Antiyokiya .
44011028	Yumwe wao iyakemighwe Agabo kema , na kwa uwetso wa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kalonga ka itsolawila inzala ng'ulu muisi mwose . Na inzala ayo ilawila mne ghamatsuwa gha mndewa Kilaudi .
44011029	Wakiristu wala walamula chila imunu ka pfayodaha aghale chochose ili kuwapfila iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu iwokala Yudeya .
44011030	Tsawatenda apfo , wawatuma Balinaba na Sauli wawaghalile iwabala we iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu .
44012001	Ghamatsuwa ghaghala mndewa Herodi kawaghogha iwanu wangi iwomtoghola Kiristu na kuwadununza .
44012002	Kamkoma kwa limaghe Jakobu ndughu yake Yohane .
44012003	Honile Wayahudi wanoghelesighwa na achila chayatendile , kaghendelela , kamghogha Petiri . Agha ghatendeka mne chihungo che ghamatsuwa ghe Pfighate ipfilihela hamila .
44012004	Hamghoghile , kamwika mchifungo , mne ghamoko gha makingili mane gha asikali wane wane , wamlolese . Herodi tsakabama Pasaka ing'amala amlapfe hambele he iwanu .
44012005	Petiri hayang'ali mchifungo , iwamtoghole Yesu wamlombela kwe Imulungu kwa ghumoyo .
44012006	Chilo chila Herodi ng'ana yamlapfe kunze hambele he iwanu , Petiri tsakawasa haghati ghati ha asikali weli , kohighwa minyororo mili , ne iwakalitsi tsawang'ali wololesa libani lya chifungo .
44012007	Bahala , malaika we Imtwatsa kalawila na ghumwanga ghumulika mne chiheleto chila . Malaika ayo kamtowa Petiri mlubapfu , kamlamsa . Kalonga , “ Hima , winuke . ” Bahala minyororo imwohile ghamoko ilaghala hasi .
44012008	Kuya malaika ayo kamlongela , “ Pfala msipi ghwako na pfilatu pfako . ” Petiri katenda apfo . Kuya kamlongela , “ Pfala ghwanda lyako uniwinze . ”
44012009	Petiri kamkoleletsa kunze mwa gheletsa , lekeni ng'amanyile bae ighatendighwe ne malaika we Imulungu ghang'ali gholawila kweli , ila kapfikitsa kakona ghamaono .
44012010	Wabita chituwo cha wakalitsi cha mwanduso na cha keli , kuya wapfika mne libani lye chuma ililongosa mne ghumji . Libani liwapfughukila lyenyegho , nawo walawa kunze . Hawang'ali woghenda mne inzila imwe , bahala malaika ayo kamleka Petiri .
44012011	Petiri hayatangile ichimlawile , kalonga , “ Sambi nomanya ghendo ka Imtwatsa kamtuma malaika wake yandapfe mne ghamoko gha Herodi na kulawa mna chila chinu chawalolele Wayahudi . ”
44012012	Hayatangile apfo , kaghenda kune ing'anda ya Mariya , mai wake Yohane , taghwa lyake lya keli Maliki ne iwanu wengi tsawetingana amo wolomba .
44012013	Petiri hayagong'onde libani lya kunze , imtumwa yumwe ipinga , taghwa lyake Roda katsa kuhulikitsa .
44012014	Naye hayamanyile litsi lya Petiri , kadeng'elela ng'ani mbaka kaleka kupfughula libani katsumila mng'anda , kawalongela , “ Petiri kema kunze halibani . ”
44012015	Wamlongela , “ Kuna lukwale . ” Lekeni yeye kakomangitsa ka pfipfo pfaili . Walonga , “ Ayo malaika wake . ”
44012016	Petiri kaghendelela kughong'onda libani , na hawapfughule hawamwone yeye , wakangawala .
44012017	Petiri kawapungila ghumoko wenyamale , kawalongela Imtwatsa pfayamlapfile mne ligheletsa . Kuya kawalongela wakamlongele Jakobu imbuli ayo , na awala wangi iwamtoghole Yesu , kuya yeye kaghenda hanu hangi .
44012018	Nemitondo haipfikile , asikali tsawapfuka ghendo kwa achila ichimlawile Petiri .
44012019	Kuya Herodi kalaghitsa wambame Petiri , lekeni ng'awamwonile bae . Kawaghutsa iwakalitsi wala , kuya kalaghitsa wakomighwe . Kuya Herodi kalawa Yudeya kaghenda Kaisariya , kakala ako matsuwa chidogho .
44012020	Naye Herodi tsakawonela maya iwanu wa Tiro na Sidoni . Apfo iwanu awo wamghendela hamwe . Hawamalitse kumtenda Balasto yawe sale yawo , imunu iyatogholighwe sideke ne imndewa . Walomba Herodi wakale nae tseghamba , kwaapfila isi tsawo tsatsing'ali tsihemela ichijo kulawa mne isi ye imndewa .

44013026	“ Ndughu tsangu , watsukulu wa Abrahamu , namwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi yamumpfuka Imulungu , imbuli ino ya ukombotsi ighalighwa kuna twetwe .

44016001	Pauli kapfika Deribe , kuya kapfika Lisitira . Baho tsakukala ne imunu yumwe iyomtoghola Yesu , taghwa lyake Timoteo . Mai wake tsakala Myahudi iyamtoghole Imtwatsa , lekeni aba wake tsakakala Mgiriki .

44019025	Apfo Demeteriyo kawakema iwanu wake , na iwanu wangi iwosang'ana isang'ano ka yake , kalonga , “ Mweye wayangu , mwomanya twopata sendi nyingi kwa isang'ano ino .
44019026	Mwemwe muwenyegho tsamuhulika na mwona ka si hano Efeso haliyeka bae , ila Asiya yose , Pauli kawakwegha iwanu na kughalusa ghamawatso ghawo , kalonga milungu itendighwe ne iwanu si milungu bae .
44019027	Apfo isang'ano yetu itsobetsighwa , na si isang'ano yetu iliyeka bae , ila hata ing'anda ye imulungu wetu mamo Atemi nayo itsobetsighwa na mlungu wetu imwenyegho katsobetsighwa , imulungu yotambikighwa mne kaye tsa Asiya na mne isi yose , katsobokighwa utunitso wake ! ”
44019028	Hawahulike apfo , wona maya wandusa kukemelela , “ Atemi wa Efeso ka Mkulu ! ”
44019029	Tsakulawila hengele mne isi yose . Iwanu wawaghogha Gayo ne Aristariko , iwanu iwelongotse na Pauli kulawa Makedoniya , watsuma nawo mbaka hane chibugha che midawalo .
44019030	Pauli imwenyegho tsakabama aghende hambele he iwanu , lekeni iwanang'ina wake wamghoma .
44019031	Hata iwakulu wangi we Asiya , sale tsake Pauli , wamtumila imunu wamlomba aleke kughenda hane chibugha che imidawalo .
44019032	Imtingano ukala uhinyika , iwanu wamwenga wang'ali wolonga achi na wamwenga wolonga chila , kwaapfila iwanu wengi ng'awamanyile tsawetinganile choni .
44019033	Wayahudi wangi wamghala Alekisanda hambele he iwanu , na iwanu wangi wamkemelela . Naye kawapungila ghumoko iwanu wanyamale , ili yeyamile kwe iwanu .
44019034	Lekeni hawamanyile yeye ka Myahudi , wose wakemelela hamwe kwa masaa meli , “ Atemi wa Efeso ka mkulu ! ”
44019035	Na kalani wa isi hayamalitse kuwalongela iwanu wanyamale , kalonga , “ Mwemwe iwanu wa Efeso , angu yuhi ng'amanyile bae ka isi ya Efeso iyo mkalitsi wa ing'anda ye imulungu mkulu Atemi na mkalitsi wa chinyagho chake ichilaghale kulawa kulanga ?
44019036	Kwaapfila kuduhu imunu yodaha kubela agho , apfo mnyamale na mleke kutenda chinu chochose himahima .
44019037	Muwaghala hano iwanu wano , nawo ng'awebile ipfinu pfe ing'anda ye imulungu wala ng'awamlighile bae mlungu wetu .
44019038	Apfo , ka Demetiriyo na weyaghe wana lighomba na imunu wowose , ghamabalatsa na iwalamutsi wabaho . Wodaha kughala ako lighomba alyo .
44019039	Lekeni ka mna ghomba lingi , mwobamighwa mlighale kune libalatsa ilibamighwa .
44019040	Kwaapfila tung'aghalighwa mne libalatsa kwaajili ya hengele lya leloli , ng'atudaha kwiyamila bae kwaapfila hengele lino lyahela mana . ”
44019041	Hayamalitse ukulonga apfi , kawalongela iwanu woke .
44020001	Hengele lila lya Efeso halimalile Pauli kawakema iwomtoghola Yesu , kawaghuma ghumoyo , kawaagha kuya kaghenda Makedoniya .
44020002	Hayang'ali yobita kaye tsila , kawaghuma ghumoyo iwanu , kuya kapfika Ugiriki ,
44020003	kakala ako kwa miyetsi midatu .
44020004	Tsaang'ali yelongotsa na Sopato imwana we Pilo iyolawila Bereya , Aristariko na Sekundo iwanu wa Tesalonike , Gayo imunu wa Deribe , Timoteo , Tukiko na Tirofimo iwolawa Asiya .
44020005	Iwanu awo tsawalongola na watubeta ako Tirowa .
44020006	Ichihungo che Pfighate ipfilihela hamila hachimalile , tudina mnumbwi kulawa Filipi , na ghamatsuwa matano hambele tutingana nawo ako Tirowa , tukala ako kwa ghamatsuwa saba .
44020007	Mne litsuwa lya mwanduso lya juma , tsatutingana hamwe na ukuja chijo . Pauli tsakalonga ne iwanu , na kwaapfila kabama yoke litsuwa lya keli kaghendelela kulonga nawo mbaka nechilo ng'ani .
44020008	Tsahana ipfitasa pfingi ipfing'ali pfakwaka mne ichiheleto ichili kuchanya , hanu hatwitinganile .
44020009	Msongolo yumwe yakemighwe Yutiko tsakala hane lidilisha . Pauli hayang'ali yoghendelela kulonga , Yutiko ang'ali yodongila , kadongila mbaka kalaghala , kulawa mne igholofa ya kadatu mbaka hasi . Hawaghendile kumwinula wampfika ma kafa .
44020010	Lekeni Pauli kahulumka hasi , kamwinamila , kamkumbatila msongolo ayo . Kalonga , “ Mleke kupfuka , kamghima ! ”
44020011	Kuya kadina keli mchanya , kasola chijo kaja , kaghendelela kulonga nawo mbaka habehi na kucha , kuya koka .
44020012	Iwanu wamghala imsongolo yula ukaye kamghima , nawo waghumighwa ghumoyo .
44020013	Twetwe tudina imeli tulongola kughenda Aso ili twitingane na Pauli . Tsakatulongela tutende apfo , kwaapfila yeye ang'ali yoghenda ako kwa mghulu .
44020014	Hatupfikile Aso , Pauli kengila mne ghumnumbwi , tughenda naye Mitileni .
44020015	Litsuwa lya keli twandusa ghumwanza kulawa ako kuya tupfika Kiyo . Litsuwa lya kadatu tupfika Samo , na litsuwa lya kane tupfika Mileto .
44020016	Pauli kalamla aghendelele na ghumwanza bila kubitila Efeso ili aleke kukawa mne isi ya Asiya . Tsakabama yasumke kupfika Yerusalemu kwaajili ya ichihungo cha Pentekoste ka ing'adahike .
44020017	Kulawa Mileto , Pauli kawatuma iwanu waghende Efeso kuwakema iwabala we iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu wetingane naye .
44020018	Hawatsile , kawalongela , “ Mwemwe mwomanya pfanikalile ghamatsuwa ghose , hanikalile namwe kulawa litsuwa lya mwanduso lyanitsile mne isi ya Asiya .
44020019	Tsanimsang'anila Imtwatsa bila kwighoda na kwa masotsi , hata ka tsanigetsighwa ng'ani na aghala ghehile ghawanendele Wayahudi .
44020020	Mwomanya silekile bae kuwalongela chila ichinu ichidaha kumwapfilani mwemwe , ila niwalangulitsa hambele he iwanu na kulawa ing'anda mbaka ing'anda .
44020021	Niwalongela wose Wayahudi na iwanu iwali si Wayahudi wamuyile Imulungu na wamtoghole Imtwatsa wetu Yesu .
44020022	Na lelo , kwaapfila nimuhulika Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , noghenda Yerusalemu aku simanyile bae choni chitsonilawila ako .
44020023	Chinu chimwe chanimanya , Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka konongela ka mna chila ghumji , ukwohighwa na ukughaya pfonibeta .
44020024	Lekeni siwona bae ughima wangu ka chinu chikulu , ila chanibama kumalitsa isang'ano yangaile Imtwatsa Yesu , isang'ano ye ukupeta Imbuli Inoghile ya uluso we Imulungu .
44020025	“ Nibita mna mwemwe wose kuwapetela Undewa we Imulungu , lekeni sambi nomanya ka kuduhu imunu mna mwemwe iyatsombona keli .
44020026	Apfo leloli nowalongela ghendo , imunu wowose mna mwemwe ang'agha , alwo lwenu , nene nahela totso .
44020027	Kwaapfila silekile bae kuwalongela ghose ghayobama Imulungu .
44020028	Mwalangitse iwenyegho , na muwalolese iwanu wose awala Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyamwikeni muwalongotse , muwadime awala iwomtoghola Imulungu iyawaghulile kwa idamu yake imwenyegho .
44020029	Nomanya nene hanikuka , wambwa wakali wa kumuhulo watsowatsilani na ng'awatsowonelani libatsi bae .
44020030	Hata mna mwemwe muwenyegho watsolawila iwanu iwolonga ughutsu ili wawakweghe kuna wawo awala iwomtoghola Yesu .
44020031	Apfo mwalangitse ! Mkumbuke , kwa miyaka midatu chilo na misi , silekile bae kumlangulitsa chila imunu iyali kuna mwemwe kwa masotsi .
44020032	“ Lelo nomwikani mne ghamoko ghe Imulungu na mne imbuli ya uluso wake iudaha kuwatsenga na kuwatenda muhale hamwe na iwanu wake .
44020033	Sibamile bae nzahabu au fetsa au lighwanda lya imunu wowose .
44020034	Mwemwe muwenyegho mwomanya ka tsanisang'ana kwa ghamoko ghangu ili kupata aghala ghanibamile na aghala ghawabamile weyangu .
44020035	Mne chila chinu chanendile , tsaniwalangusa ka kwa kusang'ana ka pfino , twobamighwa kuwapfila iwanu walihela ingupfu , mkumbuke chayalongile Imtwatsa Yesu imwenyegho , ‘ Kabweda ayula iyoghola kubita ayula iyobokela . ’ ”
44020036	Hayamalitse kulonga agho , katowa ghamaghoti hamwe nawo , kamlomba Imulungu .
44020037	Wose walila hawang'ali womuagha Pauli kuno wamkumbatila na wamnonela .
44020038	Tsawona usungu ng'ani kwaapfila kawalongela ng'awatsomwona keli bae . Kuya waghenda naye mbaka kune imeli .
44021001	Tsatuwaagha , kuya tudina imeli tughenda mbaka Kosi . Litsuwa liwinzile tupfika Rode , na kulawa ako tupfika Patara .
44021002	Ako tuipfika imeli iighenda Foinike , apfo tudina , tuka .
44021003	Na hatuyonile Kupulo , tubita lubali lwake lwe kuisi , tughenda mbaka Siriya . Tuhulumkila Tiro kwaapfila ako mnumbwi wetu ghung'ali ghwohulumsa imitsigho .
44021004	Ako tuwapfika iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu , tukala nawo ghamatsuwa saba . Kwa ingupfu ya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka wamghoma Pauli aleke kughenda Yerusalemu .
44021005	Lekeni ghamatsuwa ghetu haghamalile , tughendelela na ghumwanza ghwetu . Iwanu wose iwamtoghole Yesu na wehe tsawo ne iwana wawo watuhilika mbaka kunze kwe ghumji , na baho tutowa maghoti , tulomba .
44021006	Hatumalitse kuwaagha , tudina imeli , nawo woya mmakaye mwawo .
44021007	Tughendelela na ghumwanza kulawa Tiro , tupfika Tolemayi , baho tuwalamsa iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu na kukala nawo kwa litsuwa limwe .
44021008	Nemitondo tuka , tupfika Kaisariya . Ako tsatukala mne ing'anda ya Filipi , mpetela wanu imbuli inoghile , iyakalile yumwe wa awala saba iwasaghulighwe Yerusalemu .
44021009	Imunu yuno tsakakala ne iwanaghe wapinga wane , awo ng'ana wakwelighwe bae , wang'ali wolonga usenga we Imulungu .
44021010	Hatukalile baho kwa ghamatsuwa mengi , nabii yumwe we Imulungu iyakemighwe Agabo katsa kulawa Yudeya .
44021011	Katutsila , kasola ghumsipi ghwa Pauli , keyoha ghamoko na ghamaghulu ghake imwenyegho , kalonga , “ Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kolonga , Wayahudi wa Yerusalemu watsomwoha apfino imunu yane ghumsipi ghuno na watsomwika mne ghamoko ghe awanu iwali si Wayahudi bae . ”
44021012	Hatuhulike apfi , twetwe na iwanu iwakalile hala tumlomba Pauli aleke kughenda Yerusalemu .
44021013	Lekeni Pauli kedika , “ Ebali mwolila na mwoghutenda ghumoyo ghwangu ghutenyuke ? Nene niyandaa si kwohighwa kuliyeka bae , ila hata ukufila Yerusalemu kwaajili ya taghwa lya Imtwatsa Yesu . ”
44021014	Halemile kututegheletsa , tumleka , tulonga , “ Ghayobama Imulungu ghatendeke . ”
44021015	Hatumalitse kukala hala , twoha pfinu pfetu tugheluka tughenda Yerusalemu .
44021016	Iwanu wangi iwomtoghola Yesu kulawa Kaisariya welongotsa na twetwe , watughala tukakale ukaye kwa Mnasoni . Yeye tsakakala imunu wa Kupulo , naye yang'ali yomtoghola Yesu kwa ghamatsuwa mengi .
44021017	Hatupfikile Yerusalemu , iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu watubokela kwa kudeng'elela .
44021018	Litsuwa liwinzile Pauli na twetwe tsatughenda kumwona Jakobu , na iwabala wose we iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu tsawabaho .
44021019	Pauli kawalamsa na kuwalongela ghose ghayatendile Imulungu kubitila isang'ano yake kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi .
44021020	Hawahulike apfi , wamtunya Imulungu . Kuya wamlongela Pauli , “ Ndughu yetu , kwakona Wayahudi iwatoghole pfawali wengi ng'ani , nawo wose wosulukila ng'ani kutenda malaghitso gha Musa .
44021021	Tsawalongelighwa ka ghweghwe kowalangulitsa Wayahudi wose iwokala mghati mwa iwanu iwali si Wayahudi waghaleke malaghitso gha Musa , tsakuwalongela waleke kuwengitsa ngoma iwana wawo wala kuchiwinza ichihendo chetu .
44021022	Lelo tutendetse ? Kwaapfila watsohulika ka ghweghwe kwa baha ,
44021023	apfo tenda achi chatukulongela . Ahano hana iwanu wane iwekile laghano .
44021024	Uwasole iwanu wano , wideghetese nawo , uwalihile sendi , ili waghetighwe mvili tsawo . Kuya chila imunu katsomanya ka mbuli tsako tsawahulike ng'atsilongesa bae , ila ghweghwe imwenyegho koghawinza ghamalaghitso gha Musa .
44021025	Ka pfatuwaandikile iwanu iwali si Wayahudi iwamtoghole Yesu , wobamighwa waleke ukuja ipfijo ipfitambikighwe kwa ipfinyagho , waleke ukuja idamu , waleke ukuja imnyama iyabotighwe na waleke utsinzi . ”
44021026	Litsuwa liwinzile Pauli kawasola iwanu awo na kwideghetesa nawo . Kuya kengila mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu kuwalongela litsuwa lye ukumalitsa ukwideghesa na litsuwa lye kulapfa nambiko kwaajili ya chila yumwe mna wawo .
44021027	Ghamatsuwa ghala saba haghakalile habehi kumala , Wayahudi iwalawile Asiya wamwona Pauli mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu . Wawasongetsa iwanu wose wamuhile Pauli , wamghogha ,
44021028	wakemela , “ Amweye wamale wa Isiraeli , mtwapfile ! Hayuno iyo imunu iyakwanga chila hanu , na kuwalangulitsa iwanu wose waleke kuwawinza Waisiraeli na ghamalaghitso gha Musa na hanu hano hanoghile . Kuya kawaghala iwanu iwali si Wayahudi mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , na kuhahinya hanu hano hahenzeluke . ”
44021029	Wamwenga tsawapfikitsa Pauli kamghala Tirofimo imunu wa Efeso mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , kwaapfila tsawamwona naye mkaye .
44021030	Ghumji ghose ghukala na hengele , na iwanu wang'ali wotsuma kulawa chila hanu . Wamghogha Pauli , wamkwegha kulawa mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , na bahala imibani ye Ing'anda ye Imulungu ihindighwa .
44021031	Na hawang'ali wobama inzila ye ukumkoma Pauli , imbuli impfikila imkulu we asikali wa Roma ka ghumji ghose ghwa Yerusalemu ghukala na hengele .
44021032	Bahala imkulu hayo kawasola iwakulu wangi hamwe na asikali katsuma kuhulumkila mne kingili . Nawo hawamwonile imkulu ayo ne asikali wake , waleka kumtowa Pauli .
44021033	Imkulu ayo kamghendela Pauli , kamghogha , kalaghitsa yohighwe minyororo mili . Kuya kaghutsa , “ Angu ayuno imunu wachi ? Kuya atendile choni ? ”
44021034	Iwanu wangi mne mtingano agho walonga pfino na wamwenga walonga apfino , imkulu hayo ng'adahile kuhulika ghoya kwaapfila tsahana tsogho , apfo kalaghitsa Pauli yaghalighwe mne liboma .
44021035	Pauli hayapfikile mna ingatsi , asikali wamsola kwaapfila iwanu wang'ali wotenda hengele ng'ani .
44021036	Likingili limuwinza na iwanu waghendelela kukemelela , “ Mkomeni ayo ! ”
44021037	Pauli hayang'ali yoghalighwa mng'anda , kamlomba imkulu we asikali , “ Uleke tanu nikulongele ichinu . ” Naye kamghutsa , “ Kumbe kodaha kulonga Chigiriki ! ”
44021038	“ Pfii ghweghwe si yula Mmisiri yandusile uasi ghamatsuwa ghabitile na kuwalongotsa kunyika iwanu wala wehile elufu nne ? ”
44021039	Pauli kedika , “ Bae , nene na Myahudi wa Taso , ako Kilikiya , isi imanyika ng'ani . Nolomba undeke nonge ne iwanu wano . ”
44021040	Imbala ayo hayamlekile alonge , Pauli kema mngatsi , kawapungila ghumoko iwanu wanyamale . Kuya wose hawanyamale , Pauli kalonga nawo kwa Chihebraniya .
44022001	“ Ndughu tsangu na aba tsangu , mnihulikitse ghoya pfaniyamila hambele henu . ”
44022002	Hawahulike kolonga nawo Chihebraniya , wenyamala tulu , naye Pauli kaghendelela kulonga ,
44022003	“ Nene na Myahudi , nyelekighwa Taso , isi ya Kilikiya , lekeni nikulila mne ghumji ghuno . Tsanikala imwanang'ina wa Gamalieli , tsanilangulitsighwa kughakinda ghamalaghitso ghe iwabala wetu . Na ng'ala nosulukila kumuhulikitsa Imulungu ka mwemwe mwose pfamli leloli .
44022004	Tsaniwadununza iwanu iwoiwinza inzila ino mbaka kuwakoma , tsaniwaghogha wose iwamale ne iwapinga na kuwasa mwigheletsa .
44022005	Imtambika mkulu ne libalatsa lyose lyodaha kulapfa ukalangama . Wawo iwo iwangaile ibaluwa niighale kwa Wayahudi wa Damasko , ili niwaghoghe iwanu awo ako Damasko niwaghale Yerusalemu wahighighwe .
44022006	“ Nemisi haning'ali mnzila , hamvikile habehi na Damasko , bahala lumwesa lukulu kulawa kulanga lunimwemwesela chila hanu .
44022007	Nyighwa hasi , kuya nihulika litsi lyonilongela , ‘ Sauli , Sauli ! Ebali konidununza ? ’
44022008	Nimghutsa , ‘ Imtwatsa ghweghwe uli nani ? ’ Kanongela , ‘ Nene na Yesu wa Natsareti , yunidununza . ’
44022009	Wayangu wawona lumwesa , lekeni ng'awahulike bae litsi lya ayula iyalongile na nene .
44022010	Nimghutsa , ‘ Imtwatsa lelo nendetse ? ’ Imtwatsa kanongela . ‘ Winuke ughende Damasko , ako kutsolongelighwa ghose ghaubamighwa kutenda . ’
44022011	Weyangu wang'inda ghumoko , wanongotsa mbaka Damasko , kwaapfila sidahile bae ukwona kwaajili ya ukulu wa lumwesa lula .
44022012	“ Imunu yumwe yakemighwe Ananiya tsakatsa kumbona , imunu ayo tsakakala kompfuka Imulungu na koghakinda ghamalaghitso gha Musa na kotegheletsighwa na Wayahudi wose iwokala ako .
44022013	Kema habehi yangu , kalonga , ‘ Ndughu yangu Sauli , wone keli ! ’ Na bahala nidaha kumwona .
44022014	Kuya Ananiya kalonga , ‘ Imulungu we iwabala wetu kakusaghula ghweghwe umanye chayobama na umwone ayula Mwenzeluka wake na uhulike litsi lyake .
44022015	Kwaapfila ghweghwe kutsakuwa mkalangama wake kwa kuwalongela iwanu wose aghala ghawonile na ghauhulike .
44022016	Lelo ubeta choni ? Winuke , ubatitsighwe , uleghusighwe nzambi tsako kwa kulitoghola taghwa lyake . ’
44022017	“ Hambuyile Yerusalemu na haning'ali nilomba mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , ng'ala ka nitsilika .
44022018	Nimwona Imtwatsa konongela , ‘ Sambi baha ulawe Yerusalemu ! Kwaapfila ng'awatsotoghola ukalangama wako mne mbuli tsangu . ’
44022019	Nimwidika , “ Imtwatsa , iwanu womanya ka nene tsang'enda mne tsing'anda tse Imulungu kuwaghogha na kuwatowa iwanu wose iwakutoghole .
44022020	Na imkalangama wako Stefani hayakomighwe , nene tsanabaho , nitoghola kukomighwa kwake , na tsang'ala noghalolesa maghwanda ghe awala iwamkomile .
44022021	“ Kuya Imtwatsa kanongela , ‘ Ghenda , nokutuma kutali kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi . ’ ”
44022022	Iwanu wamtegheletsa Pauli mbaka hayalongile apfi . Kuya wandusa kukemelela , “ Mkomeni hayo ! Munu ka ayo ng'obamighwa bae kukala muisi ! ”
44022023	Hawang'ali wokemelela na ukwasa ghamaghwanda ghawo na ukupwililisa litimbwisi uchanya ,
44022024	imkulu we asikali kalaghitsa Pauli yaghalighwe mne liboma , kuya kalaghitsa wamghutse kwa kumtowa pfiboko , ili amanye ule iwanu womkemelela pfila .
44022025	Lekeni hawang'ali womwoha wamtowe , Pauli kamlongela imkulu yumwe we asikali yemile habehi , “ Apfi pfinogha mwemwe kumpfapula Mroma ng'ana yahighighwe bae ? ”
44022026	Imkulu ayo hahulike apfi , kaghenda kumlongela imkulu we asikali imbuli ayo , kalonga “ Angu ubama kutenda choni ? Imunu ayu Mroma . ”
44022027	Apfo imkulu we asikali kamghendela Pauli , kamghutsa , “ Nongele , ghweghwe kwa Mroma ? ” Pauli kamwidika , “ Ona . ”
44022028	Imkulu ayo kalonga , “ Tsaniliha sendi nyingi ili niwe Mroma . ” Pauli kamwidika , “ Nene na mwenye kaye wa Roma kwa kwelekighwa . ”
44022029	Bahala awala iwabamile kumghutsa Pauli wandusa kuka . Na imkulu we asikali hayamanyile Pauli tsakakala Mroma kapfuka , kwaapfila tsakamwoha .
44022030	Litsuwa lya keli , imkulu we asikali tsakabama amanye ghendo ule Wayahudi wamwing'a lighomba Pauli , kampfughula na kawalaghitsa iwakulu we inambiko na libaratsa lyose wetingane . Kuya kamghala Pauli , kamwika hambele hawo .
44023001	Pauli kawatsodelela tsinenge iwanu wa libaratsa , kuya kalonga , “ Ndughu tsangu , tsanimtumikila Imulungu kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile mbaka leloli . ”
44023002	Imtambika mkulu Ananiya kawalaghitsa awala iwakalile habehi na Pauli wamtowe mlomo wake .
44023003	Kuya Pauli kamlongela , “ Imulungu katsokutowa ghweghwe mng'enye . Ghweghwe kwa hano kunihigha kwa ghamalaghitso , lekeni ghweghwe imwenyegho koghahinya ghamalaghitso kwa kuwalongela iwanu wanitowe ! ”
44023004	Awala iwemile habehi na Pauli walonga , “ Ghweghwe , komligha mtambika mkulu we Imulungu ! ”
44023005	Pauli kedika , “ Ndughu tsangu , simanyile bae ka yeye ka mtambika mkulu , kwaapfila yandikighwa , ‘ uleke kumlonga pfihile imtawala we iwanu wako . ’ ”
44023006	Kuya Pauli hayamanyile ka iwanu iwakalile hala , wamwenga tsawakala Masadukayo na wangi tsawakala Mafarisayo , kakemelela mne libaratsa lila , “ Ndughu tsangu , nene na Mfarisayo , mwana wa Mfarisayo . Nene nohighighwa kwaapfila notoghola ka iwanu iwafile watsotsilihuka ! ”
44023007	Baha hayalongile apfo , Masadukayo na Mafarisayo wandusa kwisonga , baho mtingano ghwighola .
44023008	Kwaapfila Masadukayo wolonga kuduhu ukutsilihuka kwe iwanu , kuduhu wamalaika wala muhe , ila Mafarisayo wotoghola ghose agho .
44023009	Tsakulawila hengele kulu , na iwalangulitsi wa ghamalaghitso iwakalile Mafarisayo wema , walonga kwa ingupfu , “ Ng'atukona bae ichinu chochose ichihile kwa imunu ayu . Lamda malaika we Imulungu au muhe kalonga naye . ”
44023010	Hengele tsalikala kulu ng'ani , na ayula imkulu we asikali kapfuka iwanu wang'amghanile Pauli pfihindipfihindi . Apfo kalaghitsa iwanwele wahulumke , wamsole kwa ingupfu kulawa mne ghamoko ghawo , kuya wamghale mne liboma .
44023011	Chilo chila Imtwatsa tsakema habehi na Pauli , kamlongela , “ Uleke kupfuka ! Ka pfauwalongele mbuli tsangu iwanu wa hano Yerusalemu , pfipfila kobamighwa uwalongele iwanu Roma . ”
44023012	Nemitondo yake Wayahudi watingana , welaghana waleke ukuja wala ukunwa ichinu chochose mbaka hawatsomkoma Pauli .
44023013	Na iwanu iwatendile apfo tsawakala wabita iwanu alubaini .
44023014	Kuya waghenda kwe iwatambika wakulu ne iwabala , wawalongela , “ Twilaha kuleka ukuja na ukunwa mbaka hatutsomkoma Pauli .
44023015	Lelo mwemwe ne iwabala wa libaratsa mumlombe imkulu we asikali amghale Pauli kuna mwemwe , mtende ka mwobama kumanya pfinoghile mbuli tsake . Na twetwe twombeta mnzila tumkome ng'ana yapfike hano . ”
44023016	Lekeni mwighwaghe Pauli tsakahulika imbuli ayo , apfo kaghenda mne liboma , kamlongela Pauli mbuli ayo .
44023017	Kuya Pauli kamkema mkulu yumwe we asikali kamlongela , “ Umghale imsongolo yuno kwa imkulu we asikali , kana chinu kobama yamlongele . ”
44023018	Imkulu ayo kamsola imsongolo yula kamghala kwa imkulu we asikali , kamlongela , “ Pauli , ayula mwohighwa tsakang'ema , kanilomba nikughalile imsongolo yuno kwaapfila kana chinu kobama yakulongele . ”
44023019	Imkulu we asikali kamkinda ghumoko imsongolo yula , kaghenda naye hambalimbali , kamghutsa , “ Kobama unongele choni ? ”
44023020	Kamwidika , “ Wayahudi wobama wakulombe ilupfi umghale Pauli kuna libaratsa , wotenda ka wobama wamanye pfinoghile mbuli tsake .
44023021	Lekeni uleke kutoghola kwaapfila Wayahudi kubita wanu alubaini wombeta . Tsawelaha waleke ukuja wala ukunwa mbaka wamkome . Sambi wobeta , wololesa pfautsolamla . ”
44023022	Imkulu ayo kamlongela imsongolo ayo , “ Uleke kumlongela imunu wowose ka kunongela imbuli ino . ” Kuya kamleka yoke .
44023023	Kuya kawakema iwakulu weli we asikali , kawalaghitsa , “ Muwandae asikali miya mbili na iwadina farasi sabini na asikali iwokinda imighoha miya mbili , waghende Kaisariya saa tatu nechilo .
44023024	Mumwikile Pauli iwafalasi , mumghale tseghamba kwa Felikisi imtawala wa Chiroma mne isi ya Yudeya . ”
44023025	Kuya kandika pfino ibaluwa ,
44023026	“ Mbukwa ghwe imbala Felikisi . Nene Kilaudi Lisiya nokwandikila ghweghwe mtawala ,
44023027	“ Imunu yuno tsakaghoghighwa na Wayahudi na wabama wamkome , lekeni tsang'enda ne asikali kumkombola , kwaapfila tsanihulika yeye ka Mroma .
44023028	Tsanibama nimanye womwing'a lighomba lyachi , apfo nimghala mne libaratsa lyawo .
44023029	Tsambona wamwing'a lighomba kwaajili ya ghamalaghitso ghawo , lekeni tsakukala kuduhu totso ilimtenda yakomighwe au yohighwe .
44023030	Kuya hanongelighwe Wayahudi wobama inzila ye kumkoma imunu yuno , bahala nimghala kuna ghweghwe . Pfipfila niwalaghitsa iwamwing'ile lighomba walonge mbuli tsake kuna ghweghwe . ”
44023031	Apfo asikali wamsola Pauli ka pfawalaghitsighwe . Ichilo chichila wamghala Pauli mbaka Antipatiri .
44023032	Litsuwa liwinzile wawaleka awala iwadina farasi waghende naye , na asikali iwoghenda kwa imighulu woya mne liboma .
44023033	Iwadina farasi hawapfikile Kaisariya , wamwing'a ibaluwa ila imkulu ayo we isi , kuya wamwika Pauli hambele hake .
44023034	Hayamalitse kuisoma , kawaghutsa imunu yuno kalawila isi yachi ? Hawamlongele kolawa Kilikiya ,
44023035	kalonga , “ Nitsokutegheletsa baho iwakwing'ile lighomba hawatsokutsa hano . ” Kuya kalaghitsa Pauli alolesighwe mne ing'anda ye undewa ya Herodi .
44024001	Ghamatsuwa matano hambele , Imtambika mkulu Ananiya kahulumka Kaisariya hamwe ne iwabala ne imunu yumwe we ghamalaghitso yakemighwe Tetulo . Wamlongela imkulu ayo mbuli tsa Pauli .
44024002	Pauli hakemighwe , Tetulo kandusa kulonga hambele he Feliksi . “ Ghwe mbala , tsatudeng'elela kukala tseghamba kwa ghamatsuwa mengi mne utawala wako , na ipfinu pfingi ipfibamighwa pfitendighwa kwaajili ye isi yetu .
44024003	Agho ghose twoghabokela na kukutoghola chila hanu ghamatsuwa ghose .
44024004	Sibama bae kukutenda wipfe , lekeni nolomba utududumile na ututegheletse chidogho .
44024005	Tumwona imunu yuno ka mghobo , kandusa hengele mghati mwa Wayahudi wose muisi mwose . Naye ka chilongotsi wa Wanatsareti .
44024006	Yeye pfipfila tsakabama aihinye Ing'anda ye Imulungu , apfo tumghogha na tubama tumuhighe kwa ghamalaghitso ghetu .
44024007	Lekeni Lisiya , imkulu we iwang'ewele katsa , kumsola kwe ingupfu , kuya kawalaghitsa awala iwamwing'ile lighomba watse kuna ghweghwe .
44024008	Naghwe ung'amghutsa imunu yuno , kwodaha kughamanya ghose ighatutendile tumwing'e ghamaghomba . ”
44024009	Wayahudi nawo waghatoghola ghamaghomba agho , walonga apfo pfipfo pfaili .
44024010	Imkulu we ghumkoa kamgholosela chidole Pauli ili alonge , Pauli kalonga , “ Kwaapfila nomanya ghweghwe kwa imlamutsi we isi ino kwa imiyaka pilikichi , lelo neyamila kwa kudeng'elela .
44024011	Kodaha kumanya imwenyegho , ng'aghabitile bae ghamatsuwa kumi na meli kulawa hanighendile Yerusalemu kutamanila .
44024012	Iwanu wano ng'awambonile mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu nesonga ne imunu wowose , wala ukutenda hengele mne tsing'anda tse kulombela au hanu hohose mne ghumji .
44024013	Nawo ng'awodaha bae kukulangusa maghomba ghawo kuna nene ka gholongesa .
44024014	Bali nene notoghola ka nomtamanila Imulungu wa aba tsetu kwa nzila ila yawoikema wawo nzila ye ughutsu . Notoghola ghose ighandikighwe mne ipfitabu pfe ghamalaghitso na pfe manabii we Imulungu ,
44024015	na nene nomlolela Imulungu ka wawo pfawomlolela , ka kuna ukutsilihuka kwe iwanu iwafile , wose iwanoghile ne iwehile .
44024016	Apfo ghamatsuwa ghose nekatsa niwe na ghumoyo ghunoghile kwe Imulungu na kwe iwanu .
44024017	“ Tsanikala kutali kwa imiyaka mingi , lelo mbuya Yerusalemu kuwaghalila nzawadi iwahingwa we isi yangu na kulapfa nambiko .
44024018	Tsawambona mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu haning'ali notenda pfinu apfo , tsawanipfika nimalitsa ukudeghetetsighwa . Tsakukala haduhu iwanu wengi hamwe na nene , kuya tsahaduhu hengele lyolyose .
44024019	Lekeni tsakukala na Wayahudi wangi iwalawile isi ya Asiya , hawo tsawabamighwa wawe hano hambele hako kughala lighomba ka wana imbuli yoyose kuna nene .
44024020	Au iwanu wano iwenyegho walonge totso lyachi lyawonile kuna nene hanyimile hambele ha libalatsa ,
44024021	ila tsanonga chinu chino kwa kukemelela hambele hawo , ‘ Nohighighwa kwaapfila notoghola iwanu watsotsilihuka . ’ ”
44024022	Kuya Felikisi , iyamanyile ghoya mbuli tse Inzila ila , kemitsa lighomba alyo , kawalongela , “ Nitsolamla lighomba lyenu hayatsokutsa Lisiya , imkulu we asikali . ”
44024023	Kuya kamlaghitsa imkulu we asikali yamlolese Pauli , lekeni yamlekele chidogho , na yawaleke sale tsake wamwapfile .
44024024	Haghabitile ghamatsuwa mengi Felikisi katsa na mwehe wake Dulisila , iyakalile Myahudi . Kalaghitsa Pauli yakemighwe na kamtegheletsa hayang'ali yolonga mbuli tse ukumtoghola Yesu Kiristu .
44024025	Lekeni Pauli hayang'ali yoghendelela ukulonga mbuli iimtenda imunu yanoghe hambele he Imulungu , na mbuli tsa kuwa na kiyasi , na mbuli tse litsuwa lya ukuhighighwa ilikutsa , Felikisi ang'ali yopfuka , kalonga , “ Uleke tanu , sambi kodaha kughenda , hanitsopata nyafasi nitsokukema . ”
44024026	Kuya Feliksi tsayang'ali yololela ka Pauli ang'amwing'ile sendi , apfo chila mala tsakamkema na kulonga naye .
44024027	Imiyaka mili haimalile , Polikiyo Festo tsakambokela Felikisi kutawala , kawa imkulu we isi . Lekeni kwaapfila Felikisi tsakabama awadeng'elese Wayahudi , kamleka Pauli mwigheletsa .
44025001	Ghamatsuwa madatu kulawa hapfikile Kaisariya , Festo kagheluka Yerusalemu ,
44025002	ako iwatambika wakulu na iwabala wa Wayahudi wamlongela maghomba gha Pauli .
44025003	Wamlomba yawanoghese kwa kumghala Pauli Yerusalemu ili wamkome hayang'ali mnzila .
44025004	Festo kawedika , “ Pauli kamwigheletsa ako Kaisariya , na nene nobama mbuye ako matsuwa chidogho ighakutsa .
44025005	Mleke pfilongotsi wenu wamwenga waghende na nene , waghale maghomba ghake , ka katenda ichinu chochose chihile . ”
44025006	Festo hayamalitse kukala nawo ghamatsuwa manane au kumi , kahulumka Kaisariya , litsuwa liwinzile kaghenda kune libalatsa , kalaghitsa Pauli yaghalighwe amo .
44025007	Pauli hapfikile awala Wayahudi iwatsile kulawa Yerusalemu wema habehi naye , wamlapfila maghomba makulu , ghang'awadahile kulangusa ka ghana ukweli .
44025008	Baho Pauli kabela kalonga , “ Nene sitendile chochose chihile mna malaghitso gha Wayahudi , wala mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , wala kwa imndewa wa Roma . ”
44025009	Lekeni Festo kabama awadeng'elese Wayahudi , kamlongela Pauli , “ Pfii kobama kughenda Yerusalemu ukahighighwe ako hambele hangu kwa maghomba ghano ? ”
44025010	Pauli kedika , “ Nene nakwima hano mne libalatsa lya mndewa wa Roma , nobamighwa nihighighwe hano . ka ghweghwe imwenyegho pfumanya ghoya , sitendile bae ichinu chochose chihile kwa Wayahudi .
44025011	Lelo ka kuna ichinu chochose chihile chanendile ichitenda nikomighwe , silema kufa bae . Lekeni maghomba ghawangaile Wayahudi ng'agholongesa bae , haduhu imunu iyodaha kunyika mne ghamoko ghawo . Ngaleni kwa imndewa wa Roma ! ”
44025012	Kuya Festo hamalitse kulonga ne iwanu wake wa libalatsa , kalonga , “ Kobama ughende kwa imndewa wa Roma , haya kutsoghenda kwa imndewa wa Roma ! ”
44025013	Ghamatsuwa chidogho haghabitile , mndewa Agiripa na Benike wapfika Kaisariya kumlamsa Festo .
44025014	Hawakalile ako kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho , Festo kamlongela imndewa mbuli tsa Pauli . Kalonga , “ Ahano hana imunu , Felikisi tsakamleka mwigheletsa .
44025015	Hang'endile Yerusalemu , iwatambika wakulu na iwabala wa Wayahudi wanongela ghamaghomba ghake , kuya wabama yahighighwe .
44025016	Na nene niwalongela si pfipfo bae pfawotendagha Waroma , kumkoma imunu wowose ng'ana yetingane ne iwanu iwamwing'ile ghamaghomba na kumleka yeyamile .
44025017	Hawatsile hano , na nene sikawile bae , litsuwa liwinzile tsanikala mne libalatsa , nilaghitsa imunu yuno yaghalighwe .
44025018	Iwanu wala iwaghalile lighomba , hawemile ng'awalongile ichinu chihile kuna yeye ka pfandolele .
44025019	Bali tsawang'ali wesonga naye mna mbuli tsawo tsa kutamanila na mbuli tse imunu yumwe iyafile , iyakemighwe Yesu , lekeni Pauli ang'ali yolonga imunu ayo ka mghima .
44025020	Kwaapfila tsasimanyile bae nendetse kwa ghamaghomba ghano , apfo nimghutsa Pauli ka tsakabama yaghende Yerusalemu yahighighwe ako .
44025021	Lekeni Pauli kabama yahighighwe na Mkulu wa Roma . Apfo nilaghitsa akale hano mbaka hanitsoghenda kwa mndewa wa Roma . ”
44025022	Kuya Agiripa kamlongela Festo , “ Na nene nobama nimuhulike imunu yuno . ” Festo kedika , “ Kutsomuhulika ilupfi . ”
44025023	Litsuwa liwinzile Agiripa na Benike watsa aku wapfala maghwanda ghanoghile gha undewa , wengila hane libalatsa kwa ndeng'elelo hamwe na iwakulu we asikali na iwakulu wa kaye . Festo kalaghitsa Pauli yaghalighwe mghati .
44025024	Festo kalonga , “ Imndewa Agiripa ne iwanu wose yamli hano , momwona imunu yuno ! Wayahudi wose ako Yerusalemu na hano Kaisariya wanilomba nimlapfe yakomighwe .
44025025	Lekeni nene sonile bae ichinu chochose ichimtenda yakomighwe , naye kwaapfila tsakabama yahighighwe na Mkulu wa Roma , ndamla kumghala Roma .
44025026	Lekeni nene nahela imbuli ya ukumwandikila Imtawala mkulu . Apfo nimghala hano hambele henu , ghendoghendo hambele hako ghweghwe Imndewa Agiripa , mng'amalitsa kumghutsa nipate ichinu cha ukwandika .
44025027	Kwaapfila nakona ng'apfinoghile bae kumghala mwohighwa bila kulangusa ghomba lyake . ”
44026001	Kuya Agiripa kamlongela Pauli , “ Sambi kodaha kwiyamila . ” Baho Pauli kenula ghumoko , kandusa kwiyamila .
44026002	“ Mndewa Agiripa , leloli nebona nina ndondokela ukwima hambele hako kwiyamila ghamaghomba ghose gha Wayahudi . ”
44026003	Kwaapfila ghweghwe komanya pfihendo pfose pfa Wayahudi na aghala ghose ghawehisanyila . Apfo nolomba ufunye ghumoyo unitegheletse .
44026004	“ Wayahudi wose womanya pfanikalile kulawa udodo wangu , pfanikalile muisi mwangu kulawa mwanduso , na pfipfila ako Yerusalemu .
44026005	Wanimanya kulawa ghumwande , nawo ka wobama wodaha kukulongela ka tsanikala mne kingili lya Mafarisayo iwamtamanila ng'ani Imulungu kubita wanu wangi .
44026006	Lelo nyima hano nyihighighwe kwaapfila notoghola laghano lyekile Imulungu ne iwabala wetu .
44026007	Ghamakabila ghetu kumi na meli ghobetetsa laghano alyo litimile , ka pfaghomtumikila ghoya Imulungu ichilo ne imisi . Lelo kwaajili ayo , ghwe Mndewa , Wayahudi wanighala mwigheletsa .
44026008	Ebali mwakona ng'aidahika bae Imulungu kuwatsilihula iwanu iwafile ?
44026009	Nene imwenyegho tsambona nobamighwa nende ghose ighodahika ili kupinga taghwa lya Yesu wa Natsareti .
44026010	Tsanenda apfo ako Yerusalemu , kwa ghamalaghitso ghe iwatambika wakulu tsaniwaghela mwigheletsa wahenzeluka wengi , na hawang'ali wokomighwa na nene tsaning'ali notoghola wakomighwe .
44026011	Ghamatsuwa mengi tsaning'ali nighendagha mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela na kuwatowa , kuya tsaniwananaitsa waleke kumtoghola Imulungu . Tsaning'ali niwehila ghendo , mbaka tsang'enda imiji ya kutali kuwadununza .
44026012	“ Litsuwa limwe tsaning'ali nighenda Damasko aku ning'ighwa uwetso na malaghitso ghe iwatambika wakulu .
44026013	Mndewa wangu , nemisi haning'ali mnzila , mbona lumwesa kulawa kulanga lwong'ala kubita litsua , lunimwemwesela nene na wayangu chila ubali .
44026014	Wose tsatughwa hasi , nene nihulika litsi lyonongela kwa Chihebraniya , ‘ Sauli , Sauli ! Ebali konidununza ? Kwelagha hela ka ng'ombe yoitowa teke ng'weku ye imtwatsa wake . ’
44026015	Kuya nimghutsa , ‘ Mtwatsa , ghweghwe nani ? ’ Mtwatsa kanyidika , ‘ Nene na Yesu yumdununza .
44026016	Sambi winuke wime . Nikulawila kwaapfila nikusaghula uwe imtumighwa na imkalangama wa agha ghaughonile , na ghanitsokulangusa .
44026017	Nitsokukombola mne iwanu wako na iwanu iwali si Wayahudi ako kwanikutuma ,
44026018	uwafumbule nenge tsawo na kuwalapfa mchisi wengile hatselu , walawe mne ingupfu ya Setani , wamghalukile Imulungu , kwa kunitoghola nene , waleghusighwe nzambi na wahale hamwe na wose iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu . ’
44026019	“ Apfo Mndewa Agiripa , sighalemile bae maono agho gha kulanga .
44026020	Ila nyandusa kwa iwanu wa Damasko , kuya kwa awala iwali Yerusalemu na Yudeya yose , na kwa iwanu si Wayahudi bae . Niwapetela watsileke nzambi tsawo wamuyile Imulungu na walanguse kwa ghamatendo ghawo ka watsileka nzambi .
44026021	Kwaapfila nenda apfi , Wayahudi wanighogha mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu , na tsawabama wang'ome .
44026022	Lekeni Imulungu kanyapfila , mbaka leloli nene nakwima hano kulapfa ukalangama kwe iwadodo ne iwabala . Silonga ichinu chingi bae , ila nowalongela aghala ghawalongile manabii we Imulungu na Musa ka ghang'alawile .
44026023	Ka Kiristu Mkombotsi tsakabamighwa yadununzike na ang'awile wa mwanduso kutsilihuka , apfo ang'adahile kughala ghumwanga kwa Wayahudi na kwa Iwanu si Wayahudi bae . ”
44026024	Pauli hang'ali keyamila apfo , Festo kakemelela , “ Pauli ! Kuna lukwale ! Kusoma ng'ani kwausomile kukughela lukwale . ”
44026025	Pauli kedika , “ Mkulu Festo , nene si mkalukwale bae , nolonga mbuli itsilongesa na tsa ihekima .
44026026	Mndewa Agiripa komanya ipfinu pfino pfose , na nene nodaha kulonga nae bila kupfuka kwaapfila nomanya kuduhu ichinu ichitendeke chinyelenyele .
44026027	Mndewa Agiripa , apfi kowatoghola manabii we Imulungu ? Nomanya kowatoghola . ”
44026028	Kuya Agiripa kamghutsa Pauli , “ Apfi kopfikitsa kodaha kunenda niwe mkiristu kwa ichipindi chino chidodo ? ”
44026029	Pauli kamwidika , “ Nomlomba Imulungu mne ichipindi chidodo au chikulu , si ghweghwe uliyeka bae , ila wose yamnitegheletsa leloli , mdahe kuwa ka pfanili nene , lekeni bila iminyororo ino . ”
44026030	Kuya imndewa , imkulu we ghumkowa na Benike , hamwe na awala iwakalile nawo wose tsawenuka .
44026031	Na hawang'ali wakuka welongela , “ Imunu yuno ng'atendile ichinu ichimtenda yakomighwe wala ukwikighwa mwigheletsa . ”
44026032	Agiripa kamlongela Festo , “ Imunu yuno ang'alekelelighwe ka ng'abamile bae kuhighighwa na imndewa wa Roma . ”
44027001	Hailamlighwe tughende Italiya , Pauli na iwohighwa wangi wekighwa mne ghamoko gha imkulu yumwe wa asikali iyakemighwe Juliasi , wa chikosi ichikemighwe cha Agusti .
44027002	Tudina mne imeli iilawile Adiramito iibamile kuka kubitila mne mwani tsa isi ye Asiya , kuya tuka . Aristariko imunu wa Makedoniya iyolawila Tesalonike tsakakala mmeli na twetwe .
44027003	Litsuwa liwinzile tupfika ako Sidoni , Juliasi tsaang'ali yomtendela pfinoghile Pauli , tsakamleka aghende kuna sale tsake ili wamwing'e aghala ghayobama .
44027004	Kulawa ako tughendelela na ghumwanza , tubita habehi ne ichisiwa cha Kupulo kwaapfila libeho tsaling'ali likupa ng'ani .
44027005	Tsatuloka ibahali ya Kilikiya na Pamfiliya , tupfika Mira ako Likiya .
44027006	Ako imkulu yula wa asikali kaipfika imeli ya Alekisandiliya iighenda Italiya , apfo katulongela tudine amwo .
44027007	Tughendelela na ghumwanza lughalugha kwa ghamatsuwa mengi , kwa ukughaya tsatupfika habehi na Nido . Kwaapfila libeho tsaling'ali lyotughoma , tubita lubali lwe kuisi lwe Kirete habehi na Salimone .
44027008	Kuya tubita kumwani kwa kughaya , kuya tupfika hanu hakemighwe Bandari Inoghile , habehi na kaye ya Leseya .
44027009	Ghamatsuwa mengi tsaghabita , na litsuwa lya ukufunga ukuja tsalibita . c Ghumwanza tsaghukala ghwa mne ihatari ng'ani . Apfo Pauli kawakanya ,
44027010	“ Walume weyangu , nakona ghumwanza ghwetu ghutsakuwa na maghayo tutsakwaghitsa imitsigho , imeli na ughima wetu pfipfila . ”
44027011	Lekeni imkulu wa asikali kaleka kuhulikitsa ghayalongile Pauli , kawahulikitsa imkulu we imeli na imunu yane imeli ayo .
44027012	Kwaapfila bandari ila ng'ainoghile bae kukala mne ghamatsuwa gha chipfeghetsi , iwanu wangi walamla tulawe ako tughende Foinike ka ing'adahike , na kukala ako ghamatsuwa ghose gha ichipfeghetsi . Foinike tsaikala ibandari ya Kirete iilolese lubali lwa kuchanya na lubali lwa kuisi kwa liswela litsuwa .
44027013	Na libeho lya lubali lwa kuhisi halyanduse kuduma chidoghochidogho , tsawapfikitsa wapata chawabamile , apfo wandusa ghumwanza na kubita kumwani kwa kumwani habehi na Kirete .
44027014	Hambele chidogho , libeho kali ng'ani liduma kulawa kuchanya kughenda kwalilawila litsuwa . Tsaliduma kulawa mne ichisiwa .
44027015	Imeli tsaing'ali itowighwa na libeho na ng'ahidaile bae kuliking'a libeho . Apfo tuileka imeli isolighwe na libeho .

44028022	Lekeni twobama tukuhulike ghweghwe ghumwenyegho ulongatse , kwaapfila chatumanya twetwe chila hanu iwanu wolilonga pfihile kingili lyako lino . ”
