45002029	Lekeni Myahudi ghendo iyo yula iyali Myahudi kwa mghati , ayula yengile ngoma mne ghumoyo ghwake . Aino isang'ano ye Ghumuhe we Imulungu , si chinu cha ghamalaghitso ighandikighwe . Imunu iyali apfi kotogholighwa ne Imulungu , si ne iwanu bae .
45003001	Angu lelo Myahudi kana chinu chachi ichongetseke kubita wanu wangi ? Apfi ukwingila ngoma chinu chikulu ?
45003002	Ona , kuna pfinu pfikulu pfingi . Chamwanduso , Wayahudi tsaweng'ighwa imbuli ye Imulungu .
45003003	Ka wamwenga wawo ng'awomtoghola Imulungu bae , pfii chinu acho chitsomtenda Imulungu aleke kutogholighwa ?
45003004	Mbe , si pfipfo bae ! Leka Imulungu yoneke kolongesa , na chila imunu kamghutsu . Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka , “ Chila haulonga mbuli tsako chila munu kakona tsolongesa na hauhigha ghweghwe kwohuma . ”
45003005	Lekeni ka ukwiha kwetu kwolangusa Imulungu kotenda pfinoghile , lelo tulonge choni ? Tulonge Imulungu kototsa hayotuhigha ? Ahano nolonga ka imunu .
45003006	Si pfipfo bae ! Ing'awile apfo , Imulungu ang'adahiletse kuihigha isi ?
45003007	Imunu yumwe kodaha kulonga , “ Ka ughutsu wangu wakongetsa ukulongesa kwe Imulungu na wakongetsa utunitso wake , lelo ule nohighighwa ka nina nzambi ? ”
45003008	Ule ng'atulonga , “ Leka tutende ghehile ili ighanoghile ghatse ? ” Iwanu wangi wandigha , walonga ka nene nolangulitsa apfo . Watsohighighwa ka pfawobamighwa .
45003009	Tulonge choni lelo ? Twetwe Wayahudi tunogha kubita iwanu wangi ? Mbe ! Ka pfaniwalongele aho mwanduso ka Wayahudi na iwanu wangi wose wana nzambi .
45003010	Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ; “ Kuduhu hata yumwe iyanoghile ,
45003011	kuduhu hata yumwe iyotanga , kuduhu hata yumwe iyombama Imulungu .
45003012	Wose wamleka Imulungu , wose wawa ka wola , kuduhu yotenda ghanoghile , kuduhu hata yumwe .
45003013	Mimelo yawo iwa ka tsikabuli itsili mwatsi milimi yawo yolonga ughutsu . Mmilomo mwawo wana tsimbuli tsine sumu ka ya nzoka .
45003014	Milomo yawo imema ukulighita na usungu mkulu .
45003015	Ghamaghulu ghawo ghotsumilila ukukoma .
45003016	Hohose hawoghenda wohinya na woleka maghayo .
45003017	Ng'awamanyile bae kukala tseghamba .
45003018	Ng'awompfuka Imulungu bae . ”
45003019	Lelo twomanya ka Ghamalaghitso gha Musa hagholonga , gholonga ne iwanu wala iwobamighwa kulongotsighwa na Ghamalaghitso ili chila munu yaleke kudaha kwiyamila , na wanu wose wahighighwe ne Imulungu .
45003020	Apfo kuduhu imunu wowose yatsopetighwa kanogha hambele he Imulungu kwa kutenda pfaghobama Ghamalaghitso , ila Ghamalaghitso ghotutenda twalangitse kutenda nzambi .
45003021	Lekeni sambi , Imulungu kaitenda inzila yake ya kuwatenda iwanu kuwa wanogha hambele hake imwenyegho imanyike . Inzila ino ng'aihuwila ghamalaghitso bae . Hata ipfitabu pfa Ghamalaghitso ipfiandikighwe na Musa na pfa manabii pfolangusa chinu chino .
45003022	Imulungu kowatenda iwanu kuwa wanogha hambele hake kwa kumtoghola Yesu Kiristu . Imulungu kotenda apfo kwe iwanu wose iwomtoghola Kiristu , kuduhu ubaghutsi wowose kwa Wayahudi ne iwanu wangi ,
45003023	kwaapfila chila imunu katenda nzambi na kuhungukighwa ne utunitso we Imulungu .
45003024	Lekeni kwa uluso wa hela we Imulungu , iwanu wose watsotendighwa wanogha hambele he Imulungu kubitila Yesu Kiristu iyowaghombola .
45003025	Imulungu kamlapfa Yesu ili kwa lifwa lyake yawe nzila ya kuwaleghusila iwanu nzambi tsawo kwa ukutoghola idamu yake . Katenda apfi ili kulangusa ukunogha kwake hambele he iwanu kwaapfila mne ukududumila kwake yeye ng'atsihighile bae tsinzambi itsilongole kutendighwa .
45003026	Katenda apfo ili kulangusa haki yake kwe iwanu , ili yawe yane haki na yadahe kumtenda yawe na haki imunu wowose iyomtoghola Yesu .
45003027	Lelo twodaha kwighodela choni ? Haduhu ! Pfii imunu kodaha kwighoda kwa kukinda Ghamalaghitso ? Bae , ila kwa ukutoghola .
45003028	Kwaapfila imunu kotendighwa kanogha kwe Imulungu kwa ukutoghola , na si kwa ukukinda Ghamalaghitso bae .
45003029	Angu Imulungu ka Imulungu wa Wayahudi waliheka ? Angu naye si Imulungu wa iwanu wangi ? Ona yeye ka Imulungu wa iwanu wangi ,
45003030	kwaapfila Imulungu ka yumwe , na yeye katsowatenda wanoghe kuna yeye kwa ukutoghola kwawo Wayahudi iwekema wengila ngoma , pfipfila katsowatenda wanoghe kuna yeye kwa ukutoghola kwawo iwanu iwali si Wayahudi , iwokemighwa ng'awengile ngoma .
45003031	Pfii lelo twogheka hambali Ghamalaghitso kwa ukutoghola kuno ? Mbe , si pfipfo bae , ila twoghawinza Ghamalaghitso agho .
45004001	Lelo tulongetse mbuli tse mbala wetu Abrahamu , pfayatangile chinu chino ?
45004002	Mana ka Abrahamu tsakapetighwa kanogha kwa aghala ghayatendile , ang'awile na chinu cha kwighodela , lekeni si hambele he Imulungu bae .
45004003	Angu Ghamaandiko gholongatse ? Gholonga , “ Abrahamu tsakamtoghola Imulungu , apfo koneka kanogha hambele he Imulungu . ”
45004004	Imunu hayosang'ana , ng'olihighwa bae ka ghweko , ila kolihighwa ka maliho .
45004005	Lekeni awala ing'awohuwila ghamatendo ghawo ghanoghile , ila womtoghola Imulungu , kwa ukutoghola kwawo Imulungu kowapeta wanogha kuna yeye . Imulungu yowatenda iwanu wehile woneke wahela nzambi .
45004006	Daudi tsakalonga chinu chichino , hayalongile ukubweda kwe imunu yula iyopetighwa kanogha kwe Imulungu bila kulola chatendile .
45004007	“ Wabweda awala iwaleghusighwe matotso ghawo , na nzambi tsawo itsileghusighwe .
45004008	Kabweda imunu yula nzambi tsake ing'atsipetighwa bae ne Imtwatsa ! ”
45004009	Pfii ukubweda kuno , wobweda awala Wayahudi iwekema iwengile ngoma waliyeka au pfipfila na awala iwanu iwali si Wayahudi iwokemighwa ing'awengile ngoma bae ? Ka pfanongole kulonga , Abrahamu tsakamtoghola Imulungu na kwa ukutoghola kwake kapetighwa kana haki .
45004010	Lelo apetelighwe tsuwachi ka kana haki ? Hala hang'ali ng'ana yengile ngoma au hengile ngoma ? Tsakapetighwa kana haki hang'ali ng'ana yengile ngoma na si hengile ngoma bae !
45004011	Abrahamu tsakengila ngoma hambele , na kwingila ngoma kwake tsakukala chitango cha ukulangusa ka Imulungu kamtenda kana haki kwaajili ya ukutoghola kwake hala ng'ana yengile ngoma . Apfo Abrahamu kawa aba we iwanu iwomtoghola Imulungu hata ka ng'awengile ngoma bae ili Imulungu yawapete wana haki .
45004012	Pfipfila Abrahamu ka aba wa awala iwengile ngoma , lekeni si kwa kwingila ngoma kuliheka bae , ila kwaapfila woiwinza nzila ila ya ukutoghola yakalile nayo aba wetu Abrahamu yaiwinzile ahala ng'ana yengile ngoma .
45004013	Imulungu tsakamlongela Abrahamu ne iwatsukulu wake ka isi yose ing'awile yawo . Watsoibokela isi yose si kwaapfila Abrahamu tsakatenda ka ghamalaghitso pfaghalongile , ila kwaapfila kamtoghola Imulungu , Imulungu kamtenda kana haki .
45004014	Kwaapfila ka aghala ghayalongile Imulungu wakwing'ighwa iwanu wala iwoghakinda Ghamalaghitso waliheka , lelo ukutoghola kutsakuwa kwahela sang'ano , na pfipfila chayalongile Imulungu chitsakuwa chahela sang'ano .
45004015	Ghamalaghitso ghoghala maya ye Imulungu , lekeni ka kuduhu Ghamalaghitso , kung'akalile kuduhu matotso .
45004016	Apfo , laghano lyehuwila ukutoghola , ili laghano lila lyoneke ghweko lye Imulungu kwa kolo tsose tsa Abrahamu , si kwa awala iwoghakinda Ghamalaghitso waliyeka , ila pfipfila kwa awala iwotoghola ka pfayatendile Abrahamu , iyali aba wetu wose .
45004017	Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Nikusaghula uwe aba wa makabila mengi . ” Yeye ka aba wetu hambele he Imulungu iyamtoghole . Imulungu iyoweng'a ughima iwanu iwafile na kwa laghitso lyake , ipfinu ing'apfili baho pfakuwa baho .
45004018	Hata hakukalile haduhu ichinu ichimtendile Abrahamu alolele laghano , Abrahamu kamtoghola Imulungu na kulilolela laghano , apfo kawa aba wa ghamakabila ghose . Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Mweleko ghwako ghutsakuwa ketseketse ka tsinondo ! ”
45004019	Abrahamu tsakalala , na miyaka yake tsaikala ka miya imwe , lekeni yeye tsakatoghola ghendo , hata ka tsakamanya ng'odaha bae kupata imwana , na mwehe wake Sara ng'adahile bae kweleka .
45004020	Abrahamu ng'alekile bae kulitoghola laghano lye Imulungu , ila kapata ingupfu kwa ukutoghola kwake , apfo kamtunitsa Imulungu .
45004021	Tsakamanya ghendo ka Imulungu kodaha kughatenda aghala ghalaghane naye .
45004022	Apfo kwa ukutoghola kwake , “ Imulungu kampeta Abrahamu ka imunu yanoghile kuna yeye . ”
45004023	Mbuli ino “ tsakapetighwa kanogha kwe Imulungu , ” tsang'ayandikighwe kwaajili ya Abrahamu yaliheka bae ,
45004024	ila na twetwe pfipfila yatupetighwa tunogha kwe Imulungu yatumtoghola , iyamtsilihule Imtwatsa wetu Yesu .
45004025	Yeye tsakalapfighwa yafe kwaajili ya nzambi tsetu , kuya katsilihuka ili tupetighwe tunogha kwe Imulungu .
45005001	Apfo kwa ukutoghola tutendighwa twahela matotso hambele he Imulungu , lelo twokala tseghamba ne Imulungu kubitila Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu .
45005002	Kwa ukutoghola kwetu , Yesu katughala kune uluso we Imulungu , na bila kupfuka twololela utunitso we Imulungu .
45005003	Si chinu acho chiliheka bae , pfipfila toghadeng'elela maghayo ghetu , kwaapfila twomanya maghayo ghoghala ukududumila ,
45005004	ukududumila kwoghala ukutogholighwa ne Imulungu , na ukutogholighwa ne Imulungu koghala lolelo .
45005005	Lolelo ng'alimghela imunu chinyala bae , kwaapfila Imulungu kawika unoghelo wake mmimoyo mwetu kubitila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyatwing'ile twetwe .
45005006	Mana hatung'ali twahela ngupfu , Kiristu tsakafa kwaajili ya iwanu wehile .
45005007	Pfikomu kwe imunu wowose ukufa kwaajili ya imunu yane haki , lekeni yodahika imunu ukufa kwaajili ya imunu yanoghile .
45005008	Lekeni Imulungu katulangusa pfotunoghela . Hatung'ali twawanzambi , Kiristu tsakafa kwaajili ya twetwe .
45005009	Kwaapfila kwa idamu yake tupetighwa twahela nzambi , tutsokombolighwa ghendo na yeye mne maya ye Imulungu !
45005010	Kwaapfila hatukalile wehile we Imulungu , tsakatulamlitsa naye kubitila lifwa lye Imwanaghe . Kwaapfila sambi tulamlitsighwa naye , tutsokombolighwa ghendo kubitila ughima wake !
45005011	Lekeni si agho ghaliyeka bae , ila wose twodeng'elela kwa aghala ghatendile Imulungu kubitila Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu iyatulamlitse ne Imulungu .
45005012	Nzambi tsaingila muisi kubitila imunu yumwe na lifwa lingila kubitila nzambi . Apfo lifwa liwatsila iwanu wose , kwaapfila wose tsawatenda nzambi .
45005013	Hala ng'ana Ghamalaghitso gha Musa ghalapfighwe bae , nzambi tsayamuisi . Lekeni nzambi ng'aipetighwe bae ka nzambi hala hakukalile kuduhu Ghamalaghitso .
45005014	Lekeni Iifwa tsalitawala kulawa ghamatsuwa gha Adamu mbaka ghamatsuwa gha Musa , na hata kwa awala ing'awatendile nzambi ka nzambi iyatendile Adamu . Adamu tsakakala chitango cha Kiristu iyatsile hambele .
45005015	Lekeni ghweko lye Imulungu ng'alighala bae na totso lya Adamu . Mana hata ka iwanu wengi tsawafa kwa totso lya imunu yumwe , Imulungu katsakongetsa uluso wake na ghweko ilikwenela kwa iwanu wengi , kulawa kwa imunu yumwe , iyo Yesu Kiristu .
45005016	Ghweko lya Imulungu ng'alighala bae na totso lye imunu yumwe . Kwaapfila imunu yumwe hayatotsile , Imulungu tsakahigha , lekeni hala hawatotsile iwanu wengi , Imulungu kaghala ghweko lya ukuwapeta iwanu wanogha .
45005017	Kwa nzambi ya imunu yumwe , lifwa tsalitawala kubitila imunu ayo yumwe . Lekeni yolangusa ghendo , chayatendile imunu yula yumwe , Yesu Kiristu , chikulu sideke . Wose iwobokela uluso mkulu we Imulungu na ghweko kulu lye kupetighwa wanogha kwe Imulungu , watsotawala mne ughima kubitila Yesu Kiristu .
45005018	Lelo ka totso limwe litenda iwanu wose wahighighwe , pfipfila chinu chimwe chinoghile chowakombola iwanu wose na choweng'a ughima .
45005019	Kwaapfila kwa ukuleka kuhulikitsa kwa imunu yumwe , iwanu wengi tsawengila mnzambi , apfo pfipfila kwa ukuhulikitsa kwa imunu yumwe , iwanu wengi tsawatendighwa wanogha kwe Imulungu .
45005020	Ghamalaghitso tsaghalawila ili ghamatotso ghongetseke , lekeni nzambi hayongetseke , uluso we Imulungu nawo tsawongetseka ghendo .
45005021	Ka nzambi pfaitawale mne lifwa , pfipfila uluso we Imulungu utsotawala kubitila ukunogha kwe Imulungu , na kughala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose kubitila Yesu Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu .
45006001	Lelo tulonge choni ? Apfi tughendelele kukala mnzambi ili uluso we Imulungu wongetseke ?
45006002	Mbe ! Twetwe tufa mne nzambi , lelo tudahatse kukala keli mne nzambi ?
45006003	Angu ng'ammanyile bae ka hatubatitsighwe tsatwilunga na Kiristu Yesu ? Twetwe tsatwilunga mne lifwa lyake kwa kubatitsighwa .
45006004	Kuya hatubatitsighwe tsatutsikighwa hamwe naye na twilunga mne lifwa lyake , ili ka Kiristu pfayasilihuke kulawa mne lifwa kwa utunitso wa Aba , pfipfila na twetwe tudahe kukala mne ughima wa sambi .
45006005	Kwaapfila ka twilunga naye mne ukufa , pfipfila twitselunga naye mne ukutsilihuka .
45006006	Kwaapfila twomanya unu wetu wa ghumwande uwambighwa hamwe na Kiristu mne msalaba ili ngupfu ye nzambi mlukuli mwetu ihinyighwe , ili tuleke kuwa watumwa we nzambi keli .
45006007	Kwaapfila hatukufa mne nzambi , twokombolighwa kulawa mne nzambi .
45006008	Lelo ka tufa naye Kiristu , twotoghola ka tutsokala naye .
45006009	Kwaapfila twomanya Kiristu tsakasilihuka , naye ng'akufa keli bae , lifwa ng'alimtawala keli bae .
45006010	Apfo kwaapfila tsakafa mala lumwe , nzambi yahela ngupfu keli kuna yeye , na ughima woyokala , kokala hamwe ne Imulungu .
45006011	Pfipfila namwe mwipete muwenyegho ka mfa mne nzambi , lekeni mwa waghima kwe Imulungu kubitila Yesu Kiristu .
45006012	Apfo nzambi ileke kutawala mne ng'uli tsenu itsikufa , ili mleke kutsiwinza dong'o tsa lukuli .
45006013	Mleke kulapfa pfilungo pfe ng'uli tsenu pfitende ghehile , ila mwilapfe iwenyegho kwe Imulungu , ka iwanu imtsihulighwe kulawa mne lifwa , pfilapfeni pfilungo pfenu kwe Imulungu pfisang'ane aghala ighanoghile ka pfayobama Imulungu .
45006014	Nzambi ng'aitsowatawala keli bae , kwaapfila mwemwe ng'amlongosighwa na ghamalaghitso , ila mwolongosighwa na uluso .
45006015	Lelo tulonge choni ? Angu tutende ghehile kwaapfila ng'atulongotsighwa na ghamalaghitso bae , ila twolongotsighwa na uluso ? Si pfipfo bae !
45006016	Mwemwe mwomanya ghendo ka hamwilapfa muwenyegho ka watumwa kumtegheletsa imunu yungi , mwemwe mwakuwa watumwa wa ayula yamumtegheletsa . Mng'awa watumwa we nzambi mtsomalila mlifwa , mng'awa watumwa we ukutegheletsa mtsakoneka mnogha kwe Imulungu .
45006017	Lekeni mighede kwe Imulungu , kwaapfila hata ka tsamwawatumwa wa nzambi , lekeni sambi mwoghakinda kwa ghumoyo ghwenu ghwose aghala ghose ighali mne malangulitso ighambokele .
45006018	Mwemwe tsamkombolighwa kulawa mne nzambi , na muwa watumwa we aghala ghobama Imulungu mghatende .
45006019	Hano silonga bae mbuli ng'omu kwaapfila mwemwe ng'amdaha kumanya chanilonga . Ka ghumwande pfamtoghole kuwa watumwa wa ghehile na matotso , pfipfila sambi mtoghole kuwa watumwa wa aghala ghobama Imulungu ili mwenzelusighwe .
45006020	Kwaapfila hamuwile watumwa we nzambi , tsamkala ng'amlongotsighwa na aghala ghobama Imulungu .
45006021	Angu chambwedile choni ghamatsuwa ghala hamtendile aghala sambi ighakoneka chinyala kuna mwemwe ? Kwaapfila aghala ghamtendile ghoghala lifwa .
45006022	Lekeni sambi mkombolighwa mne nzambi , na muwa watumwa we Imulungu . Chambweda sambi iwo uhenzeluka , nawo woghala ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
45006023	Kwaapfila maliho ghe nzambi lifwa , lekeni ghweko lye Imulungu iwo ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose kwa kwilunga na Yesu Kiristu , Imtwatsa wetu .
45007001	Ndughu tsangu , mwoghamanya ghendo agho ghanilonga , kwaapfila nolonga ne iwanu iwomanya ghamalaghitso . Ghamalaghitso ghomtawala imunu hayakuwa mghima .
45007002	Tulonge , ipinga hayokwelighwa , kohighwa na ghamalaghitso hala immale ayo ang'awa mghima , lekeni mmale wake ang'afa , ipinga ayo ng'ohighwa bae na ghamalaghitso .
45007003	Lelo ipinga ang'akala na mmale yungi aku mmale wake yang'ali mghima , ipinga ayo katsokemighwa mghoni . Lekeni mmale wake ang'afa , ng'ohighwa keli bae ne ghamalaghitso , si mghoni bae hata ang'akwelighwa na mmale yungi .
45007004	Pfipfila namwe ndughu tsangu , ng'amlongotsighwa bae na ghamalaghitso kwaapfila mwilunga na lukuli lwa Kiristu , ili muwe wanu wa imunu yungi , yuyo iyatsilihuke , ili tumsang'anile pfinoghile Imulungu .
45007005	Hatung'ali twokala kuno twolongotsighwa na lukuli , dong'o tsa lukuli tsatsisongesighwa ne ghamalaghitso , tsisang'ana mne ng'uli tsetu , na ghose ghatutendile ghamalila mne lifwa .
45007006	Lekeni sambi ng'atwohighwa bae na ghamalaghitso , kwaapfila tufa kwa mbuli ila itutendile watumwa , ili tutumikile kwa ughima wa sambi we Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , na si kwa nzila ila ye ghumwande ye ghamalaghitso ighandikighwe .
45007007	Lelo tulonge choni ? Angu Ghamalaghitso nzambi ? Bae ! Lekeni kubitila Ghamalaghitso tsanimanya nzambi chinu chachi . Ka ghamalaghitso ng'aghalongile bae , “ Uleke kusulukila chinu cha miyagho , ” tsaning'alekile kumanya ka kusulukila chinu chachi .
45007008	Kwa ndaghitso ayo , nzambi tsaipata uleghelo wa kulamsa chila ukusulukila kwihile ikuli mghati mwangu . Kwaapfila bila ghamalaghitso nzambi ifa .
45007009	Ghumwande tsaning'ali namghima bila ya ghamalaghitso , lekeni ndaghitso haitsile , nzambi tsayenela mne ughima wangu na nene tsang'ala ka nyifa .
45007010	Tsambona ndaghitso ayo iibamighwe ighale ughima , lekeni kuna nene inighalila lifwa .
45007011	Mana nzambi tsaipata nyafwasi kubitila ndaghitso ila , ingutsukila , inikoma .
45007012	Apfo lelo , Ghamalaghitso ghahenzeluka na ndaghitso ihenzeluka , ghomnoghelesa Imulungu na ghanogha .
45007013	Lelo achila ichinoghile chingalila lifwa ? Si pfipfo bae ! Itendeka apfo ili nzambi itangike ka nzambi ghendo . ichitumila achila ichinoghile na kung'alila lifwa lyangu . Apfo nzambi kubitila ndaghitso , ilangusa ghendo pfaihile ng'ani .
45007014	Twomanya ka Ghamalaghitso gholawa mghati mwe Muhe , lekeni nene si wa Muhe bae , nihutsighwa niwe mtumwa wa nzambi .
45007015	Simanyile bae chonitenda , kwaapfila aghala ighanibama sighatenda bae , lekeni aghala inighahila noghatenda .
45007016	Lekeni ning'atenda aghala sighabama bae kughatenda , notoghola ghendo ka Ghamalaghitso ghanogha .
45007017	Lelo si nene bae nimwenyegho yanitenda ghano , ila nzambi iikala mghati mwangu .
45007018	Nomanya ghendo ka kuduhu ilinoghile lyolyose ilikala mghati mwangu , mne lukuli lwangu lwa nzambi . Kwaapfila nobama kutenda ghanoghile , lekeni sidaha bae .
45007019	Kwaapfila sighatenda bae ghanoghile ghanibama kughatenda , lekeni noghatenda ghehile aghala sighabama bae kughatenda .
45007020	Ka notenda aghala sighabama bae kughatenda , si nene bae yanitenda , ila nzambi iikala mghati mwangu iyo iitenda agho .
45007021	Apfo nitanga chinu chino , hanibama kutenda ghanoghile , ghehile nagho ghabaho .
45007022	Lekeni mghati mwangu ghendo noghadeng'elela ghamalaghitso gha Imulungu .
45007023	Lekeni nakona mbuli ingi iisang'ana mlukuli mwangu . Mbuli ayo yesonga na mbuli iitogholighwa ne mbutsi tsangu . Mbuli ayo yonenda niwe mtumwa wa mbuli tsa nzambi itsisang'ana mlukuli mwangu .
45007024	Nene miyenu ! Yuhi iyodaha kung'ombola mne lukuli luno ilunighala mne lifwa ?
45007025	Mighede kwe Imulungu iyonikombola kubitila Yesu Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu ! Lelo apfi pfipfo pfanili , nene mwenyegho mne mbutsi tsangu namtumwa we mbuli tse Imulungu , lekeni mna lukuli nene namtumwa wa mbuli tsa nzambi .
45008001	Apfo kuduhu ukuhighighwa kwa awala iwali mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu .
45008002	Kwaapfila kubitila Kiristu Yesu , mbuli ye Ghumuhe we ughima inikombola kulawa mna mbuli ya nzambi na lifwa .
45008003	Imulungu katenda achila ing'achidahika bae kutendeka na Malaghitso gha Musa mana lukuli lune nzambi lwahela ingupfu . Imulungu kamtuma Imwanaghe nyalimwe yane lukuli ka ng'uli tsetu twetwe tune nzambi ili awe nambiko ya nzambi , apfo kahigha nzambi kwa lukuli alwo .
45008004	Imulungu katenda apfo ili ukuhighighwa ikubamighwa na Malaghitso kutimile mghati mwetu , twetwe itukala kwa ngupfu tsa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , na si kwa ngupfu tsa lukuli lune nzambi .
45008005	Awala iwokala kwa kuwinza ulukuli , mbutsi tsawo tsolongotsighwa na aghala gholubama lukuli . Lekeni awala iwokala kwa kumuwinza Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , mbutsi tsawo tsolongotsighwa na aghala ghoyobama Ghumuhe .
45008006	Kwaapfila mbutsi itsilongotsighwa na lukuli lune nzambi tsoghala lifwa , lekeni mbutsi itsilongotsighwa na Ghumuhe tsoghala ughima na tindiwalo .
45008007	Imunu ang'apfikitsa mbuli itsibama lukuli lwake luliheka , ayo kakuwa mwihile we Imulungu , kwaapfila ng'okinda bae mbuli ye Imulungu , na ng'odaha bae kuikinda .
45008008	Awala iwolongotsighwa na lukuli lune nzambi ng'awodaha bae kumnogheletsa Imulungu .
45008009	Lekeni mwemwe , Ghumuhe we Imulungu ang'akala mghati mwenu , ng'amlongotsighwa bae na lukuli , ila mwolongotsighwa ne Ghumuhe . Ka imunu wowose kahela Ghumuhe wa Kiristu , ayo si munu wa Kiristu bae .
45008010	Lekeni ka Kiristu ka mghati mwenu , Ghumuhe komwing'ani ughima , kwaapfila mwemwe mpetighwa ne Imulungu mnogha hata ka ng'uli tsenu tsitsakufa kwaajili ya nzambi .
45008011	Na ka Ghumuhe wa ayula iyamtsilihule Yesu kulawa mlifwa kokala mghati mwenu , yuyo iyamtsilihule Yesu pfipfila katsotsing'a ughima ng'uli tsenu itsikufa . Katsotenda apfo kwa Ghumuhe wake , iyokala mghati mwenu .
45008012	Apfo ndughu tsangu , tuna sang'ano , ng'atubamighwa bae kukala ka ng'uli tsetu tsine nzambi pfatsibama tukale .
45008013	Kwaapfila mng'akala ka ng'uli pfatsibama , mtsakufa ghendo . Lekeni ka kubitila Ghumuhe mwoghakoma aghala ghehile ighatendighwe na lukuli , mtsokala waghima .
45008014	Mana awala wose iwolongotsighwa na Ghumuhe we Imulungu awo iwo iwana wa Imulungu .
45008015	Kwaapfila ng'ambokele bae Ghumuhe iyowatenda muwe watumwa keli wa kupfuka , lekeni mbokela Ghumuhe iyowatenda muwe iwana wa Imulungu . Apfo twokemelela , “ Aba , Aba ! ”
45008016	Ghumuhe we Imulungu mwenyegho kolongesa hamwe na muhe tsetu ka twetwe twa iwana we Imulungu .
45008017	Lelo ka twawanaghe , apfo twawahatsi we Imulungu , twohatsi hamwe na Kiristu , mana ka tughanzika hamwe naye , pfipfila tutsokala naye mne utunitso wake .
45008018	Kwaapfila nomanya maghayo ghatughanzika sambi si chinu bae na ng'agheghala bae na utunitso ula iutsoghubulighwa kuna twetwe .
45008019	Pfilumbe pfose pfobetetsa kwa kusulukila ng'ani kughubulighwa kwe iwana we Imulungu .
45008020	Kwaapfila pfilumbe pfose pfitendighwa pfiwe si chinu bae , si ka tsapfibama pfenyegho , ila kwaapfila Imulungu tsakabama iwe apfo , hata apfo lolelo lyabaho ,
45008021	kwaapfila pfilumbe apfo napfo pfitsolekelighwa kulawa mne utumwa wa ukuhinyika , pfingile mne utunitso wa ukukombolighwa kwe iwana we Imulungu .
45008022	Kwaapfila twomanya mbaka sambi hano ka pfilumbe pfose pfoghutilila kwa usungu , ka usungu wokweleka imwana .
45008023	Si pfilumbe pfiliheka bae , ila na twetwe wenyegho yatuli na Ghumuhe , iyali ghweko lya Imulungu lya mwanduso , pfipfila twoghutilila kwa mghati aku twobeta kutendighwa kuwa iwana we Imulungu ghendo na kukombolighwa ng'uli tsetu .
45008024	Kwaapfila tsatukombolighwa mne lolelo alyo , lekeni ka chinu ichilolelighwa chakoneka , aho kuduhu keli lolelo . Angu munu wachi iyololela ichinu chayalinacho ?
45008025	Lekeni tung'alolela chinu chila ing'atuchona bae , twobetetsa kwa kududumila .
45008026	Pfipfila , Ghumuhe kotwapfila twetwe mna ukuhungukighwa kwetu . Ng'atumanyile bae ukulomba ka pfaibamighwa , lekeni Ghumuhe imwenyegho kotulombela twetwe kwa kughutilila ing'akudaha kulongighwa .
45008027	Naye iyakona mmoyo mwetu , komanya Ghumuhe chayakwalangula , kwaapfila Ghumuhe kowalombela wahenzeluka ka pfoyobama Imulungu .
45008028	Twomanya ghendo ka mne pfinu pfose Imulungu kotenda ghose ghanoghe kwe iwanu wala iwomnoghela , awala iwakemighwe ka yeye pfayabamile .
45008029	Awala Imulungu yawamanyile kulawa ghumwande , tsakalamula kulawa ghumwande weghale ne Imwanaghe , ili Imwana ayo yawe chaudele mna ndughu wengi .
45008030	Na awala iyawasaghule , tsakawakema , na awala iyawakemile , kawapeta wanogha , na awala iyawapetile wanogha tsakahangila nawo utunitso wake .
45008031	Kuya lelo tulonge choni mna ghano ghose ? Ka Imulungu ka lubali lwetu , yuhi iyodaha kutubelela ?
45008032	Imulungu ng'amwonele bae libatsi hata Imwanaghe imwenyegho , ila kamlapfa kwaajili ya twetwe twose ! Katwing'a imwanaghe , angu ng'atsotwing'a bae pfinu pfose hamwe naye ?
45008033	Yuhi yatsoweng'a lighomba iwanu iyawasaghule Imulungu ? Imulungu mwenyegho kolonga wahela matotso .
45008034	Lelo yuhi yatsowahigha ? Kuduhu ! Kwaapfila Yesu Kiristu tsakafa , kuya katsilihulighwa ! Na kokala ghumoko ghwa kujilo ghwe Imulungu , naye yuyo iyotulombela .
45008035	Yuhi lelo yatsotubaghula kulawa mna unoghelo wa Kiristu ? Pfii maghayo , ukughanzika , ukudununzika , nzala , ukukala chidako , ukuhonzeka au ukukomighwa ?
45008036	Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfogholonga , “ Kwaajili yako twokala mlifwa chilo ne imisi . Tweghala ne iwang'olo iwoghenda kuchinjighwa . ”
45008037	Bae , mna ghano ghose twetwe tuhuma ghendo kubitila yeye iyotunoghela .
45008038	Kwaapfila tsanimanya ghendo kuduhu ichinu ichidaha kutubaghula na unoghelo wake , si lifwa bae wala ughima , si wamalaika wala pfinyamkela wane ingupfu , si pfinu pfa sambi wala ipfikutsa ,
45008039	si ighali hasi , wala ighali kuchanya , wala chochose ichilumbighwe , kuduhu ichidaha kutubaghula na unoghelo we Imulungu iuli mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu Imtwatsa wetu .
45009001	Nolongesa ghendo , nene na imunu wa Kiristu , silonga ughutsu bae . Ghumoyo ghwangu ghwetoghola hamwe ne Ghumuhe Mwenzelukaka ka nene sighutsuka bae ,
45009002	ka noghanzika sideke na nina usungu ing'aumalagha bae mna ghumoyo ghwangu .
45009003	Mana ning'adahile kulomba nilighitwe na mbaghulighwe na Kiristu kwaajili ye Wayahudi , iwanu wa kabila lyangu .
45009004	Awo iwo iwanu wa Isiraeli Imulungu iyawatendile wawe iwanaghe , iyawalanguse utunitso wake , iyalaghane nawo , iyaweng'ile Ghamalaghitso ghake , nzila ya ukumtamanila yeye na malaghano ghake .
45009005	Wawo wa watsukulu wa iwabala wa Wahebraniya , naye Kiristu , mne unu wake , kalawila mne kabila lyawo . Imulungu iyotawala mna ghose , na yatunyighwe ghamatsuwa ghose ! Ona .
45009006	Chalaghane Imulungu ng'achilekile bae kutimila , kwaapfila si Waisiraeli wose iwo wanu we Imulungu .
45009007	Na si watsukulu wose wa Abrahamu wa iwana we Imulungu . Lekeni Imulungu tsakamlongela Abrahamu , “ Watsukulu wako watsolawila kwa Isaka . ”
45009008	Mana iwana wala iwelekighwe kwa lukuli , awo si iwana we Imulungu bae , ila iwana wala iwelekighwe kwa laghano lya Imulungu awo iwo iwopetighwa iwana wa Abrahamu .
45009009	Kwaapfila Imulungu tsakeka laghano lyake pfino , “ Mne chipindi ichanisaghule nitsakuya na Sara katsakweleka imwana . ”
45009010	Si pfipfo pfiliheka bae , ila Rebeka naye tsakakala na iwana weli kwa aba yumwe , ayo iyo imbala wetu Isaka .
45009011	Hata ng'ana iwana awo weli welekighwe bae , na ng'ana watende ichinu chochose chinoghile au chihile , Imulungu kakoneka kana uwetso wa kusaghula .
45009012	Yeye hayosaghula kosaghula ka pfobama mwenyegho , ng'olola bae chayotenda imunu . Imulungu tsakamlongela Rebeka , “ Imwana mbala katsomsang'anila imdodo wake . ”
45009013	Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , “ Yakobu kaninoghela lekeni Esau nimuhila . ”
45009014	Lelo tulonge choni ? Pfii Imulungu kana ubaghutsi ? Aka si pfipfo bae !
45009015	Kwaapfila tsakamlongela Musa , “ Nitsomwonela libatsi imunu yula iyanibama kumwonela libatsi , nitsomdudumila imunu yula iyanibama kumdudumila . ”
45009016	Apfo , ghose ghouhila libatsi lye Imulungu na si choyobama imunu bae au choyosang'ana imunu .
45009017	Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga pfino kwa Farao mndewa wa Misiri , “ Tsanikutenda uwe mndewa ili nilanguse ngupfu tsangu kubitila ghweghwe na taghwa lyangu limanyike muisi mwose . ”
45009018	Apfo , Imulungu komonela libatsi imunu yula iyobama kumonela libatsi , na iyobama kumtenda yawe msughu komtenda yawe msughu .
45009019	Yumwe wenu kodaha kunongela , “ Lelo ule Imulungu ang'ali yotulaumu ? Yuhi yodaha kughaghoma aghala ghoyobama Imulungu ? ”
45009020	Lekeni ghweghwe uli nani , yumwidika Imulungu apfo ? Chiha ng'achidaha bae kumghutsa mfina pfiha , “ Ule kunenda pfino ? ”
45009021	Mfina pfiha kodaha kufina pfiha pfibili kwa lidongo limwe ka pfayobama , chimwe kwa sang'ano ng'ulu ngulu na chingi kwa sang'ano ndodo ndodo .
45009022	Apfi pfipfo pfaili kwa Imulungu . Tsakabama kulangusa maya yake na ingupfu yake , lekeni tsakawadudumila iwanu wala iwabamighwe wahighighwe na maya yake , awo iwobamighwa kuhinyighwa .
45009023	Naye imwenyegho tsakabama kuulangusa utunitso wake mkulu , iyaughighidile kuna twetwe itubamighwe kubokela libatsi lyake , twetwe iyatwikile kulawa ghumwande tubokele utunitso wake .
45009024	Twetwe iwo iyatukemile , si kulawa kwa Wayahudi waliheka bae , ila kulawa kwa iwanu wa isi tsingi pfipfila .
45009025	Ka Imtwatsa pfayalongile mna chitabu cha nabii Hosea , “ Awala iwali ‘ si iwanu wangu bae , ’ nitsowakema ‘ iwanu wangu . ’ Nitsolangusa unoghelo wangu kune isi tsila ng'ana nitsinoghele bae . ”
45009026	Kuya , “ Hanu hala hawalongelighwe , ‘ Mwemwe si iwanu wangu bae , ’ baho watsokemighwa iwana we Imulungu iyali mghima . ”
45009027	Pfipfila nabii Isaya kowamanila Waisiraeli hala hayalongile , “ Hata ka iwanu wa Isiraeli wa wengi ka msanga ghuli kumwani , lekeni wanu wadodo waliheka iwatsokombolighwa .
45009028	Kwaapfila Imulungu ng'atsokawa bae kuihigha ghendo isi yose . ”
45009029	Ka nabii Isaya pfayalongole kulonga , “ Ka Imtwatsa yane ngupfu ng'atulekele bae mweleko wa Waisiraeli , wose tung'afile ka iwanu Sodoma , tung'eghalile na iwanu wa Gomola . ”
45009030	Lelo tulonge choni ? Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , ng'awasang'ane chinu ili woneke ne Imulungu wanogha , tsawoneka ne Imulungu wanogha kwa ukutoghola kwawo ,
45009031	lekeni Waisiraeli , iwabamile ukutogholighwa ne Imulungu kubitila ghamalaghitso , ng'awoneke wanogha kwe Imulungu .
45009032	Ule ng'awoneke wanogha kwe Imulungu ? Kwaapfila tsawehuwila aghala ghawatendile , ng'awehuwile bae ukutoghola . Apfo tsawekwala mne “ libwe lya kwikwalila . ”
45009033	Ka pfayandikighwe , “ Nyika libwe ako Sayuni , nalyo litsowatenda iwanu wekwale , nyika libwe iliwatenda iwanu waghwe . Lekeni imunu wowose iyomtoghola ng'atsoghelighwa chinyala bae . ”
45010001	Ndughu tsangu , ghumoyo ghwangu ghwobama ghendo na nomlomba Imulungu Waisiraeli weyangu wakombolighwe .
45010002	Mana nowalongelani ghendo , wawo welapfa ghendo kumsang'anila Imulungu , lekeni si kwa kumanya pfinoghile bae .
45010003	Kwaapfila ng'awamanyile bae Imulungu pfayowatenda iwanu wanogha hambele hake , nawo wandusa inzila yawo iwenyegho , ng'awoiwinza bae inzila ye Imulungu ya kuwatenda iwanu wanogha hambele hake .
45010004	Kwaapfila Kiristu hayatsile , ghamalaghitso ghatimila , ili chila munu iyotoghola yapetighwe kanogha kwe Imulungu .
45010005	Mne mbuli ye ukutogholighwa ne Imulungu kubitila ukukinda Ghamalaghitso Musa kandika pfino , “ Imunu wowose iyoghakinda Ghamalaghitso katsakuwa mghima kubitila Ghamalaghitso agho . ”
45010006	Lekeni imbuli ya ukutogholighwa ne Imulungu kubitila ukutoghola ya pfino , “ Uleke kulonga mmoyo mwako , yuhi yatsogheluka mbaka kulanga yamghale Kiristu hasi yatse kutukombola ? ”
45010007	au ukulonga , “ Yuhi yatsohulumka kutsimu yamwinule Kiristu kulawa mlifwa yatse kutukombola ? ”
45010008	Lekeni Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga pfino . “ Imbuli ye Imulungu yahabehi naghwe , ya mumlomo mwako na ya mmoyo mwako . ” Ayo iyo imbuli ya ukutoghola yatuwapetela iwanu .
45010009	Ung'atoghola kwa ukulonga kwa mlomo wako , Yesu kamndewa , na ung'atoghola mmoyo mwako ka Imulungu kamtsilihula kulawa mlifwa , kutsokombolighwa .
45010010	Kwaapfila kwa ghumoyo imunu kotoghola na kakoneka kanogha kwe Imulungu , na kwa mlomo imunu kolonga na kokombolighwa .
45010011	Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Imunu wowose iyomtoghola ng'atsoghelighwa chinyala bae . ”
45010012	Mana kuduhu ubaghutsi kwa Myahudi wala kwa imunu iyali si Myahudi bae , kwaapfila Imulungu ka Imtwatsa we iwanu wose na kamluso kwe iwanu wose iwomlomba ,
45010013	Mana ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga , “ Chila imunu iyolomba kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa , katsokombolighwa . ”
45010014	Lelo watsomlombatse ayula ng'ana wamtoghole bae ? Kuya watsomtogholatse ayula ng'ana wahulike bae mbuli tsake ? Na watsohulikatse ka kuduhu bae imunu wa kuwapetela ?
45010015	Na iwanu watsopetatse Imbuli Inoghile ka ng'awaghalighwe bae ? Ka pfayandighwe , “ Kunogha ghendo ukutsa kwa iwanu wala iwopeta Imbuli Inoghile ! ”
45010016	Lekeni si Waisiraeli wose bae iwatoghole Imbuli Inoghile ye Imulungu . Ka Isaya pfayalongile , “ Imtwatsa , yuhi iyatoghole usenga wetu ? ”
45010017	Lekeni ukutoghola kwakutsa kubitila ukuhulika usenga , na usenga awo wakutsa kwa mbuli ya Kiristu .
45010018	Lekeni noghutsa , pfii ng'awahulike bae ? Ona kuhulika wahulika , ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Litsi lyawo lyenela muisi mwose mbuli tsawo tsipfika muisi mwose . ”
45010019	Noghutsa keli , pfii Waisiraeli ng'awamanyile bae ? Imulungu tsakalongola kulonga kubitila Musa , “ Nitsowatenda mwone chepfu kubitila iwanu wa isi tsingi . Nitsowatenda mwone maya kubitila iwanu ing'awamanyile . ”
45010020	Imulungu tsakalonga kubitila Isaya bila kupfuka , “ Tsamboneka kwe iwanu wala ng'ana wambame bae . Tsaniwalawila awala ing'awaghutsile bae mbuli tsangu . ”
45010021	Lekeni kwa Waisiraeli , Imulungu kolonga , “ Misi yose tsaniwagholosela ghumoko ghwangu kuwakema iwanu iwolema kutoghola na wasughu . ”
45011001	Lelo noghutsa , Angu Imulungu kawalema iwanu wake ? Mbe , ng'awalemile bae ! Nene mwenyegho na Muisiraeli , mtsukulu wa Abrahamu , nolawila mne kabila lya Benjamini .
45011002	Imulungu ng'awalemile bae iwanu wake iyawamanyile kulawa mwanduso . Angu ng'ammanyile bae Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga hala Eliya pfayamlilile Imulungu kwa nzambi tsa Waisiraeli ?
45011003	“ Imtwatsa , wawakoma manabii wako na wahahinya hanu hako hakulapfila nambiko . Yanisighale nene niliheka , nawo wobama wang'ome ! ”
45011004	Angu Imulungu tsakamwidikatse ? Tsakamlongela , “ Nyikila mwenyegho iwanu 7000 , awo ng'awamtamanile bae mulungu Baali . ”
45011005	Apfo pfipfo pfaili sambi , kuna iwanu chidogho iwasaghulighwe kwa uluso we Imulungu .
45011006	Wasaghulighwa kwa uluso wake , si kwa aghala ghawatendile bae . Kwaapfila ka Imulungu kosaghula kwa kulola chawotenda iwanu , apfo uluso wake ung'awile si chinu bae .
45011007	Lelo choni ? Iwanu we Isiraeli ng'awachonile bae achila chawang'ali wochibama , lekeni awala iwasaghulighwe wachona . Wamwenga tsawatendighwa wasughu .
45011008	Ka pfagholonga Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , Imulungu kaweng'a imimoyo mikomu , kaweng'a tsinenge lekeni ng'awakona bae , kaweng'a maghutwi lekeni ng'awohulika bae mbaka leloli .
45011009	Naye Daudi kalonga , “ Pfihungo pfawo pfiwe mtegho we kuwaghogha , waghwe na wahighighwe .
45011010	Nenge tsawo tsighelighwe chisi waleke kona . Mighongo yawo ipfeduke ghamatsuwa ghose . ”
45011011	Noghutsa keli , pfii Wayahudi tsawekwala mbaka waghwa ghendo ? Mbe , si pfipfo bae ! Lekeni kwa ghamatotso ghawo ukukombolighwa kutsa kwe iwanu wangi ili Wayahudi wone chepfu .
45011012	Lekeni ka ghamatotso gha Wayahudi ghaighalila isi yose ukubweda , na ukuhungukighwa kwawo ukutoghola kuwatenda iwanu iwali si Wayahudi webwede . Lelo pfii Wayahudi wose wang'amuyila Imulungu , ambe ukubweda kutsakongetseka ghendo !
45011013	Nowalongelani mwemwe imli si Wayahudi bae , kwaapfila nene namtumighwa kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , neghodela isang'ano yangu .
45011014	Nobama niwatende iwanu wangu Wayahudi wone chepfu , ili nidahe kuwakombola wamwenga mghati mwawo .
45011015	Mana ka ukulemighwa kwawo kuwatenda iwanu wose walamlitsighwe ne Imulungu , pfii itsakuwatse hawatsotogholighwa ne Imulungu ? Iwanu watsotsilihuka !
45011016	Chihindi chamwanduso che chighate ang'eng'ighwa Imulungu , chighate chose chakuwa chake . Imitsitsi ing'awa ye Imulungu , ghamaputila ghose nagho ghakuwa ghake .
45011017	Tulonge , ghamaputila ghangi gha mtseituni ghaghanighwa na ghamaputila gha mtseituni wa kwibagho ghekighwa hanu haho . Mwemwe imli si Wayahudi mweghala ne mtseituni wa kwibagho , sambi mwehangila ughima wa chimuhe wa Wayahudi .
45011018	Apfo mleke kuwabetsa awala iwaghanighwe ka ghamaputila ! Lelo mdahatse kwighoda ? Mkumbuke si mwemwe bae imkindilitsa imitsitsi , ila imtsitsi yomkindilitsani mwemwe .
45011019	Lekeni mwodaha kulonga , “ Ghamaputila ghaghanighwa ili twetwe twikighwe hanu hala . ”
45011020	Pfinogha ! Tsaghaghanighwa kwaapfila ng'aghatoghole bae , lekeni mwemwe mwakwima kwaapfila mtoghola . Lelo mleke kwighoda ila mpfuke .
45011021	Kwaapfila ka Imulungu ng'awalekile Wayahudi iweghalile ne ghamaputila ighaghanighwe , pfii lelo Imulungu katsomlekani mwemwe ?
45011022	Lelo mlole libatsi na ukali we Imulungu . Yeye kamkali kwa awala iwaghwile , lekeni kana libatsi kuna mwemwe ka mwoghendelela kukala mna libatsi lyake , lekeni ka si pfipfo bae , mwemwe namwe mtsoghanighwa .
45011023	Na Wayahudi pfipfila wang'atoghola , watsokwikighwa keli hanu hala hawaghanighwe , kwaapfila Imulungu kodaha kutenda apfo .
45011024	Mwemwe iwanu imli si Wayahudi mweghala na putila la mtseituni wa kwibagho . Mlapfighwa ako mwikighwa mne mtseituni wa kumghunda , mne sina si lyenu bae . Lekeni Wayahudi weghala na mtseituni wa kumghunda . Lelo kuna ukomu wachi Imulungu kuwoyitsa keli msina mwawo iwenyegho ?
45011025	Ndughu tsangu sibama bae mleke kumanya mbuli ino , nobama mmanye ili mleke kwibona mna mbutsi ng'ani . Usughu wa Waisiraeli tsaukala wa chipindi chidogho , mbaka iwanu wa isi tsingi hawatsomuyila Imulungu .
45011026	Baho Waisiraeli wose watsokombolighwa , ka pfayandikighwe , Mkombotsi katsakutsa kulawa Sayuni , Katsoghalapfa ghehile ghose mna lukolo lwa Yakobu ,
45011027	Na alino laghano lyangu kuna wawo , hanitsoghaleghusa ghehile ghawo .
45011028	Kwaapfila Wayahudi woilema Imbuli Inoghile , wawo wawa wanebe we Imulungu kwaajili ya mwemwe . Lekeni kwaapfila Imulungu kawasaghula , wang'ali wonoghelighwa ne Imulungu kwaajili ya iwabala wawo .
45011029	Mana Imulungu ang'awasaghula iwanu na kuwatenda webwede , ng'oghalusa bae acho chayatendile .
45011030	Ka mwemwe pfamlemile kumtegheletsa Imulungu aho ghumwande , lekeni sambi mbokela libatsi lyake kwa kulema kwawo Wayahudi kumtegheletsa Imulungu .
45011031	Pfipfila ka mwemwe pfambokele libatsi , Wayahudi sambi nawo wolema kumtegheletsa Imulungu , ili nawo sambi wabokele libatsi lye Imulungu .
45011032	Kwaapfila Imulungu kawatenda iwanu wose waleke kutegheletsa , ili yawonele libatsi iwanu wose .
45011033	Utajili we Imulungu mkulu sideke na ihekima yake ng'ulu na ukumanya kwake kukulu . Yuhi iyomanya pfayolamla ? Yuhi iyomanya nzila tsake ?
45011034	“ Yuhi yomanya chayopfikitsa Imulungu , yuhi iyodaha kumlongotsa mna ukulamla kwake ,
45011035	Yuhi iyalongol e kumwing'a chinu , kuya Imulungu yamlihe ? ”
45011036	Kwaapfila pfinu pfose pfolawa kuna yeye , na pfabaha kubitila yeye na kwaajili ya yeye . Imulungu yatunitsighwe ghamatsuwa ghose . Ona .
45012001	Apfo ndughu tsangu , kwaapfila Imulungu kana libatsi sideke , nomlombani ghendo mlapfe ughima wenu ka nambiko iili ngima , muwe wahenzeluka na mtende aghala ighamnoghela yeye . Ako kuko ukumtamanila Imulungu kunoghile .
45012002	Mleke kughawinza keli aghala ighali muisi mno , Imulungu na yaghaluse mbutsi tsenu , ili mdahe kughamanya aghala ghoyobama Imulungu . Mtange chihi chinoghile na chihi ichimnoghela yeye na ichitimilike .
45012003	Kwa uluso wangaile Imulungu , nomlongelani mwemwe wose , chila munu yaleke kwibona kamkulu kubita pfayabamighwa yawe , lekeni mwilolese iwenyegho ka Imulungu pfayamgholele chila imunu ukutoghola kwake .
45012004	Kwaapfila mne lukuli lumwe kuna pfilungo pfingi , lekeni pfose ng'apfisang'ana ng'onde imwe bae .
45012005	Pfipfila twetwe hata ka twawengi , twa lukuli lumwe kwa kwilunga na Kiristu , na chila munu ka chilungo cha miyaghe .
45012006	Mana chila imunu kana gholelo lyake kwa uluso watwing'ile Imulungu . Imunu ka keng'ighwa gholelo lye ukulonga usenga we Imulungu , yalonge kwa ukutoghola kwake .
45012007	Imunu iyeng'ighwe ukuwasang'anila weyaghe , leka yawasang'anile , ka ukulangulitsa leka yalangulitse .
45012008	Ka kuwakanza wamwenga , leka yatende pfipfo , munu iyolapfa , yalapfe kwa ghumoyo ghumwe . Imunu iyolongotsa , yalongotse pfinoghile , naye iyotenda chinu cha libatsi yatende kwa ukudeng'elela .
45012009	Unoghelo wenu uleke kuwa wa ung'enye . Mghahile ghose ghehile , mghakindilitse aghala ighanoghile .
45012010	Mwinoghele ka mwa wandughu , mwihulikitse wenyegho kwa wenyegho .
45012011	Mleke kuleghela hamumsang'anila Imtwatsa , msang'anileni kwa ghumoyo wenu wose .
45012012	Lolelo lyenu liwatende mdeng'elele , hane maghayo mdudumile na mleke kwipfa ukulomba .
45012013	Muwagholele iwanu we Imulungu pfinu pfenu , muwe waluso kwa wahenza .
45012014	Muwabaliki awala iwomdununzani , muwabaliki , mleke kuwalighita .
45012015	Mdeng'e na awala iwodeng'a , lileni na awala iwolila .
45012016	Mkale pfinoghile chila imunu na miyaghe . Mleke kwighoda , ila mtoghole kukala ne iwanu mbughilambughila . Mleke kwibona mna ihekima ng'ani .
45012017	Imunu ang'amtendelani ghehile , mwemwe mleke kumliha ghehile , mtende ghanoghile kwe iwanu wose .
45012018	Mtende pfamdaha mkale tseghamba ne iwanu wose .
45012019	Sale tsangu , mleke kuliha ghehile , ila mbuli ayo mlekeleni Imulungu , kwaapfila yandikighwa , Imtwatsa kolonga , “ Maliho igho ghangu nene , nene nitsoliha . ”
45012020	Kuya Ghamaandiko gholonga , “ Imunu iyokuhila ang'awa na nzala , umwing'e ichijo ang'awa na ng'ilu , umwing'e ghamatsi yanwe . Ung'atenda apfo , kutsomghela chinyala . ”
45012021	Uleke kutoghola ghehile ghakuhume , ila ughahume ghehile kwa ghanoghile .
45013001	Chila imunu awahulikitse watawala iwolongotsa , kwaapfila kuduhu imunu iyodaha kutawala ka Imulungu ng'amlekele yatawale , Imulungu yaliheka iyo iyoweng'a iwatawala ngupfu ya kutawala .
45013002	Lekeni ayula iyoulema utawala , ayo kolema laghitso lye Imulungu , nawo iwotenda apfo watsohighighwa .
45013003	Mana iwotawala ng'awopfukighwa bae ne iwanu iwotenda ghanoghile , ila wopfukighwa na iwotenda ghehile . Naghwe ka ng'ubama bae kumpfuka ayula iyokulongosa , utende ghanoghile , naye katsokutunya .
45013004	Kwaapfila yeye komsang'anila Imulungu kwaajili yako . Lekeni ung'atenda ghehile , umpfuke , mana kodaha ghendo kukuhigha . Yeye komsang'anila Imulungu , kowalangusa maya ye Imulungu awala iwotenda ghehile .
45013005	Apfo kwobamighwa kuwategheletsa iwatawala , si kwaapfila kwopfuka kuhighighwa ne Imulungu , ila kwaapfila ghumoyo wako womanya chaubamighwa kutenda .
45013006	Kwaajili ayo mwemwe mwoliha kodi , kwaapfila wawo womsang'anila Imulungu na welapfa kwaajili ya sang'ano ayo .
45013007	Apfo weng'eni chochose chowomdahini , imunu wa kodi , mwing'eni kodi yake , iyobama kupfukighwa , mpfukeni .
45013008	Mleke kudaighwa chinu chochose ne imunu , ila mdaighwe ukwinoghela kuliheka . Mana ayula iyomnoghela myaghe kaghatimilitsa Ghamalaghitso gha Musa .
45013009	Kwaapfila malaghitso ghano , “ Uleke ughoni , uleke kukoma , uleke kwiba , uleke kutsulukila pfinu pfe iwanu , ” na malaghitso ghangi ghose , ghamna laghitso lino limwe , “ Umnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela ghumwenyegho . ”
45013010	Ung'amnoghela myagho , ng'utsomtendela ghehile bae , apfo ukunoghela kokindilitsa Ghamalaghitso ghose .
45013011	Mtende pfino , kwaapfila mwomanya ka chipindi cha mwemwe kulamka kulawa mnongo chitsa , kwaapfila sambi ukukombolighwa kwetu kwahabehi kubita hala hatwanzile kutoghola .
45013012	Ichilo chahabehi kumala na imisi yahabehi kwingila . Apfo tuleke kutenda ghehile ghe chisi , tutende ghanoghile ghe ghumwanga .
45013013	Mleke tukale pfinoghile ka iwanu itukala mne ghumwanga we imisi , si kwa soyoka au kupatika , si kwa kwiha na ughoni wala ughobo na chepfu .
45013014	Ila mpfaleni Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu , kuya mleke kuwinza ng'uli tsenu na kutenda dongo tsake tsa nzambi .
45014001	Watogholeni awala iwane noghola ndodo , na mleke kughabela ghamawatso ghawo .
45014002	Ukutoghola kwe iwanu wamwenga kowatenda waje chinu chochose , lekeni imunu yungi yotoghola chidogho kakuja mbogha ye imitsani iliheka .
45014003	Imunu iyakuja chila chinu aleke kumbetsa ayula ing'akuja chila chinu . Ayula iyakuja mbogha ya imitsani iliheka naye aleke kumhigha ayula iyakuja pfinu pfose , kwaapfila Imulungu kamtoghola .
45014004	Ghweghwe uli nani yumuhigha imtumwa wa munu yungi ? Ang'ema au ang'aghwa alyo lya imtwatsa wake . Na katsakwima kwaapfila Imtwatsa kodaha ukumwimitsa .
45014005	Imunu yumwe kodaha kona litsuwa limwe lidegheta kubita litsuwa lingi , na yumwenga kodaha kona ghamatsuwa ghose gheghala . Chila imunu na yalole ka chayopfikitsa chinogha .
45014006	Ayula iyakona litsuwa limwe lidegheta , ayo kotenda apfo kwa kumtunya Imtwatsa . Ayula iyakuja chochose chila , naye kotenda apfo kwa kumtunya Imtwatsa , kwaapfila wolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwa chijo chayaweng'ile . Ayula iyolema kuja pfijo pfimwenga , ayo kotenda apfo kwa kumtunya Imtwatsa , naye kolonga mighede kwe Imulungu .
45014007	Mana haduhu imunu wowose mna twetwe iyokala mghima kwaajili yake imwenyegho aliheka au iyakufa kwaajili yake mwenyegho aliheka .
45014008	Kwaapfila tung'awa waghima , twawaghima kwaajili ya Imtwatsa , na tung'afa , twakufa kwaajili ya Imtwatsa . Apfo , tung'awa waghima au tung'afa , twetwe twa iwanu we Imtwatsa .
45014009	Mana Kiristu tsakafa na koya muughima ili yawe Imtwatsa we iwafile na we iwaghima .
45014010	Ebali lelo komhigha myagho ? Naghwe ule kombetsa myagho ? Mana wose tutsakwima hambele he chighoda che Imulungu chokuhighila .
45014011	Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka , Imtwatsa kolonga , “ Nelaha kwa taghwa lyangu , ka pfanili mghima , chila imunu katsonipfughamila ghamaghoti , chila imunu katsotoghola ka nene na Imulungu , ”
45014012	Apfo lelo , chila imunu mna twetwe katsolonga mbuli tsake imwenyegho hambele he Imulungu .
45014013	Apfo tuleke kwihighana , ila mwalangitse , imunu aleke kutenda chinu chochose ichimuhonza myaghe yekwale au yaghwe mnzambi .
45014014	Nene yanili mghati mwa Imtwatsa Yesu , nomanya ghendo kuduhu ichijo chochose ichihile chenyegho . Lekeni imunu ang'ona ichijo chimwenga chiha , acho chiha kuna yeye .
45014015	Lekeni ung'amdesa ndughu yako kwa ichijo chaukuja , ghweghwe kwahela unoghelo . Ichijo chaukuja chileke kumwaghitsa ndughu yako , Kiristu tsakafa kwaajili yake .
45014016	Apfo achila chamkona mwemwe chinogha , mleke kuchileka choneke chiha .
45014017	Mana Undewa we Imulungu si chinu cha ukuja bae wala ukunwa , lekeni wa undewa wa ighanoghile , tindiwalo na ndeng'elelo mna Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ,
45014018	kwaapfila imunu wowose iyomsang'anila pfino Kiristu , komnogheletsa Imulungu na kotogholighwa ne iwanu .
45014019	Apfo lelo tughendelele kutenda aghala ighoghala tindiwalo na ighotenda twiyapfile ukwima pfinoghile .
45014020	Lelo uleke kuhinya sang'ano ye Imulungu kwe chijo . Pfijo pfose pfinogha , lekeni ng'apfinoghile bae imunu kuja chinu chochose ichimhonza imunu yungi yaghwe mnzambi .
45014021	Pfinogha kuleka ukuja inyama wala ukunwa imbwali wala kutenda chinu chochose ichimhonza myagho yaghwe mnzambi .
45014022	Lelo chochose choutoghola mna pfinu pfino chisighale kuna ghweghwe ne Imulungu . Wabweda awala wose ing'awehigha iwenyegho kwa aghala ghawotenda .
45014023	Lekeni ayula iyokwalangula kwa chijo chayakuja , ang'aja kohighighwa , mana ng'ajile bae kwa ukutoghola , na chinu chochose choyotenda imunu ka ng'ochitenda kwa ukutoghola bae , ayo yakuwa nzambi .
45015001	Twetwe yatutoghola ghendo twobamighwa tuwadudumile awala iwotoghola chidogho . Tuleke kwinoghelesa iwenyegho .
45015002	Chila imunu yamnoghelese miyaghe kwa ighanoghile , ili yamtsenge .
45015003	Kwaapfila Kiristu ng'enoghelese bae mwenyegho , ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Maligho ghawakulighile ghweghwe , ghanighwila nene . ”
45015004	Chila chinu ichandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , chandikighwa kutulangulitsa twetwe , ili kwa ukududumila na ukughumighwa ghumoyo ne Ghamaandiko agho , tudahe kuwa na lolelo .
45015005	Imulungu yane ukududumila na iyoghuma ghumoyo yamwing'eni muhe wa kuwa chinu chimwe kwa kuwinza ghayatendile Yesu Kiristu ,
45015006	ili mdahe kumtunya Imulungu , Aba we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu kwa ghumoyo ghumwe na kwa litsi limwe .
45015007	Apfo mwibokele mwemwe kwa mwemwe , ka Kiristu pfayambokeleni mwemwe , ili Imulungu yatunyighwe .
45015008	Mana nomlongelani Kiristu tsakawasang'anila Wayahudi ili yalanguse ukweli we Imulungu , na laghano lyekile Imulungu ne iwabala wetu litimile ,
45015009	ili nawo iwanu iwali si Wayahudi wamtunitse Imulungu kwa libatsi lyake . Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga Apfo nitsokutunitsa mghati mwe iwanu we isi tsingi , Nitsakwimba kulitunya taghwa lyako .
45015010	Kuya Ghamaandiko gholonga , “ Mdeng'elele mwemwe iwanu imli si Wayahudi ; mdeng'elele hamwe ne iwanu wake . ”
45015011	Kuya Ghamaandiko gholonga , “ Mumtunye Imtwatsa , mwemwe iwanu imli si Wayahudi bae , Mumtunye yeye , mwemwe makabila ghose ! ”
45015012	Kuya Isaya kolonga , Mlukolo mwa Yese katsolawila imunu , naye katsowatawala kolo tsose . iwanu iwali si Wayahudi nawo watsomlolela .
45015013	Imulungu yane lolelo , yamwing'eni ndeng'elelo na tindiwalo ka pfamtoghola , lolelo lyenu lyongetseke kwa ngupfu ya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
45015014	Nene imwenyegho nomanya ghendo ka mwemwe ndughu tsangu mnogha sideke na mwomanya ghose , na mwodaha kwilangulitsa wenyegho .
45015015	Mne ibaluwa ino tsanimwandikilani pfinu pfingi bila kupfuka , nidahe kumkumbusani keli . Tsanenda apfo kwa uluso we Imulungu kuna nene .
45015016	Imulungu Kanisaghula niwe mtumighwa wa Yesu Kiristu kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae . Nosang'ana ka mlapfa nambiko mna ukupeta Imbuli Inoghile ye Imulungu , ili iwanu si Wayahudi wadahe kuwa nambiko iitogholighwa ne Imulungu , nambiko iideghesighwa na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
45015017	Apfo kwa kwilunga na Yesu Kiristu , neghodela isang'ano yangu kwaajili ye Imulungu .
45015018	Nitsolonga bila kupfuka aghala ghayatendile Kiristu kubitila nene mna ukuwalongotsa iwanu iwali si Wayahudi wamtegheletse Imulungu . Katenda apfi kwa kulonga na kwa kutenda ,
45015019	na kwa ngupfu ya pfitango pfa kukangawatsa na kwa ngupfu ye Ghumuhe we Imulungu . Apfo mne ghumwanza wangu kulawa Yerusalemu mbaka ghumkowa ghwa Iluriko , chila hanu niwapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile ya Kiristu .
45015020	Chonibama nene ghamatsuwa ghose nipete Imbuli ye Imulungu mne isi tsila ng'ana Kiristu yamanyike bae , ili ndeke kutsenga mna lukwalambatsa lwikighwe ne imunu yungi .
45015021	Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfogholonga , “ Awala ng'ana walongelighwe mbuli tsake , watsakona , na awala ng'ana wahulike bae mbuli tsake , watsomanya . ”
45015022	Apfo kwaajili ya chinu acho ghamatsuwa mengi tsangomighwa kumwangilani .
45015023	Lekeni kwaapfila sambi nimalitsa isang'ano yangu mne isi tsino , na kwaapfila tsambama ghamatsuwa mengi kutsa kuwonani ,
45015024	nololela kutenda apfo sambi . Nitsomwangilani hanibita kughenda Spania , kuya nobama mwemwe mnyapfile kupfika ako hanimalitsa kudeng'elela kukala namwe chidogho .
45015025	Lekeni sambi noghenda Yerusalemu kuwasang'anila iwanu we Imulungu iwali ako .
45015026	Mana iwanu we Imulungu wa Makedoniya na wa Akaya wona pfinogha kuwachangila wahenzeluke we Imulungu iwali wahingwa ako Yerusalemu .
45015027	Wawo iwenyegho tsawona pfinogha kutenda apfo , na kweli tsawabamighwa ghendo watende apfo . Kwaapfila ka iwanu si Wayahudi bae wabokela pfinu pfa chimuhe kulawa kwa Wayahudi , nawo wobamighwa wawagholele Wayahudi ipfinu pfa lukuli .
45015028	Apfo , hanimalitsa ing'onde ino na kuweng'a Wayahudi achila chawachangile iwanu , nitsomwangilani mwemwe hanighenda Spania .
45015029	Hanikutsa kuna mwemwe nomanya nitsakutsa na tsibalaka ketseketse tsa Kiristu .
45015030	Lelo ndughu tsangu , nowalomba ghendo , kwa Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu na kwa unoghelo wa Ghumuhe , mwilunge na nene mnombele kwe Imulungu .
45015031	Mnombele nikomboke kulawa kwe iwanu wala ing'awomtoghola Kiristu iwali Yudeya , na mnombele isang'ano yangu muisi ya Yerusalemu itogholighwe ne iwanu wa Imulungu iwali ako .
45015032	Apfo Imulungu ang'abama , nitse kuna mwemwe aku moyo wangu wodeng'elela , mbwihile hamwe namwe .
45015033	Imulungu wa tindiwalo yakale na mwemwe wose . Ona .
45016001	Nobama mumtange lumbu wetu Fibi , yeye ka imunu yanoghile , kowasang'anila mtingano we iwanu we Imulungu iwali Kenkeliya .
45016002	Mbokeleni kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa , ka pfawabokelighwa iwanu we Imulungu , mmwapfile chochose chila choyomlombani , kwaapfila yeye tsakawapfila iwanu wengi , tsakanyapfila na nene pfipfila .
45016003	Ndamsileni Pilisila na Akila , iwasang'ana wayangu mne ing'onde ya Yesu Kiristu .
45016004	Awo chidogho wakomighwe , ili nene nihone . Nolonga mighede kuna wawo , si nene niliheka bae , hata mitingano ye iwanu we Imulungu wa isi tsingi wolonga mighede kuna wawo .
45016005	Ndamsileni iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu iwotingana mne ing'anda yawo . Ndamsileni na sale yangu Epaineto , iyandusile kumtoghola Kiristu mne isi ya Asiya .
45016006	Ndamsileni Mariya , iyamsang'anileni ng'ani .
45016007	Ndamsileni Andironiko na Yuniya , ndughu tsangu iwakalile mchifungo na nene . Wawo womanyika ghendo mghati mwa watumighwa , nawo tsawanongola kumtoghola Kiristu .
45016008	Ndamsileni Ampiliato , sale yangu mkulu mne kwilunga ne Imtwatsa .
45016009	Ndamsileni Uribano , msang'ana miyetu mne ng'onde ya Kiristu , na sale yangu mkulu Stakisi .
45016010	Ndamsileni Apele , iyaghetsighwe na kutogholighwa ne Kiristu . Walamseni iwanu wala iwali mkaye mwa Alistobulo .
45016011	Ndamsileni ndughu yangu Herodioni , na iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu iwali mkaye mwa Narikiso .
45016012	Ndamsileni Trifaina na Tirifosa , mapinga iwomsang'anila Imtwatsa . Pfipfila ndamsileni lumbu jangu Perisi , pinga yungi iyamsang'anile Imtwatsa sideke .
45016013	Ndamsileni Lufo , munu iyasaghulighwe ne Imtwatsa , hamwe na mai wake , yakalile ka mai wangu pfipfila .
45016014	Ndamsileni Asinkilito na Filegoni na Herima na Patiroba na Hema na wanu wose iwomtoghola Kiristu iwali hamwe nawo .
45016015	Ndamsileni Filologo , Yuliya , Nerea na lumbu wake , Olimpa ne wahenzeluka wose we Imulungu iwali hamwe nawo .
45016016	Mwilamse mwemwe kwa mwemwe kwa ukwinonela ikunoghile . Iwanu wose iwamtoghole Kiristu womlamsani .
45016017	Ndughu tsangu , nowalombani mwalangitse na awala iwowatenda iwanu webaghule , na kuwatenda iwanu wangi waleke kughakinda malangulitso ghambokele . Mkale kutali nawo ,
45016018	kwaapfila wanu ka awo ng'awomsang'anila Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu bae , ila woghasang'anila mada ghawo wenyegho . Kwa mbuli tsawo tsine umta na itsinogheletsa wowabugha iwanu iwanoghile .
45016019	Mana mwemwe mmanyika kwe iwanu wose kwa kutegheletsa , apfo nowadeng'elelani . Nombamani mkengele mne kutenda ghanoghile , na mkale mwahela matotso mna ghehile .
45016020	Imulungu wa tindiwalo , ng'atsokawa bae kumhonda Setani hasi mwe maghulu ghenu . Uluso we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu ukale namwe .
45016021	Msang'ana myangu Timoteo , komlamsani , pfipfila ndughu tsangu Lukiyo na Yasoni na Sosipateli wose womlamsani .
45016022	Na nene Teritio , inimwandikile Pauli ibaluwa ino nomlamsani kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa .
45016023	Gayo , mwenyekaye wangu , na iwanu wose iwomtoghola Kiristu womlamsani . Erasto , mkulu wa isi ino na ndughu yetu Kwalito , wose womlamsani .
45016024	Uluso we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu ukale namwe mwose . Ona .

45016026	Lekeni sambi imbuli ayo ighubulighwa na imanyika kubitila ghawandike manabii , na kwa laghitso lye Imulungu wa ghamatsuwa ghose imanyika kwe iwanu wose , ili makabila ghose ghamtoghole na ghamtegheletse .
45016027	Imulungu yaliheka iyane nzewele yatunyighwe ghamatsuwa ghose kubitila Yesu Kiristu ! Ona .
46001001	Nene Pauli yanikemighwe niwe mtumighwa wa Kiristu Yesu ka Imulungu pfayabamile , na ndughu yetu Sostene .
46001002	Twomwandikilani mwemwe kanisa ilili mne ghumji ghwa Kolinto , mwemwe imkemighwe muwe iwanu wake wahenzeluka kwa ukwilunga na Yesu Kiristu , hamwe na wala wose iwali chila hanu iwomlomba Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu .
46001003	Imulungu Aba wetu na Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu wawatendeleni uluso na yamwikeni tseghamba .

46001006	Usenga wa Kiristu wima pfinoghile mghati mwenu .

46001010	Ndughu tsangu , nowalomba kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu mwilaghane kwa chila chinu chomlonga ili mleke kwibaghula mwemwe kwa mwemwe . Ghendoghendo mwalangule chinu chimwe na mlonge chicho .
46001011	Ndughu tsangu , iwanu wangi kulawa ing'anda ya Kiloe wanongela ka mwemwe mwisonga .
46001012	Nobama nilonge chanihulike kuna mwemwe , munu yumwe kolonga , “ Nene nomuwinza Pauli , ” na munu yungi kolonga , “ Nene nomuwinza Apolo , ” na yungi kolonga , “ Nene nomuwinza Kefa ” na yungi “ Nene nomuwinza Kiristu . ”
46001013	Angu Kiristu keghola ? Angu Pauli tsakawambighwa mna msalaba kwaajili yako ? Angu tsambatisighwa mughwe wanang'ina wa Pauli ?

46001018	Kwaapfila usenga wa lifwa lya Yesu mne msalaba wakoneka ubotsi kwe iwanu iwakwagha , lekeni twetwe itukombolighwa twowona ngupfu ye Imulungu .
46001019	Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga , “ Nitsotsihinya nzewele tse wanu wane nzewele , na tsimbutsi tse iwanu wane chisomo nitsotsasa kutali . ”
46001020	Walikwani wanu wane nzewele ? Walikwani walangulitsi wa ghamalaghitso ? Walikwani wane tsimbutsi sideke ? Imulungu kalangusa ghendo ka nzewele ye iwanu we isi ina ubotsi .
46001021	Kwa nzewele ye Imulungu , ng'aidahika bae iwanu kummanya yeye kwa nzewele tsawo wenyegho , Imulungu tsakanoghelighwa kuwakombola iwanu iwotoghola kubitila usenga watuwapetela , aula iukoneka ubotsi kwa awala wane nzewele .

46001024	Lekeni kwa awala iwakemighwe ne Imulungu , wose Wayahudi na Wagiriki , Kiristu iyo ngupfu ye Imulungu na nzewele ye Imulungu .
46001025	Kwaapfila achila ichikoneka ubotsi we Imulungu , china nzewele kubita nzewele ye imunu , na achila ichikoneka chahela ngupfu kwa Imulungu china ngupfu kubita ngupfu ye imunu .
46001026	Ndughu tsangu , lelo mkumbuke hamkemighwe ne Imulungu , wengi mna mwemwe tsamkala mwahela nzewele ya chimunu , na si wengi bae imkalile ne ngupfu na si wengi bae imkalile ne ubala .

46001028	Imulungu kasaghula aghala ghawabetsile iwanu na aghala ighoneke si chinu bae , ili kughahinya aghala ghawonile iwanu chinu chikulu .

46001030	Imulungu iyo iyawatendike mwemwe mwilunge na Yesu Kiristu , iyawile nzewele yetu kulawa kwe Imulungu , twakoneka tunogha hambele he Imulungu , twenzeluka na tukombolighwa .
46001031	Apfo ka pfayandikighwe , “ Iyobama kwighoda , yeghodele chayatendile Imtwatsa . ”
46002001	Ndughu tsangu , hanitsile kuna mwemwe siwapeteleni bae ukweli we usenga we Imulungu kwa kulangusa ka nene nomanya ng'ani au kwa nzewele tse iwanu .
46002002	Mana hanikalile na mwemwe sibamile bae kumanya chinu chingi ila kummanya Yesu Kiristu yaliyeka , ayula iyawambighwe mna msalaba .
46002003	Hanitsile kuna mwemwe , tsanahela ngupfu , tsanidedema ghendo kwa kupfuka .
46002004	Usenga wangu na kupeta kwangu ng'akukalile bae kwa malonga gha nzewele ghane kukwegha iwanu , ila tsaghana ingupfu ye Ghumuhe we Imulungu .

46002006	Twopeta usenga we hekima kwa awala iwakomale mne ukutoghola , lekeni si ihekima ye muisi amu bae , wala si ihekima ye iwakulu we muisi amu iwakwaghitsa ngupfu .

46002011	Yuhi iyodaha kumanya aghala ighali mghati mwe imunu ka si muhe iuli mghati mwake mwenyegho ? Pfipfila kuduhu iyomanya ipfinu pfe Imulungu ila Ghumuhe we Imulungu .
46002012	Ng'atubokele bae muhe we iisi , ila tubokela Ghumuhe iyatumighwe ne Imulungu ili tumanye aghala ghose ghatwing'ighwe hela ne Imulungu .

46002014	Imunu yalihela Ghumuhe we Imulungu ng'odaha bae kubokela aghala igholawa kwe Imulungu , kwaapfila ghakoneka gha ubotsi kuna yeye , na ng'oghatanga bae , kwaapfila ghomanyika kwa kwapfilighwa ne Ghumuhe .

46002016	Ka Ghamaandiko pfagholonga , “ Yuhi yatsimanyile tsimbutsi tse Imtwatsa ? Yuhi yodaha kumlangulitsa Imtwatsa ? ” Lekeni twetwe tuna tsimbutsi tse Kiristu .
46003001	Ndughu tsangu , nene silongile namwe bae ka iwanu imli ne Ghumuhe we Imulungu , lekeni tsanonga namwe ka iwanu we isi ino , ka iwana wadowado mne ukumtoghola Kiristu ,
46003002	Tsaniweng'a matombo na si chijo chikomu bae , kwaapfila ng'amdahile bae kuchija . Hata sambi ng'amdaha bae kuchija .
46003003	Kwaapfila mwemwe mng'ali mwokala ka iwanu we isi yose pfawokala . Angu pfii kuduhu chepfu na kwisonga mghati mwenu ? Agho ghose gholangusa mwemwe mng'ali mwa iwanu we isi yose , na mwokala ka isi yose pfaibama .
46003004	Imunu yumwe ang'alonga , “ Nene nomuwinza Pauli , ” na munu yungi kolonga , “ Nene nomuwinza Apolo . ” Apfi ng'amtenda bae ka iwanu we isi yose pfawotenda ?
46003005	Angu Apolo nani ? Na Pauli nani ? Twetwe twa iwatumwa we Imulungu yatumghalileni mwemwe ukutoghola , na chila munu kotenda isang'ano iyeng'ighwe ne Imtwatsa .
46003006	Nene nihanda imbeghu , Apolo kaimwaghila ghamatsi , lekeni Imulungu iyo yaitendile ikule .

46003010	Kwa ligweko lyangaile Imulungu , nyika lukwalambatsa ka imunu yadahile kutsenga pfinoghile , na imunu yungi kotsenga mchang'a mwake . Lekeni chila imunu iyotsenga yalangitse pfoyotsenga mchang'a mwake .
46003011	Kuduhu imunu yungi iyodaha kwika lukwalambatsa lungi kubita yalwikighwe , iyo Yesu Kiristu .

46003013	Ukunogha kwe isang'ano ya chila imunu kutsolangusighwa na kwikighwa mwatsi mne litsuwa lya Kiristu , kwaapfila mne litsuwa alyo ghumoto ghutsoghubula isang'ano ya chila imunu , ghumoto ghutsoghetsa tsisang'ano tsawo na kulangusa ka tsinogha .
46003014	Ka isang'ano ye imunu ng'ailakale mmoto , imunu ayo katsobokela lighweko .

46003016	Angu ng'ammanyile bae ka mwemwe mwa Ing'anda ye Imulungu , na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kokala mghati mwenu ?
46003017	Apfo imunu ang'aihinya ing'anda ye Imulungu , Imulungu katsomhinya . Kwaapfila ing'anda ye Imulungu idegheta , namwe mwa ing'anda ye Imulungu .
46003018	Uleke kwighutsukila mwenyegho , imunu wowose yali mghati mwenu ang'eghoda kana nzewele mne isi ino , ng'apfu yawe mbotsi ili yawe na nzewele ya kweli .
46003019	Kwaapfila nzewele ye isi ino ya ubotsi hambele he Imulungu . Ka pfayandikighwe , “ Imulungu kowaghogha iwanu wane nzewele mne ukukengela kwawo . ”
46003020	Kuya yandikighwa , “ Imtwatsa koghamanya aghala ighawakwalangula iwanu wane nzewele ka ng'aghanoghile bae . ”
46003021	Apfo imunu aleke kwighodela aghala ghawotenda iwanu . Mana ghose ghenu mwemwe .

46004001	Iwanu watwone twetwe ka twawatumighwa wa Kiristu , yatwing'ighwe ing'onde ye kuwapetela iwanu tsimbuli itsipfisike tse Imulungu .

46004007	Yuhi iyakutendile mkulu kubita munu yungi ? Apfi Imulungu ng'akwing'ile bae pfose pfawinapfo ? Ka kwing'ighwa , lelo ule wighoda ka ng'wing'ighwe bae ?
46004008	Haya , ma mghapata ghose ! Lelo ma muwa matajiri ! Muwa wandewa bila ya twetwe ! Nobama mng'awile iwandewa ili tuwe wandewa hamwe na mwemwe !
46004009	Kwaapfila nene pfanikona Imulungu katundenda twetwe iwatumighwa tuwe iwanu wa kuchisogho ghendo , ka iwanu iwahighighwe kukomighwa hambele he wamalaika ne iwanu .
46004010	Twetwe twawabotsi kwaajili ya kumtumikila Kiristu , lekeni mwemwe mna nzewele kwa kwilunga na Kiristu ! Twetwe twahela ngupfu , lekeni mwemwe mna ngupfu , mwemwe ng'ambetsighwa bae , lekeni twetwe twobetsighwa .
46004011	Mbaka sambi tuna nzala na ng'ilu , twahela chokupfala , twotohighwa sideke , twahela hanu ho ukukala .

46004013	hatulighighwa , twetwe twakwidika ghoya . Mbaka sambi twetwe twakoneka ka mibangu ye isi , na kwa chila imunu twakoneka wabewebewe !
46004014	Si kwandika bae agha ghose ili niwaghume chinyala , lekeni nowafunda ka wanangu iwonoghela .
46004015	Hata mng'awa ne iwemilitsi wengi kwa kwilunga ne Kiristu , lekeni aba wenu yumwe yaliheka , kwaapfila kwa kwilunga na Yesu Kiristu nene niwa aba wenu kwa kuwaghalila Imbuli Inoghile .
46004016	Apfo nowalomba mtende ka pfanitenda nene .
46004017	Apfo nomghalilani Timoteo , imwanangu mna ukwilunga na Kiristu iyonoghela na iyotogholighwa . Ayo katsomkumbusani inzila yaniiwinza nene iili mghati mwa Yesu Kiristu . Inzila iyanilangulitsa chila hanu mne makanisa ghose
46004018	Iwanu wamwenga kulawa mna mwemwe wandusa kwighoda , kulonga ka sikutsa bae kuna mwemwe .

46004021	Choni ichiwanoghela ? Nitse na fimbo , au nitse ne unoghelo na ghumoyo ghuholile ?
46005001	Sambi yolongighwa ghendo ka mghati mwenu kuna ughoni , na ughoni awo ng'ana woneke bae hata kwe iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu . Imunu kowasa na imwehe wa aba wake !
46005002	Kuya lelo mdahatse kwighoda ! Ing'awile ng'apfu mwemwe mwone usungu , na imunu iyatendile chinu acho yawingighwe mghati mwenu .

46005004	Hamtingana kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa wetu Yesu nene na hamwe namwe mmoyo , na ngupfu ya Imtwatsa wetu Yesu yabaho ,
46005005	mmwing'e Setani imunu ayo lukuli lwake luhinyighwe ili muhe wake ukombolighwe litsuwa alyo Imtwatsa hayatsokutsa kuwahigha iwanu .
46005006	Kwighoda kwenu ng'akunoghile bae , angu ng'ampfimanyile bae ka hamira chidogho yotenda bulunge lya usaghe we chighate liwe kulu ?
46005007	Muilapfe hamira ya ghumwande ye nzambi ili mdeghete ghendo . Kuya mwitseghala ne bulunge lya usaghe we pfighate pfa sambi ililihela hamira , ka pfambamighwa kuwa . Mana Pasaka wetu , Kiristu , tsakalapfighwa yawe nambiko .
46005008	Apfo , tutende chihungo acho cha Paska , si kwa hamira ye ghumwande , hamira ila ye nzambi na ghehile . Bali kwa chighate ing'achighumighwe hamira , iwo ghumoyo ghunoghile na ighulongesa !
46005009	Niwandikilani mne ibaluwa yangu ingi , mleke kwihanganya ne waghoni .
46005010	Silonga bae mleke kwihanganya ne iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu , awala iwaghoni , wabwa , wabapfi na awala iwotamanila pfinyagho . Mana ili kuwahepa iwanu awo wose mwobamighwa mlawe muisi mno .
46005011	Lekeni sambi nowandikilani mleke kwihanganya ne imunu wowose iyolonga komtoghola Kiristu aku kamghoni , ka mbwa , kotamanila pfinyagho , kana maligho , kopatika , ka mwihitsi Imunu ka ayo hata ukuja naye mleke .
46005012	Angu sang'ano yangu kuwahigha iwanu iwali kunze mwe kingili lyenu ? Aku mwemwe ng'amuwahigha iwali mghati mwenu ?
46005013	Imulungu mwenyegho katsowahigha awo iwali kunze , “ Muwingeni imunu yehile iyali mghati mwenu ! ”
46006001	Imunu ang'esonga ne myaghe , ikuwatse yamghale hane libaratsa lye iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu ? Ng'ambe kobamighwa yamghale kwe iwanu we Imulungu .
46006002	Angu , ng'ammanyile bae ka iwanu we Imulungu watsoihigha iisi ? Ka mwemwe mtsoihigha iisi , ule ng'amdaha bae kuigha maghomba ghano madomado ?
46006003	Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka mwemwe mtsowahigha malaika , pfii lelo mne ghamaghomba ighali muisi ?
46006004	Hampata lighomba , apfi mwowakema iwanu ing'awolitoghola kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu wamuhigheni ?
46006005	Nolonga apfi kuwaghumani mwemwe chinyala . Apfi kuduhu imunu mghati mwenu yane nzewele ye kuhigha lighomba lye wakiristu wayaghe ?
46006006	Lekeni , mkiristu komghala mkiristu myaghe mne libaratsa na wowaleka iwanu iwang'amnyile Imulungu wawahighe .
46006007	Kwa kwighala mwemwe kwa mwemwe kune ghamabalatsa , kolangusa mwemwe mtotsa ghendo . Ambe ing'awile ng'apfu mwemwe kubokighwa pfinu pfenu ?
46006008	Lekeni mwemwe mwobunza na mwoboka , kuya agho mwowatendela wakiristu wayenu !
46006009	Angu ng'ammanyile bae iwanu wehile ng'awatsouhala bae undewa we Imulungu ? Mleke kwighutsukila , si waghoni wala iwanzinzi , wala iwowatamanila pfinyagho , wala awala iwowasa ne iwamale weyawo ,
46006010	wala wabapfi , wabwa , iwopatika , wang'enye , iwaboka weyawo , wala wane maligho , awo wose ng'awatsouhala bae undewa we Imulungu .
46006011	Wamwenga wenu tsamkala ka iwanu awo . Lekeni nzambi tsenu tsileghusighwa , mtendighwa muwe wenzeluka na mwikighwa kwa litaghwa lye Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu na kwa ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu wetu .
46006012	Imunu yungi kodaha kulonga , “ Nilekelighwa kutenda pfinu pfose , ” lekeni si pfinu pfose bae ipfikwapfila . Notoghola ka nodaha kutenda chila chinu , lekeni sileka bae chinu chochose chinongotse .
46006013	Ichijo kwaajili ye munda na munda kwaajili ye ichijo , lekeni Imulungu katsofihinya pfose . Lukuli si kwaajili ye ughoni bae , ila kwaajili ye Imtwatsa , naye Imtwatsa koulolesa lukuli .
46006014	Imulungu kwa ingupfu yake kamtsiliula Imtwatsa , naye katsotusiliula twetwe pfipfila .
46006015	Apfi , ng'ammanyile bae ka ng'uli tsenu pfilungo pfa Kiristu ? Lelo nipfisole pfilungo pfa Kiristu nipfilunge na chiweghe ? Bae !
46006016	Ebu ng'ammanyile bae ayula iyelunga na chiweghe kakuwa lukuli lumwe naye ? Ka Ghamaandiko pfagholonga , “ Nawo weli watsakuwa lukuli lumwe . ”
46006017	Lekeni ayula yelunga na Imtwatsa kakuwa naye kwa muhe .
46006018	Mkale kutali ne ughoni . Nzambi tsose tsimwenga itsitendighwa ng'atsilagha lukuli , lekeni mghoni kolutendela nzambi lukuli lwake .
46006019	Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka ng'uli tsenu tsa ing'anda ye Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , iyali mghati mwenu , iyamumbokele kulawa kwe Imulungu ? Apfo mwemwe mwa wanu we Imulungu .
46006020	Kwaapfila tsamghulighwa kwa bei ng'ulu , apfo mumtunye Imulungu kwa ng'uli tsenu .
46007001	Apfo kwa mbuli ya aghala ghamwandike ; pfinogha imunu yaleke kukwela .
46007002	Lekeni kwaapfila kuna ughoni sideke , chila mmale yawe na mwehe wake mwenyegho . Na chila pinga yawe na mmale wake mwenyegho .
46007003	Immale yatende chayobamighwa kumtendela mwehe wake , na ipinga yatende chayobamighwa kumtendela immale wake .
46007004	Lukuli lwa mwehe , si lwake yaliyeka bae , ila lwa immale wake pfipfila . Na lukuli lwa mmale si lwake yaliyeka bae ila lwa mwehe wake pfipfila .
46007005	Mleke kwiima , ila ka mwilaghana kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho , ili mdahe kukala kwa kumlomba Imulungu , kuya muyile keli ili Setani aleke kuwaghetsa kwaapfila ng'amdaha kududumila .
46007006	Aghano noghalonga nene , na si laghitso bae .
46007007	Nobama iwanu wawe ka nene pfanili , lekeni chila imunu keng'ighwa ne Imulungu ghweko lyake mwenyegho . Munu yumwe kana lino na munu yungi kana lila .
46007008	Apfo kwa awala iwang'ali ng'ana wakwele na awala ng'ana wakwelighwe , nene nolonga pfino ; pfinogha wang'akala ka nene pfanili .
46007009	Lekeni ka ng'amdaha bae kwikinga wenyegho , mkwele , kwaapfila pfinogha ng'ani kukwela kubita kusulukila .
46007010	Kwa awala iwakwelighwe na iwakwelile noweng'a laghitso lino , kuya si langu bae ila lye Imtwatsa . Mwehe yaleke kwileka na mmale wake .
46007011	Lekeni ang'atenda apfo , yakale bila ukukwelighwa , au yelamlitse ne immale wake . Naye immale aleke kumleka mwehe wake .
46007012	Kwa awala iwasighale nolonga pfino . Nene mwenyegho , si Imtwatsa bae . Ka immale kana mwehe ing'ayomtoghola Yesu , na mwehe ayo kotoghola kukala na mmale wake , mmale aleke kumleka mwehe wake .
46007013	Na ka ipinga kana immale na immale ayo ng'omtoghola Yesu bae , ila kotoghola kukala na mwehe wake , ipinga ayo aleke kumlema mmale wake .
46007014	Kwaapfila immale yula ing'omtoghola Yesu kobokelighwa ne Imulungu kubitila mwehe wake . Na ipinga yula ing'omtoghola Yesu kohenzeluka kubitila immale wake . Ka si pfipfo bae , iwana wenu wang'alekile weha , lekeni ka pfaili , iwana wenu wenzeluka .
46007015	Ka imunu ing'omtoghola Yesu kobama yamleke myaghe , umleke atende apfo . Immale au ipinga iyotoghola Imulungu ng'oghomighwa bae kutenda apfo . Imulungu katukema twetwe tukale kwa tindiwalo .
46007016	Umanyatse , lamda ghwe mwehe kutsodaha kumkombola immale wako ? Kuya umanyatse ghwe immale lamda kutsodaha kumkombola mwehe wako ?
46007017	Apfo chila imunu yakale ka pfayagholelighwe ne Imulungu , yakale ka pfayakemighwe ne Imulungu . Alino laghitso lyangu kwa makingili ghose ghe iwanu we Imulungu .
46007018	Ka imunu hayakemighwe tsakakala kengila ngoma , ayo aleke kwitenda ka ng'ana yengile ng'oma . Na ka imunu hayakemighwe tsakakala ng'engile ng'oma bae , aleke kwingila ng'oma .
46007019	Kwaapfila , kwingila ngoma au kuleka kwingila ng'oma si chinu bae , ichinu chikulu , kukinda ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu .
46007020	Chila imunu yakale ka pfayakemighwe ne Imulungu .
46007021	Apfi , haukemighwe tsakukala mtumwa ? Uleke kwalangula , lekeni ka kopata uhuru utumile .
46007022	Kwaapfila yeye iyakemighwe ne Imtwatsa aku ka mtumwa , ayo kokombolighwa ne Imtwatsa . Pfipfila ayula iyakemighwe aku si mtumwa bae , ayo kakuwa mtumwa wa Kiristu .
46007023	Imulungu kamghulani kwa bei ng'ulu , lelo mleke kuwa watumighwa we iwanu .
46007024	Sale tsangu , chila munu na akale ka pfayakemighwe , kwaapfila Imulungu kahamwe na mwemwe .
46007025	Lelo , kwa imbuli ya awala ing'awakwelighwe bae , nene nahela laghitso kulawa kwe Imtwatsa , lekeni nene nolonga ghano ka imunu iyatogholighwe ne libatsi lye Imtwatsa .
46007026	Pfanikona nene , ukughaya kwamghaya sambi , pfinogha mwemwe kukala ka pfamli .
46007027	Pfii ma kukwela ? Uleke kumleka mwehe wako . Pfii ng'una ukwele bae ? Uleke kubama ipinga .
46007028	Lekeni ung'akwela , ng'utotsa bae , na imwali ang'akwelighwa , ayo ng'ototsa bae , lekeni iwanu ka awo watsopata maghayo mengi ghe ughima uno , lekeni nene nobama agho ghaleke kuwapata mwemwe .
46007029	Sale tsangu , nobama nonge apfi , ghamatsuwa ighasighale si mengi bae , kulawa sambi awala iwakwelile wakale ka ng'awakwelile bae ,
46007030	na awala iwolila wawe ka ng'awolila bae na awala wodeng'elela wawe ka ng'awodeng'elela bae . Na awala iwoghula ipfinu , pfinu apfo pfiwe ka si pfawo bae ,
46007031	awala iwane sang'ano ne iisi ino wakale ka wahela sang'ano nayo . Kwaapfila ka pfatumanya , iisi ino ya sambi yofosa .
46007032	Nobama mwemwe mleke kwalangula . Imunu yalihela mwehe kakwalangula sang'ano ye Imtwatsa , pfayatsomnogheletse Imtwatsa .
46007033	Immale iyakwelile kosang'ana ne tsing'onde tse iisi ili yamnogheletse mwehe wake ,
46007034	naye kokweghighwa ne pfinu pfili . Ipinga yang'akwelighwe au imwali kakwalangula ng'onde tse Imtwatsa ili yawe mwenzeluka mlukuli na mne muhe . Lekeni ipinga iyakwelighwe kakwalangula ng'onde tse iisi , ili yamdeng'eletse mmale wake .
46007035	Nolonga apfi kwaapfila nobama niwapfile . Sibama bae kwingilila uhuru wenu , ila nobama mwemwe mtende ighanoghile na mwilapfe muwenyegho mne tsing'onde tse Imtwatsa bila kuwinza pfinu pfingi .
46007036	Imunu ang'ona ng'otenda pfinoghile bae kuleka kumkwela mwali yamlapfile tsengele , na ka ng'odaha bae kukala bila kukwela , na ang'ona mwali wake miyaka yake yofosa , yatende pfayobama , ang'amkwela pinga ayo , ng'otenda nzambi bae .
46007037	Lekeni immale ayo ang'alamla imwenyegho kuleka kukwela , na ka kodaha kuleka kusulukila wapinga , ayo katsotenda pfinoghile ghendo kuleka kumkwela imwali ayo .
46007038	Apfo ayula yobama kukwela kotenda pfinoghile , na ayula yoleka kukwela kotenda pfinoghile ghendo .
46007039	Ipinga iyakwelighwe kohighwa na mmale wake ka immale ayo mghima . Lekeni immale wake ang'afa , kodaha kukwelighwa keli na imunu yungi iyombama , lekeni immale ayo yawe iyommanya Kiristu .
46007040	Lekeni pfanikona nene , ng'apfu ghendo ipinga ayo ang'akala yaliheka , na nene nakona pfipfila nina Ghumuhe we Imulungu .
46008001	Lelo , aino imbuli ye pfijo ipfitambikighwe pfinyagho . Twomanya ghendo ka “ twetwe wose tuna chisomo ” , ka pfawolonga . Lekeni ukumanya ako kwowatenda iwanu weghode , ila unoghelo wotsenga .
46008002	Imunu ang'alonga komanya chinu , ng'omanya chinu bae ka pfoyobamighwa kumanya .
46008003	Lekeni imunu iyomnoghela Imulungu komanyika na Imulungu .
46008004	Apfo , mne imbuli ye ipfijo ipfitambikighwe pfinyagho , twomanya ghendo ka chinyagho si chinu bae muisi mno , na twomanya ghendo kuduhu Imulungu yungi ila Imulungu wetu yaliyeka .
46008005	Hata ka kuna pfinu ipfikemighwa milungu muisi mno au kulanga , na hata ka kuna milungu ne iwandewa wengi ,
46008006	lekeni kuna twetwe Imulungu ka yumwe ; Aba , yalumbile pfinu pfose , kubitila yeye twetwe twa waghima . Kuya tuna Imtwatsa yumwe , iyo Yesu Kiristu , kubitila yeye pfinu pfose tsapfilumbighwa , na twetwe twa waghima kubitila yeye .
46008007	Lekeni si chila imunu bae komanya agha ghose . Iwanu wamwenga iwatsowele kutambikila pfinyagho , mbaka leloli wang'aja ichijo acho wotonga chilawa kwe ipfinyagho . Na kwaapfila mimoyo yawo yahela ingupfu , wetenda iwenyegho weha kwa ukuja ichijo acho .
46008008	Ichijo ng'achidaha bae kukughala habehi ne Imulungu , tung'aleka kuchija ng'atuhungukighwa na chinu bae , tung'aja ng'atukongetsighwa chinu bae .
46008009	Lekeni mwalangitse pfamlekelelighwe ukutenda pfinu , mleke kuwahonza awalaiwotoghola chidogho wengile mnzambi .
46008010	Ka imunu yotoghola chidogho kakona ghweghwe iumanyile kwakuja mne ng'anda ye pfinyagho , pfii ng'atsoghumighwa ghumoyo bae kuja ichijo ichitambikighwe pfinyagho ?
46008011	Apfo imunu yuno yane noghola ilihela ngupfu , iyo Kiristu yafile kwaajili yake ng'atsakwagha bae kwaajili ya achila ghweghwe kochikema ukumanya ?
46008012	Ka mwowaghitsa pfino wakiristu wayenu , na kutsilagha noghola tsawo itsilihela ngupfu , mwomtendela nzambi Kiristu .
46008013	Apfo ichijo ching'amtenda mkiristo miyangu yaghwe mnzambi , sitsakuja bae inyama , kwaapfila ning'aja nitsomhonza ndughu yangu yaghwile mnzambi .
46009001	Angu nene sina ng'ombolighwe bae ? Pfii nene si mtumighwa bae ? Apfi nene simwonile Imtwatsa wetu Yesu ? Angu mwemwe si ghamatunda ghe isang'ano yangu bae ?
46009002	Hata ka kwa wamwenga nene si mtumighwa bae , lekeni kuna mwemwe nene na mtumighwa . Mwemwe mwa wakalangama we utumighwa wangu kwaapfila mwilunga ne Imtwatsa .
46009003	Apfi pfipfo pfaniyamila kwe iwanu iwonighutsa .
46009004	Pfii ng'atubamighwa ukwing'ighwa bae ichijo na choukunwa kwaajili ye sang'ano yetu ?
46009005	Apfi twahela haki ye ukumsola mwehe iyomtoghola Kiristu na kwanga naye mne ghumwanza ka pfawotenda iwatumighwa wangi na iwandughu we Imtwatsa na Kefa .
46009006	Au twetwe tuliheka nene na Balinaba itubamighwa kusang'ana ili tupate aghala ighatubama .
46009007	Angu asikali wachi iyoghenda kwing'ondo keliha imwenyegho ? Yuhi iyohanda mitsabibu aku ng'akuja bae ghamatunda ghake ? Yuhi iyodima iwanyama aku ng'akunwa bae matombo ghawo ?
46009008	Apfi agha ghanilonga nolonga gha chimunu ? Angu Ghamalaghitso gha Musa nagho ng'agholonga apfi bae ?
46009009	Mana yandikighwa mne Ghamalaghitso gha Musa , “ Haumtumila ing'ombe kupfuna uhunga , uleke kumwoha chibang'wa . ” Pfii , Imulungu kolonga mbuli tse ng'ombe ?
46009010	Apfi hayalongile apfo ng'alongile mbuli tsetu bae ? Tsayandikighwa kwaajili ya twetwe ghendo . Kwaapfila ayula iyolima na ayula iyopfuna , wose wana haki yo ukubetela ipfijo .
46009011	Ka twetwe tuhanda imbeghu ye umuhe mghati mwenu , apfi chinu chikulu twetwe tung'apata aghala ghatubama kulawa kuna mwemwe ?
46009012	Ka wanu wamwenga wodaha ukughalolela agho kulawa kuna mwemwe . Apfi twetwe ng'atudaha bae ukughalolela agho kubita wawo ? Lekeni twetwe ng'atutumile bae uwetso awo . Ila tsatududumila chila chinu ili tuleke kuighoma Imbuli Inoghile ye Kiristu .
46009013	Apfi ng'ammanyile bae , awala iwosang'ana mne ing'anda ye Imulungu wopata ipfijo pfawo mng'anda amo , na awala iwalapfa nambiko hanu ha kutambikila wopata ipfinu pfe inambiko ayo ?
46009014	Pfipfila , Imtwatsa kalaghitsa apfi , awala iwopetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile wabokele ipfijo pfawo kulawa mne imbuli inoghile .
46009015	Lekeni nene situmile bae uleghelo hata umwe . Wala sighandika bae ghano ili mnendele apfo . Ng'apfu nene nife kubita kumtenda imunu yambone ka nene neghoda hela .
46009016	Ka nene nopeta Imbuli inoghile , acho si chinu cha kwighodela bae . Ayo iyo sang'ano yaning'ighwe . Na nitsolyona ka siipeta bae Imbuli inoghile !
46009017	Ning'atenda sang'ano ino kwa ukubama mwenyegho , ning'alolele ukughwekighwa , lekeni ka nene nobamighwa kuitenda sang'ano ayo , ayo yolangusa ka Imulungu kangaya sang'ano ayo niitende .
46009018	Lelo nobokela maliho ghachi ? Hanipetela iwanu Imbuli inoghile , sibama bae kwing'ighwa chinu , wala silomba maliho kwaajili ye sang'ano ye kupeta Imbuli inoghile .
46009019	Nene si mtumwa wa imunu wowose bae . Lekeni netenda imwenyegho kuwa mtumwa wa chila imunu ili nimpatile Kiristu iwanu wengi .
46009020	Haning'ali nisang'ana na Wayahudi tsanikala ka Myahudi , ili niwapate Wayahudi ; hata ka nene imwenyegho silongotsighwa bae na malaghitso gha Musa , lekeni tsanikala ka nolongotsighwa na malaghitso agho ili niwapate awala iwalongotsighwa na malaghitso gha Musa .
