46009021	Haning'ali nisang'ana na awala iwalihela malaghitso gha Musa , tsanikala ka nahela malaghitso , ili niwapate awala iwalihela malaghitso gha Musa . Kulonga apfo si ka nene sighawinza malaghitso hambele he Imulungu , kwaapfila nina malaghitso hambele he Kiristu .
46009022	Hanisang'ane na awala wane noghola ilihela ngupfu , tsanikala ka nina noghola yangu yahela ngupfu ka wawo pfawali , ili niwapate awo wane noghola ilihela ngupfu . Nitenda chila chinu kwe iwanu wose ili nidahe kuwatenda wakombolighwe kwa nzila yoyose ila .
46009023	Notenda agha ghose kwaajili ya imbuli inoghile , ili mbokele balaka tsake .
46009024	Apfi ng'ammanyile bae iwanu hawotsuma , wose wotsuma , lekeni ayula iyowalongola weyaghe iyo iyoghwekighwa ? Mtsume pfipfo ili mghwekighwe .
46009025	Imunu wowose iyobama kuwahuma weyaghe mna ukutsuma , tanu kalekagha ghose , kotenda apfo ili yabokele taji ilihinyika , lekeni twetwe twotenda apfo ili tubokele taji ing'alihinyika bae .
46009026	Apfo notsuma ka imunu iyobama kuhuma . Sitowa bae ka imunu yetowa ne libeho ,
46009027	ila noludununza lukuli Iwangu luwe na ngupfu na nolutenda luwe mtumwa wangu , notenda apfo ili hanimalitsa kuwapetela iwanu wangi nene imwenyegho ndeke koneka sinoghile bae kubokela ghweko .
46010001	Ndughu tsangu , sibama bae mwemwe mleke kumanya ka aba tsenu tsawahasi mwe libingu lila , na wose tsawaloka mne bahali ila ndung'u .
46010002	Wose tsawabatitsighwa wawe ka wa Musa mne libingu na mne ibahali .
46010003	Wose tsawaja ichijo chichila che ghumuhe ,
46010004	pfipfila tsawanwa chokunwa chichila che ghumuhe , mana tsawanwa kulawa mne bambalawe lye umuhe iliwawinzile , bambalawe lila tsalikala Kiristu imwenyegho .
46010005	Lekeni , Imulungu ng'anoghelighwe na wamwenga wawo . Apfo ng'uli tsawo tsatsipwililika mnyika .
46010006	Apfo agha ghose ghalawila ili kutukanya tuleke kuwa iwanu wa kusulukila ghehile ka wawo pfawasulukile .
46010007	Mleke kutamanila pfinyagho , ka wamwenga pfawatendile . Ka pfayandikighwe , “ Iwanu tsawakala hasi waja na wanwa , kuya wema wapfina pfihile . ”
46010008	Mleke kutenda uweghe , ka iwanu wangi pfawatendile , kwa litsuwa limwe iwanu elufu ishilini na wadatu tsawafa .
46010009	Mleke kumghetsa Kiristu ka iwanu wangi pfawamghetsile , wose tsawafa kwa kulumighwa ne wanzoka .
46010010	Mleke kunung'unika ka iwanu wangi pfawatendile , nawo tsawakomighwa na mtumighwa we kulanga we lifwa .
46010011	Agha ghose ghawalawila wawo ili twetwe tulangulitsighwe , ghandikighwa ili ghatukanye twetwe itukala mne ghamatsuwa ighali habehi na utsighilo .
46010012	Apfo , ayula iyebona kema pfinoghile , yalangitse aleke kughwa .
46010013	Ghamaghetso ghampatile si magheni bae kwe iwanu . Imulungu kotogholighwa , naye ng'atsowaleka mghetsighwe kubita pfamdaha . Lekeni hamghetsighwa , yeye katsoweng'a ingupfu yo kududumila , na inzila yo kulawila .
46010014	Lelo ndughu tsangu wanoghelighwa , mkale kutali ne ukutamanila pfinyagho .
46010015	Nolonga na mwemwe ka iwanu wane tsimbutsi , mwalangule achino chanilonga .
46010016	Hatubaliki ichikombe che ichijo che ukumkumbuka lmtwatsa , apfi ng'atwilunga bae na idamu ya Kiristu ? Pfii hatubena chighate ng'atwilunga bae na lukuli lwa Kiristu ?
46010017	Kwaapfila hana chighate chimwe , na twetwe yatuli wengi , twalukuli lumwe , mana twetwe wose twegholela chighate chicho .
46010018	Muwalole Wayahudi wenyegho , awala iwakuja nambiko welunga ne Imulungu kubitila nambiko atso .
46010019	Lelo nonge choni ? Ichijo ichitambikighwe pfinyagho chinu chikulu kubita ichijo ? Na ipfinyagho chinu chikulu ?
46010020	Bae ! Chanilonga nene chicho chino , nambiko tse iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu wowalapfila pfinyamkela , si Imulungu bae . Na nene sibama bae mwilunge na ipfinyamkela .
46010021	Ng'amdaha bae kuchinwela ichikombe che Imtwatsa aku mwochinwela chikombe che pfinyamkela . Ng'amdaha ukuja mne metsa ye Imtwatsa na baho mne metsa ya pfinyamkela .
46010022	Angu twobama tumtende Imtwatsa yawe na chepfu . Apfi mwopfikitsa tuna ngupfu kubita yeye ?
46010023	Wamwenga wolonga , “ Ipfinu pfose ng'apfighomighwa bae , ” lekeni nene nolonga si pfose ipfikwapfila . Kuya wamwenga wolonga , “ Ipfinu pfose ng'apfighomighwa bae , ” lekeni nene nolonga , si pfose ipfitsenga .
46010024	Imunu wowose mna mwemwe aleke kwibamila yaliyeka ghanoghile , ila yawabamile na weyaghe .
46010025	Mje chochose ichihutsighwa mne maghulilo bila kughutsaghutsa kwaajili ye imimoyo yenu .
46010026	Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga , “ Isi ya Imulungu na ghose ighali mumo ghake . ”
46010027	Ka imunu ing'ayomtoghola Yesu komkemani mkaje ichijo kaye yake , namwe mwobama kughenda , mje chochose ichikighwe hambele henu bila kughutsaghutsa kwaajili ya imimoyo yenu .
46010028	Lekeni imunu yungi ang'akulongela , “ Chijo chino chitambikighwa pfinyagho , ” uleke kuja kwaajili ye imunu iyakulongele na kwa kwaajili ya ghumoyo .
46010029	Nolonga , kwaajili ya ghumoyo wa munu yungi si kwaajili ya ghumoyo ghwako bae , Imunu yungi ang'aghutsa , “ Ule lelo ukukombolighwa kwangu kuhighighwe ne ghumoyo ghwe imunu yungi ?
46010030	Ka nolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwa ichijo chanikuja , ebali imunu yungi yanonge pfihile kwa ichijo acho ? ”
46010031	Apfo , chochose chamtenda , ukuja au ukunwa , mtende ghose kwa utunitso we Imulungu .
46010032	Mleke kuwatenda Wayahudi wala Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi , wala makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu wekwale .
46010033	Muwe ka nene , nene nobama kuwadeng'eletsa wanu wose mna ghose ghanitenda . Mana sibamila niliheka ghanoghile , ila nowabamila ghanoghile iwanu wose ili wakombolighwe .
46011001	Mniwinze ka nene pfanimuwinzile Kiristu .
46011002	Nomtunyani kwa kunikumbuka , ne ukughakinda malaghitso ghaniweng'ileni .
46011003	Lekeni nobama mwemwe mmanye pfino , Kiristu iyo litwi lya chila mmale , na mmale iyo litwi lya pinga wake , na Imulungu iyo litwi lya Kiristu .
46011004	Apfo imunu wowose iyolomba au iyopeta usenga iulawa kwe Imulungu aku kaghubika litwi lyake , ayo komghuma chinyala Kiristu .
46011005	Na ipinga wowose hayolomba au hayopeta usenga we Imulungu aku litwi lyake ng'alighubikighwe bae , komghuma chinyala mmale wake , ipinga ayo keghala na ipinga iyaghetile mvili tsake tsose .
46011006	Ka ipinga ng'oghubika bae litwi lyake , ng'apfu yabehe mvili tsake . Lekeni ka chinyala kwe ipinga kugheta mvili tsake au kubeha mvili tsake , yaghubike litwi lyake
46011007	Immale ng'obamighwa bae yaghubike litwi lyake , kwaapfila yeye keghala ne Imulungu na ka utunitso we Imulungu . Lekeni ipinga ka utunitso we immale .
46011008	Kwaapfila , immale ng'alawile bae kwe ipinga , ila ipinga kalawa kwe immale .
46011009	Immale ng'alumbighwe bae kwaajili ye ipinga , ila ipinga tsakalumbighwa kwaajili ya immale .
46011010	Apfo kwaajili ye malaika , ipinga yaghubike litwi lyake , ili chiwe chitango cha uwetso uli mchanya mwake .
46011011	Lekeni , hambele he Imtwatsa ipinga ng'omuhila bae immale , na immale ng'omuhila bae ipinga .
46011012	Mana ka ipinga pfayalawile kwe immale , pfipfila immale naye kakwelekighwa ne ipinga , lekeni ghose gholawa kwe Imulungu .
46011013	Mlamle wenyegho , angu pfinogha kwe ipinga kumlomba Imulungu aku ng'aghubike bae chinu chochose mwitwi mwake ?
46011014	Hata iwanu pfatulumbighwe pfolangusa ghendo , mmale kuwa na mvili ng'ulu chinyala kuna yeye ,
46011015	lekeni ipinga ang'awa na mvili ng'ulu , acho chinu chinoghile kuna yeye . Kwaapfila keng'ighwa mvili ng'ulu tsimghubike .
46011016	Imunu ang'abama kwihisanya mna mbuli ino , twetwe twahela matsowela ghangi . Wala makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu ghahela matsowela ghangi .
46011017	Mne malaghitso ghano ghanimwing'ani siwatunya bae , mana mne mitingano yenu yo ukumtamanila Imulungu mwotenda ghehile ghendo kubita ighanoghile .
46011018	Aho mwanduso tsanihulika hamtingana mne mitingano yenu mwebaghula . Nani chidogho notoghola ,
46011019	mana kobamighwa kuwe na ubaghutsi mghati mwenu , ili awala iwatogholighwe ne Imulungu woneke pfinoghile .
46011020	Hamtingana hamwe , mwopfikitsa mwakuja ichijo che ukumkumbuka Imtwatsa , kumbe bae !
46011021	Kwaapfila hamkuja , chila munu koghendelela ukuja bila kuwabeta wayenu , mbaka wangi wokala ne nzala aku wamwenga wapatika .
46011022	Angu ng'amdaha bae ukuja na kunwa mmakae mwenu ? Ebu mwolibesa kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu , na kuwaghuma chinyala iwanu iwalihela chinu ? Lelo niwalongeleni choni ? Niwatunye ? Mbe siwatunya bae kwaajili ya chinu acho .
46011023	Mana nighabokela kulawa kwe Imtwatsa ghamalangulitso ghanimwing'eni , Imtwatsa Yesu chilo chila chayahundukighwe , tsakasola chighate ,
46011024	hayamalitse kulonga mighede kwe Imulungu , kachibena , kalonga , “ Aluno lukuli lwangu , lwamwing'ighwe mwemwe , mtende apfi kwa kung'umbuka nene . ”
46011025	Pfipfila hayamalitse ukuja , kasola chikombe , kalonga , “ Chikombe chino laghano lya sambi lye idamu yangu . Mtende apfi chila hamkunwa kwa kung'umbuka nene . ”
46011026	Mana chila hamkuja chighate chino na kuchinwela chikombe chino , mwolipeta lifwa lye Imtwatsa , mbaka hayatsakuya keli .
46011027	Apfo imunu wowose iyakuja chighate chino na kuchinwela chikombe che Imtwatsa ing'apfibamighwa , ayo katsokuwa na totso kwa lukuli na idamu ye Imtwatsa .
46011028	Apfo , chila imunu tanu yelolese mwenyegho , kuya kodaha ukuja chighate acho na ukunwela chikombe acho .
46011029	Mana imunu wowose iyakuja na kunwa bila kulutanga lukuli lwe Imtwatsa chinu chachi , ayo kehigha imwenyegho .
46011030	Kwaajili ayo iwanu wengi mghati mwenu wahela ingupfu na watamu , na wamwenga wafa .
46011031	Twing'elolesa pfinoghile , tung'alekile kuhighighwa ne Imulungu .
46011032	Lekeni hatuhighighwa ne Imtwatsa twolangulisighwa tunoghe ili tuleke kuhighighwa hamwe ne iisi yose .
46011033	Apfo ndughu tsangu , hatwitingana hamwe ukuja ichijo che Imtwatsa , chila munu yambete myaghe .
46011034	Imunu ang'awa ne nzala , aje ukaye yake ili hamtingana kuleke kuwa ne ukuhighighwa ne Imulungu . Lekeni agho ghangi , nitsowalangulitsani hanikutsa .
46012001	Lelo ndughu tsangu nobama mmanye pfinoghile mbuli tse pfigholelo ipfilawa kwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
46012002	Mwomanya hamng'ali ng'ana mumtange Imulungu , tsamlongosighwa mne nzila tsihile muitamanile milungu ilihela ughima .
46012003	Nobama mmanye pfino , kuduhu imunu iyolongosighwa ne Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu iyodaha kulonga “ Yesu yalighitighwe , ” kuya kuduhu imunu iyodaha kulonga “ Yesu iyo Imtwatsa , ” bila kulongosighwa na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka .
46012004	Kuna pfigholelo pfingi tofwautitofwauti , lekeni Ghumuhe iyopfilapfa ka yumwe .
46012005	Kuya kuna nzila tofwautitofwauti tsa sang'ano , lekeni Imtwatsa ka yumwe .
46012006	Kuya kuna nzila tofwautitofwauti tse kutenda sang'ano atso , lekeni Imulungu iyo yuyo iyosang'ana ng'onde tsose kwe iwanu wose .
46012007	Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kelangusa kwa chila imunu kwa nzila tofwautitofwauti kwaajili ye iwanu wose .
46012008	Ghumuhe komwing'a imunu yumwe mbuli tsa nzewele , Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso we ukumanya pfinu .
46012009	Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi ukutoghola , na Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso wa kuwahonetsa iwanu .
46012010	Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka komwing'a imunu yumwe uwetso we kutenda pfihulo , Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso we kulapfa unabii na imunu yungi kubaghula pfigholelo ipfili pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na ipfili si pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka bae , yungi kulonga lugha ing'atsimanyika bae , na yungi kutsifasiri .
46012011	Atso tsose sang'ano tsa yuyo yumwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , naye komgholela chila imunu ka pfoyobama imwenyegho .
46012012	Lukuli lwa lumwe , hata ka lulumbighwa na pfilungo pfingi , na hata ka una pfilungo pfingi , lekeni pfolumba lukuli lumwe . Apfo pfipfo pfaili kwa Kiristu .
46012013	Kwaapfila twetwe wose tsatubatitsighwa kwa Ghumuhe yumwe , tuwe Wayahudi au si Wayahudi bae , tuwe watumwa au si watumwa bae , wose tunwesighwa Ghumuhe yuyula yumwe .
46012014	Kwaapfila lukuli ng'alulumbighwe bae kwa chilungo chimwe , ila kwa pfilungo pfingi .
46012015	Mghulu ung'alonga , “ Kwaapfila nene sili ghumoko bae , nene si wa lukuli . ” Apfi mghulu utsokuwa si wa lukuli bae ?
46012016	Na lighutwi ling'alonga , “ Kwaapfila nene sili inenge bae , nene si wa lukuli bae . ” Apfi lighutwi litsokuwa si lya lukuli bae ?
46012017	Ka lukuli lwose lung'awile inenge , ukuhulika kung'akalile kwani ? Na lukuli lwose lung'awile lighutwi , ukunusa kung'akalile kwani ?
46012018	Lekeni Imulungu keka pfilungo pfose mne lukuli lwa chila munu ka pfayabamile pfiwe .
46012019	Ka pfilungo pfose pfing'awile chilungo chimwe , lukuli lung'akalile kwani !
46012020	Ka pfaili , kuna pfilungo pfingi , lekeni lukuli lwa lumwe .
46012021	Inenge ng'aidaha bae kughulongela ghumoko , “ Sikubama bae ! ” Wala litwi ng'alidaha bae kughalongela maghulu “ Simbamani bae ! ”
46012022	Lekeni kubita agho , yolangusa ipfilungo pfila ipfikoneka pfahela ngupfu , apfo pfipfo chinu chikulu ,
46012023	na pfilungo pfila pfatulonga pfahela heshima , twopfing'a heshima ng'ulu , na pfilungo ipfikoneka ng'apfinoghile , twopfighubika pfinoghile .
46012024	Lekeni pfilungo pfetu ipfinoghile sideke ng'apfibama bae kuhambighwa . Imulungu mwenyegho kalwika pfipfo lukuli , na kapfing'a heshima pfilungo pfila ipfihungukighwe .
46012025	Apfo kuleke kuwa na ubaghutsi mne lukuli , ila pfilungo pfose pfilolese .
46012026	Chilungo chimwe ching'atama , pfilungo pfose pfotama hamwe nacho , na chilungo chimwe ching'atunyighwa , pfilungo pfose pfodeng'elela hamwe nacho .
46012027	Apfo chila munu mghati mwenu ka lukuli lwa Kiristu , na chila munu ka chilungo cha lukuli alwo .
46012028	Na mne kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu , Imulungu keka wa mwanduso iwatumighwa , wa keli manabii , wa kadatu iwalangulitsi , wa kane awala iwotenda pfihulo , na wala iweng'ighwe ingupfu yo kuwahonetsa iwatamu , na iwodaha kuwapfila iwanu wangi , kuya pfilongotsi na iwolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika .
46012029	Si wanu wose bae watumighwa au manabii au walangulitsi . Na si wose bae iwotenda pfihulo .
46012030	Si wose iwodaha kuhonetsa iwanu . Si wose iwolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika .
46012031	Apfo mbame pfigholelo pfikulu . Nani leloli nowalangusa nzila inoghile kubita nzila tsose .
46013001	Hata ka nodaha kulonga lugha tse iwanu na tse wamalaika we kulanga , lekeni ka nahela unoghelo , nene neghala na malati iikema hela au tsimbughi .
46013002	Hata ka nodaha kupeta usenga we Imulungu , na kumanya ghose na mbuli na kutanga chila chinu , hata ka nodaha kusoghetsa pfighongo kwa ukutoghola kwangu , lekeni ka nahela unoghelo , nene si chinu bae .
46013003	Hata ka ning'aweng'a iwahingwa pfinu pfose pfanilinapfo na kulwika lukuli lwangu lulakale mlambi , lekeni ka nahela unoghelo , nene sipata chinu bae .
46013004	Munu yane unoghelo kodudumila , kana libatsi , kahela chepfu , ng'etunya bae wala ng'eghoda bae .
46013005	Imunu yane unoghelo kana mahala , ng'abamagha bae mbuli tsake mwenyegho , ng'asumkagha bae kona maya , kuya ng'ekagha bae fondogholo mmoyo .
46013006	Imunu yane unoghelo ng'odeng'elelela bae ghehile , ila kodeng'elela ukweli .
46013007	Yane unoghelo kodudumila ghamatsuwa ghose , kotoghola ghamatsuwa ghose , ghamatsuwa ghose kololela bila kwipfa , kodudumila ghamatsuwa ghose .
46013008	Unoghelo ng'autsighagha bae , ka hana unabii , awo utsotsigha , ka hana ukulonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , ako kutsomala , ka hana ukumanya , kutsoluta .
46013009	Mana ukumanya kwetu ng'akutimile bae , na ukulapfa unabii kwetu ng'akutimile bae ,
46013010	lekeni Imulungu hayatsotimilitsa ghose , achila ing'achitimile chitsohupa .
46013011	Haning'ali mdodo , tsanonga ka mwana mdodo , tsanyalangula ka mwana mdodo , tsanimanya ka mwana mdodo . Lekeni hanikulile nighaleka aghala gha udodo .
46013012	Mana sambi twolola ka chihanga ing'achikoneka pfinoghile bae mne chilolelo , lekeni hambele tutsolola chihanga kwa chihanga . Ghanimanya sambi ng'aghatimile bae , kuya hambele nitsomanya ghose ka Imulungu pfonimanya .
46013013	Lelo pfinu pfidatu ipfighendelela ; kuko ukutoghola na lolelo na unoghelo , lekeni chikulu kubita pfose uwo unoghelo .
46014001	Muubame unoghelo , na mbame pfigholelo pfingi pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka , kubita pfose mpate chigholelo cha kuwapetela iwanu usenga we Imulungu .
46014002	Kwapfila imunu wowose iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , ayo ng'olonga bae ne iwanu , ila kolonga ne Imulungu , kwaapfila kuduhu imunu iyohulika . Kolonga pfinu ipfipfisike kwa ngupfu ye Ghumuhe .
46014003	Lekeni awala iwopeta usenga we Imulungu wolonga ne iwanu na kuwapfila , kuwaghuma ghumoyo na kuwakanza .
46014004	Ayula iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , ketsenga mwenyegho , ila ayula iyopeta usenga we Imulungu kowatsenga iwanu we Imulungu .
46014005	Nene nobama mwemwe mwose mlonge kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , lekeni kubita alyo nobama mwemwe mlonge usenga we Imulungu . Kwaapfila ayula iyolonga usenga we Imulungu kotenda ghanoghile kubita ayula iyolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika , ila ka kabaho imunu yungi iyodaha kuwafasilila iwanu choni chayalongile , ili iwanu wose we Imulungu wadahe kwapfilighwa .
46014006	Lelo ndughu tsangu , ning'atsa kuna mwemwe na kulonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , angu mwemwe mtsobweda choni ? Ng'amtsobweda bae ! Ila ka nolonga namwe kwa nzila ya ughubulo , au ukumanya , au imbuli ye Imulungu au malangulitsi .
46014007	Hata ipfinu ipfilihela ughima ipfilapfa litsi kaapfila ichimbeta au chilimba , ka ng'apfilapfa bae litsi tofwautitofauti , imunu yatsomanyatse wila wachi iutowighwa ?
46014008	Ka malati ng'ailapfa bae litsi pfinoghile , yuhi yatseyandaa kughenda kwing'onde ?
46014009	Na mwemwe pfipfila , ka ghamlonga ng'aghomanyika bae , yuhi iyodaha kumanya mlonga choni ? Apfo mwakuwa ka iwanu iwolonga na libeho .
46014010	Muisi mna lugha nyingi , lekeni tsose tsomanyika .
46014011	Ka simanya bae ichilongighwa ne imunu yungi , nene nakuwa mgheni kwa imunu ayo iyolonga na nene , naye kakuwa mgheni kuna nene .
46014012	Pfipfila na mwemwe wose , kwaapfila mwobama ghendo kubokela pfigholelo pfe Ghumuhe , mtende pfomdaha kongesa pfigholelo ipfiwatenda iwanu we Imulungu wabwede .
46014013	Apfo ayula iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , yalombe yadahe kuwafasilila iwanu achila chalongile .
46014014	Mana ning'alomba kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , muhe wangu nawo wolomba , lekeni mbutsi tsangu ng'atsitenda chinu bae .
46014015	Lelo nitendetse ? Nitsolomba kwa ghumuhe wangu , pfipfila nitsolomba kwa mbutsi tsangu , nitsakwimba kwa ghumuhe wangu , pfipfila nitsakwimba kwa mbutsi tsangu .
46014016	Ung'amtunya Imulungu wako kwa ghumuhe wako uliheka , ka kuna imunu ing'ayomanya chaulonga , yodahatse kwidika “ Ona ” haulonga mighede kwe Imulungu ka ng'omanya bae chaulonga ?
46014017	Kwodaha kulonga mighede kwe Imulungu pfinoghile , lekeni ng'aitsomwapfila bae imunu yungi .
46014018	Nolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwaapfila nene nolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika kubita mwemwe wose .
46014019	Lekeni mne likanisa nonoghelighwa kulonga malonga matano ighomanyika , ili nidahe kuwalangulitsa iwanu wengi kubita kulonga malonga mengi kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika .
46014020	Ndughu tsangu mleke kutonga ka iwana wadowado , lekeni muwe iwana wadowado mna aghala ghehile , hamtonga muwe ka iwanu wabala .
46014021	Yandikighwa mne ghamalaghitso , “ Imtwatsa kolonga , ‘ Kwa nzila ye iwolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika , na kwa milomo ya iwahenza , nitsolonga ne iwanu wano , hata apfo ng'awatsonihulikitsa bae . ’ ”
46014022	Apfo ukulonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , acho chitango kwa awala ing'awotoghola bae , lekeni si kwa awala iwotoghola , lekeni ukupeta usenga we Imulungu , acho chitango kwa awala iwotoghola na si kwa awala ing'awotoghola bae .
46014023	Lelo ka iwanu wose we Imulungu wetingana hamwe na chila imunu kolonga lugha ing'atsimanyika , na awala ing'awomanya na ing'awotoghola wang'engila , angu ng'awatsolonga bae ka mna lukwale ?
46014024	Lekeni wose wang'alonga usenga iweng'ighwe ne Imulungu , iwanu ing'awomanya au ing'awotoghola wang'engila , watsoghahulika ghose ghamlonga , nagho ghatsowahigha .
46014025	Na aghala ighapfisike mmoyo mwawo ghatsoghubulighwa , nawo watsopfughama na kumtamanila Imulungu , aku wolonga ; “ Imulungu ka mghati mwenu ghendo ! ”
46014026	Ndughu tsangu , lelo tulonge choni ? Hamtingana hamwe kumtamanila Imulungu , yumwe yembe wila , yungi yalangulitse , na yungi yawe na ughubulo iulawa kwe Imulungu , ayu yalonge kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , yungi yawafasilile iwanu achila ichilongighwe . Ghose ghatendeke kwa kuwapfila iwanu we Imulungu .
46014027	Imunu wowose ang'alonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika , iwanu weli au wadatu walonge , lekeni walonge yumweyumwe aku kukale na imunu yungi iyowafasilila achila ichilongighwa .
46014028	Lekeni ka kuduhu imunu iyowafasilila iwanu achila ichilongighwa , imunu iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika yanyamale , na yelongele mwenyegho ne Imulungu .
46014029	Iwanu weli au wadatu iweng'ighwe usenga we Imulungu walonge aku iwanu wangi walamule achila ichilongighwe .
46014030	Lekeni ka imunu yali mne mtingano kabokela usenga we Imulungu , ayula iyolonga yanyamale .
46014031	Kwaapfila mwose mwodaha kulonga yumweyumwe usenga wamwing'ighwe ne Imulungu , ili chila imunu yelangulitse na yaghumighwe ghumoyo .
46014032	Muhe tse manabii tsowategheletsa manabii .
46014033	Kwaapfila Imulungu si Imulungu wa kutenda pfinu chakachaka bae , ila yeye ka Imulungu wa tindiwalo . Pfipfila ka pfaili mne makingilli ghe iwanu we Imulungu ,
46014034	iwapinga wanyamale mne makingilli ghe iwanu we Imulungu , ng'awobamighwa bae kulonga , wala kulongotsa ka Ghamalaghitso gha Wayahudi pfagholonga .
46014035	Wang'abama kumanya mbuli yoyose ila , wawaghuse wamale wawo ukaye yawo , mana chinu cha chinyala kwe ipinga kulonga mbuli yoyose mne kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu .
46014036	Pfii mwopfikitsa imbuli ye Imulungu ilawa kuna mwemwe au iwapfikila mwemwe mliheka ?
46014037	Imunu wowose iyebona keng'ighwa usenga we Imulungu au kana gholelo lya Ghumuhe , yatange ghendo ka chanikwandika , nakwandika laghitso lye Imtwatsa .
46014038	Imunu ang'aghabetsa ghano , naye yabetsighwe .
46014039	Apfo ndughu tsangu , msulukile kuwalongela iwanu imbuli ye Imulungu , kuya mleke kuwaghoma iwanu kulonga lugha ing'atsimanyika .
46014040	Ghose ghatendeke ghoya na pfinoghile .
46015001	Lelo ndughu tsangu nobama niwalongele keli Imbuli Inoghile yaniwapetele , yamuibokele iili lukwalambatsa lwa ukutogha kwenu , na mna ayo mwemwe mwakwima ghendo .
46015002	Usenga awo yaniwapetele iyo Imbuli Inoghile , mwemwe mwokombolighwa mng'ahakinda ghoya aghala ghaniwapetele , ka si pfipfo bae mtoghola hela .
46015003	Niwagholela aghala ghanibokele nene mwenyegho , Kiristu tsakafa kwa nzambi tsetu ka pfagholonga Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ,
46015004	tsakasikighwa , na katsilihuka mna litsuwa lya kadatu , ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga ,
46015005	tanu tsakamlawila Petiri kuya kawalawila watumighwa wose 12 .
46015006	Pfipfila kawalawila ndughu ka 500 kwa mala lumwe , wengi mna wawo waghima mbaka sambi , lekeni wangi wawo ma wahupa .
46015007	Hambele kamlawila Jakobu , kuya kawalawila watumighwa wose .
46015008	Pfipfila kandawila nene , ka imunu yanyelekighwe mne chipindi si chake bae .
46015009	Kwaapfila nene na mtumighwa mdodo , sinoghile bae kukemighwa mtumighwa , kwaapfila tsanighadununza makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu .
46015010	Lekeni uluso we Imulungu , unitenda niwe ka pfino pfanili , uluso wangaile , ng'angaile hela bae . Nene tsanisang'ana kubita iwatumighwa wose , si nene bae , ila uluso we Imulungu tsausang'ana hamwe na nene .
46015011	Hata apfo iwe nene au wawo iwoipeta Imbuli inoghile si chinu bae , acho chicho chatupeta na chicho chamtoghola .
46015012	Lekeni ka tsaipetighwa Kiristu katsilihuka , wamwenga wenu wodahatse kulonga kuduhu kutsilihuka ?
46015013	Ka kuduhu kutsilihuka kwe iwanu , apfo Kiristu naye ng'atsilihuke bae ,
46015014	kuya ka Kiristu ng'atsilihuke bae , chatuwapetela si chinu bae , pfipfila chamtoghola si chinu bae .
46015015	Kubita ghose , pfipfila twetwe twoneka tulonga ughutsu hambele he Imulungu , kwaapfila tsatulonga Imulungu kamtsilihula Kiristu , kumbe ng'amtsilihule bae , ka iwanu iwafile ng'awotsilihuka bae .
46015016	Kwaapfila ka iwafile ng'awatsilihuka bae , Kiristu naye ng'atsilihuke bae .
46015017	Kuya ka Kiristu ng'atsilihuke bae , ukutoghola kwenu kwahela sang'ano , na nzambi tsenu mng'ali natso .
46015018	Pfipfila wanu iwafile aku womtoghola Kiristu wagha .
46015019	Ka tumlolela Yesu Kiristu mna ughima uno uliheka , twobamighwa twonelighwe libatsi kubita iwanu wose .
46015020	Lekeni kwo ukulongesa ghendo Kiristu katsilihuka , yeye iyo wa mwanduso we iwanu iwawasile mlifwa , apfo yolangusa iwanu wangi watsotsilihuka .
46015021	Mana ka lifwa lighalighwa ne imunu yumwe , pfipfila kutsilihuka nako kughalighwa ne imunu yumwe .
46015022	Ka iwanu wose pfawakufa kwa ukwilunga na Adamu , pfipfila kubitila Kiristu iwanu wose watsakuwa waghima .
46015023	Lekeni chila imunu na hanu hake , tanu Kiristu , kuya awala iwali wake Kiristu hayatsakuya .
46015024	Kuya utsighilo utsakutsa , Kiristu hayatsomwing'a Undewa Aba Imulungu , hayamalitsa kuhinya utawala na ukulu na ngupfu tsose itsihile .
46015025	Kwaapfila Kiristu kobamighwa yatawale mbaka Imulungu yaweke iwanebe wose hasi he ghamaghulu ghake .
46015026	Lifwa iyo mwihile wa usighilo iyatsokomighwa .
46015027	Mana Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga , “ Imulungu keka pfinu pfose hasi he maghulu ghake . ” Lekeni ghamaandiko hagholonga , “ Pfinu pfose pfikighwa hasi he maghulu ghake yapfitawale , ” yakoneka ghendo Imulungu ng'alimumo bae mna pfinu apfo , kwaapfila yeye iyo iyekile pfinu apfo hasi he ghamaghulu gha Kiristu .
46015028	Lekeni hayatsakwika pfinu pfose hasi he ghamaghulu gha Kiristu , naye Imwana katseika mwenyegho hasi he Imulungu , ili Imulungu yatawale ghendo chila chinu chila hanu .
46015029	Lelo ka kuduhu kutsilihuka , watsotendatse awala iwabatitsighwe kwaajili ye iwanu iwafile ? Ka iwafile ng'awotsilihuka bae , ule iwanu wobatisighwa kwaajili yawo ?
46015030	Na twetwe , ebali twehonza chila saa ?
46015031	Wandughu , noulapfa ughima wangu chila litsuwa , neghoda kwaajili yenu mna ukwilunga na Yesu Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu .
46015032	Ka ukwitowa kwangu ne iwanu iwakalile ka iwanyama wane usongo akula Efeso tsanitowa kwa mbuli tse chimunu , angu nipatile choni ? Lekeni iwanu iwafile ka ng'awotsilihulighwa bae , leka , “ Tuje na tunwe kwaapfila ilupfi twakufa . ”
46015033	Mleke kughutsukighwa . “ Usale wihile wohinya chitsowelo chinoghile . ”
46015034	Mlamke lelo ! Mleke kutenda nzambi , kwaapfila kuna iwanu wamwenga mghati mwenu ng'awammanyile ghendo Imulungu , chinyala kuna mwemwe kwa ghano ghanongile .
46015035	Lekeni munu kodaha kughutsa , “ Apfi iwanu wotsilihukatse ? Watsokuwa na lukuli lwachi ? ”
46015036	Mleke kuwa wabotsi ! Imbeghu yuhanda ng'aikota bae mbaka ife tanu .
46015037	Hauhanda , kohanda imbeghu iliheka , iwe ya uhemba au ya mitama au mbeghu tsingi , ng'uhanda mbiki wose iulawila hambele .
46015038	Lekeni Imulungu koing'a mbeghu ayo lumbo ka pfoyobama na chila mbeghu ina lumbo lyake .
46015039	Ng'uli tse pfilumbe ng'atsighala bae . Iwanu wana lukuli lwawo na iwanyama wana lukuli lwawo , wapfideghe wana lukuli lwawo na iwasomba wana lukuli lwawo .
46015040	Kuya kuna ng'uli tsa kulanga na tsa muisi , ukunogha kwe ng'uli tsa kulanga ng'akwighala ne ukunogha kwe ng'uli tsa muisi .
46015041	Litsua lina ukunogha kwake na lwetsi luna ukunogha kwake na tsinondo tsina ukunogha kwake , na hata tsinondo natso ng'atsighala bae mna ukunogha .
46015042	Apfi pfipfo pfaitsakuwa hawatsotsilihuka iwanu . Ka pfaili imbeghu , lukuli lotsikighwa aku lwola , lekeni lwotsilihuka aku lughima .
46015043	Lwotsikighwa mna chinyala , lotsilihuka mna utunitso , lwotsikighwa aku lwahela ngupfu lwotsilihuka aku luna ngupfu .
46015044	Haulutsikighwa , lwotsikighwa lukuli lwa chimunu , kuya lwotsilihuka lukuli lwe chimuhe . Ka hana lukuli lwa chimunu , pfipfila hana lukuli lwa chimuhe .
46015045	Mana Ghamaandiko gholonga , “ Imunu we mwanduso , Adamu , tsakawa imunu mghima , ” lekeni Adamu wa usighilo iyo Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyoweng'a iwanu ughima .
46015046	Si lukuli lwa ghumuhe bae iulongola , ila lukuli lwa chimunu , kuya lukuli lwa chimuhe .
46015047	Adamu wa mwanduso tsakalawa mne timbwisi lye isi , Adamu wa keli tsakalawa kulanga .
46015048	Awala we iisi weghala na ayula iyalawile muisi , na awala we kulanga weghala na ayula iyalawile kulanga .
46015049	Ka pfatwighalile na ayula yalumbighwe na lidongo , pfipfila twitseghala na ayula yalawile kulanga .
46015050	Ndughu tsangu chonilonga hano chicho chino , lukuli lwe imunu ng'aludaha bae kuhala Undewa we Imulungu , wala aghala ighohinyika ng'aghodaha bae kuleka ukuhinyika .
46015051	Tegheletseni , nowalongelelani mbuli ; wose ng'atutsokufa bae , ila wose tutsoghaluka ,
46015052	malati haitsolila , baho , iwanu iwafile watsotsilihulighwa aku ng'uli tsawo ng'atsolile bae , kuya na twetwe ng'atutsakufa ila tutsoghaluka .
46015053	Mana aghala ighohinyika ghobamighwa ghaghaluke ghawe ing'aghohinyika bae , lukuli ulukufa lughaluke luleke kufa .
46015054	Apfo lukuli luno iluhinyika halutsoghaluka luleke kuhinyika , na achila ichikufa hachitsoghaluka chileke kufa , baho ghatsotimila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka igholonga , “ Lifwa likomighwa , ukuhuma kutimila ! ”
46015055	Ghwe lifwa kulikwani ukuhuma kwako ? Ghwe lifwa ulikwani usungu wako ?
46015056	Lifwa lyopata ngupfu yo ukulagha kulawa mnzambi , na nzambi yopata ngupfu mne Ghamalaghitso gha Musa .
46015057	Lekeni mighede kwe Imulungu iyotutenda tuhume kubitila Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu .
46015058	Apfo ndughu tsangu mwime ghoya , mleke kuhighisika . Matsuwa ghose mghendelele ghendo kusang'ana ing'onde ye Imtwatsa , kwaapfila mmanye isang'ano yamsang'ana mghati mwa Imtwatsa ng'aikwagha hela bae .
46016001	Lelo nonge imbuli yokuwasangila iwanu we Imulungu , mtende achila chanighalongele makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu gha Wagalatiya .
46016002	Chila jumapili , chila munu mghati mwenu yabaghule sendi iilawa mna achila choyobokela , kuya yeke ili hanikutsa ndeke kubama msango keli .
46016003	Kuya hanipfika kuna mwemwe nitsowatuma awala yamuwasaghula waghale ibaluwa na msango wenu Yerusalemu .
46016004	Ka pfinogha na nene kughenda ako , watselongotsa na nene .
46016005	Hanitsobita kughenda Makedoniya , tanu nitsakutsa kuna mwemwe , mana nobama kughenda Makedoniya .
46016006	Nodaha kukala na mwemwe chidogho , au kukala namwe matsuwa ghose gha chipfeghetsi , ili mnyapfile mna ghumwanza wangu kokose konighenda .
46016007	Sibama bae kwibona na mwemwe kwa kubita kuliheka , nobama nikale namwe chidogho Imtwatsa ang'abama .
46016008	Lekeni nitsokala hano Efeso mbaka litsuwa lya Pentekoste ,
46016009	kwaapfila libani lya mwatsi kwa sang'ano yangu ng'ulu hano , hata ka kuna iwanu wengi iwobela ghanilonga .
46016010	Timoteo ang'atsa mumtende aleke kwalangula chinu chochose hayatsokala na mwemwe , kwaapfila yeye kosang'ana ing'onde ye Imtwatsa ka nene .
46016011	Apfo imunu wowose yaleke kumbetsa , ila mwapfileni yaghendelele tseghamba na ghumwanza wake ili yadahe kumbuyila . Mana nomlolela yoye ne iwanu wangi .
46016012	Lelo nonge mbuli ya ndughu yetu Apolo , tsanimkomangitsa yamwangileni hamwe na iwandughu wangi . Lekeni ng'obama bae kutsa sambi , lekeni katsakutsa hayatsopata uleghelo .
46016013	Mkale meso , mwikindilise mne ukutoghola , mwime chilume na muwe iwanu wane ngupfu .
46016014	Msang'ane ghose kwa kwinoghela .
46016015	Mwommanya Stefana na iwanu wa mkaye mwake , wawo tsawalongola kuwa wakiristu ako Akaya , kuya tsawelapfa wenyegho kuwasang'anila iwanu we Imulungu . Apfo ndughu tsangu nowalomba ,
46016016	muwategheletse iwanu ka awo na chila imunu iyosang'ana nawo .
46016017	Tsandeng'ela hawatsile Stefana na Fotonata na Akaiko , kwaapfila tsawamemesa achila ichihunguke kuna mwemwe .
46016018	Mana tsawadeng'eletsa ghumoyo ghwangu ka pfawamdeng'eletseni mwemwe . Iwanu awo pfinogha wang'akumbukighwa .
46016019	Makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu gha Asiya ghomlamsani . Akila na Pilisila ne iwanu wose iwotingana mkaye mwawo womlamsani kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa .
46016020	Wandughu wose iwali hano womlamsani . Mwilamse kwa kulangusa unoghelo wa Kiristu .
46016021	Nene , Pauli nowalamsani , nakwandika kwa ghumoko ghwangu mwenyegho .
46016022	Imunu wowose iyolema kumnoghela Imtwatsa , ayo yalighitwe . Utse ghwe Imtwatsa wetu .
46016023	Uluso we Imtwatsa Yesu ukale namwe .
46016024	Unoghelo wangu ukale na mwemwe wose yamli mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu .
47001001	Nene Pauli , mtumighwa wa Yesu Kiristu kwa unoghelo we Imulungu , hamwe na ndughu yetu Timoteo twomlamsani . Twomwandikilani mwemwe kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu lyose ilili Kolinto , na iwanu wose we Imulungu iwali muisi yose ya Akaya .
47001002	Nomlomba Imulungu Aba wetu na Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu yawatendele uluso na yamwikeni tseghamba .
47001003	Yatunyighwe Imulungu , Aba wa Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu , Aba wa libatsi na Imulungu iyokanza ghendo .
47001004	Imulungu kotukanza mna ghamaghayo ghose , ili tuwakanze awala iwali mne maghayo ghoghose ka Imulungu pfayotukanza twetwe .
47001005	Ka ghamaghayo gha Yesu pfaghokongetseka mghati mwetu , pfipfo pfatughendelela kukanzighwa na Kiristu .
47001006	Tung'aghanzika , twoghanzika ili mwemwe mwapfilighwe na mkombolighwe . Tung'akanzighwa , namwe pfipfila mwokanzighwa na mwakwing'ighwa ngupfu mdudumile maghayo ghaghano ghatududumila .
47001007	Lolelo lyatuli nalyo kuna mwemwe kulu sideke , kwaapfila twomanya ghendo mwoghaya na pfipfila mwokanzighwa ka twetwe pfatukanzighwa .
47001008	Ng'atubama bae mwemwe mleke kumanya maghayo ghatupatile muisi ya Asiya . Ghamaghayo agho tsaghabita ngupfu tsetu mbaka tsatupfikitsa ng'atuhona bae .
47001009	Lekeni mne imimoyo yetu tsatupfikitsa ka tuighighwa kufa . Ilawila apfo ili tuleke kwihuhila wenyegho , ila tumuhuhile Imulungu iyowatsilihula iwanu iwafile .
47001010	Tsakatukombola mne ghamaghayo ing'aghadahile kutukoma , naye katsotukombola . Na twetwe twomlolela yeye ka katsoghendelela kutukombola .
47001011	Mwemwe mng'atwapfila kwa kutulombela . Ukutulombela kwenu ng'ani kutsakwidikighwa , na Imulungu katsotubaliki , kuya iwanu wengi watsolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwaajili ya twetwe .
47001012	Twetwe tweghodela chinu chimwe , mimoyo yetu yotulangusa ka kukala kwetu muisi amu , hasa na mwemwe , tukala kwa uhenzeluka na ghumoyo ghunoghile ghwatwing'ighwe ne Imulungu . Ng'atulongotsighwe ne tsimbutsi tse iwanu bae , ila twolongotsighwa ne uluso we Imulungu .
47001013	Mana ng'atukwandika bae chinu chochose mwemwe chang'amdaha bae kuchisoma au kuchimanya . Nololela mtsomanya pfinoghile ghendo ,
47001014	hata ka mbaka sambi mwomanya chidogho , hambele mtsomanya ghendo na mtseghoda kwaajili ya twetwe , ka twetwe pfatwitseghoda kwaajili ya mwemwe mne litsuwa lya Imtwatsa wetu Yesu .
47001015	Aku ng'ala nololela agho . tsambama ghendo tanu kumwangilani mwemwe , ili mbwede lwakeli .
47001016	Tsambama kumwangilani hanibita kughenda Makedoniya na kuya kuna mwemwe hanilawa Makedoniya , ili mnyapfile mne ghumwanza wangu kughenda Yudeya .
47001017	Pfii hanibamile kutenda apfi , tsanikala chigeugeu ? Ebu ghanitenda notenda kwa mbutsi tse chimunu , na hanilonga , “ Ona , ona ” na hanilonga , “ Bae , bae ” ?
47001018	Lekeni ka Imulungu pfoyotogholighwa , usenga wetu kuna mwemwe si mbuli ya kulonga “ Ona ” na “ Bae ” , chipindi chicho .
47001019	Kwaapfila Kiristu Yesu , Imwana we Imulungu , yapetelighwe kuna mwemwe na Silivani na Timoteo na nene mwenyegho ng'awile “ Ona ” na “ Bae . ” Lekeni mna yeye kuna “ Ona ” iliyeka matsuwa ghose ,
47001020	kwaapfila chila chinu Imulungu chayalaghane kubitila Yesu chakuwa “ Ona , ” mna Kiristu . Apfo “ Amina ” yetu yolongighwa kubitila yeye , kwa utunitso we Imulungu .
47001021	Lelo iyotutenda twetwe na mwemwe twime pfinoghile mna Kiristu , na iyatusaghule , iyo Imulungu mwenyegho ,
47001022	naye katughela ichitango ichilangusa ka twetwe twawakwake , na katwing'a Muhe wake mna imimoyo yetu yaghwe tsamana kwa aghala ghose ighotutsila .
47001023	Imulungu iyo mkalangama wangu yeye kaghumanya ghumoyo wangu ! Nene sitsile keli bae Kolinto kwa kuwonelani mwemwe libatsi .
47001024	Ng'atubama kuwananahitsa mne ukutoghola kwenu , twetwe twomanya mwemwe mwima pfinoghile mne ukutoghola , lekeni twosang'ana hamwe na mwemwe kwa ndeng'elelo yenu .
47002001	Apfo nilamla ndeke kumwangilani keli na kuwaghuma usungu .
47002002	Ning'awaghuma usungu , nani lelo yatsonenda ndeng'elele ? Ng'ambe wawala niwaghumile usungu !
47002003	Niwandikilani mbuli ayo ili hanikutsa ndeke kughumighwa usungu na awala iwabamighwe kunitenda ndeng'elele . Nomanya ghendo nene ning'adeng'elela , namwe wose mtsodeng'elela pfipfila .
47002004	Niwandikilani kwa usungu mkulu aku nisusuwala na masotsi ghondawa , sibamile bae kuwaghuma usungu , lekeni kuwatenda mmanye pfaniwanoghela sideke .
47002005	Imunu wowose ang'amghuma imunu usungu , ng'anighumile nene niliheka bae , ila kawaghuma usungu mwemwe wose , nene sibama niwe mkali ng'ani .
47002006	Kubaghulighwa kwayabaghulighwe imunu ayo ne iwanu wengi kumkolela .
47002007	Namwe mwobamighwa mumleghusile totso lyake na mumghume ghumoyo ili aleke kona usungu sideke , na aleke kuya kuchughu ghendo .
47002008	Apfo nowalomba , mumlanguse ka mwemwe mwomnoghela ghendo .
47002009	Tsaniwandikilani ibaluwa ila kwaapfila tsambama kumanya ka mwodaha kunitegheletsa mna chila chinu chanilonga .
47002010	Mng'amleghusila imunu totso lyake , nene pfipfila nomleghusila totso lyake . Kwaapfila ning'amleghusila imunu totso lyake , nimleghusila hambele he Kiristu kwaajili ya mwemwe
47002011	ili tuleke kumleka Setani yatubughe , kwaapfila twomanya chayobama kutenda .
47002012	Lelo hanipfikile Tirowa kupeta Imbuli Inoghile ya Kiristu , Imtwatsa kangoloselela inzila nisang'ane ng'onde yake .
47002013	Lekeni tsanighaya mmoyo mwangu kwaapfila simpfikile bae ndughu yangu Tito , apfo niwaagha iwanu ng'enda Makedoniya .
47002014	Lekeni mighede kwe Imulungu iyotutenda tuhume ghamatsuwa ghose kubitila Kiristu , na kubitila twetwe itukwenetsa imbuli ye ukummanya Kiristu chila hanu hatumsang'anila ka nung'o inoghile .
47002015	Kwaapfila hambele he Imulungu , twetwe twa nung'o inoghile ya Kiristu kwa awala iwokombolighwa na kwa awala iwakwagha .
47002016	Kwa awala iwakwagha , twetwe twa nung'o iighala lifwa , na kwa wamwenga iwokombolighwa twetwe twa nung'o iighala ughima , lelo yuhi yodaha ing'onde ayo ?
47002017	Twetwe si ka iwanu wamwenga bae iwochuhutsa Imbuli ye Imulungu , lekeni mghati mwa Kiristu twetwe twa iwanu iwolongesa hambele he Imulungu , ka iwanu iwatumighwe ne Imulungu .
47003001	Angu twakwandutsa keli kwitunya iwenyegho ? Au twobama baluwa itsitutoghola kutsa kuna mwemwe , au baluwa tso ukutoghola kulawa kuna mwemwe , ka iwanu wangi pfawotenda ?
47003002	Mwemwe muwenyegho mwa ibaluwa yetu , iyandikighwe mmimoyo mwetu , yomanyika na yosomighwa na chila imunu .
47003003	Pfimanyika ka mwemwe mwa baluwa ya Kiristu , iilawile mne sang'ano yetu , ayo ng'ayandikighwe bae kwa lwino ila kwa Ghumuhe we Imulungu iyali mghima , na si mne lwala lwe libwe bae , ila mne imimoyo ye iwanu .
47003004	Na lolelo alyo tunalyo hambele he Imulungu kubitila Kiristu .
47003005	Kuduhu ichinu chochose ichitutenda tulonge ka twodaha kusang'ana ng'onde ino , lekeni ukudaha kwetu kolawa kwe Imulungu .
47003006	Ayo iyo yuyo iyatutendile tudahe kutumikila laghano lya sambi , na si laghano lya ghamalaghitso bae , ila laghano lya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka . Mana ghamalaghitso ighandikighwe ghoghala lifwa , ila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka koghala ughima .
47003007	Lelo ka ghamalaghitso ighaghalile lifwa , ghala ighandikighwe mne ghamabwe ghatsa na utunitso , mbaka Waisiraeli ng'awadahile bae kuchilola chihanga cha Musa kwaajili ya ukung'ala kwake , nawo tsaukala utunitso iuhupa ,
47003008	pfii lelo sang'ano ya Ghumuhe ng'aitsokuwa ya utunitso mkulu bae ?
47003009	Ka isang'ano iiwahigha iwanu tsaikala na utunitso mkulu , apfi isang'ano iighala ughima si ng'ulu bae kubita ayo ?
47003010	Lelo utunitso mkulu ghendo ughubika utunitso ula wo ghumwande , hata ka utunitso awo tsawoneka mkulu , lekeni sambi uhupa .
47003011	Mana ka achila ichikalile chidogho tsachikala na utunitso , pfii lelo achila ichikala ghamatsuwa ghose , ambe chitsakuwa na utunitso mkulu ghendo !
47003012	Kwaapfila tuna lolelo alyo , twolonga bila kupfuka .
47003013	Twetwe si ka Musa bae , iyaghubike chihanga chake kwa lighwanda ili iwanu wa Isiraeli waleke kona ukumala kwe ukung'ala kula .
47003014	Lekeni tsimbutsi tsao tsatsighubikighwa . Kwaapfila mbaka leloli halisomighwa laghano lya ghumwande chighubiko acho chabaho chighubika mbutsi tsawo . Cholapfighwa hala imunu ang'amtoghola Kiristu .
47003015	Hata leloli hawosoma Malaghitso gha Musa , chighubiko choghubika mbutsi tsao .
47003016	Lekeni chighubiko acho cholapfighwa ahala imunu ang'amuyila Imtwatsa .
47003017	Lelo Imtwatsa ka Ghumuhe , na hane Ghumuhe we Imtwatsa , hana ukulekelighwa .
47003018	Lekeni twetwe wose tune pfihanga ing'apfighubikwe bae , twakona ka mne chilolelo utunitso we Imtwatsa , na twetwe twotendighwa twighale naye kwa kongetseka mne utunitso iulawa kwe Imtwatsa , ayo iyo Ghumuhe .
47004001	Kwa libatsi lyake Imulungu katwing'a isang'ano ino , apfo ng'atukuya kuchughu bae .
47004002	Lekeni tupfileka pfinu pfose pfa chinyala na pfa chinyelenyele . Ng'atukala bae kwa ukubugha na ng'atughela ughutsu bae mne mbuli ye Imulungu , ila kwa kuulangusa ukweli , tweika hasi mwe malamutsi ghe mimoyo ye iwanu hambele he Imulungu .
47004003	Hata ka imbuli inoghile yotuwapetela ipfisika , ipfisika kwa awala iwakwagha waliheka .
47004004	Hawo ng'awotoghola bae kwaapfila imulungu yehile we isi ino katsighuma ichisi tsimbutsi tsawo waleke kuwona ghumwanga we Imbuli Inoghile ye utunitso wa Kiristu , iyeghalile ghendo ne Imulungu .
47004005	Kwaapfila ng'atwipeta bae iwenyegho , ila twompeta Yesu Kiristu ka Imtwatsa , na twetwe iwenyegho ka watumwa wenu kwaajili ya Yesu .
47004006	Imulungu yuyula iyalongile , “ Ghumwanga ghulangatse kulawa mchisi , ” iyo yuyo iyoilangatsa imimoyo yetu , na kutwing'a ghumwanga wo ukumanya utunitso we Imulungu iulang'atsa mchihanga mwa Yesu Kiristu .
47004007	Lekeni twetwe ituli na hatsina lino tweghala na ipfiha pfa lidongo , ili yoneke ka ingupfu ayo ng'ulu yolawa kwe Imulungu , wala ng'ailawa kuna twetwe bae .
47004008	Twokandamitsighwa chila ubali , lekeni ng'atuhondeka bae , twopfuka lekeni ng'atukuya kuchughu ,
47004009	twoghanzika , lekeni twokwapfilighwa , twokwasighwa hasi , lekeni ng'atulaghighwa bae .
47004010	Matsuwa ghose twosola lifwa lya Yesu mlukuli mwetu , ili ughima wa Yesu pfipfila woneka mne ng'uli tsetu .
47004011	Mana twetwe yatuli waghima , ghamatsuwa ghose twolapfighwa tufe kwaajili ya Yesu ili ughima wake woneke mne ng'uli tsetu itsikufa .
47004012	Apfo lifwa lyosang'ana mghati mwetu , lekeni ughima wosang'ana mghati mwenu .
47004013	Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka gholonga , “ Tsanitoghola , ndo mana tsanilonga . ” Na twetwe pfipfila kwa muhe uhula wa ukutoghola , twotoghola na twolonga .
47004014	Kwaapfila twomanya ghendo Imulungu iyamtsilihule Imtwatsa Yesu , pfipfila katsotutsilihula twetwe na Yesu , na kutwika hamwe namwe hambele hake .
47004015	Kwaapfila agha ghose ghatendeka kwaajili ya mwemwe , ili uluso we Imulungu hauwapfikila iwanu wengi ng'ani , utsowatenda iwanu walonge mighede na ukumtunya Imulungu kwongetseke .
47004016	Apfo ng'atukuya kuchughu bae , hata ka ng'uli tsetu tsolala , lekeni mghati muhe tsetu tsotendighwa tsa sambi chila litsuwa .
47004017	Kwaapfila ghamaghayo ghatughaya mabewe na ghokala chidogho , lekeni ghatsotwing'a utunitso wa ghamatsuwa ghose iukongetseka ng'ani .
47004018	Apfo tuleke kulola ng'ani aghala ighakoneka , ila tulole aghala ing'aghakoneka bae . Kwaapfila aghala ighakoneka ng'aghokala bae , lekeni aghala ing'aghakoneka ghokala ghamatsuwa ghose .
47005001	Kwaapfila lelo twomanya ka chibumbulika chotukala hano muisi ching'ahinyika , Imulungu katsotwing'a ing'anda ingi kulanga , ing'anda ya ghamatsuwa ghose ing'aitsengighwe bae kwa ghamoko ghe iwanu .
47005002	Kwaapfila sambi twoghutilila , aku twololela kwa kusulukila ghendo ukupata lukuli lwa kulanga ,
47005003	kwaapfila hatutsopata lukuli lwa kulanga , ng'atutsakoneka twahela lukuli bae .
47005004	Hatung'ali twokala mne chibumbulika chino che isi twoghutilila na kuhondighwa , ng'atubama bae kulutsula lukuli luno ulukufa , ila twobama kupfatsighwa lukuli ing'alukufa bae , ili achila ichikufa chighalusighwe ghendo chiwe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
47005005	Imulungu imwenyegho iyo yatutendile pfinu apfo , naye katwing'a Ghumuhe wake yawe nzamana kwa aghala ghose ghayatwikile .
47005006	Apfo ghamatsuwa ghose twoghumighwa ghumoyo na twomanya ghendo tung'akala mna lukuli luno luliheka , twokala kutali na ukaye yetu kwe Imtwatsa .
47005007	Twokala kwa inoghola , na si kwa aghala ghatukona bae .
47005008	Lekeni tughumighwa ghumoyo na twobama kukala kutali na lukuli , tukale hamwe ne Imtwatsa .
47005009	Lekeni chinu chikulu ghendo , twobama kumdeng'eletsa , tung'awa hano muisi au tung'awa hako .
47005010	Kwaapfila twetwe wose twobamighwa twime hambele he Kiristu , tuhighighwe naye , na chila imunu katsobokela achila chayobamighwa kubokela kwa aghala ghayatendile hayakalile muisi , ghawe ghanogha au gheha .
47005011	Kwaapfila twomanya kumpfuka Imtwatsa chinu chachi , apfo twotenda ka pfatudaha wakwegha iwanu . Imulungu kotumanya pfinoghile , nani nololela mwemwe pfipfila mwotumanya pfinoghile mne imimoyo yenu .
47005012	Ng'atubama bae kwitunya keli hambele henu . Lekeni twomwing'ani nyafasi ye ukwighoda kwaajili ya twetwe ili mdahe kuwedika awala iweghodela ighakoneka ne tsinenge kubita aghala ighali mmoyo .
47005013	Hata ka twakoneka tuna lukwale , tuna lukwale kwaajili ye Imulungu na mbutsi tsetu tsinogha kwaajili ya mwemwe .
47005014	Mana unoghelo wa Kiristu wotulongotsa , sambi twotanga ka imunu yumwe tsakafa kwaajili ya wose , apfo wose tufa hamwe naye .
47005015	Yeye tsakafa kwaajili ya wose , ili awala iwali waghima waleke kukala kwaajili yawo wenyegho , ila kwaajili ya yeye iyafile kwaajili yawo na iyatsilihulighwe .
47005016	Apfo kulawa sambi na kughendelela ng'atummanya bae imunu kwa kumlolesa . Hata ka tsatummanya Yesu Kiristu kwa kumlolesa , lekeni sambi ng'atutenda apfo keli .
47005017	Apfo , imunu ang'awa mghati mwa Kiristu , ayo ka chilumbe cha sambi , ghumwande ghahupa , ghawa gha sambi .
47005018	Agha ghose ghalawa kwe Imulungu iyatulamlitse twetwe naye imwenyegho kubitila Kiristu na kutwing'a ing'onde yo ukuwalamlitsa iwanu ne Imulungu .
47005019	Imulungu tsakakala mghati mwa Kiristu tsakailamlitsa iisi na yeye , bila ukupeta nzambi tse iwanu . Naye katwing'a usenga wo ukuwalamlitsa iwanu .
47005020	Apfo twetwe twosang'ana ka iwanu iwatumighwe ne Kiristu , twolonga ka Imulungu mwenyegho iyolonga kubitila twetwe . Kuya twetwe twomlombani ghendo , mwilamlitse ne Imulungu .
47005021	Kiristu tsang'akalile na nzambi bae , lekeni Imulungu kamtenda yabape nzambi tsetu , ili twetwe kwa kwilunga naye , tudahe kuwa iwanu wanoghile hambele he Imulungu .
47006001	Mne sang'ano yetu ne Imulungu , twomlombani mleke kuuleka uluso we Imulungu wambokele waghe hela .
47006002	Mana Imulungu kolonga , “ Mne chipindi cha libatsi lyangu tsaniwahulika , mne litsuwa lya ukukombola tsanimwapfilani . ” Nowalongelani , sambi chicho chipindi cha libatsi lye Imulungu , leloli ilo litsuwa lya ukukombolighwa !
47006003	Ili sang'ano yetu ileke kwoneka si chinu bae , ng'atubama kumwikila imunu wowose chikwatso ,
47006004	ila kwa chila chinu chatusang'ana twelangusa twetwe twa iwatumighwa we Imulungu kwa ukududumila ukughanzika na maghayo ghose .
47006005	Tsatutwowighwa , twohighwa , tutwowighwa ne iwanu , tusang'ana sang'ano ng'omu , ng'atuwasile bae , tukala ne nzala .
47006006	Tsatwilangusa ka twa iwatumwa we Imulungu kwa kukala kwa ukudegheta , kwa ukumanya , kwa ukududumila , kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile na kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka na kwa unoghelo ulihela ung'enye ,
47006007	na kwa usenga wetu iulongesa na kwa ngupfu ye Imulungu . Haki iyo isilaha yetu mne ghumoko ghwe kujilo na ghumoko ghwe kumoso .
47006008	Twiyandaa ukutogholighwa na ukubetsighwa , ukulongighwa na ukutunyighwa . Twakoneka ka waghutsu , lekeni twolongesa ,
47006009	ka iwanu ing'awomanyika , lekeni twomanyika na wose , tutowighwa lekeni ng'atukomighwe bae , ka iwanu iwafile , lekeni ka pfamkona twetwe twa waghima ghendo .
47006010	Hata ka tuna usungu , lekeni ghamatsuwa ghose twodeng'elela , hata ka twakoneka ka wahingwa , ila twoweng'a mali iwanu wengi , hata ka twakoneka twahela chinu , lekeni tuna chila chinu .
47006011	Mwemwe ndughu tsetu Wakolinto , tsatuwalongelani ghose mwatsimwatsi na imimoyo yetu ipfughuka kuna mwemwe .
47006012	Si twetwe bae yatuhindile imimoyo yetu kuna mwemwe , ila mwemwe iwo yamuhindile imimoyo yenu kuna twetwe .
47006013	Lelo nolonga namwe ka wanangu , mfughule imimoyo ka twetwe pfatutendile .
47006014	Mleke kwilunga ne iwanu wala ing'awomtoghola bae Imulungu , angu ghanoghile na ghehile ghodaha kukala hamwe ? Ghumwanga na ichisi pfidahatse kukala hamwe ?
47006015	Apfi Kiristu na Setani wetegheletsa ? Lelo imunu iyomtoghola Kiristu na ing'ayomtoghola Kiristu wana usale wachi ?
47006016	Apfi Ing'anda ye Imulungu ina usale wachi ne ipfinyagho ipfitamanilighwa ? Kwaapfila twetwe twa ing'anda ye Imulungu iyali mghima , ka Imulungu mwenyegho pfayalongile , “ Nitsokala nawo na kwanga mghati mwao , nitsakuwa Imulungu wao , nawo watsakuwa iwanu wangu . ”
47006017	Kuya Imtwatsa kolonga , “ Mlawe mna wawo mwibaghule nawo . Mleke kukinda chinu chihile , na nene nitsowabokela .
47006018	Imtwatsa yane Ngupfu kolonga , nene nitsakuwa Aba wenu , namwe mtsakuwa wanangu wamale na wapinga . ”
47007001	Sale tsangu , kwaapfila tunagho malaghano . Apfo twideghete kulawa mna ghose ighoutenda ghumuhe na lukuli wihe , tuwe wenzeluka ghendo kwa kumpfuka Imulungu .
47007002	Twing'eni uleghelo mna imimoyo yenu . ng'atumtotsele imunu wowose , ng'atumlaghile imunu wala ng'atumghutsukile imunu wowose bae .
47007003	Silonga agha bae kwa kuwahighani mwemwe , ka pfanongole kulonga , mwemwe mwamghati mwe imimoyo yetu , hatukufa au hatukala waghima .
47007004	Nene nowatogholani , neghoda kwaajili ya mwemwe ! Mne ghamaghayo ghetu ghose noghumighwa ghumoyo na nodeng'elela sideke .
47007005	Kwaapfila hata hatupfikile Makedoniya , ng'atubwihile bae . Tsatupata maghayo chila hanu , kunze ughobo , mne imimoyo ukupfuka .
47007006	Lekeni Imulungu iyowakanza iwabeneke ghumoyo , tsakatukanza hayatsile Tito .
47007007	Wala si kwa kutsa kwake kuliheka bae , ila pfipfila tsakatulongela pfamumkanzile yeye . Tsakatulongela pfambama ghendo kumbona , pfamli na usungu mkulu kwa aghala ighalawile na pfambama kunyamila , apfo nodeng'elela sideke .
47007008	Hata ka niwaghuma usungu kwe baluwa ila , nene sijuta bae . Hata ka ning'ajutile , nakona ibaluwa ayo imwing'ani usungu lekeni kwa chipindi chidodo .
47007009	Lekeni sambi nodeng'elela , si kwaapfila tsaniwaghuma usungu , lekeni kwaapfila usungu wenu uwatenda mwemwe mghaluke na kuleka nzambi . Kwaapfila tsamwona usungu ka pfayabamile Imulungu , apfo twetwe ng'atuwalaghileni bae .
47007010	Usungu iughalighwa ne Imulungu woghalusa ghumoyo , na kughala ukombotsi ulihela majuto . Lekeni usungu we chimunu womghala imunu mlifwa .
47007011	Lelo mlole usungu iughalighwe ne Imulungu chautendile kuna mwemwe , mwemwe sambi muwa iwanu we ibidii , pfambama kulangusa mimoyo yenu pfainoghile , mwakwiduka na kwalangula , pfomninoghela kumbona na pfamwilapfa mwobama kona ihaki yotendeka . Mwemwe mlangusa ghendo ka mwahela totso mne chinu chino .
47007012	Apfo hata ka nyandika ibaluwa ila si kwaajili ya yula yatotsile au yula yatotselighwe , ila nyandika apfo ili kumwikileni mwatsi hambele he Imulungu ili mwone pfamwilapfa kwaajili ya twetwe .
47007013	Apfo tughumighwa ghumoyo . Si ka tughumighwa ghumoyo ghuliheka , ila Tito tsakatudeng'eletsa ghendo kwa ndeng'elelo ng'ulu yakalile nayo kwa pfamumtendile yasangalale .
47007014	Nene tsanighoda hambele hake kwaajili yenu namwe ng'amnighumile chinyala bae . Lekeni chila chinu chatuwalongele tsatulongesa , na kuwaghodelani mwemwe hambele ha Tito tsachikala chinu cha kulongesa .
47007015	Unoghelo wake kuna mwemwe mkulu sideke , hayokumbuka pfamtegheletse , pfamumbokele kwa kupfuka na kudedema .
47007016	Nodeng'elela ng'ani kwaapfila nodaha kuwahuwila mwemwe ghendo .
47008001	Ndughu tsangu , twobama kuwalongela uluso we Imulungu waweng'ighwe iwanu we Imulungu wa Makedoniya .
47008002	Tsawaghetsighwa ng'ani kwa ghamaghayo , lekeni ndeng'elo yawo ighwa ng'ulu na iwatenda wawe waluso sideke hata ka tsawahela chinu .
47008003	Nowalongela ghendo tsawalapfa pfawadahile , kuya hata kubita pfawadahile . Kuduhu imunu iyawalongele ila tsawabama iwenyegho ,
47008004	tsawatulomba ghendo tusang'ane nawo kuwapfila iwanu we Imulungu iwali Yudea .
47008005	Ng'awatendile bae ka pfatulolele , ila welapfa iwenyegho tanu kwe Imtwatsa , kuya kuna twetwe ka Imulungu pfayabamile .
47008006	Apfo tumlomba Tito , iyandusile sang'ano ayo yawapfile mwemwe muimalitse ing'onde ayo ya unoghelo mghati mwenu .
47008007	Mwemwe mwotenda ghoya mne chila chinu , mna ukutoghola , na mwodaha kulonga , mwoghendelela ukusang'ana ghanoghile , mwotunoghela . Apfo twowalomba muwe na unoghelo mkulu mna isang'ano ino ya ukulapfa .
47008008	Silonga bae ka laghitso , ila nobama kughetsa unoghelo wenu ka wa kweli , na weghala na iwanu wangi .
47008009	Kwaapfila twomanya uluso we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu , yeye tsakakala na chila chinu kulanga , lekeni tsaketenda mhingwa kwaajili yenu , ili kubitila uhingwa wake mwemwe muwe na mali .
47008010	Lekeni chanibama kuwalongela achino hano , pfinogha kumalitsa aghala ghamwanzile ghumwaka ghupfosile . Mwemwe tsamkala wamwanduso kulamla na kutenda apfo .
47008011	Lelo mmalitse isang'ano yo kulapfa , muwe na usulukilo ghendo kuimalitsa ka pfambamile , mlapfe kwa kulola aghala ghamlinagho .
47008012	Mana ka imunu kobama kulapfa , Imulungu katsobokela acho choyolapfa kwa kulola achila chayalinacho , na si kwa kulola achila chayalihela .
47008013	Mwemwe ng'ambamighwa bae mghaye ili wamwenga wabwede , ichibamighwa wose mwilingane .
47008014	Chochose chamlinacho sambi ichitsidile chiwapfile awala iwalihela , ili nawo hawatsakuwa napfo wamwing'eni mwemwe hamtsohungukighwa , kuya wose mtsolingana .
47008015	Ka pfayandikighwe , “ Ayula yakungile pfingi ng'akalile na pfingi bae , na ayula yakungile chidogho ng'ahungukighwe chinu bae . ”
47008016	Nolonga mighede kwe Imulungu yamwing'ile Tito ghumoyo we kumwapfilani ka pfanili nene .
47008017	Si ka tsakachitoghola chatulombile chiliheka , ila pfipfila imwenyegho tsakabama sideke kumwapfilani , mbaka kalamla imwenyegho kutsa kuna mwemwe .
47008018	Kuya hamwe na Tito tumtuma ndughu yumwe iyatunyighwe na makingili ghose ghe iwanu we Imulungu kwa ing'onde yake ya kuwapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile .
47008019	Kubita agho , Yeye kasaghulighwa na makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu yange na twetwe hatuwaghalila iwanu nambiko ino ya unoghelo , isang'ano yotuitenda kwa utunitso we Imtwatsa na kulangusa ka twobama kuwapfila iwanu .
47008020	Ng'atubama bae imunu yatunung'unikile pfatulitumila ghweko lino lya uluso .
47008021	Mana chotubama twetwe kusang'ana ghanoghile , si kwe Imtwatsa yaliheka bae , ila hata kwe iwanu .
47008022	Apfo twomtuma ndughu yetu hamwe nawo , iyatumghetsile na kumtoghola , naye kobama sideke kumwapfilani , na sambi kosulukila sideke kwaapfila kowatogholani sideke .
47008023	Tito ka myangu , twetwe twosang'ana hamwe kwaajili ya mwemwe . Lekeni ndughu tsetu wano iwakutsa naye , wawo watumighwa na makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu , nawo womtunya Kiristu .
47008024	Lelo muwalanguse iwanu awo unoghelo wenu , ili makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu ghamanye ka twolongesa hatwighoda kwaajili ya mwemwe .
47009001	Nene sibama bae kumwandikilani mwemwe iwanu we Imulungu imbuli ye sang'ano ino .
47009002	Kwaapfila nomanya pfambama ghendo kuwapfila iwanu we Imulungu ako Yudea , na tsanighoda kwaajili ye chinu acho kwe iwanu wa Makedoniya . Tsanimlongelani ka iwanu wa Akaya tsaweandaa kulapfa kulawa ghumwaka ghubitile . Apfo ghumoyo ghwenu wo ukulapfa ghuwatenda iwanu wengi nawo walapfe .
47009003	Apfo nowatuma iwandughu awo ili ukwighoda kwetu kwaajili ya mwemwe kuleke kuwa hela . Lekeni ka pfanongile , mwiyandae ukwapfila .
47009004	Kwaapfila iwanu wa Makedoniya hawatsakutsa na nene na kuwapfika mwemwe ng'amwiyandae bae , tutsakona chinyala kwaapfila tsatwighoda sideke kwaajili ya mwemwe , namwe pfipfila mtsakona chinyala .
47009005	Apfo mbona pfinogha kuwalomba ndughu wano wanongole kutsa kuna mwemwe , ili weke ghoya maghweko ghatwilaghane , na itsolangusa ka mwolapfa kwaapfila mwobama na si ka mnanaitsighwa .
47009006	Lekeni mkumbuke mbuli ino , iyohanda chidogho kopfuna chidogho , iyohanda nyingi kopfuna nyingi .
47009007	Chila imunu yalapfe achila chayalamle mmoyo mwake , na hayolapfa aleke kuwa na pfondogholo ka imunu iyananaitsighwe kulapfa . Kwaapfila Imulungu komnoghela imunu iyolapfa kwa uluso .
47009008	Imulungu kodaha kumwing'ani kubita agha ighambama ili matsuwa ghose muwe na ghose ghambama , na mwongetseke kwa chila sang'ano inoghile yamtenda .
47009009	Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Yeye koweng'a iwahingwa kwa uluso , Uluso wake wokala matsuwa ghose . ”
47009010	Imulungu iyomwing'agha imbeghu ayula iyohanda na iyomwing'agha ichijo , pfipfila katsomwing'ani mwemwe mbeghu tsambama , kuya katsotsitenda tsote , naye katsakongetsa ghamapfuno kwa uluso wenu .
47009011	Namwe mtsobweda kwa chila chinu ili muwe na uluso chila litsuwa , na kubitila twetwe iwanu watsolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwa uluso wenu .
47009012	Kwaapfila isang'ano ino iyamsang'ana ng'aitsowapfila bae iwanu we Imulungu waliheka , ila itsowatenda iwanu wengi wamlongele Imulungu mighede ghendo .
47009013	Na kwa chailangusa sang'ano yenu ayo , iwanu watsomtunya Imulungu kwa kutegheletsa kwenu na kuitoghola Imbuli Inoghile ya Kiristu . Pfipfila kwa uluso wenu wamuwatendela wawo ne iwanu wose .
47009014	Apfo watsowalombelani kwa ghumoyo ghwawo ghose , kwa uluso mkulu wamtendeleni Imulungu .
47009015	Tulonge mighede kwa Imulungu kwa ghweko lyake kulu sideke !
47010001	Nene mwenyegho Pauli iyanikoneka nihola hanikala namwe , lekeni na mkali hanikala kutali namwe ka iwanu wangi pfawolonga , nowalombani kwa libatsi na uluso wa Kiristu .
47010002	Nowalombani mleke kunenda niwe mkali hanikutsa , kwaapfila nolongesa ghendo nodaha kuwa mkali kwa awala wose iwotwona twetwe twokala ka iwanu we iisi ino .
47010003	Hata ka twokala muisi , ng'atwitowa bae ka iwanu we iisi pfawetowa .
47010004	Kwaapfila tsisilaha tsatwitowela si tsisilaha tse iisi bae , ila ngupfu ye Imulungu iihinya boma lyose lye iwotuhila . Twotsihinya mbuli tsose tse ughutsu ,
47010005	na kubomola chila chinu ichighoda ichikighwe kuighoma Imbuli ye Imulungu ; na kutsitenda mbutsi tsose tsimtegheletse Kiristu .
47010006	Mwemwe hamkomala mna ukutegheletsa chila chinu , twetwe twiyandaa kumuhigha chila munu iyolema kutegheletsa .
47010007	Mwemwe mwolola ipfinu kwa kunze kuliheka . Pfii hana imunu iyebona ka yeye munu wa Kiristu ? Pfinogha , naye pfipfila yatwone ka twetwe pfipfila twa iwanu wa Kiristu ka yeye pfayali imunu wa Kiristu .
47010008	Hata ka neghoda sideke kwa uwetso iyatwing'ile Imtwatsa wa kuwatsenga na si wa kuwabomola bae , sikona chinyala bae .
47010009	Sibama bae mboneke ka nobama kuwatenda mpfuke kwa tsibaluwa tsangu .
47010010	Imunu kodaha kulonga , “ Tsibaluwa tsa Pauli ng'ali na tsina mbuli nito , lekeni yeye mwenyegho hayokala na twetwe kahela ngupfu na ghayolonga ka si chinu bae . ”
47010011	Imunu iyolonga apfo yatange ghendo ka aghala ghatukwandika hatuli kutali gheghala na aghala ighatutenda hatuli namwe .
47010012	Ng'atubama bae kwiika au kwighala ne iwanu wala iwetunya wenyegho . Iwanu iwelinga wenyegho kwa wenyegho na iweghala wenyegho kwa wenyegho , awo wa wabotsi .
47010013	Twetwe , ng'atutsolumbilila bae ukwighoda , ukwighoda kwetu kutsokala mna ing'onde iyatwing'ile Imulungu , ing'onde iipfikile mbaka kuna mwemwe .
47010014	Kwaapfila ng'atulumbilile bae mna ukwighoda kwetu . Twetwe iwo itulongole kuwaghalila Imbuli Inoghile ya Kiristu .
47010015	ng'atwighodela sang'ano tsawatendile iwanu wangi kubita chipimo chayatwikile Imulungu , lekeni twololela ghendo ka ukutoghola kwenu kutsakongetseka , tudahe kusang'ana ng'onde ng'ulu mghati mwenu kwa chipimo chayekile Imulungu .
47010016	Kuya twodaha kupeta Imbuli Inoghile mna isi tsingi . Kwaapfila ng'atubama bae kwighodela ing'onde iisang'anighwe mne isi ya imunu yungi .
47010017	Lekeni ka pfagholonga Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka . “ Iyobama kwighoda , yeghodele achila chayatendile Imtwatsa . ”
47010018	Kwaapfila iyotogholighwa si yula bae iyetunya imwenyegho , ila ayula iyetunyighwa ne Imtwatsa .
47011001	Nobama mnidudumile chidogho , hata ka nakoneka na mbotsi ! Nidudumileni chidogho .
47011002	Nowonela chepfu , lekeni chepfu cha Imulungu , kwaapfila mwemwe ka mwali yanoghile yang'awasile ne mmale yanimlapfile tsengele kwa immale yumwe yaliyeka , iyo Kiristu .
47011003	Lekeni nopfuka , ka inzoka pfayamghutsukile Eva , tsimbutsi tsenu tsodaha kughutsukighwa , namwe mtsoleka wenyepfale wenu wa kweli kwa Kiristu .
47011004	Mana mwomdudumila imunu yungi iyakutsa kuna mwemwe aku kompetelani Yesu yungi kubita ayuno yatumpeta twetwe . Namwe mwombokela muhe ungi na si Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka yula yamumbokele , kuya mwobokela imbuli inoghile ingi na si Imbuli ila Inoghile yampetelighwe .
47011005	Nene sibona bae ka namdodo kubita awo iwekema iwenyegho watumighwa wakulu .
47011006	Hata ka sidahile bae kulonga pfinoghile , lekeni nina chisomo , chinu chino tuchitenda ghamanyike ghendo kuna mwemwe , chila hanu na ghamatsuwa ghose .
47011007	Pfii notenda nzambi hanihulumsa mwenyegho na kuwenulani mwemwe kwa kuwapetela hela Imbuli Inoghile ye Imulungu ?
47011008	Tsanikala ka noghaboka makingili ghangi ghe iwanu we Imulungu kwa kusola pfinu pfawo , ndahe kuwasang'anila mwemwe .
47011009	Na hanikalile namwe simtsupfile imunu wowose hanibamile chinu , kwaapfila iwandughu iwalawile Makedoniya tsawangaya ghose ghanibamile . Sibamile bae niwalombeni mwemwe kwa chinu chochose chila , na noghendelela kutenda apfo .
47011010	Kwa kweli ya Kiristu ili mghati mwangu , kuduhu imunu wowose iyali mna isi ya Akaya yatsongoma nene ndeke kwighoda .
47011011	Pfii kwaapfila siwanoghela bae ? Imulungu komanya ka nene nowanoghela !
47011012	Nitsoghendelela kutenda achila chanitenda sambi , ili ndeke kuweng'a nyafasi awala iwekema iwenyegho watumighwa wakulu , awala iwobama nyafasi yo ukwighoda ka wawo nawo wotenda sang'ano ka twetwe .
47011013	Mana iwanu awo watumighwa wa ughutsu , wasang'ani wa ughutsu iwetenda iwenyegho woneke ka watumighwa wa Kiristu .
47011014	Mleke kukangawala , mana hata Setani imwenyegho kodaha kwitenda yoneke ka malaika wa ghumwanga .
47011015	Apfo si chinu cha kukangawatsa bae hata watumwa wa Setani wang'etenda iwenyegho woneke ka watumwa iwanoghile , lekeni mne utsighilo wawo watsobokela ka pfawasang'ane .
47011016	Nolonga keli , imunu wowose yandeke kumbona ka nene na mbotsi . Lekeni mng'ambona apfo , mmbokele pfipfo ka nene na mbotsi , ili nidahe kwighoda chidogho .
47011017	Chanilonga sambi si achila chayobama Imtwatsa nonge , lekeni kwa mbuli ino ye kwighoda , nene nolonga ka na mbotsi .
47011018	Kwaapfila iwanu wengi weghoda ka iwanu we isi pfaweghoda , na nene notenda pfipfo .
47011019	Mwemwe muwenyegho mna nzewele , ndo mana mwowadudumila iwabotsi kwa kudeng'elela !
47011020	Mwomdudumila hata imunu yula iyomtendani watumwa , iyoboka pfinu pfenu , na iyetunya na iyomtsabeni mpfihanga .
47011021	Nakona chinyala kutoghola ka agho twetwe ng'atughadahile bae kughatenda . Kuya pfopfose pfaikuwa , ka hana imunu wowose yobama kwighodela chinu , nolonga ka na mbotsi , nani noghetsa kwighoda .
47011022	Angu wawo Waebulaniya ? Nani pfipfila na mwebulaniya . Pfii wawo Waisiraeli ? Nani pfipfila na muisiraeli . Pfii wawo wolawa mlukolo lwa Abrahamu ? Nani pfipfila nolawa mlukolo lwa Abrahamu .
47011023	Wawo wamsang'anila Kiristu ? Nolonga ka nina lukwale , nene namtumighwa yanoghile kubita wawo ! Nisang'ana ng'onde ng'omu kubita wawo , nyohighwa kubita wawo , nifapulighwa kubita wawo , na ng'ala habehi yakufa kubita wawo .
47011024	Tsanifapulighwa mala tano pfiboko 39 pfa Wayahudi .
47011025	Tsanitowighwa mala ndatu na Waroma , tsanitowighwa na mabwe mala lumwe , mnumbwi tsaunibenekela mala ndatu mwibahali , ng'ala meso mmatsi chilo na misi .
47011026	Tsanyanga mala nyingi . Tsambama kukululuka na ghamatsi , kutohighwa na wabapfi , kutohighwa na Wayahudi weyangu na Iwanu si Wayahudi bae , nighanzika mkaye , nighanzika mbagho , nighanzika mwibahali , ndununzighwa na sale we ughutsu .
47011027	Tsanisang'ana ng'onde ng'ulu na kughanzika , siwasile bae , tsambona nzala na ng'ilu , tsanikala nahela chijo , tsambona beho aku nahela maghwanda .
47011028	Kubita agho ghose , chila litsuwa nosang'ana ng'onde ketseketse tsa ghamakingili ghose ghe iwanu we Imulungu .
47011029	Ka imunu kahela ngupfu na nene nakuwa ka nahela ngupfu . Imunu wowose ang'alongotsighwa mnzambi , nene pfipfila nakona usungu .
47011030	Ning'eghoda , neghodela aghala igholangusa pfanilihela ngupfu .
47011031	Imulungu , Aba we Imtwatsa Yesu iyo yatunyighwe ghamatsuwa ghose ; yeye komanya ka chanilonga sighutsuka bae .
47011032	Haning'ali Damasko , mkulu wa kaye , iyali hasi he imndewa Areta , keka iwanu hane mibani ye isi wangoghe .
47011033	Lekeni tsanikighwa mghati mwe linang'ulo , nihulumsighwa kubitila chonzo ichili mbanda , nitsuma kulawa hana yeye .
47012001	Nene noghendelela kwighoda hata ka ng'apfinoghile bae , nitsolonga aghala ghandawilighwe ne Imtwatsa na aghala ghanighubulile .
47012002	Tsanimmanya imunu yumwe iyamtoghole Kiristu , miyaka kumi na mine ( 14 ) ipfosile tsakenulighwa mbaka kulanga , lekeni simanyile bae ka kakala ako kwa lukuli au kwa ghumuhe . Imulungu mwenyegho komanya .
47012003	Nomanya ka imunu ayo tsakasolighwa mbaka kulanga , lekeni simmanyile bae ka kakala ako kwa lukuli au kwa ghumuhe . Imulungu mwenyegho komanya ,
47012004	ako yeye kahulika ipfinu ing'apfilongeka bae , ipfinu apfo imunu ng'obamighwa bae yalonge .
47012005	Nitseghodela imunu ka ayo , lekeni sitseghodela mwenyegho , ila nitseghoda kwa pfinu pfila ipfilangusa pfanilihela ngupfu .
47012006	Ning'abamile kwighoda , ning'awile si mbotsi bae , kwaapfila ning'alongese . Lekeni tsangoma mwenyegho , ili iwanu waleke kumbona ka namkulu kubita aghala ghawakona na kuhulika kulawa kuna nene .
47012007	Ili ipfinu pfikulu pfangubulighwe pfileke kunenda nighode , tsaning'ighwa usungu mkulu mlukuli ka nihomighwa na luhonga , imsenga wa Setani konidudunza ili ndeke kwighoda ng'ani .
47012008	Tsanimlomba Imtwatsa mala ndatu ili chinu acho chindawe .
47012009	Lekeni yeye kanongela , “ uluso wangu wakwenela , kwaapfila ingupfu yangu yokuwa ng'ulu ghendo hala haulihela ngupfu . ” Apfo nitseghoda kwa kudeng'elela pfanihungukighwe ngupfu ili ngupfu ya Kiristu ikale mchanya mwangu .
47012010	Apfo kwaajili ya Kiristu , nodeng'elela hanikala nahela ngupfu , hanilighighwa , hanighanzika , hanighaya . Kwaapfila hanikala nahela ngupfu , baho nakuwa na ngupfu .
47012011	Niwa ka mbotsi , lekeni mwemwe yamninanahitse niwe apfo , mwemwe iwo imbamighwe kunitoghola . Kwaapfila hata ka nene si chinu bae , lekeni sili mdodo bae mna awala iwekema iwenyegho “ iwatumighwa wakulu . ”
47012012	Pfihulo na pfinu pfa kukangawatsa ipfilangusa ka nene na imtumighwa tsapfitendighwa mghati mwenu kwa kududumila ghendo .
47012013	Kwaapfila chinu chachi chamuhungukighwe kubita makanisa ghangi , ila nene siwatsupfile bae kwa kubama mwemwe mnyapfile ? Mnilekelele kwa acho chihile chaniwatendile !
47012014	Mlole aluno lwa kadatu nene niyandaa kumwangilani , na sitsokuwa mtsigho bae kuna mwemwe . Sibama bae ipfinu pfenu , ila nowabamani mwemwe , kwaapfila iwana ng'awowekela hatsina iwelesi wawo , ila welesi wowekila iwana wawo .
47012015	Nitsodeng'elela sideke kulapfa pfose pfanilinapfo , hata kwilapfa mwenyegho ili kumwapfilani mwemwe , angu mtsoninoghela chidogho kwaapfila nowanoghelani ng'ani ?
47012016	Apfo mtsotoghola ka nene siwile mtsigho bae kuna mwemwe . Lekeni imunu yumwe katsolonga , “ Kwaapfila Pauli kakengela , tsakawapata kwa kuwaghutsukila . ”
47012017	Angu nene tsaniwaboka chinu ahala hanimtumile imunu wowose kuna mwemwe ?
47012018	Tsanimlomba Tito , nimtuma yatse kuna mwemwe hamwe na ndughu yetu yungi . Angu Tito kawaboka pfinu pfenu ? Angu yeye na nene ng'atusang'ane bae kwa ghumoyo ghughula au ng'atuwinzile bae nzila ihila imwe ?
47012019	Angu mwokwalangula mbaka sambi ka tweyamila wenyegho hambele henu ? Twetwe twolonga hambele he Imulungu ka twa iwanu wa Kiristu . Sale tsangu , chochose chotusang'ana , twosang'ana kumwing'ani mwemwe ingupfu .
47012020	Kwaapfila nopfuka hala hanikutsa kuna mwemwe ndeke kuwapfika si ka pfanibama kuwonani , namwe ng'amtsombona bae ka pfambama kumbona . Nopfuka kwaapfila kutsolawila ukwisonga , chepfu , ughobo , ukwihisanya , ung'enye , ukwighoda , maya , ukwighola na hengele ,
47012021	Nopfuka kwaapfila hanitsakutsa keli Imulungu wangu katsonenda nihole hambele henu , na nitsowalilila awala iwatendile nzambi kulawa mwanduso , lekeni ng'awatoghole bae kuleka nzambi tsawo , dong'o tsawo na ughoni wawautendile .
47013001	Aluno lelo lwakadatu kumwangilani . “ Chila lighomba lihighighwe aku kuwe ne iwanu wabili au wadatu iwonile , ” ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfogholonga .
47013002	Tsanyanza kumkanyeni hanitsile lwakeli kuna mwemwe , na sambi nolonga keli aku nakutali . Hanitsakutsa sitsowonela libatsi awala iwalongole kutenda nzambi na weyawo wose ,
47013003	namwe mtsolola iwenyegho ka Kiristu kolonga kubitila nene , naye si ka kahela ngupfu bae kuna mwemwe , ila kana ngupfu mna mwemwe .
47013004	Mana hata ka tsakawambighwa aku kahela ngupfu , lekeni sambi ka mghima kwe ngupfu ye Imulungu . Pfipfila twetwe twahela ngupfu kwa ukwilunga naye lekeni tutsokala naye kwa ngupfu ye Imulungu kuwasang'anilani mwemwe .
47013005	Mwilolese wenyegho mlole ka kweli mwotoghola , pfii ng'ammanyile bae ka Yesu Kiristu ka mghati mwenu ? Ka Kiristu ng'ali mghati mwenu , mhumighwa ghendo !
47013006	Lekeni nololela mwemwe mtsotanga ka twetwe ng'atuhumighwe bae .
47013007	Sambi twomlomba Imulungu mleke kutenda lyolyose lihile , lekeni si kwaapfila twoneke ne iwanu ka tuhuma lighetso , ila mdahe kutenda aghala ghanoghile , hata ka twetwe twakoneka ng'atuhumile bae .
47013008	Mana ng'atudaha bae kutenda chochose kupinga ukweli , ila kughendeletsa .
47013009	Twodeng'elela ka twahela ngupfu , lekeni mwemwe mna ngupfu , kuya twomlomba Imulungu mwemwe mnoghe kwa chila chinu .
47013010	Kwaajili ayo nakwandika ghano ghose hanili kutali , ili hanikutsa ndeke kuwa mkali kwa ukulu wanying'ighwe ne Imtwatsa wa kuwatsengani na si wa kumbomolani bae .
47013011	Ndughu tsangu lelo nowaagha , muwe wanoghile kwa chila chinu , mwalangule chinu chimwe , ghakindeni ghose ghaniwalongele , kaleni bila kwisonga , na Imulungu wa unoghelo na tindiwalo katsokala namwe .
47013012	Mwilamse kwa kulangusa unoghelo wa Kiristu .

48001001	Nene Pauli mtumighwa , sikemighwe bae wala kutumighwa ne iwanu , ila nikemighwa na kutumighwa ne Yesu Kiristu na Aba Imulungu iyamtsilihule Yesu ,
48001002	nene ne iwandughu wose iwali na nene twomwandikilani mwemwe iwanu wa Galatiya imumtoghole Yesu .

48001005	Imulungu yatunyighwe ghamatsuwa ghose . Ona .

48001009	Ka pfatulongole kulonga , na sambi nolonga keli , imunu wowose ang'awapetela imbuli inoghile ingi , na si ila yamuibokele bae , ayo na yalighitighwe ne Imulungu !
48001010	Angu nibama kumnogheletsa nani ? Kuwanogheletsa iwanu , au Imulungu ? Ning'abamile kuwanogheletsa iwanu , ning'alekile kuwa mtumwa wa Kiristu .
48001011	Ndughu tsangu , nobama mmanye ka imbuli inoghile yanipetile nene si ya chimunu bae .
48001012	Kuya nene siibokele kulawa kwe imunu wowose , wala silangulitsighwe ne imunu bae . Yesu Kiristu imwenyegho iyo yanighubulile .
48001013	Mana tsamuhulika pfanikalile ghumwande kwa kukindilisa dini yangu ya Chiyahudi , na pfaniwadununze iwanu we Imulungu , tsambama niwamalitse ghendo .
48001014	Tsaning'ali nowalongola Wayahudi weyangu wengi wa ubala wangu kwa kukinda ghamalangulitso gha dini ya Chiyahudi , tsanikatsana ghendo kukinda ghatubokele kwa wabala wetu .

48001016	Bahala hayonile pfinogha kumghubula Imwanaghe mghati mwangu , ili niwapetele Imbuli yake inoghile iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , sitsumilile bae kumghutsa imunu wowose ,
48001017	wala sighendile bae Yerusalemu kwa awala iwatumighwa iwanongole , tanu tsang'enda isi ya Arabiya , kuya mbuya keli mne ghumji ghwa Damasko .

48001019	Lekeni simwonile imtumighwa yungi bae , ila Jakobu , ndughu yake Imtwatsa .

48002001	Kuya haimalile miyaka kumi na mine , tsangeluka keli Yerusalemu hamwe na Balinaba , pfipfila tsanongotsa na Tito .
48002002	Tsang'enda ako kwaapfila Imulungu tsakangubulila nighende . Hako tsanitingana na pfilongotsi waliheka , niwalongela Imbuli Inoghile yaniipetile kwa iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae . Tsanenda apfo ili isang'ano yangu iyanitendile ileke kuwa hela .
48002003	Lekeni miyangu Tito , hata ka tsakakala Mgiriki , ng'awamnanaitse bae kwingila ngoma ,
48002004	hata ka tsakukala ne ndughu wangi wa ughutsu iwabamile yengile ngoma . Iwanu wano tsawengila chinyelenyele ili kuulolesa uleghelo ituli nawo kwa kwilunga na Kiristu Yesu , ili watutende watumwa .
48002005	Lekeni ng'atuwatogholele mbe , ili ukweli we Imbuli Inoghile usighale namwe .

48002007	Ila watanga ka Imulungu kanituma niwapetele Imbuli Inoghile iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , ka Petiri pfayatumighwe yawapetele Imbuli Inoghile Wayahudi .

48002009	Apfo , Jakobu , Kefa na Yohane iwakoneka pfilongotsi , hawamanyile ka Imulungu kangaya isang'ano ino , watukinda ghamoko nene na Balinaba ka chitango kulangusa twetwe na wawo twawamwe . Twetwe tughende kusang'ana kwa Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , nawo wasang'ane kwa Wayahudi .
48002010	Ila chinu chimwe chiliheka chawatulombile , tuleke kuwasemwa iwahingwa , na nene nochitenda ghendo chinu acho .

48002012	Kwaapfila hala ng'ana watse iwanu iwalawile kwa Jakobu , tsayang'ali yakuja ne Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae , lekeni hawapfikile kandusa kuya kuchughu , tsakebaghula ne Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae kwaapfila tsayang'ali yowapfuka awala iwang'ali wokomangitsa iwanu wengile ngoma .
48002013	Nawo Wayahudi wangi tsawelunga na Petiri mne ung'enye wake , hata Balinaba naye tsakakweghighwa ne ung'enye wawo .
48002014	Hambonile inzila yawo ng'aighenda ghoya na kweli ye Imbuli Inoghile , nimlongela Petiri hambele he iwanu wose , “ Ghweghwe kwa Myahudi , lekeni kokala ka imunu wa isi tsingi , si ka Myahudi bae , lelo ebali kobama Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae wakale ka Wayahudi ? ”
48002015	Twetwe twa Wayahudi ghendo kwa kwelekighwa , na si “ Iwanu we isi tsingi iwakemighwe wane nzambi . ” .
48002016	Twomanya ka imunu kotendighwa ne Imulungu kanogha kwa kumtoghola Kiristu , si kwa kutenda pfaghobama ghamalaghitso . Apfo twetwe pfipfila tumtoghola Yesu Kiristu ili tutendighwe ne Imulungu tunogha kubitila ukutoghola kwetu kwa Kiristu , na si kwa kutenda pfaghobama ghamalaghitso . Mana kuduhu imunu iyotendighwa ne Imulungu kanogha kwa kutenda pfaghobama Ghamalaghitso .
48002017	Ka twetwe kwa kubama kutendighwa ne Imulungu tunogha kwa kwilunga na Kiristu , twetwe tuwenyegho twakoneka twawane nzambi , pfii lelo , chinu chino cholangusa Kiristu kowapfila iwanu kutenda nzambi ? Mbe , si pfipfo bae !
48002018	Mana ning'aitsenga keli mbuli ila ya kuhuila ghamalaghitso yaniihinyile , nolangusa ka nene imwenyegho tsanitotsa .
48002019	Mana kwa mbuli ya Ghamalaghitso nene nifa , ghamalaghitso ghenyegho tsaghang'oma ili niwe mghima kwaajili ye Imulungu . Nene niwambighwa hamwe na Kiristu mna msalaba ,
48002020	apfo nokala mghima , lekeni si nene bae , ila Kiristu iyokala mghati mwangu , na ughima yanili nawo sambi mlukuli , ninawo kwa kumtoghola Imwana we Imulungu , yuyo iyanimnoghele na kaulapfa ughima wake kwaajili yangu .
48002021	Sibama bae kuulema uluso we Imulungu . Kwaapfila ka imunu kotendighwa ne Imulungu kanogha kwa kukinda ghamalaghitso , apfo Kiristu kafa hela !
48003001	Mwemwe Wagalatiya wabotsi ! Angu nani iyamloghileni ? Imbuli ya ukuwambighwa kwa Yesu Kiristu tsailongighwa mwatsimwatsi hambele henu .
48003002	Nobama mnongele chinu chimwe , angu tsambokela Ghumuhe we Imulungu kwa kutenda pfaghobama Ghamalaghitso gha Musa au kwa kuhulika Imbuli Inoghile na kuitoghola ?
48003003	Apfi mwemwe mwawabotsi pfino ? Tsamwandusa kwa Ghumuhe we Imulungu , lelo mwobama kumalitsa kwa ngupfu tsenu wenyegho ?
48003004	Angu maghayo ghose ghampatile tsaghakala ghahela ? Mbe , ng'apfidahika bae !
48003005	Apfi Imulungu komwing'ani Ghumuhe wake na kotenda pfihulo mghati mwenu kwaapfila mwoghakinda Ghamalaghitso gha Musa au kwaapfila mwohulika Imbuli Inoghile na kuitoghola ?
48003006	Mloleni Abrahamu , “ Yeye tsakamtoghola Imulungu , na kwa ukutoghola kwake , koneka kanogha hambele he Imulungu . ”
48003007	Lelo mmanye ka awala wose iwomtoghola Imulungu , awo iwo iwana we Abrahamu ghendo .
