54006019	kwa kutenda apfo , itsowapfila kupata ughima wa kweli mne ichipindi ichikutsa , nawo watsokuwa ka iwanu iweikila pfinu pfingi ipfitsowapfila hambele .
54006020	Ghweghwe Timoteo , ughalolese aghala ghwing'ighwe . Wibaghule ne mbuli itsili si tsa Imulungu bae na itsilihela mana na mahisanyo ghe elimu ya ughutsu .
54006021	Kwaapfila iwanu wangi waitoghola elimu ayo , na kwa kutenda apfo waghisa inoghola . Uluso we Imulungu ukale namwe .
55001001	Nene Pauli , mtumighwa wa Kiristu Yesu ka pfabamile Imulungu , ili nipete laghano lila lya ughima ilili mne ukwilunga ne Kiristu Yesu .
55001002	Nokwandikila ghweghwe Timoteo , mwanangu mnoghelighwa . Uluso na libatsi na tindiwalo lya Aba wetu Imulungu na Kiristu Yesu Imtwatsa wetu pfikale naghwe .
55001003	Nomlongela mighede Imulungu yanimtumikila kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile ka pfawatendile iwabala wangu , nomlongela Imulungu mighede hanikukumbuka ghamatsuwa ghose ichilo ne imisi mna ukulomba kwangu .
55001004	Nokumbuka ghamasotsi ghako na nobama ng'ani kukwona ili nimemesighwe indeng'elo .
55001005	Nokumbuka inoghola yako ilihela ughutsu , inoghola iyakalile nayo bibi yako Luisa na mai wako Yunisi . Nani notoghola naghwe pfipfila kwinayo .
55001006	Kwa mbuli ayo , nokukumbusa ulitende gholelo lye Imulungu ilili mghati mwako kwa ukwikilighwa ghamoko na nene litende sang'ano ng'ani .
55001007	Mana Imulungu ng'atwing'ile bae muhe wa kututenda tupfuke , ila muhe wa ingupfu na wa unoghelo na wa ghumoyo wa kwilongotsa wenyegho .
55001008	Lelo uleke kona chinyala kupeta mbuli tsa Imtwatsa wetu , wala uleke kona chinyala kwaajili ya nene yanyohighwe kwaajili yake , ila ududumile hamwe na nene kwaajili ya Imbuli Inoghile , kwa ukwapfilighwa ne ingupfu ye Imulungu ,
55001009	iyatukombole na iyatukemile tuwe iwanu wake , si kwa ichinu chochose chatutendile , ila kwa pfila pfabamile yeye , na kwa uluso wake . Katutendela uluso kubitila Kiristu Yesu kulawa isi ng'ana ilumbighwe ,
55001010	lekeni sambi ughubulighwa kuna twetwe kwa ukutsa kwake Mkombotsi wetu , Kiristu Yesu . Yeye katsihinya ngupfu tsa lifwa , na kwa inzila ye Imbuli Inoghile kaughubula ughima ulihela lifwa .
55001011	Imulungu kanisaghula niwe mtumighwa na imlangulitsi na kuwapetela iwanu Imbuli Inoghile ,
55001012	na kwa mbuli ayo nodununzika apfino , lekeni sikona chinyala bae , kwaapfila nommanya ayula yanimtoghola , kuya notoghola ghendo yeye kodaha kuchilolesa achila chayangaile mbaka litsuwa lila lya utsighilo .
55001013	Tsikindise mbuli tsila tse ughima tsanikulangulitse , usighale mne inoghola na unoghelo iuli mne ukwilunga na Kiristu Yesu .
55001014	Lelo aghala ghanoghile ghawing'ighwe ughalolese kwa ingupfu ye Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyokala mghati mwetu .
55001015	Ghweghwe kwomanya ka iwanu wose iwokala Asiya , hata Figelo na Helimogeni wandeka .
55001016	Imtwatsa yawonele libatsi kaye ya Onesifori , kwaapfila tsakanisangalamsa mala nyingi . Ng'onile chinyala bae kwa ukwohighwa kwangu ,
55001017	lekeni bahala hayapfikile Roma , tsakanibama ghendo mbaka kambona .
55001018	Imtwatsa yamwonele libatsi mne litsuwa lila lya utsighilo , naghwe komanya ghoya mengi ghanitendele ako Efeso .
55002001	Apfo ghweghwe mwanangu , Imulungu yakwing'e ngupfu mne uluso watupata mna ukwilunga na Kiristu Yesu .
55002002	Na aghala ghunihulike nolonga hambele he iwakalangama wengi , uweng'e iwanu iwanoghile iwodaha kuwalangulitsa iwanu wangi pfipfila .
55002003	Ududumile ghamaghayo hamwe na twetwe , ka asikali yanoghile wa Kiristu Yesu .
55002004	Asikali mne ing'ondo ng'otenda bae tsing'onde tsa ughima wa chila litsuwa , ila kotenda ng'onde tsa mng'ondo ili yamnoghelese mkulu wake .
55002005	Pfipfila imunu iyotsuma na weyaghe mne mdawalo , ng'odaha kubokela ghweko lye ukuhuma ka ng'awinzile ghamalaghitso gha mdawalo .
55002006	Imunu iyolima ng'ani iyo iyobamighwa yalongole kubokela ghamapfuno .
55002007	Ughalangule ghano ghanilonga , kwaapfila Imtwatsa katsokutenda umanye chila chinu .
55002008	Mkumbuke Kiristu Yesu , iyatsilihuke , yakalile mtsukulu wa Daudi , ka pfailonga Imbuli Inoghile yaniipeta .
55002009	Kwaapfila noipeta Imbuli Inoghile nene nodununzika mbaka nikighwa mchifungo ka mtenda ghehile , lekeni Imbuli ye Imulungu ng'aikohighwa bae .
55002010	Apfo nodudumila pfinu pfose kwaajili ye iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu ili nawo wapate ukombotsi iuli mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu , hamwe ne utunitso wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
55002011	Imbuli ino yolongesa . Tung'afa naye , pfipfila tutsokala naye
55002012	Tung'adudumila , tutsotawala naye , tung'amlema , naye katsotulema .
55002013	Ka twetwe si wakutogholighwa bae , yeye kosighala wakutogholighwa , kwaapfila yeye ng'odaha kughaluka mna aghala ghalongile .
55002014	Uwakumbuse ipfinu apfo , na uwakanye hambele he Imulungu , waleke kuhisanyila tsimbuli tsolongatse , ng'apfinoghile bae , chinu acho chowahinya awala iwohulikitsa .
55002015	Wighangamitse kwilangusa kuwa kutogholighwa ne Imulungu , ka imunu iyosang'ana isang'ano yake aku ng'oyonela chinyala bae na kolangulitsa pfinoghile usenga ula wa kweli .
55002016	Ukale kutali ne mbuli itsihile na tsa chibotsi , atso tsowatenda iwanu wakale kutali ne Imulungu .
55002017	Ghamalangulitso ghawo gheghala na londa ilikula himahima no ukuja lukuli . Wamwenga wawo iwo Hemenayo na Fileto .
55002018	Waileka inzila ya kweli , na kuhinya inoghola ye iwanu wangi kwa kulonga kutsilihuka kwa iwanu wose ma kupfika .
55002019	Lekeni ukweli we Imulungu wima ghendo ka lukwalambatsa lwe ghamabwe , na mchanya mwake lwandikighwa pfino , “ Imtwatsa kowamanya iwanu wake ” na “ Chila imunu iyolonga yeye ka imunu we Imtwatsa , yaleke ghehile . ”
55002020	Mne ing'anda ng'ulu haduhu ipfinu pfa nzahabu na fetsa pfiliheka , ila hana pfinu pfa mibiki na pfa lidongo , pfimwenga pfa heshima na pfimwenga si pfa heshima bae .
55002021	Imunu ang'edeghetetsa kulawa mne ghehile kakuwa ichinu cha kutogholighwa , kwaapfila kelapfa na kutumika ne imtwatsa wake , keyandaa kutenda chila isang'ano inoghile .
55002022	Utsipfuke dong'o tsa usongolo , na ubame ukukala ka pfobama Imulungu , uwe na inoghola na unoghelo na tindiwalo hamwe na wose iwomlomba Imtwatsa kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile .
55002023	Utsileme mbuli tsa ubotsi na itsilihela mana , kwaapfila kwomanya tsoghala ukwisonga .
55002024	Mtumwa we Imtwatsa ng'esonga bae . Yahole kwe iwanu wose na yadahe kulangulitsa na yadudumile ,
55002025	yawakanye kwa uhole awala iwohisanya naye , kwaapfila Imulungu kodaha kuwatenda watoghole nzambi tsawo na kutsileka na waumanye ukweli ,
55002026	ili tsimbutsi tsawo tsiwoile na kulawa mne chonzo cha Yehile iyawonzile na kuwatenda watende pfobama yeye .
55003001	Ukumbuke kutsakuwa na maghayo mne ghamatsuwa gha utsighilo .
55003002	Iwanu watsenoghela iwenyegho na watsonoghela tsisendi na watsetunya na watsakuwa na chidandali na watsokuwa na maligho , watsoleka kuwahulikitsa aba tsawo na mai tsawo , watsokuwa wahela mighede , watsokuwa ng'awahenzeluke bae ,
55003003	iwalihela unoghelo na iwolema kwighongola na waghutsu na ing'awodaha kwilongotsa na wakali , ing'awonoghela ghanoghile ,
55003004	iwohunduka weyawo na iwotenda bila kwipfikitsa na wane chepfu na iweghoda na iwenogheletsa iwenyegho kubita kumnogheletsa Imulungu .
55003005	Kwa kunze wakoneka ka iwanu iwompfuka Imulungu , lekeni woilema ngupfu yake . Wibaghule ghendo ne iwanu awo .
55003006	Wamwenga wawo woghenda mne tsing'anda tse iwanu aku wowabugha iwapinga wabotsi ili wawahulikitse , wapinga iwali ne imitsigho ye nzambi na iwaghoghighwe na soyoka nyingi ,
55003007	ghamatsuwa ghose welangulitsa lekeni ng'awodaha bae kuumanya ukweli .
55003008	Iwanu awo wolema ukweli ka Yane na Yamble pfawampingile Musa , iwanu iwahinyike tsimbutsi na iwalemighwe kwa mbuli tse inoghola .
55003009	Lekeni ng'awatsodaha kughendelela ng'ani kwaapfila ubotsi wawo utsakoneka ghendo kwe iwanu wose , ka pfailawile kwa Yane na Yamble
55003010	Lekeni ghweghwe kughawinza ghamalangulitso ghangu na pfanikalagha na chanibamile mne ughima wangu na inoghola yangu na ukududumila kwangu na unoghelo wangu na ukubetetsa kwangu ,
55003011	madununziko na maghayo . Koghamanya ighanilawile ako Antiyokiya , Ikoniya na Lisitira . Tsanidudumila madununziko makulu ng'ani , naye Imtwatsa kang'ombola mna agho ghose .
55003012	Chila imunu iyobama kukala kwa kumpfuka Imulungu na kwa kumuwinza Kiristu Yesu , katsodununzighwa ,
55003013	lekeni iwanu wehile na waghutsu , watsoghendelela kwiha ghendo , wobugha aku wenyegho wobughighwa .
55003014	Lekeni ghweghwe ughendelele na achila chawilangulitse na kuchitoghola ghendo , kwaapfila kowamanya awala iwakulangulitse ,
55003015	naghwe kulawa udodo wako tsakughamanya Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , ighodaha kukwing'a inzewele ili ukombolighwe kwa kumtoghola Kiristu Yesu .
55003016	Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghose Imulungu kaghahumulila Muhe wake , na ghanogha kulangulitsila ukweli na ukukanya na kulangusa matotso na kuwalongotsa iwanu wakale pfinoghile ,
55003017	ili imunu we Imulungu atimilike , na adahe kutenda ghose ghanoghile .
55004001	Nokulaghitsa hambele he Imulungu , na hambele ha Kiristu Yesu iyatsowahigha iwanu waghima ne iwafile , kwaapfila kakutsa kulongotsa ka Imndewa ;
55004002	uwapetele iwanu imbuli , wiyandaye kwa chipindi chinoghile na chipindi ing'achinoghile bae , uwakembele na uwakanye na uwaghume iwanu ghumoyo kwa ukududumila ghendo na kuwalangulitsa .
55004003	Ghamatsuwa ghakutsa iwanu ng'awatsohulikitsa ghamalangulitso gha kweli , ila watsowinza ghawobama iwenyegho na watsepatila iwalangulitsi bwelele yawatsowalongela aghala ghaliheka maghutwi ghawo ghobama kughahulika .
55004004	Watsolema kuhulika ukweli , watsohindukila simo tse ughutsu .
55004005	Lekeni ghweghwe walangitse mne ipfinu pfose , ududumile ghamaghayo , utende isang'ano ya kupeta Imbuli Inoghile , utimitse pfinoghile isang'ano yako .
55004006	Kwaapfila nene nahabehi ukulapfighwa ka nambiko yo ukughida na ghamatsuwa gha ukufa kwangu ghapfika .
55004007	Nitowa ng'ondo pfinoghile , ghumwanza nighumalitsa na inoghola niilolesa .
55004008	Sambi nokalitsa kwing'ighwa ghweko lya ukukala pfinoghile , Imtwatsa iyolamla ka pfaibamighwa katsongaya ghweko alyo mne litsuwa lila , kuya si nene niliheka bae , ila na awala wose iwobeta kwa unoghelo ukulawila kwake .
55004009	Tenda ka pfaudaha utse hima kuna nene sambi .
55004010	Dema kainoghela isi ino , kandeka kaghenda Tesalonike na Kilesike kaghenda Galatiya , naye Tito kaghenda Damalitiya .
55004011	Luka yaliheka yali na nene . Msole Maliki utse naye , kwaapfila kodaha kunyapfila mne ng'onde yangu .
55004012	Lekeni Tukiko nimtuma Efeso .
55004013	Haukutsa ungalile na lighwanda lyangu lyanililekile kwa Kupulo akula Tirowa , pfipfila ngalile na pfitabu pfila , ghendoghendo apfila ipfitendighwe kwa ngotsi .
55004014	Ayula Alekisanda iyosang'ana ng'onde tsa chuma tsakanendela ghehile ghendo , Imtwatsa katsomliha kwa aghala ghayatendile .
55004015	Naghwe walangitse nae , kwaapfila tsakaupinga ghendo usenga wetu .
55004016	Haniyamile lwa mwanduso kuduhu imunu yemile lubali lwangu , wose tsawandeka . Imulungu aleke kuwapetela totso alyo .
55004017	Lekeni Imtwatsa tsakakala na nene , kangaya ingupfu ili niwapetele usenga wose Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi . Kuya tsang'ombolighwa kulawa mlifwa ka kunikombola mumlomo mwe simba .
55004018	Imtwatsa katsonikombola kulawa mne ghehile ghose , na kunighala ghoya mbaka mne undewa wake we kulanga . Utunitso uwe kuna yeye ghamatsuwa ghose ! Ona .
55004019	Uwalamse tsina Pilisila na Akila , hamwe ne iwanu wa kaye ya Onesifori .
55004020	Elasto kasighala Kolinto na Tirofimo nimleka Mileto kwaapfila tsakakala mtamu .
55004021	Utende pfaudaha utse ng'ana chipfeghetsi chanduse . Ebulo , Pude , Lino na Klaudiya na wandughu wangi iwomtoghola Kiristu wokulamsa .
55004022	Imtwatsa yakale na muhe wako . Uluso we Imulungu ukale namwe mwose .
56001001	Nene Pauli mtumwa we Imulungu na mtumighwa wa Kiristu Yesu . Tsanisaghulighwa na kutumighwa ukwapfila inoghola ye iwanu iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu na kuwalongotsa wamanye ukweli wa kukala ka pfobama Imulungu .
56001002	Ukweli uno wotwing'a lolelo lya ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose , Imulungu ing'alongagha ughutsu bae tsakalapfa laghano kulawa ng'ana isi ilumbighwe ,
56001003	na mne chipindi chinoghile kaughubula mna imbuli yake . Nene tsaning'ighwa imbuli ayo niipete kwa laghitso lye Imulungu Mkombotsi wetu .
56001004	Nokwandikila ghweghwe Tito , mwanangu ghendo yatuhangila inoghola imwe . Nomlomba Aba Imulungu na Kiristu Yesu Mkombotsi wetu yakutendele uluso na yakwike tseghamba .
56001005	Tsanikuleka Kirete ili wike pfinoghile chila chinu ichihunguke na uwasaghule iwabala iwolongotsa iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu chila mne ghumji , ka pfanikulaghitse .
56001006	Mbala yolongotsa iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu kobamighwa yawe imunu yalihela totso , yawe na mwehe yumwe , na iwanaghe wamtoghole Yesu , na waleke kumanyika kwa ughobo au kwa kuleka kuhulika .
56001007	Kwaapfila mbala yowalolesa iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu ka mwimilitsi we isang'ano ye Imulungu , yawe imunu iyalihela matotso . Aleke kwighoda , aleke kusumka kwona maya , aleke kupatika , aleke ughobo na aleke kusulukila ng'ani tsisendi .
56001008	Lekeni awe mluso na iyonoghela ghanoghile , awe mhole , awe imunu iyotenda ighamnogheletsa Imulungu , awe mwenzeluka na iyodaha kwilongotsa mwenyegho ,
56001009	iyokindisa pfinoghile usenga ula wa kutogholighwa ka pfaulangulitsighwa . Apfo katsodaha kuwaghuma ghumoyo iwanu wangi kwa ghamalangulitso igholongesa na kuwahuma awala iwoghabela ghamalangulitso agho .
56001010	Mana kuna iwanu wengi ghendoghendo awala iwalawile mne kingili lya Wayahudi , awo iwolema kuhulika , iwolonga hela , na iwobugha iwanu wangi .
56001011	Waghomighwe waleke kulonga , kwaapfila wopfulughitsa kaye ngima kwa kulangulitsa ipfinu pfang'awobamighwa kupfilangulitsa , wotenda apfo ili wapate tsisendi .
56001012	Hata nabii wawo yumwe , naye pfipfila ka Mkilete , tsakalonga , “ Wakilete waghutsu ghamatsuwa ghose , wawo ka iwanyama wehile , wana batsu na wadebwe ! ”
56001013	Naye tsakalongesa , apfo uwakanye ghendo , ili weme pfinoghile mne inoghola .
56001014	Waleke kughendelela kukoleletsa simo tsiliheka tsa Wayahudi na ghamalaghitso igholawila kwe iwanu iwalemile ukweli .
56001015	Kwa iwanu iwelile hambele he Imulungu , chila chinu chela , lekeni kuduhu chochose ichelile kwa awala iwehile na ing'awotoghola Imulungu , na uwetso wawo wo kusaghula kutenda ghanoghile au ghehile kuhinyika na tsimbutsi tsawo tsiha .
56001016	Iwanu awo wolonga wommanya Imulungu , lekeni kwa ghamatendo ghawo womlema . Weha ghendo na ng'awohulika bae , ng'awotogholighwa bae kwa kutenda chinu chochose ichinoghile .
56002001	Lekeni ghweghwe ulonge ghamalangulitso igholongesa .
56002002	Uwalongele wanzehe wawe na chiyasi , wawe iwotogholighwa ne wanu , wadahe kwilongotsa wenyegho , weme mne inoghola yawo na unoghelo na wadudumile .
56002003	Pfipfila uwalongele wapinga wanzehe wampfuke Imulungu , waleke kuwa waghutsu , waleke kunwa ng'ani mbwali , walangulitse aghala ighanoghile ,
56002004	ili wawafunde wapinga wadowado kuwanoghela iwamale tsawo ne iwana wawo ,
56002005	wadahe kwilongotsa wenyegho na wadeghete , walolese ghoya kaye tsawo , wanoghe na wawahulikitse wamale wawo , ili usenga we Imulungu uleke kulongighwa pfihile .
56002006	Pfipfila uwaghume ghumoyo iwasongolo wadahe kwilongotsa wenyegho .
56002007	Mne ipfinu pfose ghweghwe imwenyegho uwe chitango cha kutenda ghanoghile . Ulanguse ukweli na ghamalangulitso ghako ghakindike ghendo .
56002008	Ghaulonga ghaleke kuwa na matotso ghoghose ili iwanebe wako wone chinyala , kwaapfila wahela chochose chihile cha kulonga mne mbuli tsetu .
56002009	Iwatumwa wawahulikitse iwatwatsa wawo na kuwanoghelesa mne ipfinu pfose . Waleke ukwihisanya nawo ,
56002010	au ukwiba ipfinu pfawo . Ila walanguse ka wawo wanogha na wa wanu wa kutogholighwa ghamatsuwa ghose , ili waghatende ghamalangulitso ghe Imulungu Mkombotsi wetu ghoneke ghanogha mna chila chinu chawotenda .
56002011	Mana uluso we Imulungu iughala ukombotsi kwe iwanu wose ughubulighwa .
56002012	Uluso awo wotulangulitsa kughaleka ghehile na dong'o tse iisi , tukale kwa kwilongotsa iwenyegho , tukale pfinoghile na kukala ka pfayobama Imulungu mne iisi ino ya sambi ,
56002013	aku twobetetsa litsuwa lila lya kubweda lyatulilolela baho hautsolawila utunitso we Imulungu Mkulu na Mkombotsi wetu Yesu Kiristu .
56002014	Yeye tsakelapfa imwenyegho kwaajili yetu ili atughombole kulawa mne ghehile ghose na kututenda tuwe iwanu wahenzeluke iwali wake yeye mwenyegho , iwanu iwosulukila kutenda ghanoghile .
56002015	Lelo , ulangulitse ipfinu apfo na uwaghume ghumoyo na kuwakanya kwa uwetso wose . Imunu wowose aleke kukubetsa .
56003001	Uwakumbuse iwanu kuwategheletsa iwakulu na iwanu wane uwetso , kuwahulikitsa na kwiyandaa kutenda ghose ighanoghile ,
56003002	waleke kumligha imunu wowose , waleke kuwa waghobo , wawalangule iwanu wangi , wawe wahole kwe iwanu wose .
56003003	Kwaapfila aho ghumwande na twetwe tsatukala twawabotsi , ng'atuhulikitse bae , tsatubughighwa , aku twotumikila dong'o na uhondo wose . Tsatukala kwa ukwihila na kwionela chepfu , iwanu tsawatuhila na twetwe tsatuwahila .
56003004	Lekeni uluso na unoghelo we Imulungu , Mkombotsi wetu haughubulighwe ,
56003005	tsakatukombola si kwaajili ye ichinu chochose ichinoghile chatutendile twetwe , ila kwa libatsi lyake , kubitila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyotutenda twelekighwe lwa keli na kuwa iwanu wa sambi kwa kutuopfugha .
56003006	Imulungu tsakatughalila ghendo Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kubitila Yesu Kiristu , Mkombotsi wetu ,
56003007	ili kwa uluso wake tutogholighwe kuwa tunogha na kuubokela ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose watuulolela .
56003008	Imbuli ino yolongesa , nokubama ulonge imbuli ino kwe ingupfu , ili awala iwamtoghole Imulungu wakumbuke kukala mne ghamatendo ghanoghile . Agho ghanogha na ghowatenda iwanu wabwede .
56003009	Lekeni kaleni kutali na midawalo ya ubwotsi , na ghamataghwa gha lukolo , ughobo na ukwihisanyila mbuli tsa Ghamalaghitso , kwaapfila pfinu apfo pfahela mana na ng'apfiwapfila bae .
56003010	Imunu msongetsi , umkanye mala imwe na ya keli , kuya umleme .
56003011	Kuya kwomanya imunu ka ayo keyaghitsa na kana nzambi , natso tsomlangusa ka kana matotso .
56003012	Hanitsowatuma Aritema na Tukiko kuna ghweghwe , utende ka pfaudaha utse kuna nene aku Nikapoli , kwaapfila nobama kukala aku ghamatsuwa gha chipfeghetsi .
56003013	Utende pfaudaha umwapfile mmanya malaghitso Sena na Apolo ili wadahe ukwandusa ghumwanza ghwawo , kuya ulole waleke kuhungukighwa chinu .
56003014	Iwanu wetu wobamighwa welangulitse kusang'ana ng'onde tsinoghile ili weyapfile wenyegho mna aghala ghawobama , waleke kukala hela .
56003015	Iwanu wose iwali na nene wokulamsa . Uwalamse iwanu iwomtoghola Yesu . Uluso we Imulungu ukale namwe mwose .
57001001	Nene Pauli , yanyohighwe kwaajili ya Yesu Kiristu . Na ndughu yetu Timoteo . Twokwandikila ghweghwe sale yetu Filimoni , yatusang'ana ng'onde imwe ,
57001002	na iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu iwetingana mng'anda mwako , na Afiya lumbu wetu , na Arikipo asikali miyetu .
57001003	Nolomba Aba wetu Imulungu na Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu wawatendele uluso na waweng'e tindiwalo .
57001004	Ghamatsuwa ghose hanilomba , nokukumbuka ghweghwe Filimoni na kumlongela Imulungu mighede ,
57001005	kwaapfila nihulika pfaumtoghola Imtwatsa Yesu na pfauwanoghela iwanu wose we Imulungu .
57001006	Nokulombela uwe ne ngupfu kuwalongela iwanu wangi inoghola yako , ili wamanye ghendo ghose ghanoghile ghatwinagho twetwe yatwilungile na Kiristu .
57001007	Unoghelo wako unideng'elesa ng'ani na unighuma ghumoyo . Ghweghwe kuisangalamsa mimoyo ye iwanu wose we Imulungu .
57001008	Apfo , nene ka ndughu yako mne ukwilunga na Kiristu , ning'adahile kukulaghitsa bila kupfuka utende chaubamighwa kutenda .
57001009	Lekeni kwaapfila nokunoghela , pfinogha nikulombe . Notenda apfi hata ka nene Pauli nilala , na sambi nene nyohighwa kwaajili ya Kiristu Yesu .
57001010	Apfo nokulomba umwapfile Onesimo , iyawile imwanangu kubitila ukwilunga na Kiristu hatukalile mchifungo .
57001011	Ghumwande tsakakala kahela sang'ano kuna ghweghwe , lekeni sambi kana sang'ano kuna nene na kuna ghweghwe pfipfila .
57001012	Lelo nomuyitsa keli kuna ghweghwe , yeye ka ghumoyo ghwangu .
57001013	Tsambama akale na nene , yakutendele ng'onde ino ya kunyapfila hano mchifungo , kwaajili ya kupeta Imbuli Inoghile .
57001014	Lekeni sibama bae kukunanahitsa unyapfile , ila nobama utende pfaubama . Apfo sitenda ichinu chochose mbaka utoghole .
57001015	Lamda Onesimo tsakakala kutali naghwe chidogho , ili yoye keli kuna ghweghwe ukale naye ghamatsuwa ghose .
57001016	Lelo yeye si mtumwa keli ila kanogha kubita mtumwa , yeye sambi kandughu yetu mne ukwilunga na Kiristu . Kanoghela nene na katsokunoghela ghweghwe ghendo , mana yeye kamunu miyetu na ndughu yetu mne kwilunga ne Imtwatsa !
57001017	Apfo ka kwombona nene nandughu yako , umbokele Onesimo ka pfunibokela nene .
57001018	Ka katenda ichinu chochose chihile au kakubunza chinu , nene nitsokuliha .
57001019	Nene Pauli nakwandika imwenyegho kwa ghumoko ghwangu , nitsokuliha . Sibama bae kukukumbusa unilihe ughima wako .
57001020	Ndughu yangu utende pfino kwa kunyapfila nene kwaajili ye Imtwatsa , lelo ghweghwe ka ndughu yangu mne ukwilunga na Kiristu udeng'elese ghumoyo ghwangu .
57001021	Kwaapfila nokutoghola , nokwandikila ghano , nomanya kutsotenda kubita ghano ghanikulongele .
57001022	Hamwe na hagho , mnyandalile hanu ho kuwasa , kwaapfila nololela Imulungu katsakwidika ghamumlomba na nene nitsomwangilani .
57001023	Epafura , iyohighwe hamwe na nene kwaajili ya kumsang'anila Kiristu Yesu , kokulamsa .
57001024	Nawo tsina Maliki , Aristariko , Dema na Luka , iwosang'ana na nene pfipfila wokulamsa .
57001025	Uluso we Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu ukale namwe mwose .
58001001	Aho ghumwande Imulungu tsakalonga na aba tsetu mala nyingi na kwa nzila nyingi kubitila manabii wake ,
58001002	lekeni mne ghamatsuwa ghano gha ukutsigha kalonga na twetwe kubitila Imwanaghe , iyamsaghule na yamwing'ile pfinu pfose pfiwe pfake , kuya kubitila yeye Imulungu tsakalumba isi yose .
58001003	Yeye katumwemwesela utunitso we Imulungu , na keghala ghendo ne Imulungu imwenyegho pfayali . Kaikindilisa isi yose ighendelele kuwa baho kwa mbuli yake ine ingupfu . Hamalitse sang'ano ya kuwatenda iwanu wele kulawa mne nzambi tsawo , kakala kulanga ubali wa ghumoko ghwe kujilo ghwe Imulungu .
58001004	Imwana katendighwa mkulu kubita wamalaika , ka taghwa lyeng'ighwe ne Imulungu pfalili kulu kubita taghwa lyawo .
58001005	Mana Imulungu ng'amlongele ghendo malaika wowose , “ Ghweghwe kwa Imwanangu leloli nolonga nene niwa Aba wako . ” Wala ng'alongile ghendo kwa malaika . “ Nitsakuwa Aba wake , naye katsakuwa Mwanangu . ”
58001006	Lekeni Imulungu hayomghala chaudele wake muisi , kolonga , “ Wamalaika wose we Imulungu wamtamanile ”
58001007	Lekeni kuna wamalaika Imulungu kalonga , “ Imulungu kawatenda libeho wamalaika wake na iwatumwa wake kawatenda kuwa imilambi ye ghumoto . ”
58001008	Lekeni kwa imwana , Imulungu kalonga , “ Undewa wako , ghwe Imulungu , ng'aumala bae . Ghweghwe kwotawala kwa kumnoghelesa Imulungu .
58001009	Ghweghwe konoghela ghamatendo ighomnoghela Imulungu na koghahila ghehile . Apfo Imulungu , Imulungu wako kakusaghula , kakutenda udeng'elele ng'ani kubita pfawatendile weyagho . ”
58001010	Kuya kalonga , “ Ghweghwe Imtwatsa aho mwanduso tsakulumba isi yose , kwa ghamoko ghako tsakulumba kulanga .
58001011	Napfo pfitsohupa , ila ghweghwe kutsosighala , pfose pfitsolala ka lighwanda .
58001012	Kutsotsibotabota ka gholole , natso tsitsoghaluka , lekeni ghweghwe kutsosighala pfipfo pfauli na ughima wako ng'autsomala bae . ”
58001013	Imulungu ng'amlongele mbe malaika wowose , “ Ukale hano ubali wangu wa kujilo mbaka hanitsoweka wehile wako hasi ha ghamaghulu ghako . ”
58001014	Lelo kuya wamalaika tsina nani ? Wawo muhe iwomsang'anila Imulungu , na waghalighwa nae kuwapfila awala iwatsobokela ukombotsi .
58002001	Lelo tughakinde ghendo aghala ighatuhulike ili tuleke kuleka kupfika kwatughenda .
58002002	Usenga ula iulongighwe ne wamalaika woneka wolongesa ghendo , imunu wowose yang'aukindile au kuutoghola kohighighwa ka pfaibamighwa .
58002003	Lelo twetwe tutsohonatse ka ng'atuutoghola bae ukombotsi uno mkulu ? Tanu Imtwatsa tsakalonga ukombotsi uno , kuya awala iwamuhulike walangusa kuna twetwe ka wolongesa .
58002004	Imulungu naye kongetsa ukalangama wake kwa kutenda pfitango , pfihulo na pfinzonza ketseketse , na kwa kuwagholela iwanu pfigholelo pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ka pfayabamile .
58002005	Imulungu ng'awekile bae malaika kutawala isi iikutsa , isi ila yatulonga mbuli tsake .
58002006	Lekeni Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka hanu hangi gholonga , “ Imunu chinu chachi mbaka umwalangule ? Imwana we imunu chinu chachi mbaka umlolese ?
58002007	Tsakumtenda yawe mdodo kubita wamalaika , kumpfika fiya ya utunitso na heshima .
58002008	Kwika chila chinu chiwe hasi hake . ” Yolongighwa Imulungu tsakamwika imunu yawe mtawala we pfinu pfose , ng'achisighala hata chinu chimwe bae . Lekeni ng'atukona ipfinu pfose imunu pfopfitawala sambi ,
58002009	ila twomwona Yesu iyatendighwe mdodo kubita wamalaika kwa chipindi chidodo , ili kwa uluso we Imulungu yawafile iwanu wose . Sambi twomwona kapfatsighwa fiya ya utunitso na heshima kwa ukufa kwayadununzike .
58002010	Tsaikala pfinogha ghendo Imulungu iyolumba na ukukindilisa ipfinu pfose , yamtende Yesu kuwa mkamilifu kwa inzila ye ukudununzika , ili yawaghale iwanu wengi mne utunitso wake . Kwaapfila Yesu iyo iyowalongotsa mne ukombotsi .
58002011	Yeye kowadeghetesa iwanu nzambi tsawo , yeye na awala iwadeghetesighwe , wose wana aba yumwe . Kwaajili ayo Yesu ng'akona chinyala bae kuwakema iwanu awo ndughu tsake ,
58002012	kolonga , “ Nitsolipeta taghwa lyako kwe iwanu wangu , nitsokutunya mne ghumtingano ghwawo . ”
58002013	Pfipfila kolonga , “ Nitsakwika lolelo lyangu kuna yeye . Kuya kalonga keli , nene nabaha ne iwana iyangaile Imulungu , wawe wana wangu ”
58002014	Lelo kwaapfila iwana awo wana lukuli na idamu , Yesu imwenyegho tsakawa ka wawo , kelunga na unu wawo . Tsakatenda apfo ili kubitila lifwa lyake amuhume Yehile yane uwetso mne lifwa ,
58002015	na apfo yawalekelele awala iwakalile watumwa mna ughima wawo wose . Tsawakala watumwa kwa kupfuka ukufa .
58002016	Kwaapfila yeye ng'atsile ghendo bae kuwapfila wamalaika ila katsa kuwapfila iwatsukulu wa Abrahamu .
58002017	Apfo tsakabamighwa yeghale na ndughu tsake kwa chila chinu , ili yawe Mtambika wawo mkulu iyotogholighwa na yane libatsi mne kumsang'anila Imulungu , ili nzambi tse iwanu tsileghusighwe .
58002018	Kwaapfila yeye mwenyegho tsakadununzika ahala hayaghetsighwe , kodaha kuwapfila awala iwoghetsighwa .
58003001	Apfo ndughu tsangu iwanu we Imulungu , imkemighwe ne Imulungu , mmwalangule Yesu , Imtumighwa na Mtambika mkulu we inoghola yatuilonga toitoghola .
58003002	Yeye tsakakala kotogholighwa ne Imulungu , iyamsaghule kutenda isang'ano yake , ka Musa pfayang'ali iyotogholighwa mne ukuwasang'anila iwanu wose wa Isiraeli , iwakemighwe ing'anda ye Imulungu .
58003003	Imunu iyotsenga ing'anda kotunyighwa kubita ing'anda yenyegho , lelo Yesu kotunyighwa kubita Musa .
58003004	Kwaapfila chila ing'anda itsengighwa ne imunu , lekeni Imulungu iyo iyatsengile chila chinu .
58003005	Musa tsayang'ali yotogholighwa ka mtumwa kwe iwanu wose wa Isiraeli , iwakemighwe ing'anda ye Imulungu , na tsakalonga ipfinu apfila Imulungu pfayatsolonga hambele ,
58003006	ila Kiristu katogholighwa ka imwana mne ing'anda ye Imulungu . Twetwe iwenyegho twa ing'anda yake ka twoghendelela ukwima bila ukupfuka na kuchilolela achila chatwighodela .
58003007	Apfo ka Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka pfayolonga mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , “ Leloli mng'ahulika litsi lye Imulungu ,
58003008	mleke kutenda imimoyo yenu iwe misughu , ka pfawatendile iwabala wenu hawalemile kunihulikitsa , ghamatsuwa ghala hawanighetsile akula kunyika .
58003009	Ako iwabala wenu tsawanighetsa na kunidodosa , hata ka tsawaghona ghanendile kwa miyaka makumi mane .
58003010	Apfo niwonela maya iwanu wala , nilonga , ‘ Ghamatsuwa ghose lweleko lula lwakwagha , na ng'alumanya bae nzila tsangu . ’
58003011	‘ Tsanilaha kwa maya nilonga , ng'awatsakwingila mbe hanu hangu ha kubwihila ! ’ ”
58003012	Lelo ndughu tsangu , mwalangitse mghati mwenu kuleke kuwa ne imunu yane ghumoyo ghuhile na wa kulema kutoghola , kwa kwibaghula ne Imulungu iyali mghima .
58003013	Lekeni hamghendela kuhulika mbuli ila leloli yosomighwa mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , mwighume ghumoyo chila litsuwa ili kuleke kuwa ne imunu mghati mwenu iyotendighwa mkomu kwa ukughutsukighwa ne nzambi .
58003014	Kwaapfila twakuwa wamwe mna Kiristu , tung'akindilisa kwe ingupfu mbaka utsighilo lolelo lyetu lyatubokele mwanduso .
58003015	Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Leloli mng'ahulika litsi lye Imulungu , mleke kuitenda mimoyo yenu iwe misughu , ka pfawatendile iwabala wenu hawamlemile Imulungu . ”
58003016	Kuya tsina nani iwahulike litsi lye Imulungu na kumlemela ? Pfii si awala wose bae iwalongotsighwe na Musa kulawa Misiri ?
58003017	Angu tsina nani Imulungu yawonele maya kwa miyaka makumi mane ? Kawonela maya awala iwatendile nzambi , ng'uli tsawo tsatsenela kunyika .
58003018	Angu Imulungu helahile , “ Ng'awatsakwingila mbe hanu hangu ha kubwihila , ” yang'ali yowalonga tsina nani ? Yang'ali yowalonga awala yang'awamuhulikitse .
58003019	Lelo twakona ng'awadahile ukwingila ako kwaapfila tsawalema kutoghola .
58004001	Lelo kwaapfila laghano lye ukwingila hanu hake ling'ali baho , twalangitse imunu wowose mna twetwe aleke kuleka kwingila hanu hao ho ukubwihila .
58004002	Kwaapfila Imbuli Inoghile tsaipetighwa kuna twetwe ka pfaipetighwe kuna wawo iwanu wa ghumwande . Lekeni usenga awo ng'auwapfile chinu bae , kwaapfila tsawahulika ila ng'awaubokele kwa ukutoghola .
58004003	Twetwe itutoghole tutsakwingila hanu ho ukubwihila ka pfayalongile . “ Tsambona maya na nilaha , ‘ Ng'awatsakwingila mbe hanu hangu ha kubwihila ! ’ ” Imulungu tsakalonga agho hata ka isang'ano yake tsaimala kulawa hayalumbile isi yose .
58004004	Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga mbuli tsa litsuwa lya saba , “ Imulungu tsakaileka sang'ano yake yose , litsuwa lya saba kabwihila . ”
58004005	Kuya chinu chino cholongighwa keli , “ Ng'awatsakwingila mbe hanu hangu ha kubwihila . ”
58004006	Apfo laghano lye ukubwihila ling'ali baha , na iwanu wala iwapetelighwe Imbuli Inoghile aho mwanduso tsang'awengile hamo kwaapfila ng'awategheletse bae .
58004007	Chinu chino cholangusa kuwa Imulungu keka litsuwa lingi , ilikemighwa “ Leloli . ” Miyaka mingi ibitile tsakalonga kubitila Daudi ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Leloli mng'ahulika litsi lye Imulungu , mleke kuitenda mimoyo yenu iwe misughu . ”
58004008	Mana ka Yoshua ang'awatendile iwanu wabwihile , ka pfayalongile Imulungu , Imulungu ang'alekile kulonga mbuli tsa litsuwa lingi hambele .
58004009	Apfo kubwihila kwe iwanu we Imulungu kung'ali baho ka Imulungu pfabwihile tsuwa lya saba .
58004010	Imunu wowose yakwingila hanu ha kubwihila ka pfayalongile Imulungu , ayo katsoleka sang'ano yake na kubwihila ka Imulungu pfalekile sang'ano yake na kubwihila .
58004011	Lelo twiyunde twingile mne ukubwihila ako , ili kuleke kulawila imunu wowose mna twetwe aleke ukughwa kwa kulema kutegheletsa ka pfawatendile wawo .
58004012	Kwaapfila mbuli tse Imulungu tsina ughima na ingupfu , tsotema kubita mmaghe ighutema kuno na kuno . Kuya tsakwingila mbaka hane ghumoyo na muhe , ka limaghe ilitema mbaka mghati mwa pfilungo na ulojo , kuya tsomanya ghaikwalangula na ghaibama mimoyo ye iwanu .
58004013	Kuduhu chilumbe chochose ichipfisighwe kwe Imulungu , chila chinu chighubulighwa kuna yeye iyatubamighwa tumlongele ghamatendo ghetu .
58004014	Apfo kwaapfila twinaye Mtambika mkulu iyengile mbaka kulanga kwe Imulungu , Yesu Imwana we Imulungu , leka tukindilise ukutoghola kwetu kwatulonga totoghola .
58004015	Mtambika wetu mkulu kotwonela libatsi , kwaapfila yeye mwenyegho tsakaghetsighwa mna chila chinu ka twetwe , ila ng'atendile nzambi bae .
58004016	Lelo tuchighendele chighoda che undewa che Imulungu yane uluso bila kupfuka , tubokele libatsi na uluso mne chipindi cho ukutwapfila .
58005001	Chila mtambika mkulu kosaghulighwa kulawa kwe iwanu wake , kakwikighwa yawatendele iwanu isang'ano ye Imulungu kwa kumlapfila maghweko na nambiko kwaajili ya nzambi tsawo .
58005002	Kwaapfila yeye imwenyegho tsakahungukighwa ghendo , kodaha kuwonela libatsi iwanu awala ing'awomanya chinu na iwakwagha .
58005003	Na kwaapfila yeye imwenyegho kahungukighwa , kobamighwa yelapfile mwenyegho nambiko , si kwaajili ye iwanu wangi waliheka bae , ila pfipfila kwaajili ya nzambi tsake .
58005004	Kuduhu imunu iyetenda imwenyegho kuwa mtambika mkulu . Imulungu iyo iyomkema yawe mtambika mkulu , ka pfakalile Aruni .
58005005	Kiristu Mkombotsi pfipfila ng'etendile bae imwenyegho yawe Mtambika mkulu . Ila Imulungu kamlongela , “ Ghweghwe kwa Imwanangu , leloli nolonga niwa Aba wako . ”
58005006	Pfipfila hanu hangi mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka kalonga , “ Kutsakuwa mtambika ghamatsuwa ghose , ka pfakalile Melikisedeki . ”
58005007	Mna matsuwa ghake ghakalile muisi , Yesu tsakamlomba na ukumdedetsa na kumlilila ng'ani kwa masotsi Imulungu , iyodaha kumkombola kulawa mne lifwa . Kwaapfila tsakakala mhole na kompfuka Imulungu , Imulungu kamuhulikitsa .
58005008	Hata ka tsakakala Imwana we Imulungu , kelangulitsa ukutegheletsa kubitila ukudununzika kwake .
58005009	Hayamalitse sang'ano yatumighwe kutenda , kawa mwanduso we ukombotsi wa ghamatsuwa ghose kwa awala iwomuhulikitsa ,
58005010	na Imulungu kamsaghula yawe mtambika mkulu , ka pfayakalile Melikisedeki .
58005011	Kuya twinagho mengi gha kulonga kwa chinu chino , lekeni pfikomu kughalonga ghoya kwaapfila mwemwe muwa wadebwe ukwilangulitsa .
58005012	Sambi tsambamighwa muwe walangulitsi , kwaapfila ghamatsuwa mengi ma ghabita , lekeni mwemwe mwobama keli imunu yawalangulitse malangulitso gha mwanduso ghe mbuli tse Imulungu . Sambi muya kuchughu mwobama ukughwawa na si ukuja chijo chikomu bae .
58005013	Chila imunu iyoghwawa matombo ng'odaha bae kughatanga ighomnoghela Imulungu , kwaapfila ayo ang'ali mwana mdodo .
58005014	Chijo chikomu cha iwanu iwabala , wane tsimbutsi itsilangulitsighwe kubaghula ighanoghile na ighehile .
58006001	Lelo tugheke hambali ghamalangulitso gha mwanduso gha mbuli tsa Kiristu , tughende hambele kwa ghamalangulitso ighakomale . Si kughendelela kwika keli ghumsingi ghwa kuleka ghamatendo ghalihela sang'ano , na ghwa kumtoghola Imulungu ,
58006002	ghamalangulitso gha ubatitso , ukwikighwa ghamoko , kutsilihuka kwe iwanu na ukuhighighwa kwa ghamatsuwa ghose .
58006003	Tughendele hambele Imulungu ang'abama .
58006004	Kwaapfila iwanu iwaghubulilighwe ukweli we Imulungu na kulanza pfigholelo pfa kulanga , na ukwilunga na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ,
58006005	na kulanza umta we mbuli tse Imulungu , na ingupfu ye ghamatsuwa ighakutsa ,
58006006	ng'aidahika bae kuwoyitsa watoghole keli kutsileka nzambi tsawo , kwaapfila kwa kuleka kwawo kutoghola , wawo wenyegho ka womuwamba keli Imwana we Imulungu mna msalaba na kumghela chinyala hambele he iwanu .
58006007	Mghunda ighubokela imvula ighutowela ghamatsuwa ghose na ukotetsa imimeya inoghile kwaajili ye imunu iyolima , ghubalikighwa ne Imulungu .
58006008	Lekeni mghunda ighukotetsa imibiki ye tsimiwa na mighughu , wahela sang'ano , ghwabehi kulighitighwa ne Imulungu , kuya yolakatsighwa mmoto .
58006009	Lekeni sale tsetu , hata ka twolonga pfino , twomanya ghendo ka mwa mne inzila inoghile imlongotsani mne ukombotsi .
58006010	Imulungu ng'ohigha pfihile bae . Yeye ng'atsoisemwa bae isang'ano yenu au unoghelo wenu yamuulanguse kuna yeye kwa kuwapfila iwanu wake na pfamghendelela kuwapfila .
58006011	Twobama chila munu mna mwemwe alanguse ukwiyunda kuko mbaka utsighilo , ili achila chambetetsa chitimile .
58006012	Ng'atubama bae muwe wadebwe , ila muwe ka awala iwatoghole na kududumila , kuya tsawabokela chalaghane Imulungu .
58006013	Imulungu hayekile laghano na Abrahamu , tsakatumila taghwa lyake kwilaha kwaapfila kuduhu imkulu kubita Imulungu , kuna yeye ang'elahile .
58006014	Imulungu tsakalonga , “ Nitsokubaliki ghendo , nitsokwing'a iwana wengi . ”
58006015	Abrahamu tsakabetetsa kwa ukududumila , kuya kabokela achila chayalongelighwe ne Imulungu .
58006016	Iwanu hawelaha , welaha kwa yula iyali imkulu kubita wawo , na ukwilaha kolangusa ka ichilongighwe cholongesa , na kwilaha komalitsa ukwihisanya kwose .
58006017	Naye Imulungu pfipfo tsakakindilisa chalaghane kwa ukwilaha , kwa kutenda apfo kawalangusa awala yelaghane nawo ka ng'atsoghalusa chayobama .
58006018	Hana pfinu pfino pfibili ng'apfidaha kughaluka , mna apfo Imulungu ng'odaha bae kulonga ughutsu . Lelo twetwe yatutsumilile hanu tseghamba twoghumighwa ghumoyo kukindilisa ghendo lolelo ilikighwe hambele hetu .
58006019	Tuna lolelo lino ka nanga kwa ughima wetu . Lolelo alyo lima na lina ngupfu , lyakwingila mghati mwe ilipanziya , mbaka hanu haenzeluke ,
58006020	amwo hayengile Yesu kwaajili yetu , chilongotsi wetu , kawa mtambika mkulu kwa ghamatsuwa ghose ka pfayakalile Melikisedeki .
58007001	Ayu Melikisedeki tsakakala mndewa ghumji ghwa Salemu , na mtambika we Imulungu iyali kuchanya ghendo . Abrahamu hayang'ali yakuya kulawa mng'ondo ako kwayawakomile iwandewa , Melikisedeki tsaketingana naye , kambaliki ,
58007002	naye Abrahamu tsakamwing'a kumi limwe lye ipfinu pfose pfayang'ali napfo . Mana ya taghwa lyake “ Imndewa wa kutenda ighanoghile , ” pfipfila yeye tsakakala “ Imndewa wa Salemu , ” mana yake “ Imndewa wa tindiwalo . ”
58007003	Tsakahela aba wala mai , tsakahela lukolo , kuduhu imunu iyomanya yelekighwe tsuwachi wala yafile tsuwachi . Tsakeghala ne Imwana we Imulungu , koghendelela kuwa mtambika ghamatsuwa ghose .
58007004	Lelo mlole , imunu ayo pfayakalile mkulu . Hata mbala wetu Abrahamu tsakamwing'a kumi limwe lye ipfinu pfose pfayabokile mng'ondo .
58007005	Na awala lukolo lwa Lawi iwakalile watambika tsawalaghitsighwa na Ghamalaghitso Imulungu ghamwing'ile Musa , wabokele kumi limwe lye ipfinu kulawa kwe iwanu we Isiraeli , ndughu tsawo , hata ka tsawakala watsukulu wa Abrahamu .
58007006	Melikisedeki ng'awile bae wa lukolo lwa Walawi , lekeni tsakabokela kumi limwe lye pfinu kulawa kwa Abrahamu , kuya kambaliki yeye iyabokele malaghano .
58007007	Ng'ailemighwa bae ka imunu iyobaliki ka mkulu kubita ayula iyobalikighwa .
58007008	Kuya iwatambika iwobokela kumi limwe lye ipfinu wa iwanu iwakufa , lekeni hano kumi limwe lye ipfinu tsalibokelighwa ne imunu iyolongighwa ka mghima ghamatsuwa ghose , ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga .
58007009	Kuya twodaha kulonga , iwanaghe Lawi iwobokela kumi limwe lye ipfinu , kubitila Abrahamu nawo tsawaliha kumi limwe lye ipfinu ,
58007010	Kwaapfila Melikisedeki hayatingane na Abrahamu , Lawi tsayang'ali mlukuli mwa Abrahamu , imbala wake .
58007011	Kwaapfila Waisiraeli tsaweng'ighwa ghamalaghitso kwa sang'ano ya ukutambika ya Walawi . Lelo ka ukutambika kwa Walawi kwotimitsa ghose , ebali yabamighwe mtambika yungi iyeghalile ne Melikisedeki , na si Aruni bae ?
58007012	Mana ukutambika kung'aghaluka , ghamalaghitso nagho ghobamighwa ghaghaluke .
58007013	Naye Imtwatsa wetu , iyolongighwa mbuli tsino , kolawila mlukolo lungi , na kuduhu imunu wa lukolo alwo iyasang'ane hanu ha kutambikila .
58007014	Kwaapfila twomanya ghendo ka yeye kalawila mlukolo lwa Yuda , na Musa ng'alongile chinu bae kwa lukolo luno kwa mbuli tsa watambika .
58007015	Kuya chinu chino cha mwatsimwatsi ghendo ka mtambika yungi iyeghalile na Melikisedeki kalawila .
58007016	Yeye ng'atendighwe mtambika kwa ghamalaghitso ghe iwanu , ila kwa ngupfu tsa ughima ulihela utsighilo .
58007017	Kwaapfila Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga , “ Ghweghwe kutsakuwa mtambika ghamatsuwa ghose , ka pfakalile Melikisedeki . ”
58007018	Lelo laghitso lila lya ghumwande tsalikighwa hambali kwaapfila tsalyahela ingupfu na tsalyahela sang'ano .
58007019	Mana Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu ng'aghadahile bae kutenda chinu chochose chitimile , lekeni sambi twing'ighwa lolelo linoghile , kubitila lolelo alyo twodaha kumghendela Imulungu habehi .
58007020	Kuya hano Imulungu tsakelaha , ila awala wangi hawatendighwe watambika tsakuduhu ukwilaha .
58007021	Lekeni Yesu tsakawa mtambika kubitila ukwilaha ahala Imulungu hayamlongele , “ Imtwatsa tsakelaha , kuya ng'atsoghalusa achila chobama , ‘ Ghweghwe kwa mtambika ghamatsuwa ghose . ’ ”
58007022	Kwa ukwilaha kuno , Yesu kawa mwimilitsi wa laghano ilinoghile ghendo kubita lila lya mwanduso .
58007023	Kuya awala watambika wangi tsawakala wengi kwaapfila tsawang'ali wakufa , apfo ng'awadahile bae kughendelela ne isang'ano yawo .
58007024	Lekeni kwaapfila Yesu ka mghima ghamatsuwa ghose , ukutambika kwake ng'akumala bae .
58007025	Apfo yeye kodaha kuwakombola ghendo awala iwomtsila Imulungu kubitila yeye , mana yeye kokala ghamatsuwa ghose yawalombele kwe Imulungu .
58007026	Kwaapfila tsaibamighwa tuwe na mtambika mkulu ka yuno iyali mwenzeluka , iyalihela totso lyolyose wala nzambi , yabaghulighwe kutali na wane nzambi , na yenulighwe kubita kulanga .
58007027	Yeye ng'eghala ne watambika wakulu wangi bae , ng'obamighwa kulapfa nambiko chila litsuwa , tanu kwa nzambi tsake imwenyegho , kuya kwa nzambi tse iwanu wangi . Tsakalapfa inambiko mala lumwe hela kwa iwanu wose baho helapfile imwenyegho .
58007028	Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu ghowasaghula iwanu yang'awakamilike wawe watambika wakulu , lekeni laghano lye Imulungu ilitendighwe kwa ukwilaha , ilitsile hambele he Ghamalaghitso agho , lyomsaghula Imwana , iyatendighwe yatimilike ghamatsuwa ghose .
58008001	Imbuli ng'ulu kubita ghose ghatulongile , iyo ino , tuna Mtambika mkulu iyakalile lubali lwe kujilo lwe chighoda che undewa che Mkulu ako kulanga .
58008002	Yeye kosang'ana ka mtambika mkulu hanu hala haenzeluke kubita hanu hohose , hane bumbulika lye Imulungu lya kweli , ilitsengighwe ne Imtwatsa , si ne iwanu bae iwatsengile .
58008003	Chila mtambika mkulu kosaghulighwa amlapfile Imulungu ghweko ne nambiko , lelo mtambika wetu mkulu kabamighwa yawe na chinu cho ukumlapfila Imulungu .
58008004	Ka ang'awile wa hano muisi , ang'alekile kuwa mtambika mbe , kwaapfila ma kuna watambika iwolapfa ghweko ka pfaghalaghitse Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu .
58008005	Nawo wosang'ana aghala igheghala na ghumfano au sisila lya ighali kulanga . Pfipfo Musa habamile kutsenga bumbulika lila , kalongelighwa ne Imulungu , “ Ulole , utsenge ka pfulangusighwe haukalile kuchidunda . ”
58008006	Lekeni sambi Yesu keng'ighwa isang'ano ya ukutambika inoghile kubita yawo , ka pfayali mlamlitsi wa laghano ilinoghile kubita laghano lila , kwaapfila lima mne ipfinu pfinoghile ghendo pfalongile Imulungu .
58008007	Kwaapfila ka laghano lila ililongole ng'aliwile na totso bae , ng'alibamighwa bae laghano lya keli .
58008008	Lekeni Imulungu kona matotso kwe iwanu wake , kalonga , “ Imtwatsa kolonga , ghamatsuwa ghakutsa , hanitsakwika laghano lya sambi ne iwanu wa Isiraeli ne iwanu wa Yuda .
58008009	Ng'alitseghala bae ne laghano lyanyikile ne iwabala wawo , ghamatsuwa ghala haniwakindile ghamoko na kuwalongotsa walawe mne isi ya Misiri . Kwaapfila ng'awakindile laghano lyangu , na nene tsaniwalema .
58008010	Lekeni alino laghano lyanitsotenda ne iwanu wa Isiraeli , hambele ha ghamatsuwa agho , nitsakwika ghamalaghitso ghangu mne tsimbutsi tsawo , nitsoghandika mne mimoyo yawo , Nitsakuwa Imulungu wawo , nawo watsakuwa iwanu wangu .
58008011	Kuduhu imunu yatsomlangulitsa miyaghe , au kumlongela ndughu yake , ‘ Mmanye Imtwatsa ’ kwaapfila wose iwanu wakulu ne iwadodo watsonimanya .
58008012	Nitsowaleghusila matotso ghawo na nzambi tsawo sitsotsipfikitsa keli . ”
58008013	Kwa kulilonga laghano lya sambi , kalitenda lila lya mwanduso lilale , na chinu chochose ichilala cha habehi kuhupa .
58009001	Laghano lya mwanduso likala na malaghitso gha ukutamanila na hanu hakutamanila hatsengighwe ne iwanu .
58009002	Tsahatsengighwa bumbulika lye Imulungu , chiheleto chake cha mwanduso tsachikemighwa Hanu Haenzeluke , amwo tsamkala na hanu ha kwikila pfitasa na imetsa ne pfighate ipfilapfighwe kwe Imulungu .
58009003	Kuchughu mwa lipanziya lya keli tsakukala na chiheleto ichikemighwe Hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo .
58009004	Hamo tsamkala na hanu ha kupfukitsa upfumba ha nzahabu , na sanduku lya laghano ilighubikwe hosehose na nzahabu , mghati mwake tsakukala na chiha che nzahabu ichikalile ne chijo ichikemighwe mana , ng'weku ya Aruni iisanule mitsani na pfibao ipfandikighwe ghamalaghitso .
58009005	Mchanya mwe sanduku tsakukala na pfinyagho pfibili pfine ghamapamanilo ka chitango cha utunitso we Imulungu , ghamapamanilo ghawo tsaghaghubika hanu hatsileghusighwa nzambi . Lekeni sambi ng'atudaha bae kulonga chinaghanagha mbuli tse pfinu pfino .
58009006	Pfinu pfino hapfimalile kutendighwa , watambika tsawang'ali wakwingilagha mne chiheleto cha mwanduso na kulapfa nambiko chila litsuwa .
58009007	Lekeni mtambika mkulu yaliheka iyang'ali yakwingila mne chiheleto cha kabili , naye tsakatenda apfo mala imwe iliyeka kwa ghumwaka , tsakengilagha na idamu ya kumlapfila Imulungu kwaajili yake imwenyegho na kwaajili ye nzambi tsawatendile iwanu bila kumanya .
58009008	Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kolangusa chinu chino , inzila ya ukwingila hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo ha kulanga tsang'ana ipfughulighwe bae , kwaapfila chiheleto cha kunze tsaching'ali baho .
58009009	Chinu chino cheghala na ghamatsuwa ghano gha sambi , maghweko na nambiko tsolapfighwa lekeni ng'atsidaha bae kutenda imimoyo ye iwanu iwomtamanila Imulungu ileke kuwa na matotso ,
58009010	kwaapfila ukuja na ukunwa na ukwopfugha lukuli , tsapfikala pfihendo pfe lukuli luliyeka , na ngupfu yake itsomala Imulungu hatsopfitenda pfinu pfose pfiwe pfa sambi .
58009011	Lekeni Kiristu katsa , ka mtambika mkulu wa ighanoghile ighapfikile sambi . Yeye tsakengila mne bumbulika kulu na ilinoghile ghendo , ing'alitsengighwe kwa ghamoko ghe iwanu bae , si bumbulika lya isi ino ilumbighwe .
58009012	Tsakengila hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo mala imwe hela , naye ng'engile na idamu ye mvulati au idamu ye ng'ombe , ila kwa idamu yake imwenyegho , na katughalila ughombotsi wa ghamatsuwa ghose .
58009013	Kwaapfila ka idamu ya mvulati na ng'ombe na lipfu lye ng'ombe iyali mbughuma pfawamitsilighwe iwanu wehile , pfiwatenda iwanu awo wele nguli tsawo ,
58009014	lelo pfii idamu ya Yesu Kiristu , ambe unogha ghendo ? Yeye kwa ingupfu ya Ghumuhe iyokala ghamatsuwa ghose , tsakelapfa imwenyegho yawe nambiko inoghile , iitsotutenda mimoyo yetu yele ghendo kulawa mne ghamatendo ghetu ghehile , ili tumsang'anile Imulungu iyali mghima !
58009015	Apfo Kiristu iyo mlamlitsi wa laghano lya sambi , ili awala iwakemighwe wabokele laghano lya ukuhala kwa ghamatsuwa ghose . Kwaapfila yeye tsakafa ili yawaghombole iwanu kulawa mne nzambi tsawatendile mne laghano lila lya ghumwande .
58009016	Kwaapfila usiya wotogholighwa , ka ayula yaulongile kafa ,
58009017	kwaapfila usiya una ingupfu ka imunu yaulongile kafa , usiya wahela ingupfu ka munu yaulongile ka mghima .
58009018	Apfo hata laghano lila lya mwanduso ng'alyanduse bae bila idamu .
58009019	Tanu Musa kawalongela iwanu wose chila laghitso ilili mne Ghamalaghitso ghayeng'ighwe ne Imulungu , kuya kasola idamu ya ndama na mvulati na ghamatsi , na sufi na imitsani ya hisopo , tsakachimitsila Chitabu che Ghamalaghitso na kawamitsila iwanu wose .
58009020	Tsakalonga , “ Aino idamu ya laghano lyalaghitse Imulungu mlikinde . ”
58009021	Pfipfila Musa tsakamitsila idamu mne bumbulika lila ne ipfinu pfose pfa ukutambikila .
58009022	Na mne Ghamalaghitso habehi ipfinu pfose pfotendighwa pfela kwa idamu , na nzambi yoleghusighwa ahala haliyeka haukwitika idamu .
58009023	Pfinu pfino ipfighalile ne ipfinu pfa kulanga tsapfibamighwa kutendighwa pfela kwa nzila ayo . Lekeni ipfinu pfa kulanga pfobama nambiko inoghile ghendo .
58009024	Kwaapfila Kiristu ng'engile bae Hanu Haenzeluke hatsengighwe kwa ghamoko ghe iwanu bae , hanu heghalile na hanu henyegho hali kulanga . Tsakengila kulanga kwenyegho , sambi kakwima hambele he Imulungu kwaajili yetu ,
58009025	wala Kiristu ng'engile kulanga kulapfa lukuli lwake chila ghumwaka ka Mtambika mkulu pfayengile Hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo na idamu yaili si yake bae ,
58009026	mana ing'awile apfo , Kiristu ang'adununzighwe mala nyingi kulawa isi hailumbighwe . Lekeni sambi matsuwa agha ighali habehi kutsigha , yeye kalawila mala lumwe hela kuleghusa nzambi kwa nambiko ya lukuli lwake imwenyegho .
58009027	Ka imunu pfayakufa mala lumwe hela , kuya kohighighwa ne Imulungu ,
58009028	pfipfo Kiristu naye tsakelapfa nambiko mala lumwe hela ili yawaleghusile nzambi iwanu wengi . Hayatsolawila lwakeli , ng'oitsila bae inzambi , ila kakutsa kuwakombola awala iwomlolela .
58010001	Kwaapfila Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu gheghala na sisila lya ipfinu pfinoghile ipfikutsa , pfelinga na apfila pfa kweli , nambiko tsila tsa Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu itsilapfighwe kwa kuyililayilila chila ghumwaka ng'atsidaha bae kuwatenda wanoghe awala iwomtamanila Imulungu .
58010002	Ka iwanu wala iwomtamanila Imulungu wang'atendighwe wela ghendo kulawa mne nzambi tsawo , wang'alekile kwibona keli ka wana nzambi , na nambiko tsila tsawolapfa tsose tsing'amalile .
58010003	Lekeni nambiko tsila tsitendeka chila ghumwaka kuwakumbusa iwanu nzambi tsawo .
58010004	Kwaapfila idamu ye mvulati na ng'ombe ng'aidaha bae kuleghusa nzambi .
58010005	Apfo Kiristu hayang'ali yakutsa muisi , tsakamlongela Imulungu , “ Ng'ubamile nambiko wala sadaka , lekeni tsakuniyandalila lukuli .
58010006	Nambiko tsa kulakatsighwa au tsa kuleghusa nzambi ng'atsikunoghele bae .
58010007	Kuya tsanilonga , ‘ Nabaha ghwe Imulungu , kutenda aghala ghubama ka pfanyandikilighwe mne Chitabu cha Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu . ’ ”
58010008	Tanu tsakalonga , “ Ng'ubamile bae wala ng'unoghelesighwe na tsinambiko na sadaka , nambiko tsa kulakatsighwa na tsa kuleghusa nzambi . ” Tsakalonga apfo hata ka nambiko tsila tsose tsatsilapfighwa ka Ghamalaghitso pfaghabamile .
58010009	Kuya kalonga , “ Nene nabaha , ghwe Imulungu , kutenda aghala ghubama . ” Apfo Imulungu keka hambali nambiko tsa ghumwande , keka nambiko ingi imwe .
58010010	Kwaapfila Yesu Kiristu tsakamalitsa ghayobama Imulungu , twetwe twodeghetesighwa nzambi tsetu kwa inambiko ya lukuli lwake mwenyegho yalulapfile mala lumwe hela .
58010011	Chila mtambika kosang'ana chila litsuwa , kolapfa nambiko tsitsila mala nyingi , nambiko ing'atsidaha mbe kuleghusa nzambi .
58010012	Lekeni Kiristu kalapfa nambiko imwe kwaajili ya kuleghusa nzambi , nambiko inoghile ghamatsuwa ghose , kuya kakala lubali lwe kujilo lwe Imulungu ,
58010013	kobeta wehile wake wekighwe hasi ha ghamaghulu ghake .
58010014	Kwaapfila kwa nambiko imwe tsakawatenda awala iwodeghetesighwa wanoghe ghamatsuwa ghose .
58010015	Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka pfipfila kotulangusa ukalangama wa mbuli ayo . Tanu kolonga ,
58010016	Imtwatsa kolonga , “ Alino laghano lyanitsolaghana nawo hambele ha ghamatsuwa agho , nitsakwika ghamalaghitso ghangu mne mimoyo yawo na kughandika mne tsimbutsi tsawo . ”
58010017	Kuya kalonga , “ Sitsotsipfikitsa keli nzambi tsawo , na ghehile ghawatendile . ”
58010018	Lelo aghano ghang'aleghusighwa , kuduhu keli kulapfa nambiko ya kuleghusa nzambi .
58010019	Lelo ndughu tsangu , kwa idamu ya Yesu twodaha ghendo kwingila Hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo bila kupfuka .
58010020	Yeye tsakatupfughulila inzila ya sambi , inzila itulongotsa mne ughima kubitila lipanziya lila kwa kulapfa lukuli lwake .
58010021	Lelo tuna mtambika wetu mkulu ghendo iyolongotsa mne ing'anda ye Imulungu .
58010022	Apfo tumsoghelele Imulungu kwa imimoyo ya kweli na kwa ukutoghola bila kupfuka , aku mimoyo yetu itotsile yele , tuleke ghehile na ng'uli tsetu tsiopfughighwe kwa ghamatsi ghelile .
58010023	Tulikinde ghendo lolelo lyetu lyatulitoghola na kulilonga , kwaapfila Imulungu yekile laghano lyake kotogholighwa .
58010024	Twilolese twetwe kwa twetwe , twighume ghumoyo , twinoghele na kutenda ghanoghile .
58010025	Kuya tuleke kuleka kwitingana hamwe , ka wamwenga pfawatendagha , ila twighume ghumoyo na tughendelele kutenda apfo , ghendoghendo ka pfamkona litsuwa lye Mtwatsa lya habehi .
58010026	Kwaapfila tung'aghendelela kutenda nzambi ghiladi aku twomanya ukweli , kuduhu nambiko iidaha kulapfighwa keli kwaajili ya kuleghusa nzambi .
58010027	Lekeni ichisighala , kuko ukubeta kwa kupfuka kuhighighwa ne Imulungu kwa ghumoto ighulambila ighutsowahinya wose iwombela .
58010028	Imunu yaghalemile Ghamalaghitso gheng'ighwe Musa ne Imulungu , tsakakomighwa bila libatsi ka kuna wakalangama weli au wadatu .
58010029	Lelo mkonatse , kobamighwa yahighighwetse imunu iyambetsile Imwana we Imulungu na kuyona si chinu bae idamu ye laghano lye Imulungu iimdeghetetse , imunu iyomligha Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu ?
58010030	Kwaapfila twomanya chayalongile Imulungu , “ Nene nitsowoyitsila chawamtendeleni , nene nitsowalia wawo , ” kuya kalonga , “ Imtwatsa katsowahigha iwanu wake . ”
58010031	Kughwila mna ghamoko ghe Imulungu iyali mghima , chinu cha kupfuka ghendo !
58010032	Lekeni kumbukani ghamatsuwa gha mwanduso hala hamghubulilighwe ukweli we Imulungu . Hata ka tsamdununzika ghendo , mwemwe tsamdudumila .
58010033	Ghamatsuwa ghangi tsamlighighwa na kutendelighwa ghehile hambele he iwanu , ghamatsuwa ghangi tsamtoghola kuwa hamwe na awala iwadununzike pfipfo .
58010034	Tsamuwonela libatsi wohighwa , na hambokighwe pfinu pfenu tsamtoghola kwa ukudeng'elela , kwaapfila tsammanya ka mna chinu chinoghile kubita apfo na chokala ghamatsuwa ghose .
58010035	Lelo mleke kwaghitsa lolelo lyenu , kwaapfila lina ghweko kulu ghendo .
58010036	Mdudumile ili mtende ghobama Imulungu na kubokela achila chawalongele .
58010037	Ka Ghamaandiko pfagholonga , “ Ing'ali chidogho , ayo iyakutsa katsakutsa , ng'atsokawa bae .
58010038	Iwanu wangu iwotenda ighoninogheletsa watsotoghola na kukala waghima , lekeni wang'apfukapfuka , sinogheletsighwa nawo bae . ”
58010039	Lekeni twetwe si iwanu wa ukupfukapfuka bae na ukuhinyighwa , ila twetwe twotoghola na twokombolighwa .
58011001	Ukumtoghola Imulungu kuko kumanya kwa hakika aghala ghatubeta , na kutoghola ghendo aghala yang'aghakoneka bae .
58011002	Kwa ukutoghola kwawo , iwabala wetu tsawatogholighwa ne Imulungu .
58011003	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu twetwe twomanya ka isi yose tsailumbighwa kwa laghitso lya Imulungu , ipfinu ipfikoneka pfilumbighwa kulawa mne pfinu ing'apfikoneka .
58011004	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Abeli tsakamlapfila Imulungu nambiko inoghile kubita ya Kaini . Kwa kutoghola kwake , kamnoghelesa Imulungu ahala haitoghole nambiko yake . Hata ka Abeli tsakafa , aghala ghatendile ghang'ali ghotulangulitsa .
58011005	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Enoki tsakasolighwa kulanga , apfo ng'afile bae . Ng'oneke keli kwaapfila Imulungu tsakamsola . Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga hala ng'ana yasolighwe , tsakatogholighwa ka imunu iyamnoghelese Imulungu .
58011006	Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kumnoghelesa Imulungu bila kumtoghola , kwaapfila imunu wowose iyomghendela Imulungu kobamighwa atoghole ka Imulungu kabaho , nae kowaghweka awala iwombama kwa ukwiyunda .
58011007	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Nuhu tsakalongelighwa ne Imulungu aghala ighakutsa hambele , aghala ng'ana ghoneke bae . Kwa pfila pfamuhulikitse Imulungu , katsenga safina , amwo yeye na iwanu we kaye yake tsawakombolighwa . Kwa kutoghola kwake kalangusa iwanu we isi yose weha , na Nuhu kawa muhatsi wa haki iikutsa kwa kutoghola .
58011008	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Abrahamu hakemighwe aghende mne isi iyalongile Imulungu katsomwing'a , koka mne isi yake kuya ng'amanyile ang'ali yoghenda kwani .
58011009	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu , Abrahamu tsakakala muhenza mne isi yelaghane ne Imulungu . Tsakakala mne pfibumbulika na Isaka na Yakobu , iwabokele ghaghala ghalaghane Imulungu .
58011010	Kwaapfila Abrahamu tsayang'ali yobeta ghumji ghune ghumsingi , ghumji ighupfikitsighwe na kutsengighwa ne Imulungu mwenyegho .
58011011	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Abrahamu tsakawa aba hata ka tsakalala ng'ani , na Sara tsaang'ali ng'akweleka bae . Abrahamu tsakamtoghola Imulungu ka katsotimitsa laghano lyake .
58011012	Apfo kubitila imunu yumwe Abrahamu iyakalile ka kafa , tsawelekighwa iwanu wengi ing'awodahika bae kupetighwa , ka tsinondo tsa kulanga na msanga ghwa kumwani .
58011013	Iwanu wano wose tsawafa aku womtoghola Imulungu . Ng'awabokele bae aghala ghayalaghane Imulungu , ila tsawaghona kwa kutali , tsawatoghola ka wawo tsawahenza na wabita nzila muisi .
58011014	Iwanu awala iwolonga apfo , wakoneka ka woibama isi yawo iwenyegho .
58011015	Wang'aikumbuke isi ila yawalawile , wang'adahile kubwela .
58011016	Lekeni sambi woibama isi inoghile ghendo , isi ya kulanga . Apfo Imulungu ng'akona chinyala bae kukemighwa Imulungu wawo , kwaapfila kawatendela ghumji .
58011017	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Abrahamu tsakatoghola kumlapfa nambiko Isaka imwanaghe nyalimwe hala hayaghetsighwe , tsakatenda apfo hata ka Isaka tsakakala imwana wa laghano lye Imulungu .
58011018	Kwaapfila Imulungu tsakamlongela , “ Kubitila Isaka kutsopata watsukulu wanikulongele . ”
58011019	Abrahamu tsakatoghola Imulungu kodaha kuwatsilihula iwanu iwafile , kwa kulonga apfo Abrahamu tsakambokela keli Isaka kulawa kwe iwanu iwafile .
58011020	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Isaka kawabaliki Yakobu na Esau , kwa aghala ighakutsa hambele .
58011021	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Yakobu hayang'ali habehi kufa kawabaliki iwana wose wa Yosefu , kamtamanila Imulungu aku kaghamila ng'weku yake .
58011022	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Yosefu hayang'ali habehi kufa , tsakalonga mbuli tsa Waisiraeli kulawa Misiri , kawalaghitsa waitendetse imipate yake .
58011023	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu welesi wa Musa tsawampfisa Musa kwa miyetsi midatu kulawa hayoneke . Tsawamwona kakala imwana yanoghile , ng'awapfukile bae ghamalaghitso gha imndewa .
58011024	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu , Musa hakulile kalema kukemighwa imwana wa neghe Farao mndewa wa misiri .
58011025	Tsakasaghula kudununzika ne iwanu we Imulungu kubita kudeng'elela uhondo wa nzambi kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho .
58011026	Tsakona ukumdununzikila Kiristu Mkombotsi kunogha ghendo kubita tsimali tsa Misiri kwaapfila tsayang'ali yololela ghweko lyake lya hambele .
58011027	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Musa tsakalawa Misiri bila kupfuka maya ye mndewa . Kwaapfila tsakamlolela ghendo Imulungu yang'akoneka bae .
58011028	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu tsakatenda chihungo cha Pasaka na kulaghitsa idamu imitsighwe mne mibani , malaika wa lifwa aleke kuwakoma iwana chaudele wa Waisraeli .
58011029	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Waisraeli tsawaloka ibahali ya Shamu ka mne isi isakale , lekeni Wamisiri hawabamile kuloka tsawafa mne ghamatsi .
58011030	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu imibanda ya ghumji ghwa Yeriko ighwa hasi Waisraeli hawaitsunguluke kwa ghamatsuwa saba .
58011031	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Rahabu , pinga chiweghe ng'akomighwe bae na awala yang'awamuhulikitse Imulungu , kwaapfila tsakawabokela pfinoghile wapelembi wa Waisraeli .
58011032	Lelo nonge choni keli ? Nahela nyafwasi ya kulonga mbuli tsa Gidioni na tsa Balaki na tsa Samsoni na tsa Yefita na tsa Daudi na tsa Samweli na tsa manabii .
58011033	Awo kwa kumtoghola Imulungu tsawawahuma iwandewa . Tsawahigha ka pfaimnogheletsa Imulungu na wabokela chayalaghane Imulungu . Tsawadiwa imilomo ye simba .
58011034	Tsawatsima milambi ya ghumoto , tsawahoneka kukomighwa kwa imimaghe . Hawang'ali wahela tsingupfu , waghumighwa tsingupfu , tsawakala ne ngupfu mng'ondo , wawawinga asikali wahenza .
58011035	Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu iwapinga wamwenga tsawoyitsighwa iwanu wawo iwafile iwatsilihulighwe . Wangi wawo tsawadununzika mbaka wafa , waleka kutoghola kulekelighwa ili watsilihuke na kwingila ughima unoghile .
58011036	Wangi tsawabetsighwa na kutowighwa mbalati , na wamwenga tsawohighwa na kwasighwa mchifungo .
58011037	Tsawafa kwa kutowighwa na ghamabwe , tsawaghanighwa kwa msumeno pfihande pfili , wakomighwa kwa imimaghe , tsawanga kuno na kuno aku wapfala ngotsi tse iwang'olo ne iwamene . Tsawakala wahingwa , wadununzighwa na watendelighwa ghehile .
58011038	Tsang'aibamighwe bae iwanu we isi yose ino wakale ne iwanu ka awo . Tsawang'ali woyungayunga kunyika na mpfidunda , tsawakala mne tsimango na mne mipondo muisi .
58011039	Iwanu wano wose watogholighwa ka wahuma kwa ukutoghola kwawo . Hata apfo ng'awabokele bae aghala ghalongile Imulungu ,
58011040	kwaapfila Imulungu tsakatutendela twetwe chinu chinoghile ghendo kubita chawabokele wawo , ili wawo waleke kukamilika bila twetwe .
58012001	Apfo ka pfatuli ne kingili kulu lye iwakalangama hambele hetu , tuleke chila mtsigho ghwatwinagho na nzambi iitunanahila , na mna mdawalo ghwa kutsuma ighwikighwe hambele hetu tutsume kwa kududumila .
58012002	Tumtsodelele tsinenge Yesu iyanduse ukutoghola kwetu na iyatsoitimitsa . Kwaajili ye ndeng'elelo ikighwe hambele hake tsakaududumila msalaba , tsakona ichinyala si chinu bae , naye kokala ghumoko ghwa kujilo ghwe chighoda che undewa che Imulungu .
58012003	Mumkumbuke Yesu , pfadununzike na iwanu wane nzambi pfawamwihile . Lelo mleke kwipfa na kutenyuka ghumoyo .
58012004	Mne ukwihisanya kwenu na nzambi ng'ana mwihisanye mbaka mlapfe idamu yenu .
58012005	Pfii msemwa imbuli ila ya kughuma ghumoyo ahala Imulungu hayomkemani mwemwe iwanaghe ? Mwanangu uleke kubetsa Imtwatsa hayokukanya , kuya hayokukembela uleke kutenyuka ghumoyo .
58012006	Kwaapfila Imtwatsa komuhigha chila imunu iyomnoghela , na komkanya chila imwana iyotogholighwa naye .
58012007	Mdudumile ahala hamkanyighwa , Imulungu kowatendelani ka iwanaghe . Apfi imwana wachi yang'okanyighwa na aba wake ?
58012008	Ka ng'amkanyighwa ka pfawokanyighwa iwanaghe wose , mwemwe si iwanaghe ghendo , ila wana halamu .
58012009	Kubita agho , twetwe tsatukala na aba tsetu iwatweleke iwatukanyile , na twetwe tsatuwatoghola kwa chinu acho chawatendile , lelo ambe pfinogha ng'ani tung'amtegheletsa ghendo Aba wetu wa kulanga , ili twing'ighwe ughima .
58012010	Aba tsetu iwatweleke tsawatukanya kwa matsuwa madodo ka pfawonile iwenyegho pfinogha , ila Imulungu kotukanya kwa ukutwapfila twetwe , ili tuwe wahenzeluka wake .
58012011	Lekeni sambi ukukanyighwa si chinu cha kudeng'elesa bae , ila chinu ichighala usungu , lekeni hambele ukukanyighwa kutsoghala ghamapfuno gha tindiwalo na ukukala kwa kumnoghelesa Imulungu kwa awala iwakanyighwe .
58012012	Lelo mghaghume ngupfu ghamoko ghenu ighaleghele , kuya mgholose ghamaghoti ghenu ighaleghele .
58012013	Mghendelele kubita mne inzila iigholoke , ili achila ichiholole chileke kugholojoka ila chihonetsighwe .
58012014	Mwiyunde ghendo kukala kwa tindiwalo ne iwanu wose na kukala kwa uhenzeluka , kwaapfila kuduhu imunu iyatsomwona Imtwatsa ka ng'enzeluke bae .
58012015	Mwalangitse ghendo , imunu wowose aleke kuhungukiwa na uluso we Imulungu , aleke kuwa ka sina lya usungu ilitula na kuwaghalila maghayo iwanu wengi .
58012016	Kuleke kuwa na mghoni wala imunu yang'ompfuka Imulungu bae , ka Esau iyautsile uhatsi wake wa kuwa chaudele kwa chijo chimwe .
58012017	Kwaapfila mwomanya hata hambele habamile kuipata keli ibalaka ila , tsakalemighwa kwaapfila ng'adahile bae kughalusa chayatendile , hata ka tsakaibama ghendo kwa masotsi .
58012018	Mwemwe ng'ampfikile bae hane chidunda Sinai ka iwanu wa Isiraeli pfawapfikile , chidunda ichidaha kukindighwa , aku chakwaka ghumoto , hane liwingu titu , ichisi na libeho kulu ,
58012019	na litsi lya malati na litsi ililonga mbuli . Iwanu wala iwahulike litsi alyo , tsawalomba kwa ukudedetsa waleke kuhulika keli ,
58012020	kwaapfila ng'awadahile bae kulibokela laghitso ililongighwe , “ Hata mnyama ang'achidonza chidunda acho , atowighwe ghamabwe mbaka afe . ”
58012021	Agho ghose ghawatenda wapfuke sideke , mbaka Musa kalonga , “ Nodedema na ukupfuka ! ”
58012022	Lekeni mwemwe mchipfikila chidunda Sayuni , hane ghumji ghwe Imulungu iyali mghima , Yerusalemu ya kulanga , hamwe ne wamalaika wengi yang'awopeteka .
58012023	Mwemwe mtsa mne mtingano we chihungo che iwanu we Imulungu , iwokemighwa welekighwa wa mwanduso we Imulungu , iwandikighwe mataghwa ghawo kulanga . Mtsa kwe Imulungu , yowahigha iwanu wose na muhe tse iwanu iwomnoghelesa Imulungu iwakamilike .
58012024	Mwemwe mtsa kwa Yesu , mlamlitsi wa laghano lya sambi na idamu yake ighumitsighwe yolonga ghanoghile kubita idamu ya Abeli .
58012025	Mwalangitse , mleke kulema kumuhulikitsa yeye iyolonga namwe . Kwaapfila ka ng'awahoneke bae awala iwamlemile yeye iyawakanyile hano muisi , twetwe twodahatse kuhona tung'amlema iyolonga na twetwe kulawa kulanga !
58012026	Litsi lyake tsalihighisa isi ghamatsuwa ghala , lekeni sambi kalaghana , kalonga , “ Nitsoihighisa keli mala lumwe si isi iliheka bae , ila na kulanga pfipfila . ”
58012027	Imbuli ayo “ mala lumwe keli ” yolangusa ghendo ka ipfinu ipfilumbighwe pfitsohighisighwa na kulapfighwa , ili pfisighale apfila ing'apfidaha kuhighisighwa .
58012028	Lelo kwaapfila tubokela undewa ing'audaha kuhighisighwa bae , mleke tumlongele Imulungu mighede , tumtamanile kwa kumnoghelesa na kwa kumtegheletsa na kwa kupfuka ,
58012029	kwaapfila Imulungu wetu ka ghumoto ighuhinya ghendo .
58013001	Mghendelele kwinoghela chindughu .
58013002	Mleke kwisemwa kuwabokela iwahenza mmakaye mwenu , kwaapfila kwa kutenda apfo iwanu wangi tsawawabokela wamalaika aku ng'awamanyile bae .
58013003	Mleke kuwasemwa awala iwali mchifungo ka mwemwe mwohighwa hamwe nawo . Muwakumbuke awala iwodununzika ka namwe mwodununzika nawo .
58013004	Iwanu iwekwelile wehulikitse , mmale au mwehe yaleke kuwasa ne imunu yungi . Imulungu katsowahigha waghoni na watsinzi .
58013005	Mleke kunoghela ng'ani tsisendi , mdeng'elele na ipfinu pfamwinapfo . Kwaapfila Imulungu kalonga , “ Sitsokuleka mbe , sitsokwasa mbe . ”
58013006	Apfo twodaha kulonga bila kupfuka Imtwatsa iyo iyonyapfila , Sitsopfuka bae . Imunu katsonenda choni ?
58013007	Muwakumbuke awala iwang'ali womlongotsani , iwamlongeleni imbuli ye Imulungu . Mkumbuke pfawakalile na pfawafile , mwighale nawo pfawamtoghole Imulungu .
58013008	Yesu Kiristu ka yuyula , ligholo , leloli na ghamatsuwa ghose .
58013009	Mleke kusolighwa ne ghamalangulitso ghangi , pfinogha mimoyo yetu ighelighwe ngupfu kwa uluso we Imulungu , wala si kwa malaghitso ghe ipfijo bae , kwaapfila malaghitso agho ng'aghawapfile bae awala iwaghawinzile .
58013010	Twetwe tuna hanu ha kutambikila , amo awala iwosang'ana mne bumbulika lya ukutamanila lya Wayahudi waghomighwa ukuja inambiko yake yoyose .
58013011	Mtambika mkulu koghala idamu ye iwanyama Hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo , koghulapfa ka inambiko ya kuleghusa nzambi , lekeni ng'uli tse iwanyama tsolakatsighwa kunze mwe kambi .
58013012	Apfo Yesu naye ili yawadeghetese iwanu kwa idamu yake imwenyegho , kadununzika na kufa kunze kwe ghumji .
58013013	Lelo leka tumghendele kunze kwe kambi tukalighighwe ka yeye pfalighighwe .
58013014	Kwaapfila hano muisi twahela ghumji ighukala ila twokalitsa ghumji ighukutsa .
58013015	Lelo kubitila Yesu tumlapfile Imulungu nambiko yo ukumtunya ghamatsuwa ghose , mbuli atso tsa utunitso , tsitso sadaka tsetu hala hatulonga Yesu ka Mtwatsa .
58013016	Mleke kwisemwa kwitendela ghanoghile na kwiyapfa , kwaapfila nambiko ka atso , tsitso itsimnogheletsa Imulungu .
58013017	Muwategheletse awala iwomlongotsani na kuwinza malaghitso ghawo . Wawo wololesa muhe tsenu , kwaapfila watsomlongela Imulungu pfawamsang'anile . Mng'awategheletsa watsotenda sang'ano yawo aku wodeng'elela , ka ng'amuwategheletsa watsosang'ana kwa kusing'inika , na chinu acho ng'achitsomwapfilani bae .
58013018	Mtulombele . Twotoghola ghendo ka mimoyo yetu ng'aitulongela bae tutotsa , mana twobama kutenda ghanoghile mne pfinu pfose .
58013019	Nowalomba ghendo mnilombele Imulungu ambuyitse himahima kuna mwemwe .
58013020	Lelo , Imulungu wa tindiwalo iyamtsilihule Imtwatsa wetu Yesu , imdimi mkulu we iwang'olo kwa idamu iilangusa laghano lya kweli lya ghamatsuwa ghose ,
58013021	awatende mwemwe mkomale mne chila chinu chinoghile chamtenda , mdahe kughatenda ghayobama , na kwa kubitila Kiristu yatende aghala ighamnogheletsa imwenyegho mghati mwetu . Utunitso uwe kuna Yesu Kiristu ghamatsuwa ghose ! Ona .
58013022	Ndughu tsangu nowalomba ghendo , muubokele usenga uno wa kughuma ghumoyo kwa kududumila , aino ibaluwa ndodo hela yanimwandikileni .
58013023	Nobama mmanye ka ndughu yetu Timoteo kalekelelighwa kulawa mchifungo , ang'atsa sambi nitsakutsa naye kumwonani .
58013024	Walamseni wose iwomlongotsani na iwanu wose we Imulungu . Wandughu wa isi ya Italiya womlamsani .
58013025	Uluso we Imulungu ukale namwe mwose .
59001001	Nene Jakobu , imtumwa we Imulungu na we Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu . Nomwandikilani mwemwe ghamakabila kumi na meli yampwililike muisi . Nomlamsani .
59001002	Ndughu tsangu , hamghetsighwa mna maghayo ghoghose ghala mdeng'elele ghendo ,
59001003	kwaapfila mwomanya hamghetsighwa mne ukutoghola kwenu , mwotendighwa mdudumile .
59001004	Mwalangitse ukududumila kwenu kuleke kutsigha , ili mkomale na mtimile na mleke kuhungukighwa ne ichinu chochose .
59001005	Ka yumwe wenu kahungukighwa ihekima , alombe kwe Imulungu , Imulungu iyoweng'a iwanu wose kwa uluso bila ukukembela , naye katsakwing'ighwa .
59001006	Lekeni alombe kwa ukutoghola bila ukwalangula chochose . Kwaapfila imunu iyakwalangula keghala ne ghamawimbi ghe ibahali , ghotowighwa na kwasighwa ne libeho .
59001007	Imunu ka ayo aleke kwipfikitsa ka katsobokela ichinu chochose kulawa kwe Imtwatsa ,
59001008	imunu yakwalangula ipfinu pfibili mmoyo mwake , ng'akwima ghoya bae mna ghose ghayotenda .
59001009	Ndughu iyali mhingwa kobamighwa adeng'elele ahala hakwinulighwa ne Imulungu .
59001010	Naye imunu iyane mali kobamighwa adeng'elele hayatsohulumsighwa ne Imulungu , kwaapfila katsohupa ka luwa lwa kwibagho .
59001011	Kwaapfila litsuwa lyolawa na kunyatsa imimeya , maluwa ghake gholaghala ne ukunogha kwake kwohupa . Apfo pfipfo kwe imunu yane mali , naye katsohupa mne sang'ano tsake .
59001012	Kabweda imunu yula iyodudumila hayoghetsighwa , kwaapfila hatsoluta mne ukughetsighwa katsobokela ghweko lya ughima , lila Imulungu lyawalongele katsoweng'a awala iwomnoghela .
59001013	Imunu ang'aghetsighwa , aleke kulonga , “ Imulungu konighetsa . ” Kwaapfila Imulungu ng'oghetsighwa bae kwa ghehile , wala ng'omghetsa imunu wowose atende ghehile .
59001014	Chila imunu koghetsighwa atende ghehile kwa tsitamaa tsake mwenyegho aku kokweghighwa na ukwonzighwa .
59001015	Kuya , itamaa ila ing'akomala , yakweleka nzambi , na nzambi nayo haikomala , yakweleka lifwa .
59001016	Ndughu tsangu , mleke kubughighwa .
59001017	Chila ghweko linoghile na ilikamilike lyolawa kuchanya , lyolawa kwa Aba we imimwanga ya kulanga , yeye ng'oghaluka bae na ng'olangusa chitango chochose cha uchigheugheu .
59001018	Kwa ukubama kwake mwenyegho katweleka kubitila usenga wa ukweli ili tuwe wa mwanduso mna pfilumbe wose yawalumbile .
59001019	Ndughu tsangu wanoghelighwa , mkumbuke chinu chino , chila imunu asumke kutegheletsa , lekeni aleke kuwa chilabilabi , wala kusumka kwona maya ,
59001020	kwaapfila munu yane maya ng'odaha bae kutenda aghala ighamnoghelesa Imulungu .
59001021	Apfo mghaleke ghose ghehile na nzila tsenu tsose itsihile ghendo . Muibokele kwa uhole imbuli iihandighwe mghati mwenu iidaha kuwakombolani .
59001022	Mleke kwighutsukila kwa kuhulika hela imbuli yake , ila muitendele sang'ano .
59001023	Imunu wowose iyohulika mbuli lekeni ng'oitendela sang'ano bae , imunu ayo keghala ne imunu iyelola chihanga chake mne chilolelo ,
59001024	na homalitsa kwilola , kakuka na baho kesemwa pfali .
59001025	Lekeni imunu iyolola ghoya laghitso ilitimile ilitenda iwanu weyanzale , na koghendelela kulikinda , ng'esemwa bae chayahulike , ila kochisang'ana , imunu ayo katsobweda mne chila chinu choyotenda .
59001026	Imunu wowose ang'ebona ka imunu wa dini na ng'olughoma bae lulimi lwake , imunu ayo keghutsukila imwenyegho , na dini yake yahela sang'ano .
59001027	Dini inoghile na ilihela totso hachinga ha Aba wetu Imulungu , iyo ino ano , kuwapfila iwachuwa ne pfitsuka mne maghayo ghawo , na kukala kutali na ghehile ighali muisi .
59002001	Ndughu tsangu , ka mwomtoghola Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu , Imtwatsa wa utunitso , mleke kuwabaghula iwanu .
59002002	Tulonge katsa imunu mne mtingano wenu kapfala tsipete tsa nzahabu ne ghamaghwanda ghanoghile , na pfipfila katsa mhingwa kapfala ghamaghwanda ighalalile .
59002003	Ka mwombokela pfinoghile imunu yula iyapfalile ghamaghwanda ighanoghile na kumlongela , “ Ukale hano hane chighoda chinoghile , ” lekeni mwomlongela imunu yula mhingwa , “ Ghweghwe wime hala , ” au , “ Kala hasi . ”
59002004	Apfi awo si ubaghutsi bae uli mna mwemwe ? Na ukulamla kwenu ng'akulawa bae mne mbutsi tsihile ?
59002005	Ndughu tsangu wanoghelighwa , mtegheletse ! Apfi Imulungu ng'awasaghule wahingwa we isi ino kuwa matajiri wa ukutoghola na kuhala undewa wawalongele katsoweng'a wala iwomnoghela ?
59002006	Lekeni mwemwe mwowabetsa wahingwa . Apfi si iwanu wane mali bae iwombunzani mwemwe ? Apfi si wawo bae iwowaghalani mwemwe mne libalatsa ?
59002007	Apfi si wawo bae iwoliligha taghwa linoghile lye Imtwatsa , mwemwe yamli wanu wake ?
59002008	Mtsotenda pfinoghile ka mwoghakinda Ghamalaghitso gha chindewa , ighali mne Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka , “ Mnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela ghumwenyegho . ”
59002009	Lekeni ka mwowabaghula iwanu , mwotenda nzambi na mwohighighwa ne Ghamalaghitso kwaapfila mwemwe ng'amkindile bae Ghamalaghitso .
59002010	Kwaapfila imunu iyokinda Ghamalaghitso ghose na kuleka kukinda laghitso limwe , imunu ayo kana totso lya kuleka kughakinda Ghamalaghitso ghose .
59002011	Kwaapfila yuyula iyalongile , “ Uleke utsinzi , ” pfipfila kalonga , “ Uleke kukoma . ” Ka ng'utenda bae utsinzi lekeni kwokoma , ghweghwe ng'ukinda bae Ghamalaghitso ghose .
59002012	Mlonge na mtende ka iwanu wala iwatsohighighwa kwa Ghamalaghitso ghala ighotenda iwanu weyanzale .
59002013	Kwaapfila Imulungu ng'atsomwonela libatsi bae imunu wowose iyalihela libatsi . Lekeni libatsi lyohuma ukuhigha .
59002014	Wandughu tsangu , apfi pfinogha imunu kulonga komtoghola Yesu aku ghamatendo ghake ng'agholangusa apfo ? Apfi ukutoghola ako kodahatse kumkombola ?
59002015	Tulonge , kwomwona ndughu yako au dada yako kahela ghamaghwanda na kahela ichijo .
59002016	Naghwe kwomlongela , “ Ughende tseghamba , ukwote ghumoto na ukaje wighute , ” lekeni ng'umwing'ile bae ichijo au ghamaghwanda . Apfi chutendile chomwapfila choni ?
59002017	Pfipfila ukutoghola kuliyeka , ka ng'akulangusa ghamatendo , akwo kufwa ghendo .
59002018	Lekeni imunu kodaha kulonga , “ Imunu yumwe kotoghola , na imunu yungi kana ghamatendo ! ” Na nene nitsomwidika , “ Unilanguse lelo ukutoghola kwako kulihela ghamatendo . Nani nitsokulangusa ukutoghola kwangu kune ghamatendo . ”
59002019	Apfi kwotoghola ka hana Imulungu yumwe ? Pfinogha ! Na ipfinyamkela nawo pfipfila wotoghola pfipfo aku wodedema kwa kupfuka .
59002020	Kwambotsi ! Apfi kwobama ulangusighwe ka ukutoghola kulihela ghamatendo kwahela isang'ano ?
59002021	Pfii imbala wetu Abrahamu pfatendighwe kanogha hambele he Imulungu ? Ambe kwa kubitila ghamatendo ghake , hamlapfile imwanaghe Isaka awe nambiko hanu ha kutambikila .
59002022	Mwakona ! Ukutoghola kwake na ghamatendo ghake ghasang'ana hamwe . Ukutoghola kwake tsakutimila kubitila ghamatendo ghake .
59002023	Apfo Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimila , aghala ighalongile , “ Abrahamu tsakamtoghola Imulungu , na kwa ukutoghola kwake , Abrahamu koneka kanogha hambele he Imulungu . ” Apfo Abrahamu kakemighwa sale we Imulungu .
59002024	Mwakona , imunu kakoneka kanogha hambele he Imulungu kwa ghamatendo ghake na si kwa ukutoghola kuliyeka bae .
59002025	Pfipfila , Rahabu ayula pinga chiweghe katendighwa kanogha hambele he Imulungu kwa ghamatendo ghake , hala hayawabokele wapelembi na kuwalapfa kunze kwa nzila ingi .
59002026	Ka apfila lukuli bila muhe lufa , pfipfo ukutoghola bila ghamatendo kufa .
59003001	Ndughu tsangu , mna mwemwe mleke kuwa na walangulitsi wengi , ka pfammanya twetwe walangulitsi tutsohighighwa ng'ani kubita iwanu wangi .
59003002	Twetwe twose tutotsagha . Ka imunu ng'ototsa bae mna ghayolonga , imunu ayo kakomala , kodaha kululongotsa lukuli lwake lwose .
59003003	Twetwe twakwoha imitsabi mne milomo ya falasi kuwatenda watuwinze , na twodaha kutsilongotsa ng'uli tsawo tsose kwokwose kwatubama .
59003004	Ebu uloleni mnumbwi , hata ka mkulu ng'ani na wosolighwa ne libeho likulu , wodaha kulongotsighwa ne mtela mdodo , nawo woghenda kwokwose mlongotsi kwoyobama ughende .
59003005	Pfipfo kwa lulimi , chilungo chidodo che lukuli , lekeni cheghodela pfinu pfikulu . Lola isesi ya ghumoto pfaidaha kutenda muhulo ghulakale .
59003006	Pfipfila lulimi lweghala ne ghumoto , lwakwima hanu ha chila chinu chihile mghati mwe pfilungo pfetu , lwoluteda lukuli lwose lufinale na lwolakatsa ughima wose , nalwo lwakwaka ghumoto ighubwinighwe jehanamu .
59003007	Iwapfilumbe wose , iwanyama we kumuhulo , iwapfideghe , iwanyama iwotambala ne iwasomba wodaha kufughighwa , na ma wafughighwa ne iwanu .
59003008	Lekeni lulimi , haduhu imunu iyadahile kulufugha . Lulimi lwiha na ng'aludaha kulongosighwa , lumema sumu iighala lifwa .
59003009	Kwa lulimi twomtunya Imtwatsa na Aba wetu , kwa lulimi lulo twowalighita iwanu iwalumbighwe kwa kwighala ne Imulungu .
59003010	Mlomo wuwula wotunya na wolighita iwanu . Ndughu tsangu agha ghaleke kulawila !
59003011	Apfi mbwibwi yodaha kulapfa ghamatsi ighanoghile na ghane munyu ?
59003012	Ndughu tsangu , apfi mkuyu ghodaha kweleka ng'owo , au mkowo kweleka ng'uyu ? Pfipfo mbwibwi ye ghamatsi ghe munyu ng'aidaha bae kulapfa ghamatsi ghanoghile .
59003013	Yuhi mghati mwenu yane ihekima na tsimbutsi ? Yalanguse ghamatendo ghake ighanoghile kwa kukala pfinoghile , ghamatendo ighotendighwa kwa uhole na ihekima .
59003014	Lekeni ka imimoyo yenu imema chepfu chine usungu , ukwinoghela wenyegho mliheka na ukwibaghula , mleke kwighoda kwa kulonga ughutsu na kuulema ukweli .
59003015	Ihekima ayo ng'ailawa bae kulanga , ila yolawa bahano muisi , si ya Ghumuhe we Imulungu bae , ila ya chisetani .
59003016	Kwaapfila chila hane chepfu na hane iwanu iwenoghela wenyegho waliheka , aho hana hengele na chila chinu chihile .
59003017	Ila ihekima iilawa kulanga tanu idegheta , yonoghela tindiwalo , ihola , yotegheletsa mbuli tse iwanu , imema libatsi na ina ghamatendo ghanoghile , yahela ubaghutsi wala ung'enye .
59003018	Ipfinu ipfimnoghelesa Imulungu pfolawa mne mbeghu itsihandighwa mne tindiwalo ne iwanu iwoghala tindiwalo .
59004001	Chihi ichiwatenda mwitowe na mwighobole mghati mwenu ? Si tsitamaa tsenu tsihile bae itsitowagha mghati mwe ng'uli tsenu ?
59004002	Mwobama pfinu lekeni ng'ampfipata bae . Mwokoma na kwona chepfu , lekeni ng'amdaha bae kupata pfambama . Apfo mwetowa ne kwighobola . Mwahela pfinu kwaapfila ng'amumlomba Imulungu bae .
59004003	Hamlomba , ng'ambokela bae , kwaapfila mwolomba kwa tamaa tsihile , mwolomba pfinu apfo mpfitumile kwa tamaa tsenu .
59004004	Mwemwe iwanu yang'amtogholighwa ! Apfi ng'ammanya bae ka kuwa sale we iisi kumwihila Imulungu ? Imunu wowose iyosaghula kuwa sale we pfinu pfe iisi , imunu ayo katsakuwa mwihile we Imulungu .
59004005	Apfi mwopfikitsa Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghalonga hela haghalongile , “ Muhe iyamwikile Imulungu mghati mwetu kana chepfu ng'ani ? ”
59004006	Lekeni Imulungu katutendela uluso mkulu ghendo . Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga , “ Imulungu kowalema iwanu iweghoda , ila kowatendela uluso iwanu yang'aweghoda . ”
59004007	Apfo mumtegheletse Imulungu . Mumpinge Yehile , naye katsotsuma kulawa kuna mwemwe .
59004008	Msegheleleni Imulungu naye katsowasoghelelani . Mwopfughe ghamoko ghenu mwemwe yamne nzambi , muideghetese imimoyo yenu , mwemwe yamkwalangula ipfinu pfibilii mmoyo !
59004009	Mlile , mwiyayane na kwona usungu . Chiseko chenu chiwe chililo , na ukudeng'elela kwenu kuwe usungu .
59004010	Mwihulumse hambele he Imtwatsa , naye katsowenulani .
